1.content:
On your 20th birthday, you get a plush toy from your girlfiend. You are too old for a plush toy, but you don't dare say that to Sally. Sally is 19 and is into dolls like a little girl; she never really grew up. Sally's father is a toy maker. It was Sally's father that made the plush toy that she gave you. It's a very well-made plush toy and is so soft that you cuddle with it nearly every night in bed. You know that it's childish to sleep with a toy at your age, but its not like you tell everybody about it. The Plush toy is slightly bigger than a cat.
First off, what is your plush toy?



4/7 UPDATE

You don't have to follow the storyline above. Feel free to make your own.
1.title: Plush choice

choices: You rush out of the room
11.content:
Your plush fox is real looking. It even has the brown "gloves" and "boots" of a fox. The fox's eyes are made out of plastic and are black. The orange fur is soft to the touch. You decided that the fox is a vixen. You can't say how you're sure about this, but you're convinced its a she.
A few weeks after your birthday, your vulpine pal comes to life. You're not sure how it came to life. It happened one night when you woke up suddenly with a full bladder. After going to the bathroom, you re-enter your room and see that the plush fox has moved about a foot from where it was on your bed. You also see whiskers on the fox, something you don't remember seeing. It blinks its eyes, with startles you.
"Hello" said the plush fox in a female voice.
Your eyes go wide and you let out a small yelp.
"Oh, be quiet" said the fox. "you want to wake the whole house up?" then, the fox giggled.
"But...but..how?" you stammer.
"Magic" said the fox, matter-of-factly.
"Magic?" you ask. "there's no such thing"
"Don't be too sure of that" said the fox. "that toy maker knows some magic"
You haven't moved an inch since the vixen had first spoken to you. You're too afraid to get near it.
"Hey, I'm not an 'it' !" said the vixen, sounding angry. "I do have a name, you know"
"You do..?" you ask faintly.
The fox nodded.
"What is it?"
"Racheal" said the fox. "come closer. I like to cuddle with you some more!"
11.title: One night

111.content:
You decide to get all up close and personal with your talking toy!

Hey, don't misunderstand, you're still pretty weirded out by this talking, moving toy right in front of you, but you are trying to relax a bit. After all, you still need a full night's sleep, and freaking out isn't going to help.

After taking a few deep breaths, you walk calmly towards the bed and sit down gently next to Raechel. She giggles a bit, you can tell she thinks you're being silly about this. But she's more than happy to hop into your lap and snuggle up to you.

You sit for a few minutes, just cuddling and beginning to enjoy having a living toy. Racheal just might be the best thing that ever happened to you.

She looks up from your lap, and breaks the silence. "You know what...
111.title: Come Hither

choices: You ask Racheal for more infomation
1111.content:
Hungry? How can a toy be hungry?
Racheal giggles a bit when she sees your puzzled look.
"What do you wanna eat?" you ask. "there are some cookies downstairs.."
"Sounds tempting" said Racheal. "but no"
"Well..." you say. "there are some steaks in the freezer"
Racheal snuggles against your clothed chest. "You're getting warmer" she saids.
"Warmer, eh?" you ask. "so...you want some meat then?"
"Yes" said Racheal, who grins. You see a total of eight teeth. You hadn't noticed those teeth before. The teeth are pointed, but are made out of plush. The teeth are not that big.
"I said that toy maker knew some magic" said Racheal. "he made me alive with that magic. I'm alive in every sense of the word; I need food just like you do"
"Well...what do you wanna eat then?" you ask.
In answer, Racheal licks your face with her plush tongue. The tongue feels soft and tickles your face. "You" said Racheal.
"You wanna eat me?" you ask. "but why? I'll die"
Racheal giggles at that. "No you won't, silly! I'm just a toy and toys can't digest food"
"Well, why do you wanna eat me then?" you ask.
"Because I like you" said Racheal. "And don't worry. You won't be harmed in any way. In fact, you just might like it"
1111.title: Food talk

choices: Step over her lips and past her gums...
11112.content: Your getting smaller by the second! Within aa minute you're only a foot tall and after a minute more you're only an inch tall! Luckily you stop shrinking then. Racheal puts her head down next to you and licks you teasingly. She than opens her mouth and, unless your eyes are playing tricks on you, she has more teeth than before! There are at least twenty! Racheal your thoughts with a comment, "Are you getting in or am I going to have to make you?"
11112.title: Bite Size

111121.content:
Rachael's open mouth certainly looks more life like than before. Her teeth look sharp and her tongue looks real enough. It's as if this plush toy is turning into a real fox before your eyes! You consider running from the wide open maw in front of you but something tells you to enter her mouth. You don't know why you want to enter her mouth but you feel you can trust Rachael that you won't be hurt. You step over Rachael's lips and onto her tongue. Not only her teeth look more real but her tongue feels like the real thing! She even has gums!
Rachael moves you in her mouth, savoring your taste. You're bounced around the mouth afraid that you might be impaled on one of her teeth but you don't.
"You taste delicious" said Rachael. Then she gulps you down, sending you down her gullet.

The muscles in the throat push you down, down and down until you're forced through a tight ring of muscle and you enter a large chamber that could only be her stomach. You don't land with a splash into stomach acid but land with a soft thud. There's so stomach acid at all and the floor of the stomach is soft like velvet. It takes your eyes several minutes to adjust to the dim light in the stomach. The light inside the stomach comes from the walls.
The inside of the stomach is a strange mix of organic and plushy material. The floor and the walls are made from what looks like velvet and the top of the stomach seems to be organic. The stomach chamber is perhaps 20 feet in diameter. It's quite cozy in here.

"Told you" said Rachael. "you love it in here don't you?"

"Yes.." you say.

"Just sit there and relax" said Rachael. "you're gonna be in there for a while"
111121.title: Fox treat

111122.content:
You didn't say a thin and you began to run as fast as you could.

Racheal just saw you and sighed. Then she said: "then we will have it the hard and somewhat funny way. Run, my little friend." she shouted. "I will give you some advantage. Anyway I will catch you"

You heard that and headed for the door. By the time you reached the door you noticed that Racheal began to moved and chase you. You ran more faster and climb down the stairs. You tried to hide in the living room. But...

"There you are little" said Racheal raising his paw and trapping you with it.

"Please. Don't eat me." you pleaded.

"Don't worry. Like I told you before, you will not be digested." she said.

"I don't care. Please let met go."

"But where are my manners? I have to thank you first for the fun game. I wish this could have been a little longer. Oh well it will be the next time."

Racheal opened her mouth and you saw more teeth. This time there were about twenty-five. She carried you inside her mouth. You tried to grab her tongue but to your surprise it was slippery. You slipped into her gullet and swallowed you. You fell in her stomach, it was dark and comfy.

"You were right Racheal. There is no acid here and in some kind of way I felt comfortable here." you shouted to her.

"I knew you would like it. You were really delicious by the way. I am very tired. You don't mind if I sleep in your bed right?" she asked.

"No of course not."

"Well good night, little friend." said as she went to your room. You lied down and slept fast.

In the morning...

"Good Morning. Would you like to get out?" you heard asking you.
111122.title: Little Hunt

choices: Ask her to grow bigget/other questions
1111222.content: Sh let's you out you needed to be normal size so you ask her to grow you to normal as she nods and your back to normal and you wonder if she can get bigger or if she knows about some "fun"?

stop her and start asking questions

You look at her, wondering what she has in mind.
"Oh, like you don't know?" She asks slyly. "Fine! Here's a hint." She sat up on your lap and moved your hands off of her. Instead of being offended though, you're just curious as to what she's doing. She touches her nose to your pant button and your pants completely disintegrate! You automatically try to get her off of you, but she puts her paws on your chest and reaches forward and touches your nose with hers.You hold still as she begins to change size and shape, becoming slightly shorter than you and with a soft, feminine form. Her eyes are different and as you look at them, you realize they're the same eyes that you fantasize about on a girl. She's humanoid in shape, but still retains her foxish physique: slim, small paws(yes, still paws), a long muzzle with pointy ears and a bushy tail...not to mention the cloud-soft red fur that covers her naked body! She rests her large breats against your chest and spreads her thighs over your hardening dick, then begins to lower herself on it when you....
1112.title: ... let's have some fun!"

choices: She has other ideas to have fun
11121.content:
You had thoughts about refusing her advances but your raging hormones says otherwise. You grab her from behind her head and kiss her hard. She returns the kiss just as passionately. She then licks you all over your face with her silky tongue making you giggle. She pulls you closer and bites you gently on the neck. As you're now looking behind her you notice that now she has more than one tail. In fact she has nine and she also gained a bit more height, which makes her the same size as you are. She still has her foxish features. You push back on her while still in her embrace.
"You're a kitsune" you say.
"Is that a problem?" She asks, sounding genuinely curious and worried
In response you kiss her again. "Does that answer your question? Any other human might have a problem but not me"
She smiles and kisses you and the two of you start to tongue-wrestle. You then shove your throbbing erection into her. The questions you have for her quickly die while you two start to do the horizontal mambo. For the next few minutes you two get into a comfortable rhythm. You don't care if this is a crime against nature making love to a non-human. All you care is that this feels absolutely incredible.
You feel yourself inching towards climax and you thrust even deeper. She makes happy little yipping noises almost like a bark.
You release your seed into her, crying/shouting her name.

After some minutes the two of you come down from the orgasmic high. You find yourself lying beside her.

"You don't seem distressed that I'm a kitsune" Rachel says, gently rubbing your cheek.
"To tell you the truth" you pant slightly. "I'm not that surprised when you shifted your shape"
"So it was that obvious eh?"

She licks your face making you giggle.

111211.title: Round two

113.content:
The toy suddenly talking to you is unnatural. Every instinct of yours is telling you to get away from it. As quickly as you can, you bolt for the door, turn the handle, fling it open, and run.

You look back and you see the plush fox actually walking out of your bedroom. You walk backwards up to the living room couch, eying the living plushy warily, then she speaks up, "Why are you afraid of me? Sally gave me to you so I could snuggle you while she's gone."

"W-wait, she knows I sleep with you?" you ask

"Yep" she responds, "and she's glad that you enjoy me as her gift. You think of her whenever you snuggle with me right?"

"I always think of her" you answer.

This fox had a point. Sally is taking college classes and going for a degree in physics. The movies make college look easy. College students are always depicted as party animals with nothing better to do. Anyone that knows Sally knows that is not the case. As a result, she's had little time for you. The plushy was a way to help you know she's thinking of you too even if you never admit to liking it.

"Let's snuggle already. It will make Sally happy" exclaimed Rachael.
113.title: You rush out of the room

choices: Stay here and deal with Rachael yourself
1132.content:
"I'm going to call Sally" you tell Rachael, hoping the fox plush will listen to reason. "Are you calling her over?" asked Rachael as you reach for your cell phone on the counter. "Maybe, it depends." you sigh while scrolling through the contact list. You hope you aren't bothering her.

After you dial, you get an unusually swift answer, "Hello?"

"Hi Sally! I'm so glad to hear your voice. I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time."

Her voice sounded perky, "not at all. I was hoping you'd call me sometime do you want to chat?"

"Not exactly. Well, I wish we could, but I have a situation. Do you remember that toy fox you gave me?"

"Rachael? Oh no, what happened to her. Don't tell me you lost her or hurt her."

"No no, nothing like that. This might sound crazy, but Rachael is, well, alive."

"Alive? Are you drunk or something?"

"You have to listen, she talked and said something about your father knowing magic. I thought I was hallucinating myself. Maybe I am, but now she's walking around. She almost looks like a real fox..."

Rachael walks up to your legs and starts rubbing herself on you like a cat.

"Now she's rubbing up on me and feels like a real cat. I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm shocked at the whole thing more than scared. I just thought maybe you know something."

"Well, you don't sound like you're losing it. Come over and bring Rachael with you if you want."

Rachael wags her tail at those words. She's clearly been listening to the whole conversation.
1132.title: Call Sally

11321.content:
"Okay, I'm coming with Rachael. We'll figure this out" you tell Sally.

"I'll see you soon" she responds before hanging up.

"So we're going?" Rachael asks excitedly while her tail swishes back and forth.

"Yes" you sigh as you realize one big problem. Sally's place is about a twenty minute walk away, but there's no way you should be seen carrying a stuffed animal around. If the toy moves, people might mistake her for a real fox, but all it takes is one nosy neighbor to call the authorities. Pet foxes are illegal in the state you live in without a special license. "Rachael, could I um, carry you in a bag?" you ask, not wanting to startle her by shoving her into one.

She looks down at the ground drooping her ears, "I really don't like being inside boxes or bags. I get scared that I might get forgotten or stuck in there for a really long time."

"I would walk with you, but someone might call the cops and they will lock you up."

"Then I'll stop moving and they'll know I'm a toy" she argues.

"Then I'll have to explain why a 20 year old is carrying a stuffed animal in public."

Rachael suddenly develops a devious smile then slyly asks, "Okay, then I'll carry you. Everyone will think I'm just a wild fox passing by. Better yet, I can do a good job hiding so nobody sees me."

You give her a perplexed look, "How on earth are you going to carry me?"

"Simple" she replies in a know it all tone, "with magic"

You aren't sure what kind of spell she'll cast on you or exactly how she'll 'carry' you, but you have to get to Sally and decide how to go. You think letting Rachael 'carry' you to Sally's might be a bad idea if she doesn't get you there on time. Maybe she'll let you carry her in a bag on the way to Sally's if you let her take you back home on the way back.
11321.title: Out in public

12.content:
You love your Plush Dragon. It has a dark green body with light green on its belly. It has a wicked-looking tail, with spikes coming out of it. Ir has amber eyes, which glow when you shine a light onto them. The dragon's mouth is open, as though as the dragon is roaring. It also has two bat-like wings that are bigger than the rest of the toy. The dragon is sitting on its two hind feet, while its arms are in the air like the arms of a T-Rex. The two arms of the dragon is thicker than your entire hand.
This beauty has set atop of your dresser ever since your birthday a month ago. Despite the dragon's looks, it's quite cuddly. You snuggle it when you're asleep.
And when does the toy comes to life?
12.title: Dragon

121.content:
It still is hard to describe why you like your new plush dragon so much although you´re a "hardened" 19 year old. Maybe because it brings back a lot of good memories from your childhood. You once had a similar dragon plush, and you were also cuddling with it. And it´s from Sally, after all, and deep inside you really love her, thus everything that reminds you of her is somehow special - that doesn´t mean the plush dragon reminds you of her because of its look, of course not!
But if you had known back then what was about to happen with you and the plush dragon, you probably would have thrown it into the garbage can, or into some bottomless hole, in any case far far away from you. Remember the Simpsons Halloween episode where the Krusty puppet comes to live? This here is far worse, including...*shudder* vore!
During a night like any other, the unexpected happens at last. You´re sleeping like a baby, dreaming of things you would never tell your friends about, and you wouldn´t think of anything unusual happening to you. Well, but that´s exactly the case. First of all, you wake up in the middle of the night because you noticed in your sleep that your plush dragon is no longer in your arms.
"Huh? Where is he?"
Suddenly, you can hear a threatening roar, coming from inside your room. You turn your head in fear to see your dragon, and he´s pretty much alive, since he´s moving his body parts like a real animal. You´re trembling as you realize that...
121.title: The Nightmare plush toy

choices: He talks to you some more.
He eats you right then and there
1211.content: Within seconds your little dragon plush toy has gone from being 6 inches long to being 6 feet tall, and still growing! He wraps his scaly(?) tail around you and bashes (yes bashes) through the wall of your bedroom. You get one last look at your home, and the gigantic hole that your plush toy caused, before the dragon takes off into the night. Eventually, it lands in what you think is a mountain cave. Looking at your plushie you'ld say he's about twenty feet tall and a hundred feet long. He grins (yes grins!) at you and then speaks, "Welcome to your new home." You hear his stomach growl ominously.
1211.title: Big Hungry Dragon

12111.content:
The voice of the dragon is deep and slow, as if he's new to talking...or that English isn't his natural language. You back up slowly as you hear the dragon's stomach growl loudly. Your "plush dragon" now looks like the real deal..not that you've seen a dragon before. You were always fasinated by dragons ever since you were little, and that you hoped you'll get to meet one...in stories, of course, because dragons aren't real...are they?


"You can see that I'm very real, human" said the dragon. "and I'm very hungry right now. Hungry for humans"

"Wait..." you start to say.

"I suppose you have about a million questions" said the dragon, taking a deep sigh. "all right...let's start with the basics. My name is Zorksasilal'nalsdinayl--but you can call me "Zorks" for short. I'm a real dragon that's been cursed by a magician named Wiorth for something I did to him 500 years ago...no wait...it's 2007 now...that'll make it...560 years ago. Anyway.."
"560 years?!" you ask. "you're 560 years old?"
"I'm 1,004 years old, if that's any of your beeswax" said Zorks. "I learned to talk from my mother, Nithog...who in turn learned to speak from her mother, Jasmina..who was taught by Odin...but that's a long story"
"Odin?" you ask.
"Norse god" said Zorks. "King of the Norse gods, actually"
"Wait...why are you telling me all this?" you ask.
"Plot points, they have to go somewhere" said Zorks. "anyway, I had many 'owners' over the years with this curse I have on me now" Zorks' stomach growled again, even more loudly than last time.
"Look, you don't mind if I eat you, right?" asked Zorks. "I haven't eaten in 14 years"
12111.title: Zorks

121111.content: "P-please d-don't-" you manage to stutter. You're to speak (let alone move). and with good reason! It won't hurt.Besides, it's not like you can go anywhere." he whispers to you. Zorks opens his mouth wide and stretches out his tounge. He motions with one of his claws as if to say "Go in!" You gulp.
121111.title: Like it matters- oh wait that's been used! XD

'So, this is how it ends,' you think to yourself, 'Eaten alive by a dragon.' You step onto Zorks' tounge and walk into his mouth, all the while trying to pretend that you're walking into a building with a red carpet. As soon as you're in his mouth, Zorks slams upper jaw down, pinning to his tounge. He pushes you back and forth against his upper pallette a little, then he tilts his head back and....

GULP!

1211111.title: *Gulp*

12111111.content:
Zorks' stomach is 10 feet long and probably 15 feet high...which gives you plenty of room to move around. There's ankle-deep stomach acid everywhere, but it doesn't effect you. Strangely enough, you can see in the stomach which should be impossible. The light is coming from a gland-like thing at the end of the stomach which is red. You can hear Zorks' massive heartbeat and you can feel Zorks settling himself down in the cave he's in.

"I haven't eaten a human in 10 years" said the booming voice of Zorks.

"Thanks for not digesting me..." you say as you get into a comfortable postition. You found a comfy nook to sit in. The stomach walls are pink and slimy...and the air is a bit stale in the stomach.

"Can you break the curse?" you ask.

"I don't know" said Zorks.

"What's this gland thing for?" you ask.

"Dragons breathe fire" said Zorks. "that gland produces the fire"

"How?"

"I can't show you while you're in my belly" said Zorks. "you'll be burned alive"

"So what-" the rest of your question is drowned out by a massive yawn from Zorks. "Sorry," he apologizes, "I haven't slept for about... two years. I think I need some rest." Your jaw drops at the thought of anything going without sleep for two years. Soon the entire stomach chamber begins pulsing slowly as Zorks falls asleep. You fall asleep too, lulled by the warmth of the stomach around you.
----Later...----
You wake up back in your bed. "What a wierd dream," you say to yourself, "It felt so real though." You get up and head over to your bedroom door. You reach toward the door knob to open it, and get a good lock at a black-scaled hand. After a moment, you begin to wonder what could've caused this, and only one possibility comes up. "Zorks," you mutter under your breath, "When I find you, I'm gonna clip your wings..." Zorks' open mouth is like an opening to a cave. You see that the teeth is half the size of you! You see his red and glistening tongue, and you can see down his dark throat. You turn around and run out of the mountain cave. You quickly look down to see where you are exactly. It looks as if you're somewhere in the Rocky Mountains. The cave itself is half-way up a mountain and it doesn't look like there's anyway to escape from the dragon that wants to eat you. But wait...you see a faint path that leads away from the cave. 1211112.title: Running is useless

121112.content:
"Actually, I don't mind," you say. Zorks grins widely, revealing his large teeth. He opens his mouth and motions for you to go in. You obey all too happily. There's a loud "SLAM!" as the mouth suddenly shuts. Zorks tosses you around a little with his tounge, and then he swallows you. As you pass through his throat, you notice how warm it is in there. Almost like you're sitting next to a roaring fire...
You must've dozed off, because you come to deep inside Zorks' gullet. You can hear loud gurgling sounds coming from the walls around you, and Zorks' steady heartbeat. You stand up and look around. There isn't much to see, except for a glowing membrane popping out of the stomach floor.
121112.title: EAT ME!!!!

1212.content:
You realize that you're shrinking before your plush dragon. You get smaller and smaller until you're 5 inches tall. Your plush dragon is roughly the size of a real dragon to you now. You cower in fear, wondering what the dragon will do. "Please don't let him eat me" you say to yourself over and over again.
The dragon had jumped from its spot on the dresser to the bed. Now it's stalking you. It also stops short.
"Who says I'm a male dragon?" asked the dragon in a female voice.
"You can talk?" you ask.
"Of course I can" said the dragon.
"But you're just a toy!" you say, half-shouting at this dragon.
"How true" said the dragon. "but I am alive. What's this buiness of calling me a 'him' ?"
"I never.." you start.
"I can read your mind, nimrod" said the dragon.
"Well.." you say. "I just assumed.."
"Don't assume anything" said the dragon. "you humans expect to run into a male dragon all the time. You never expected to run into a female"
"Well, I didn't assume I would meet a dragon ever" you say.
"And why not?" asked the dragon. "there are plently of dragons left in the world. What do you think is the Loch Ness Monster?"
You cower behind your pillow, not wanting to approach the dragon, who is steadily getting closer to you.
"Stay away!" you yell.
"And why would I want to do that?" asked the dragon. "you're so cuddly" At this, the dragon laughed. It was a musical laugh.
"How long have you been alive?" you ask.
"Ever since that human girl gave me to you"
"So, how's come you haven't shown yourself?" you ask.
"You humans have interesting fetishes" said the dragon. "like I know what your fetish is"
All the blood drains from your face as you realize what the dragon is talking about.
"This 'vore' fetish is very interesting to me" said the dragon, coming ever closer. "why would you want to be swallowed alive?"
"I..It's human nature" you say. "I'm not sure why some people have that fetish"
"Why are you backing away from me?" asked the dragon. "I won't hurt you"
1212.title: Talking with the dragon

choices: Try to sweet talk her..a female's STILL a female!
Try to break free of her tight grip!
12121.content:
This dragoness doesnt seem to want to hurt you. In fact, her voice DOES seem quite gentle and affectionate. So what the hey?

You start to approach her.. "Um...so....you have a name?"

She simply replies, "It's impossible to pronounce with a human tongue. So just call me Nithog for short."

Kinda out of stuff to say, you just say the first thing that comes to mind, "So..uh....Nithog...you can read my mind, eh?"

"Mm-hmm"

You decide to play a game with your dragon friend, "Prove it! Im thinking of a number between 1 and a million! What is it?"

"4"

"Damn....ok...now what?"

"4"

"GEEZ! Ok....NOW what?"

"Youre now thinking of your girlfriend Sally naked riding you like a mighty stallion while tickling your-

"WHOA! You ARE good!" you say impressed! For a moment your fear of Nithog fades completely away....at least until she licks you!

*LIIICCKKK!* "MMMMM!!! And so are you!" she says with a wicked grin!

You start to sweat even more than earlier! "Um... as much as Id uh... like to experience what it's like to be eaten alive by a mythical creature...I REALLY DONT! So BYE!" You try to run... but Nithog swipes you with a hand/claw and pins you to the ground with it!

She starts to smile at you, "Now now...I promise to be gentle. It wont hurt!...at least I dont THINK it will.... 'I' wont feel a thing!" She continues to lick you while youre pinned down shivering!

Her grip on your body starts to tighten! You can almost feel the claws start to penetrate your skin! At the very moment.... you have no doubt in your mind that this was the worst birthday EVER!!
12121.title: Enter the dragon...not LITTERALY!

121211.content:
"So..what is a nice-looking dragon like you doing in a place like this?" you ask Nithog.
Nithog loosens her grip on you slightly and laughs a low chuckle.
"I'm happy that you think I'm nice-looking" said Nithog. "humans are usually apalled at the sight of dragons"
"Yeah, I wonder why that is" you say.
"You're stalling" said Nithog.
"No I'm not" you say. "it's just you look beautiful to me. I never considered that a dragon could be as..."
Nithog licks you again with her velvetly soft tongue. "Hmmm..." she saids as she opens her mouth wide. You see all her teeth and into her throat. There seems to be a passageway leading down to...what, a stomach? But toys didn't have stomachs!
"You're quite right" said Nithog. "I have no need for a real stomach since I don't need to eat food. However, I do have a special place inside of me"
Despite your terror, you are curious.
"I see that you are curious" said Nithog. "allow me to show you what I mean!"
With that, Nithog grabs you with her mouth and forces you down. You try to fight her off, but she's much stronger than you are. Soon you find yourself in her mouth entirely. Her teeth are soft and slightly tickle you as Nithog moves you around in her mouth making "Hmmmm"ing sounds. Then, Nithog swallows you and sends you down her throat. You land in a small chamber that would've been a stomach. The chamber is perhaps 10 feet across compared to your size. The lining of the chamber was soft as velvet, and had no exit to it. There's no stomach acids here either, so you're sure that you won't get digested.
"Welcome to your new home" said Nithog's voice all around you.
121211.title: Into Nithog

1212112.content:
"whoa..." you whisper to yourself as you start walking around this chamber that you seem to be trapped inside. You wonder if you'll EVER be able to get out of here....

"Not until Im done with you!" you hear Nithog's voice! DAMN! You should stop thinking to yourself so much...

"Why? You seem so cute when you do that!"

You start to get annoyed, "Umm....would you please stop that? And uh...where exactly am I? And WHY exactly am I here??!!!" The voice continues:

"Youre within me. A special place where I keep my personal toys..."

"Personal toys??" you get a shocked look on your face!

"Oh yes...because I cant exactly EAT my prey, I tend to play with it for quite a while! I have played with thousands of your kind for many years! And I am not fond of giving ANY of them up!!!"

You continue to look around, "Uh...then um...how come Im the only person in here?"

Nithog nearly laughs, "Heh....guess they dont tend to live very long in me, do they? Im not a very good host, arent I?"

NOT something you wanted to hear! Now you start to feel worried! You wont be digested inside Nithog, you'll probably starve to death or maybe get a stroke from the heat inside this warm chamber! You start sweating from the heat and from the fact you will never see your family or girlfriend again...

But then you hear the dragoness voice again, "Awww... dont be sad... perhaps playing with you might cheer you up!"

Just then, someone about your size appears before you! A woman....an odd woman... a pale skinned woman with blue hair, green lizard eyes, horns, wings, and a dragon tail! Weird....yet...BEAUTIFUL...

You become at a loss for words! "What the .....who are..?" She shushes you....and speaks in Nithogs voice!

"Sshhh... relax little toy..." she wraps a hand/claw around you! "Are you ready to experience your little....fetish?" She then opens her mouth and her lizard tongue stretches out licking you across your face!

Your first thought, even though Nithog can hear it, is........... WHAT THE FU-
1212112.title: Oh, it aint weird YET!!

choices: refuse; you two talk some more
12121121.content:
"HOW DID YOU...WHAT THE...?" you shout. The lizard woman laughs.

"All dragons can change forms" said Nithog. "geez, don't you know anything about dragons?!"

"Uh..no" you say.

"Well" said Nithog. "dragons are very powerful magical beings. They have been around since the Dinosaur days. When the meteor that killed all the dinosaurs struck Earth, a few dragons survived and thrived, living off the little mammals that were there. When man came around, dragons decided to change thier forms and into human beings. At first, dragon and human lived in harmony with one another. And then, came the middle ages..."
Nithog sighed.
"In the Middle Ages, there came a dragon that was named Zorks. Zorks was wicked and evil to the extreme. He said that the humans were there simply food for us dragons. I disagreed with him..."
"YOU?!" you ask. Nithog smirked.
"Do you think I'm young?" asked Nithog. "I'm old. Nearly a thousand years old now...I was born in the year 1044"
You gape at her. The lizard woman in front of you looks to be no older than 24!
"At age 24, I was still an hatchling" said Nithog. "Anyway, I disagreed with Zorks. Zorks and I went to war over it...and Zorks won barely. With my army defeated, Zorks's followers went around everywhere, devouring humans left and right. The humans started to hunt down all dragons, wheather they were good or evil. Humans were quite good at killing dragons...they had nearly killed all the dragons. I'm one of the last...."
"You are?" you ask.
"Yes" said Nithog sadly. "I've been so lonely...I want company. Any company"
"But you're just a toy!"
"Thanks to a magician named Merlin" said Nithog.
"Merlin?!" you ask.
"Yep, the same Merlin who gave advice to Arthur" said Nithog. "Anyway, I was badly injured and Merlin healed me. He was one of the few humans that still liked dragons. He turned me into a toy so I could go on living without being hunted. And so, I've been passed to hand to hand until I was passed to you"
You're not sure you believe all that, but you're starting to. Nithog's story sounds impossible, but you are currently in Nithog's body!
"Actually, you're not" said Nithog.
"What?"
"The plush toy you're now in isn't my body" said Nithog. "This is my real body" Nithog pointed to herself.
"Well...not my real one" said Nithog. "I can revert to my real body, but I'll destory your house by doing so. And anyway, If I did that, I'll be hunted"
"So..you want to eat me with that body?" you ask, pointing to the lizard woman in front of you.
"Yes" said Nithog, licking her lips.
"But I'll die!"
Nithog laughs.
"I've eaten lots of people" said Nithog. "and they all are still living inside of me"
"But how?" you ask.
"I can show you if you want" said Nithog.
12121121.title: Nithog's tale

choices: Meanwhile, back with you and Nithog...
Stick with the collector and your roomate...
121211212.content:
As much as you "relish" the thought, you might EVENTUALLY miss your family! "Um...no thanks.. I'll uh...take your word for it."

"Aw..." Nithog closes her mouth, "Always the family thing.... 'Please dont eat me! I have a family! I have a wife and kids!' blah blah blah... geez, that was almost interesting the FIRST 800 times I heard it!"

Now you are REALLY getting tired of her peeking into your thoughts! "Uh... could you PLEASE stop that? There are uh....certain thoughts in my head that are....PERSONAL!!"

She then smiles, "Is that right? Like what? Your little perverted dreams about your girlfriend?...or perhaps maybe about....ME???!!" She grins at you revealing sharp fang-like teeth!

You then get a little angry but you keep your cool, "Oh hahahaha! Sorry, Ms Thog, but you'll never EVER find THAT thought in THIS head of mine!"

"REALLY now?" you have a feeling she's about to read your mind....but you get an idea! You try thinking about a million thoughts at the same time to block out a CERTAIN sick thought! She tries to read your mind but hears too many voices at the same time:

"I LIKE PIE-this aint my sweater-who makes those little fortunes inside fortune cookies-I LOVE MONEY!-memememememe-Geez, Nithog is-$1.99??ARE THEY OUT OF THEIR MIND-who shot J.R.-I STILL LIKE PIE-Love and Inity's what we need upon the streets-If you can hear this, you suck-George W. Bush is an idiot-would love to tap that-MEMEMEMEMEMEME!!!!"

Nithog starts to get a headache..."Oh you are clever, human......VERY clever!"

-MEANWHILE BACK IN YOUR HOME-

There is a knock on your door. Your roomate answers it. At the door, there is red-haired bloodred-eyed teenage boy in a white suit, bowing his head. He speaks in an eerie English accent:
"Good day sir. My master, a collector of sorts wishes to speak with you."

The boy then moves out of the way and gives room to to a long black-haired man with a slight goatee with no mustache in a black fancy suit with sunglasses on.

He speaks in a Czech accent, "Hello sir. Sorry to bother you so late. I have come hearing about a certain birthday gift from a certain girlfriend."

Your roomate answers him, "Oh, my roomate just got a cute little dragon plush toy from his girlfriend."

The man smiles, "Yes... I wish to purchase it. That toy happened to have belong to the great magician, Merlin of King Arthur's court so long ago..."

The roomate is shocked, "WOW! Really?? Come on in! So.... is it valuable?"

"Oh yes....it is an antique and it is the last I need to complete my collection... I will offer ANY price for it!"

The roomate grins, "REALLY??? And uh..... who may I ask is collecting this.....antique?"

The man smiles and takes off his sunglasses..... revealing a pair of green lizard eyes! "Just call me..... DEMITRI ZORKS!!"
121211212.title: The collector...

choices: You and Nithog talk some more
1212112122.content:
Your roommate shouts your name, but of course you don't come.

"I don't know where my roommate is" saids you roommate.

"No matter" said Demitri. "I'll just leave the money here and take that toy"

Demitri looks at Nithog and smiles. "I finally found you" he thought. "after all these centuries, I have found you"

"How much money do you want?" asked Demitri, pulling out a check book.

"Gee, I don't know" said your roommate, whose name is Tom Yelnats. "I think you better wait for my roommate to come back. I have no idea where he is"

"How does $13,000 sound to you?" asked Demitri.
Your roommate's jaw drops open. If it was possible, it would've gone straight to the floor!

"Deal!" saids your roommate.

Demitri smiles and hands your roommate the check. Then, Demitri tells the other man something in Russian. The man nods and goes and picks up the toy dragon.

"Have a wonderful night" said Demitri and he exits the room.
Demitri puts back on his sunglasses and walks behind his human slave. The human slave had put Nithog in a plastic bag. Demitri smiled, knowing the spell on the plastic bag prevented Nithog to read his mind, or any mind outside the bag.
Demitri walks outside and enters a limosuine, driven by another human slave.
The human slave that had Nithog spoke in Russian.
"Don't you worry" said Demitri in his Czech accent. "she won't even suspect a thing until it's too late!"
The limosuine drove to the nearest airport.

--Back to you and Nithog--

Nithog is trying to read your mind again, but you know how to block her attempts now.

"You are really clever, human" said Nithog. "no human has ever tried that on me before"

"Thanks" you say.

Nithog smiles and you, showing you her fangs. You wonder what she looks like in her true form, making sure she can't read your mind.
1212112122.title: Going to the airport

choices: Try to break free of her!
Close your eyes....and await your fate.
12121121221.content:
Back at the airport, Demitri and his group of human slaves get ready and get on their plane. Demitri asked to have his uh...plush doll with him during the flight. Though he got a few odd looks from the attendants, they agreed and allowed him to carry it during the trip.

During the flight, he started to notice the Nithog doll start to shake around a little bit and flash strange colors.

His young red-eyed red-haired slave sitting next to him immediately noticed. "What is that, Master Zorks?"

Demitri grins, "It seems she has yet ANOTHER human playmate with her... she always loved those creatures.."

The kid looks at him, "Is she going to.....EAT him?"

Demitri shakes his head, "Not exactly... the wench has a soft spot for those tiny weak frail skinned mammals....uh...no offense!"

The kid smiles, "None taken..." but he thinks, "You sadistic lizard-eyed bastard...."

Although Demitri hears that...he just laughs.

--Meanwhile, back in Nithog---

"You are amazing human," Nithog said with a smile, "So smart.....so gentle....so..... beautiful looking..." She then looks at you uh.....passionately.

She then says, "You even though you wont admit you have any perverted thoughts of me....I will admit! I had plenty with YOU!" Shen then grins wickedly at you.


You start to blush and get really nervous when she strokes your head with a hand/claw. "Um...I uh...I do have a girlfriend you know..." you try to tell her, but...

"I.....I....MUST add you to my collection!!" she then JUMPS on you and pins you down!! She licks your face a few times.

"W....WAIT!!....I said I DIDNT want to eaten!" you yell at her!

She laughs, "Heh...you act as if Ive given you a choice!" She starts to open her mouth wide like a snake RIGHT over your head!

You start to get terrified, "NITHOG! Please! Please dont do this!!!!!"
12121121221.title: Um....THIS is awkward...

121211212211.content:
You try to break free. Oddly enough, you're successful..sort of. You're able to free one hand from her grip and start to pry your other pinned arm. She laughs and grabs your free hand. That's when you knee her in the stomach, knocking the wind out of her. Appearently, Nithog isn't stronger than you.

"Is that what you think?" asked Nithog. "I like to play with my food!"

You get to your feet, while Nithog is gasping for breath. You look around in vain for an escape route. The only way out of this chamber is the way you came in, which is 20 feet above you and you have no hope to get to it.

Nithog gets up and jumps at you again, but you dodge barely. Nithog grins.

"You may be fast, human" said Nithog. "but soon you'll tire..and there's no escape from me"

She continues her attack but you keep on dodging them. Nithog doesn't look angry; in fact, she's enjoying it! She's right, she's just playing with you until you run out of energy.
"You might as well give up, then" said Nithog, licking her lips.
"But I'm too young to die!" you shout.
"Who says you're gonna die?" asked Nithog.
What?
"You want to eat me" you say. "If you do that, I'll die"
Nithog stops her attack and laughs.
"What's so funny?" you ask.
"You think I would kill you?" asked Nithog.
"You said..."
"I'm going to add you to my COLLECTION, dumbass" said Nithog.
"And your collection is in your stomach?" you ask.
"Yes" said Nithog. "you see, dragons have two stomachs. One stomach is for digesting food, the other one is for storing food"
"But how can you have two stomachs?" you ask. "if your collection is big, then your belly would be bigger"
Nithog smirked.
"Just let me eat you and you'll understand" said Nithog.
"But I don't wanna get eaten" you say.
"I'm so bored hearing that" said Nithog. "you're lucky your not with Zorks. He would digest you"
She jumps at you again, but you dodge again. Nithog is letting you dodge.
"Come on" said Nithog. "I promise it won't hurt...much"
"No!" you yell.
You and Nithog continue to do your little dance of jump and dodge. After 20 minutes, you begin to get tired. Nithog isn't getting tired one bit.
121211212211.title: Playing with her food

choices: The two of you continue your "fun"...
You notice another presence in there with you...
1212112122111.content:
You fall to the ground gasping for breath while she slowly approaches you grinning...

"Did I not tell you'll get tired before I do? Such a cute and dumb creature..." she says while stepping toward you.

Shes right. She hasnt even broken a sweat yet and youre almost dehydrated! You have no choice...

"Allright...allright! I uh....admit defeat. Just...please dont hurt me!" you say barely breathing. "I have no intention to, little one," Nithog tells you.

Just then she swipes at you with a hand/claw and rips your shirt apart! You yell out, "YIKES!" She still smiles, "Sorry...but clothing has such a horrible taste...please take them off!"

You refuse, but youre too shy to say why...

"...sigh...allright. You can keep them on." Nithog's about to extend her jaw and engulf you with it, but then she notices a strange look on your face. She wonders if youre trying to trick her, but all she hears when she listens to your thoughts are:

"I admit defeat-I admit defeat-I ADMIT DEFEAT-I admit defeat- I....admit defeat- I admit DEFEAT- I do not admit success-Defeat is what I admit-You success, me defeat-I still admit defeat"

Apparently she believes you admit defeat.

--Meanwhile back on the plane--

While Demitri Zorks is fast asleep, his young red-eyed slave is staring at the dragon plush doll. It seems he has an idea coming to mind. He puts his hand on the doll and...

--Meanwhile back with Nithog--

Nithog approaches you and starts to open her mouth EXTREMELY wide and brings your head close to it... You close your eyes and wait for your fate. You can feel her lizard tongue start to stroke across your face. Youre thoughts are as followed...

"I admit defeat-I admit defeat-I admit defeat-I ADMIT DEFEAT-I admit DEFEAT-Bite that bitch's tongue out!"

Youre not sure WHY you thought that last thought, perhaps out of desperation...but you listen it, and bite her tongue down as HARD as you can!!!

"AAARRRRGGGHHHH!!!" she lets out a painful scream and you quickly pull your head out of her mouth before she snaps her jaw shut! You continue to bite down on her tongue as it stretched out of her mouth!!

"OWWW!! You know, that wasnt very smart, human!" She says angrily! "Im starting to have second thoughts about putting you in the SAFE stomach!!"

Meanwhile, it seems the red-headed slave seems to be watching you two from afar and says to himself:

"Oh....THIS is getting good!"
1212112122111.title: The French Kiss from Hell...

choices: The plane lands somewhere in Europe
12121121221112.content:
Nithog is glaring daggers at you now. At first, you think that you're going to die. Then, you feel as if someone is in the chamber with you...other than Nithog. Nithog seems to feels the same thing, for she gets a puzzled expression on her face.

"That's not your roommate..." said Nithog slowly. She's no longer is glaring at you, but looks like she's looking for someone.

"Someone has you?" you ask.

"Hush" said Nithog. She closes her eyes and disappears. The pressence you feel is alien to you. You don't know who it is. You can't see him, but you can feel his pressence.

---Outside---

The red-haired human slave notices the plush toy's eyes are glowing purple light. Then, the toy's head moves by itself and looks at the slave.
"Who are you?" asked Nithog.
The human slave quickly lets go of the toy.
Nithog notices that she's in the lap of a human. She looks up to see the face of....NO! It couldn't be! Fear flowed from Nithog as she recongized the human form of Zorks! How did HE track her down?! Last time she heard, Zorks was somewhere in Europe, starting a computer company. Nithog thought she had hidden from him for good. Luckily, Zorks was sound asleep. Nithog looks around wildly and realizes that she's on an airplane.

--YOU--

The pressence you were feeling was gone. What was going on? Then, Nithog appears in her lizard woman body and seems half scared to death.
"What is it?" you ask.
"Z-z-z-orks" she stammers. "he's got me!"
"That's a bad thing" you say. Nithog nods.
"So what are you gonna do?" you ask.
"I don't know" said Nithog. "Zorks is alseep now. We're on a plane, and I have no idea where we're going"
"Can't you do anything?" you ask.
"I can try to get away" said Nithog. "but Zorks will come after me"
"What does he want with you?" you ask.
"To kill me" said Nithog. "I got away from him after I lost the war. Zorks was badly injured by me, and he swore that he will hunt me down and kill me"
"Why didn't you finish him off?" you ask.
"I was in no condition to finish him off" said Nithog. "I almost died trying to get away"
"What will we do?!" you ask. "does he know that I'm here?"
"Probably..." said Nithog.
"How can you get away?" you ask.
"By turning into my true dragon self" said Nithog. "but I would be a BIG target"
You say quiet, regretting that you ever upset Nithog earlier. You would rather be eaten by Nithog than by Zorks.
"Yeah, you would" said Nithog darkly. "Zorks likes to play with his food too..but his food is forced to carry weights to slow food down. And I do forgive you"
"Sorry.." you start to say.
"I know you're scared being eaten by me" said Nithog. "but I promise you, you won't be harmed. But if you bite my tongue ever again, I will change my mind and send you into my nasty stomach"
You nod as you cower. Nithog smirks.
"So, what do we do now?" you ask.
"Stay here" said Nithog. "I'm tired of running from Zorks forever. It's time to kill that bastard"
12121121221112.title: Nithog's discovery

121211212211122.content:
---Outside---

The red-haired slave quickly took his hand off the plush doll when Nithog spotted him! He then says to himself: "Damn! Lizard-woman spotted me! I'll have to be more careful contacting that.....human...."

---Inside---

"Stay here" said Nithog. "I'm tired of running from Zorks forever. It's time to kill that bastard!!"

"NO!" you say, "Im coming with you! I am not sticking around in this humid prison! Plus, that kid..."

Nithog then says, "Allright fine....but if youre coming with me... I have to eat you."

"WHAT? WHY??!!" you burst out!

"It's the only place you'll be safe. If Zorks sees you, HE'LL eat you!!"

You get worried about the thought. Before Nithog could reply to what you were thinking, you yell out: "STOP THAT! I AINT LETTING YOU PEEK INTO MY THOUGHTS ANYMORE!"

Nithog sighs, "Ok ok....I wont intrude."

You finally give in. "Allright, eat me. But just PROMISE me you'll put me in the SAFE stomach! Not the other one!"

Nithog promises, "You have my word"...but deep down she thinks to herself, "Bite MY tongue, will he??!!!"

You close your eyes, "Make it quick..." She licks her lips and stretches them out VERY widely! She grabs you and pushes into her mouth. You start to slide in with ease while tongue starts to tickle your body. Finally she swallows a HUGE swallow and you quickly slide down her throat!

Inside her, you become pushed toward two tunnels... one that leads to safe stomach..and one that leads to the OTHER stomach! One tunnel closes and you get pushed into the other one. There you land into some kind of room with lots of padding and pillows.

It seems like some kind of bedroom with comfy beds and pillows everywhere. It even has beautiful red curtains all around the walls It's nice and cozy. You kinda think to yourself, "Geez, why didnt I let her eat me in the FIRST place?"

Just then, someone appears before you. It's that teenaged slave that spotted you earlier! He grins at you, "Cozy, isnt it?"

"Um...who are you?" you ask him. He bows his head and tells you, "My name is Sadri H'Thiara. And I will need your help in defeating Zorks."

"Zorks?? But dont you serve him?" you ask Sadri.

"Serve him, yes. But I am in no allegiance with that beast! Let's just say I actually serve a higher force destined to be rid of ancient evils such as that!"

You stand up and look him straight in the eye, "Im listening..."

Sadri then makes a wicked-looking grin at you, "Good... because I will need your undivided attention!"
121211212211122.title: Cozy?

1212112122111221.content:
Sadri sits on one of the beds and invites you to sit next to him. You do. You wonder how did Sadri get in here?

"Zorks ate my parents" said Sadri. "he forces me to serve him, or I end up in the toliet"

"So, why do you need my help?" you ask.

"Zorks can read my mind" said Sadri. "I can block his attempts for a short time, but I can't keep it up forever"

"But he can read my mind" you say.

"Not while you're in here" said Sadri.

"I thought this was a stomach" you say. "it looks more like a room"

"Dragons can do anything" said Sadri, as if that explained everything.

"So...which higher power do you work for?" you ask.

"Bahamut" said Sadri.

"Who?" you ask.

"The God of all good Dragons" said Sadri. "it is Bahamut's will that I kill Zorks"

"But how can you defeat Zorks on your own?" you ask.
"I don't intend to" said Sadri. "you and..this dragon.."
"Her name is Nithog"
"You and Nithog will help me to defeat Zorks" said Sadri.
"Zorks sounds pretty tough" you say.
"Yes, he is" said Sadri. "after he ate my parents, I prayed to the Gods for help and Bahamut came to me. He gave me...special powers that Zorks doesn't know about"
"Like?"
"You'll see" said Sadri.
A pause.
"Have you ever seen Zorks in his true form?" you ask.
"Yes.." said Sadri. "he attacked my village in his true form..." Sadri shudders at the memory.
"So, why not use your power to stop him yourself?" you ask.
"My power may not be enough" said Sadri.
"And you think mine and Nithog's are?" you ask.
"Have faith" said Sadri.
"I have plenty of faith" you say. "but I doubt I could beat a dragon like Zorks all by myself"
Sadri smiled. "You won't be alone"
You look around the room/stomach. You don't see anybody else, which make you puzzled. Didn't Nithog say she had a collection? You say this to Sadri, and he grins.
"Look deeper" said Sadri, pointing to a door right in front of the entrance to the room/stomach.
You get up and walk toward the door. You open the door and nearly gasp. Behind the door is a CITY! You see buildings and people walking around.
"What the...?" you ask.
"Dragons can do anything" said Sadri again.
"But how can a city be in her stomach?!" you ask.
"Just because Nithog's in her human form" said Sadri. "doesn't mean her insides are human"
"Wow...dragons have big stomachs then" you say.
"You haven't seen anything yet" said Sadri.
1212112122111221.title: The city in Nithog

choices: Try looking around the city for an escape
Chat with eachother and think of an escape
12121121221112212.content:
You and Sadri take a walk all across the city. There are buildings, houses, cars, parks, even a big statue of Nithog in the center of town!

Sadri looks at you and says, "One of my special powers given by Bahumut is that I can see into the minds of dragons...I managed to find you by slipping into one of her thoughts!"

"Wow..." you say, "Say... have you learned anything... interesting...about Nithog?"

"Well, Ive learned that each person inside this city was put in seperate houses and buildings each for personal reasons and interests."

You get curious, "In that case... where did I end up?"

Sadri gets a sick look in his face, "Sigh...the uh...boudior.."

Youre still curious, " 'Boudior'? Why?"

Sadri shudders, "Let's just say that Ive seen one of her...perverted thoughts about you..... *SHIVER*!!" He shudders just thinking about it!

You almost laugh at the thought...then you think about Nithog's true form...and you shudder too!

Just then something stops Sadri dead in his tracks!

"Sadri, whats wrong?!"

He whispers to you, "It's Nithog....she's going to go up against Zorks herself!"

You ask, "Will she be able to beat him?"

"No... she has still become weakened after her last battle! You and I will need to aid her!"

You then say, "Wait...you still havent said how I could help her defeat Zorks!!"

"I saw how you were able to manipulate Nithog's mind-reading ability! You figured out the tactic to take a dragon by suprise... and that part when you bit Nithog's tongue....not even SHE saw that coming!"

"Oh yeah..." you think about and kinda laugh, "So... what should I do? Think about flowers and hippies and then when Zorks least suspects it, kick him RIGHT in the balls?"

"No, not exactly.." he shakes his head, "But I do have something that will help you in your fight..."

Sadri reaches his hand under his white over-coat and pulls out ANOTHER white over-coat! "Wear this. It's a coat of Yggdrassil. With it on, you'll be able to withstand dragon fire, dragon claws, anything involving an attack by a dragon.... it's the only reason Zorks hasnt eaten me yet..."

You put on the coat of Yggdrassil. It fits snug. Like it was MADE for you! "Sweet....now uh...how do we get out of here?"

Sadri lowers his head, "That, I still havent figured out..."
12121121221112212.title: Sadri and Me

choices: You and Sadri find a way out of Nithog
121211212211122121.content:
"Wait...if people live here, then there must be sewers" you say.

"Uhh...Right" said Sadri.

"So where would those sewers go?" you ask.

"Nithog's other stomach, I guess" said Sadri. "you're not saying we get out THAT way?!"

"Well...unless you have a better idea!" you shout.

"....No, I don't have a better idea" said Sadri.

"Because I doubt this safe stomach doesn't lead to her intestines" you say.
"That would be a safe bet" said Sadri.
"All we need to do is find a way to her other stomach..." you say.
"What about her stomach acid?" asked Sadri. "I'm sure we won't last 4 seconds"
"Will these coats protect us against stomach acid?" you ask.
"....I'm not sure" said Sadri. "it protects against most stuff that comes with dragons. But I dunno about stomach acid"
"When does Nithog plan to attack Zorks?" you ask.
"When we get to Zorks's home" said Sadri. "Zorks lives in a remote mountain valley in Germany....we should get there in about 7 hours"
"So...we have 7 hours to get out of Nithog" you say. "plenty of time, I should think"
121211212211122121.title: The Way Out

choices: Youre about to get thrown up!
It's not gonna be THAT easy!
1212112122111221212.content:
Meanwhile, back on the plane, Demitri wakes up...and notices two things are missing: the doll...and the boy!

"WHAT??!!" he thinks to himself in anger, "I should have known that traitor would try and pull something!! WHERE IS SHE??"

The stewardess then approaches him with a smile, "Good morning sir. I trust you have slept well."

He just smiles back at her, "Oh it was heavenly!" but thinks to himself, "Damn it all! Where did they go?!"

-------Back in Nithog----

You and Sadri snuck down into the sewers and head toward where the current is flowing from.

"Um...how much further until we reach the other stomach?" you ask him.

"Not much further...although I still dont know what we'll do when we get there." Sadri looks at you curiously.

"Well that all depends...if these coats cant be digested...odds are, it will make her sick!" you smile.

He then gets what youre up to! "And then she'll throw us up! Not a bad idea! uh...if it works. But what if it doesnt?"

"Um...nice knowing ya?"

He sighs and lowers his head. Finally the two of you reach the end of your destination, a tunnel leading to stomach #2!

"You ready?" you ask him.

"Not really, Id uh-"

"TOO LATE!" you grab his arm and jump into the liquid swimming into the tunnel!

"AAAAUUUGGGHHH!!!!"

While of swimming in the liquid, you've still yet to be broken down! It tingles, but it doesnt hurt! So you continue swimming until you finally reach the surface of the nasty stomach!

"Heh...well what do you know? It worked!" Sadri says to you impressed!

"Yep yep yep!" you act conceited. But after a couple of seconds, the stomach starts to shake a lot and the liquid starts fizzing!!!

"Um....I sure hope this part of your plan!" he tells you with a concerned look on his face.
"GET READY! HERE WE GO!!!"
1212112122111221212.title: The next departure!

12121121221112212121.content:
The plane that had Demitri on it was going in the opposite direction of the dragon that had appeared some 10 minutes ago. The plane and the dragon was over the Atlantic Ocean, so nobody noticed that a dragon had appeared from no where. Nithog had, of course, teleported the toy and herself out of the plane and out of Zorks's lap. She then reverted to her true form, a thing that she hadn't done in 900 years. She looked like the toy had; Dark green body, with light green on her belly, huge bat-like wings, two arms thicker than tree trunks, spikes coming out of her tail and had hazel eyes. She was much bigger than the plane she had been in. Nithog in her true form was well over 100 feet long. Her wingspan was 140 feet by themsleves. Nithog was close too 1000 feet long and looked like a fierce enemy. She had no hair on her scaley body. The plane was out of sight when Nithog started to feel a pain in her stomach. She knew at once what it was.
Nithog quickly threw up you and Sadri. You're both covered in stomach acid and salvia.
"What in hell did you think you were doing?!" asked Nithog.
Even though it's nighttime, you're able to see Nithog's outline. You can't help but being intimidated by the sight of her in her true body.
"This is S...Sadri" you say, stammering slightly. "he could help us defeat Zorks"
"And how do you suppose you defeat Zorks?" asks Nithog.
"I can block out Zorks's mind reading" you say.
"And while he's doing that" said Sadri. "I can help you fight Zorks"
"A puny human like you fight Zorks?" asked Nithog.
"Ah, I come from a higher power" said Sadri. "I have...certain powers that'll help us defeat Zorks"
Nithog flew over the clouds, so that she wouldn't be seen by humans on the ground. Nithog's hand is bigger than you and her claws are even bigger! You are simply awed at her size. And...how graceful she flies. It's hard to believe that a creature this big can even fly.
12121121221112212121.title: Above the clouds

121211212211122121211.content:
She communicates to each of you via mind and asks Sadri, "So um...young human... how exactly can YOU help us?"

He grins, "Are you famiar with the Hindu religion?"

Nithog says, "Yes...what of it?"

"BEHOLD!" he chants something in Latin and slowly transforms....he starts to grow more and more bigger and he changes...suddenly he grows 6 arms and his skin gets darker. His overcoat disappears and is replaced with golden jewelry all over his body..

You drop your jaw... Sadri's a Hindu God! And he's about the same size as Nithog! And each hand is about 3 times your size! You hope to God you dont get bitch-slapped by ANY of them! Nithog looks at him strangely, "WHAT?....What ARE you??"

Sadri smiles says in a much deeper accent, "I have become Siva the Destroyer! That's the male version of Shiva the Destroyer! Compliments of the great Bahumut!"

"WHAT?! You know Bahumut?!" Nithog asks him.

"KNOW him? I serve under him! And he tells me that the 3 of us must destroy Zorks!"

You start to feel left out, "Um....do I have any special powers as well?"

He looks down at you, "Bahamut says you have a power greater than either of us... but he wont tell me what it is!"

Just then you hear a loud yell in a Czech accent!

"TRRRRRAAAAAIIIIITTTOORRRRSSS!!!!!"

You turn your head and see an angry black haired fancy-suit wearing man with lizard eyes!

"Who the hell are you?" you ask unpolitely!

Nithog yells, "SSSHHHH!!! THAT'S Zorks! Do NOT enrage him!!!"

You dont seem threatened, "Umm....THAT'S him? Geez, I didnt know....I'll start shivering in fear now...BRRRR!!" you say sarcasticaly!

Zorks laughs.... "Heheheh...stupid human. You have no idea what you're about to put yourself into... other than the stomach of a hungering dragon!!!"

His eyes start to glow, strong wing blows through his hair, wings rip out from his back and a powerful bright light shines around him!!

You now suddenly have a bad feeling about this...
121211212211122121211.title: The Confrontation

1212112122111221212111.content:
But something else catches your attention, what looks like an aircraft breaking the sound barrier comin right at you. But as i gets closer you notice it doesn't at all look like a plane, but a dragon.
'i see it too' says Nithog in your head 'and by the looks if it coming at mach 20! that's impossible even for a dragon'
Zorks still hasnt noticed the fast approcing dragon and transforms into his true dragon state
"this is it!" shouts Sadri
Nithog and Sadri turn to face Zorks and are about to clash when a voice enters your head, and by the looks of it Nithog and Sadri's as well
'back away from Zorks or i might hit you as well'
Nithog and Sadri does as the voice says, just as tracers zip past all around Zorks, some hitting him ir glancing off his scales. You look back at the approcing dragon, he's the one shooting at Zorks. Zorks dives out of the way towards the nearby mountain, the dragon perform an air-braking manuver and comes to hover in front of Nithog. By the looks of it, it's male.
"you might have to add one more to how many people are gonna save the world Sadri" he said his eyes still fixed on Zorks, watching his every move.
He looks more human that dragon, although most of his body is covered with some kind of armour, the only parts which you can see that are dragon like is that he has redish black scales a head like a normal dragon hands/claws, similar to when Nithog was in her human like form, the differences that he had a short human like neck. But his wings you wondered the most about, they were a cross between demon wings and angel wings, it was feathered like an angel, pure white, but with horns coming out of the joint. He was flapping them slowly, elegantly.
He puts his chain-rifle (thats right a cross between a rifle and a chain-gun) onto a clip on his back, and it dissapers. You now notice he has swords, 3 and two daggers to be exact, two samuri swords on both sides of his hip, a large long-broad sword which is held inbetween his wings and the sword ends at about his knee from the base of his neck.
"I will not let him harm you brother" he says
You wonder who he is talking to, you look around for any sign of another dragon nearby but see nothing.
he flicks out his two samurai swords and dives at Zorks, breaking the sound barrier soon after making his decent.
1212112122111221212111.title: Hell's Angel

12121121221112212121111.content:
Zorks had just landed when the dragon made impact, it was like a single artilery shell just hit the side of the mountain. Nithog landed nearby and put you down, and went to take a closer look, you could see enough from where you were standing. Zorks was on his back with the dragon standing over his, with the tip of his sword at his neck.
"What are you waiting for Draegon? Kill him!" yelled Nithog
"Can't. It's different this time, i could have back in the war, but not now. Rules say that I cannot harm another dragon unless the dragon are at war. No War, he lives" the dragon says, lifting the weapon away. He slowly walks away from Zorks.
"Wha? How come you didnt tell me this before?" retorts Nithog
"Didnt ask" Draegon replies
Suddely Zorks rushes Draegon and drives a demonic sword staight through Draegon's chest just as he turns around. Draegon half yells in pain, his eyes going wide.
"Unfortunately for you," Zorks says, ajusting the position of the sword, causing Draegon more pain "your rules dont apply to me" with that Zorks lets go of the sword and starts to walk away.
Draegon staggers backwards, the grabs hold of the hilt of the sword and slowly, and painfully, pulls the sword out and drops it. Nithog is too shocked to move, and Sadri has gone missing. Probally gone to chase Zorks you think.
"H..he has" says Draegon, he stits out a wad of blood
"Save your strength, Draegon" protests Nithog
Obviously, they've known each other for a long time
"No! I have to tell him now" says Draegon "he has to know"
"Know what?" you ask, it was the first time you've spoke in a while you were concentrating on the battle to speak "is it about my power Sadri talked about?"
"Ye..Yes" relpies Draegon, he was starting to struggle speaking the words
He starts to walk towards you when he trips and falls, the ground trembles slightly. He turns into his Human form, he looks like a real human, he has long hai some of which is made to look like his dragon horns, he was just taller than you, his weaponry and armour remained, as well as his wound. Somehow you've seen him before, but you dont know were.
"You have to remember your past lives...you must remember.....brother"
The last word shocked you
"I cant be your brother, I'm human!.....Arent I?"
You feel him looking though your memories, but he's very specific and quickly finds what he's looking for
"This should help" He says

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------

You find yourself in a small white room
You are sitting down lokking at the white floor
then someone stops infront of you, you look up to find Draegon looking down on you
he smiles "after looking all around the after life I finially find you!"
"Brother? Why are you here are you dead too?" you reply emotionlessly
"Not quite, come with me, you belong somewhere again"
"But I cant go, if I'm dead then i deserve to be here"
"NO YOU DONT!! You dont deserve to be here for my mistakes, not ever!" he looks away, you see tears in his eyes.
"What is it?" you ask
"My very life is now devoted to getting vengence for the fallen, now that I have for you and the others, you my have life once more"
He grabs your hand and pulls you onto your feet and drags you through one of the walls. You feel youself coming to life again.

You wake up laying face up in the middle of a road, the first thing you notice is that you breating, and you have a heartbeat once more. You get up and look down the road, you see the light of a city in the far distance, Draegon appears next to you.
"This is where is started" he says
"Where are we?" You ask
"It's a one planet dimension called the Nexus, only available to dragons, they come here when they die in there original dimension, wher they can live, fly whatever dragons normally do, but whats special is that they have a portal in the cit which can transport you to other dimensions, thats how I got to you" he explains
"But if its for dragons only, then how are we here?" you ask
"Well i was part dragon from when we found the DragonHeart crystal, it changed all of us part dragon, but only I was sent here, maybe it was fate, or luck that I was sent here, but in the end I got all of you here"
"The others, were are they?"
"In the city, their all dragon knight, as am I, thats another thing you have to complete a certain type of misson to become full dragon and remain here, if not the dimension expels you after a while"
"this is alot to take in"
"you'll understand it more when we get to the city"

------------------------------------------------

"Re...remember yet?" Draegon asks, he is now standing very shakily, clutching he wound
"It's stanting to but I think need abit more, but first, how did I die and what was your mistake?"
"Dont ask something like that child" says Nithog
"No, it's okay, he needs....to know everything if....he cant remember" Draegon says calmly, the worry about the wound has completely gone, you see why as he removes his hand away, it had completely healed
"you died because of my mistake, my mistake was thinking that the goverment was going to always accept us for what we were. They didnt, the president told me personally that he would nuke us in our next battle, i was bound at the time, which was lucky for him. Another mistake i made was not telling you about it, he wouldn't kill us stwithout a fight if I said, and i always though we could always find a way to avoid the blasts. when it happened i was wrong, the blast would have killed us all, but only i I survived, i had no idea why, but i just did. After that i joined the anti-goverment force, hell bent on revenge, that was how Drachte was born, he fed off my anger and chanelled into violence in a fight. I killed the president in the end, but i suicide bombed to do it, thats how i wound up in Nexus. The rest you now know"
You suddenly remember someting, something which would open your eyes to everything

------------------------------------------------

"todays the big day"
"okay, but dont embaress me afterwards"
"I wont, I wont, but becoming a full dragon AND Dragon Knight at the same thing, it something really big"
"I know that's why dont you guys embaress me"
"Now why would i do that"
"Because i know you"
"Fine. How about i take you somewhere after, the Battlestar Galactica Dimension sounds good"
"Maybe i'll think about it" you reply
"Come on it'll be fun killin cyclons" Draegon answers
"You only want to go because you wanna fly a viper" says someone else
"No, it's not because of that, it's because....um..er.....it'll be and adventure?"
"Fine so long as you dont hurt yourselves"

---------------

"By the power of the dragon concil, we give you the life of a dragon, for eternity. We also dub thee a honorary Dragon knight"
there was a explosion of applase
you remember nothing else, but something began to stir within you
12121121221112212121111.title: Sweet memories

1212112122111221212112.content:
Zorks turns into his true form in a matter of minutes. He's slightly bigger than Nithog and Sadri. Zorks's body is black as pitch and has a reddish belly. If you didn't know any better, you'd say that Zorks was Satan himself! Zorks snatches at you, but Nithog dodges him. Sadri, as Siva, shoots out fire form his mouth and directly hits Zorks. This gives time for Nithog to fly away from Zorks.
"What am I supposed to do?!" you shout.
{Don't worry. You'll know}
The voice comes from inside your head, but it isn't Nithog's voice. And it's not Sadri's or Zorks. The voice is male and young.
Zorks moves away from Sadri and goes after Nithog, breathing fire at her. Nithog dodges and breathes fire at Zorks. Nithog has you in her hand and his a vice-like grip on you.
"I can't battle with him with you in my hand" said Nithog in your head.

"Eat me" you shout to Nithog. "I'll be.."
Zorks collied with Nithog in mid-air. Sadri shoots fire again but misses. Zorks digs his claws into Nithog and she screams in pain.
{The power is within you}
What power? You have no power to speak of.
{You must remember!}
Remember what?
Nithog and Zorks are battling in mid-air. The fight moves under the clouds and is headed for a mountain range. Sadri and Nithog is fighting Zorks together, with you barely managing to hold on.
{Remember your past}
My past? What does my past has anything to do with this?
Nithog is knocked into the peak of a mountain. She lets go of you and you fall down and down.
"AHHHHH!!! HELP ME!" you shout.
{Remember what your mother taught you}
What? Your mother didn't teach you how to fight dragons!
You continue to fall and you rush towards the ground. You close your eyes, not wanting to see death coming.
Then, all goes white.

*****

You've emerged from your egg finally. You pant as your young body is tired from getting out of the egg. You belch a small spark of fire. You hear someone chuckling above you. You look up, and see your mother for the first time...

*****

You snap open your eyes. You're not dead. Sadri has saved you at the last possible moment. Nithog and Zorks are still battling far above you.
"Thanks" you say.
"Bahamut saids that you will find your power on your own" said Sadri. "now, I must go help Nithog"
"Wait!" you shout. "what am I supposed to do?!"
It goes all white again...

****

You are flying unsteadily through the air. You're flying right behind your mother. She is teaching you how to hunt.

***

"Are you alright?" asks Sadri.
"I think so" you say.
{Your mother needs you}
But my mother is back in the United States..
What the hell was going on?!
1212112122111221212112.title: Long-forgotten memories

choices: Let's play with Zorks for a while!
12121121221112212121121.content:
{Dont let your mother down}
"WHO ARE YOU???" you scream out loud! Zorks then eyes you, and tosses Nithog aside!

You look Zorks STRAIGHT in the eye... and shiver in every part of your body!

*****
Youre looking up at your mother.
"Mom... will I be a great warrior... just like daddy?"

"Oh, Im sure you will... you will become the BEST! Your father will see to that..."
*****

WHAT THE HELL IS HAPPENING?? Who was that dragon? And who is this 'father' you were talking about??!!

While youre phased out, Zorks grabs you and picks you up to eye level.

"All this fight is making me hungry... care to help me with that problem, human?"

You start to scream as loud as you can!!!

{She didnt lie...}
You start to recognize that youthful voice... that can only be none other than...

*****
You sneak up behind your mother and suprise her!
"BOO!"

She jumps and looks at you suprised and shocked!
"How? How did you do that? A dragon can always sense others around! How were you able to..."

"Heheheh! I'll never tell!"

*****
A blinding white light flashes! And everything becomes white...
----------------------------------------------------
"Wh....where am I?" You look around and then see.... YOUR FATHER???!!!

"Hello son!" he smiles.

You look at him shocked "Dad?....but I thought you were.."

"Dead?... oh death is only the beginning. Bahumut's spirit will always live on.."

"BAHUMUT???!!!" You then remember your father's initals... 'G.D.B'...'Gregory Daniel Bines'...

*****(human life)
When you were 6, at your father's funeral...
"(sniff)...is Daddy gone...forever?"

"No son... his body may be gone... but Gregory Daniel Bines will watch over you ALWAYS!"
***** (Dragon life)
When you and the other dragons gathered all around your father's skeletal corpse.
"(sniff)...is Daddy gone...forever?"

"No son... his body may be gone... but the Great Dragon Bahumut will watch over you ALWAYS!"
******

'G.B.D'....'Great Dragon Bahumut'?!

"Do me a favor, son... kick Zorks' scaley black-hearted ass!"
------------------------------------------------------

While in Zorks hand, you suddenly disappear...
"WHAT??!! WHERE DID YOU....AAUUUGGHH!!"

You drop-kick him RIGHT in the back of the head!

Zorks gets upset, "HOW??!! YOU COULDNT HAVE GOTTEN PAST ME WITHOUT ME KNOWING!! HOW DID YOU....??!!!"

You smile at him and say, "Heheheh! I'll never tell!"
12121121221112212121121.title: The Son of Bahumut

choices: You, Nithog and Sadri live happily ever after
121211212211122121211211.content:
When you vanished from Zorks's hand, Zorks looks everywhere for you. Then, Zorks realizes that he is on a giant hand...YOUR HAND! But not that hand of a human.
You finally remember that you are the son of Bahamut, and that makes you a God. Well...demi-god, anyway...since your mother was...Nithog?! You don't fully understand this, but it makes sense. Right at the moment where you remember this, you turn into your dragon self. If Zorks and Nithog was big, then you were huge compared to them. In your true form, you are about 10,000 feet tall. You have a silver body and a golden belly. Your wings are silver and can cover mountains! Nithog and Sadri stop and stare at you. Hey, if they thought you were big, than they should oughta see your father!
Zorks tries to escpae from you clucthes, but you bring him to your face.
"You know, I'm hungry too" you say. With that you toss Zorks into your mouth and swallow him whole. "Yum" You know that's cannibalism, but you don't care. Let Zorks melt away in your stomach!
"Uhh..human?" asked Nithog.
"You can plainly see that I'm no mere human" you say. "I am Sehr, son of Bahamut...daughter of you"
"Me?!" asked Nithog. "but, I never..."
"I don't see how that's possible" said Sadri.
"Me neither" you say.
You all revert to human form, as to not attract any attention to nearby humans.
121211212211122121211211.title: Sehr, Son of Bahamut

1212112122111221212112112.content:
