Sadri then looks at Nithog weirdly, "To think, you actually wanted to......EGGGHHH!!...with this human!"

"What? The creature's kinda cute.." Nithog said with a smile, "Guess he reminded me a bit about his... 'old' father..."

"Nevertheless," Sadri says, "Sehr...Nithog... My work here is almost done...only one thing left to do.." He pulls out a pair of knives and stabs Nithog in the back!

"AUUGGHHH!!" Nithog screams and falls to the ground! You grab Sadri by his coat and yell, "WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING??!!!"

"Humans and dragons cannot coexist with eachother.. and the second stomach is not made for storing a city in!"

"BUT...SHE SAVED US!! I'm gonna tear both your arms off!!" You say in anger, about to kill him!

Sadri just smiles, "You wont in a minute... in fact, you'll thank me..." Then Nithog starts to glow... and her wings, fangs, and horns disappear... and her lizard change to hazel... she gets up, and you notice, she is COMPLETELY human!

"Wha...what happened to me?" She looks puzzled. "One of Bahamut's last request before I can return to my REAL master" Sadri tells her.

"Wait a minute... you said Bahamut was your master! You joined him ever since Zorks ate your parents! Was that all a lie??!!" You say to him confused.

He lowers his head in shame... "Im afraid so.. I actually serve a much...HIGHER person. And THEY told me to help Bahamut and his son, Sehr save the world.."

You and Nithog ask, "Just... who ARE you???"

He smiles and bows his head one last time, "A prisoner of my own actions... I have a done a lot of things I regret.. and now I must pay for them." And then he disappears!

Then you and Nithog look at eachother... "So um... what was my 'old' father, Bahamut, the god of dragons, like?"

She looks oddly at you, "WHAT??? He never told me... oh...." She then smiles at you, "So THAT'S how you suprised me when you were little, wasnt it???"

You just smile at her and say, "Heheheh... I'll never tell!"

----Meanwhile.....elsewhere...-------

"I thank you Sadri... for helping my son..."

"I have what 'he' has told me... therefore, I must return to 'him'..."

"But Sadri... isnt 'he' working you a little too hard?"

"I dare not say... I am owed my eternal soul to 'him'. I am to do 'his' bidding... no matter WHAT it is?"

"Do you think... 'he'll' ever... let you go and run your own life once again?"

"I'm not sure.... Chronos is a very obsessive God... If I didnt THINK of leaving him...."
1212112122111221212112112.title: Sadri's REAL employer...

121212.content:
As you try to wiggle free, you hear Nithog say, "Do not try to wiggle free. It is useless even if you try."

Then you realize that she was right.

"Now, don't worry, I won't digest you," you ten hear her say.
"Okay, in that case, you can eat me," you said in defeat.

Then you are eaten, and you then fell into Nithog's gullet. You waited for the stomach acids to burn your skin, but once you fell into the stomach acids, you were not being dissolved. In fact, you were still alive!

"Mmmmm... I have not had human in a while," Nithog said.

After regaining your senses, you...
121212.title: Try to break free of her tight grip!

choices: On your bed in the form of a dragon that looks like Nithog.
1212122.content:
"Well, I am getting tired. Goodnight," you hear Nithog say.

She then falls asleep, and you decide to fall asleep as well.

The next morning, you woke up...
1212122.title: hear Nithog say goodnight.

12121221.title: On your bed in the form of a dragon that looks ...

choices: Yes, but she is a voice in the back of your head.
No, she is nowhere to be found.
121212211.content:
As you opened your eyes, you got up out of your bed and you decided to head to the bathroom to take a shower. As you pass by the mirror, you thought you saw Nithog. You then walk back to the mirror and you saw that you indeed were Nithog!

"Nithog!" you yelled. "Nithog, answer me right now!"

Did Nithog answer you?
121212211.title: Yes

choices: Somebody we know is going to get it!
123.content: It had been a short day but you were happy to be home. You open the door and step inside, unaware that you are being stalked. You walk upstairs to your bedroom and find that your dragon isn't there. You began wonder what had happened to the toy until you hear something behind you. You turn around quickly to find absolutely nothing behind you. "I must be hearing things." You said aloud. You had always listened to music a little too loud and it was probably beginning to wear on your hearing. You sit on your bed and close your eyes. You are filled with terror when you feel a cold hand on your shoulder. You open your eyes and look behind you, once again there is nothing there. At this point you are confused and a little bit scared. You don't figure on playing games anymore. You go to your closet and get out your baseball bat. It's made of aluminum and its fairly heavy considering its a little-league bat. "The next person that decides to mess with me is getting hit out of the park!" You say to your almost empty room. You feel someone or something breathing down your neck. "BATTER UP!" You scream as you turn around and swing at the empty space. Now you are completely terrified. You try to remain calm and your hand brushes over your belt, something hard is there and you remember what it is and relax a little. Your bedroom is fairly small and you walk out and head toward your living room. Your living room is wide open and with no places to hide. "Try to get me now." You taunt.
123.title: You're not ready for the big leagues

choices: You're a baseball player! Pitch the gun at him and hope for the best
Try something you don't think he'd ever expect
1231.content: You turn around and see your dragon for a split second before it jumps on you. "Looks like I won't go hungry after all!" He says. He has you pinned but you are evidently stronger than him. You break free of his grip and push him off you. "And here's the appetizer!" You say as you pull your pistol from your belt. "Any last words?" You ask menacingly. "Yeah! Where are your bullets?" He asks. He holds up the magazine of your gun. Alright so you have an empty gun, your bat is on the floor ten feet away from you, and your dragon, who is two feet taller than you, is about to eat you. Wait! your gun is an automatic so you've got one bullet in chamber. Even if you don't hit your dragon the sound of a gunshot will attract a lot of attention, either way you win. "Not quite." Your dragon says, reading your mind. "I'm a plush toy so bullets can't hurt me, and by the time the police arrive I will have eaten you and run away." He says. Knowing this what are your options?
1231.title: Would you like some (lead) medicine with that?

choices: Take your chances with your hungry toy
12312.content: With all your strength you throw the gun at the dragon. Astonishingly enough he catches it. "Strike one!" He shouts. "Why are you doing this?" You ask. "Did you ever feed me? Did you ever talk to me? No. You didn't even name me." He explains. "I didn't know you where alive!" You protest. "Let's name you right now if you want. How about Talon?" You suggest. "Well I guess I should tell you my name is Fang." He replies. "Alright then. Nice to meet you Fang, now if you don't mind your dinner is going to make a home run." You say as you run to the kitchen. You shut the door and barricade it with a chair. "How do you like that? My dinner hiding in a kitchen, how ironic." Fang says on the other side of the door. Now that you're safe you sit down and fall asleep. When you wake up it's dark out. Considering you can't live in your kitchen forever you decide to...
12312.title: In this game it's one strike and you're dinner

choices: Fang lets you out and you play some more
123122.content: You grab the phone and call your parents. Then you realize that the phone is dead. Fang seems to be one step ahead of you with this one. The window is still an option. You walk over to the window and look out. "My ankles will hurt but I won't get eaten." You whisper to yourself. You crawl out the window and let yourself drop. The fall is a bit shorter than you had anticipated but your ankles still crack on impact. You crumple to the ground but you are free of your hungry dragon. You walk away from your house and then realize that you have nowhere to sleep for the night. Friend's house? Nope. Parents? Absolutely not. Girlfriend's house? Now you're talking! Even though you want to see her you don't want to be forced out of your own home by a toy. Then something occurs to you. If Fang is a toy then maybe you can play with him. You walk up your front steps and open the front door slowly and quietly. Fang is asleep in front of the kitchen door. You decide an appropriate game to play is 'knight in shining armor'. You grab a yardstick and a piece of cardboard. You put on a little plastic helmet that has been lying around for ages and approach Fang with your 'armor and sword'. "I shall slay thee!" You shout waking Fang up. Fang can't resist the urge to play and begins acting like a dragon fighting a knight. Fang roars and you pretend to stab him. Fang roars again and grabs you. "Time for a midnight snack." Fang says. "You shall not win that easily beast!" You say as you pretend to bash Fang with your shield. Fang drops you and falls to the ground. "Where is the princess?" You ask. "I shall never tell." Fang replies playing along. "Where is she?" You ask again. "Not that it matters to you." Fang answers. "Why is that dragon?" You ask not sure where Fang is going with this. "Because I'm going to eat you!" Fang shouts as he springs up and pounces on you. You are pinned to the ground and Fang doesn't give you a chance to throw him off you. "No, the dragon never wins." You protest. "This time he does." Fang shouts as he holds you up. Fang opens his mouth wide and begins to swallow you. You slide down quickly and find yourself in a dark room that has a soft velvety floor. "Wait where are the stomach acids?" You ask. "There are none silly!" Fang replies. "How?" You ask. "I'm a toy! I can't digest you even if I wanted to." Fang explains. Upon hearing that you snuggle in and doze off. When you wake up.
123122.title: Hungry hungry dragon

choices: Nope no findy and no eaty today
1231222.content: You open your eyes and Fang is aware of it. "Want to play some more?" Fang asks maniacally. "Yes." You reply shyly. Fang coughs twice and the stomach begins to move and convulse around you. Before you know it your are back in the world. "What to play." Fang says looking at you hungrily. "I don't know." You say honestly. "I'll play anything with you so long as my prize is eating you." Fang replies. "What do I get if I win?" You ask. Fang thinks for a second. "You DON'T get eaten." Fang answers sadly. "Sounds good to me!" You shout. "How about you hide and if I find you you become lunch on the spot?" Fang suggests. You are excellent at hide and seek so you accept the challenge. "Oh boy, early lunch." Fang says as he begins counting. You know of a great hiding place and you duck into it. Fang finishes the countdown and begins to search for you.
1231222.title: Playtime again

1232.content:
You're standing in the middle of your living room with a bat in your hands. If anyone had seen you they would have thought you were crazy. You feel like something is coming up behind you, and your theory is proven when the floor creaks. You spin around to infuriatingly find that you are alone. "Alright show yourself." You say quietly. Something touches your leg, it's cold and it feels soft. You swing the bat behind you without turning around. Seeing that you hit nothing, you begin to wonder if you're losing your mind. To disprove that theory something taps you on the shoulder. You turn around and still nothing. You're really mad at this point, and you wonder who or what is doing this to you. Suddenly an idea comes to mind and you figure it might be worth a try. You wait for the next contact with this mysterious thing and it comes slowly. You feel something lay a hand on you. You put your plan into action and pretend to scream in surprise. You fall to the ground feeling pretty good (your plan was to make it look like the person gave you a heart attack.) Your idea works and the thing bends down. Your plan had backfired slightly as you had closed your eyes after falling. Something sits you up and wraps around you. You're sitting there limply while this thing has one hell of a grip on you. You take a chance and open your eyes. Your dragon is there sitting next you but slightly leaning over because it's arms are wrapped around you and it's head is laying on your chest.

What is your dragon doing?
1232.title: No places to hide? NO PROBLEM!

12321.content:
Panic isn't an option because there is nothing to panic about. Your dragon thinks he has killed you. You hug your dragon back and it looks up at you. "Hi." You say. "I thought you were dead!" He says happily. "Well as you can see I'm alive." You say to your scaly friend. He hugs you tighter and stands up. You aren't quite sure what to think after all your dragon plush is alive and can talk. "Yes I can talk and you shouldn't be afraid of me." He says after reading your mind. His stomach growls and you begin to worry a little. He looks at you lovingly. "You know you never did feed me." He says quickly. "Steak in the freezer." You reply. "Why would I eat that when I can eat you?" He says as he edges closer. You're feeling a little sarcastic. "I'm not on the menu tonight sweetheart." You reply. "C'mon just relax and it will be painless." Your dragon says. "What is your name?" You ask trying to distract him. "My name is Fang." He answers. "Fang, how original." You say as his fangs are actually huge. Fang comes even closer and grabs you in another hug. "Please. You won't be digested." Fang pleads. "Why won't I be digested?" You ask. "I'm a toy. I can't digest stuff." Fang answers.

What now?
12321.title: Looks like love IS all you need

123211.content: Open windows can be very handy especially when your toy dragon is about to eat you alive. Fang is hugging you but he lets go after a few seconds. You run to the kitchen where the window is always open. You make it to the kitchen and shut the door behind you. Like always the window is open and you run to it. You look out and realize there is a good distance between the window and the ground. It becomes do or die when Fang opens the door. Looks like its time to die. Before you can even begin to crawl out Fang has grabbed you and has pulled you away from the window. "Dinner time!" He says. "Please I taste terrible." You beg. Fang licks you and thinks for a second. "Why didn't I eat you before?!" He asks himself. You didn't believe him when he said that you wouldn't be digested and you struggle as he tries to eat you. Fang stops for a second and simply hugs you. You stop struggling and relax. "Don't you trust me?" He asks. "Well no." You reply. Fang thinks for a second. "Lets play a game then." He suggests. You remember that he's a toy and that toys are meant to be played with. "OK what do you want to play?" You ask.
123211.title: DINNER TIME!

choices: A certain someone learns the hard way that not fixing things gets you eaten.
You've been a bad boy! Go to bed without your supper!
1232112.content: "Lets play tag." You say thinking you can outrun Fang. Then you remember that Fang was sneaking up behind you and disappearing before you could even turn around. "Alright I'll give you a ten second head-start and two lives." Fang says. "Two lives?" You query. "I catch you, let you go and give you a twenty second head-start, but if I catch you again I get to eat you." Fang explains. "Sounds fair to me." You say. In reality you're going to run right out the front door as soon as Fang starts counting. "Alright. Ten, nine, eight..." Fang counts down. You run for the front door but quickly realize Fang was already after you. As you run you look back to see Fang moving with terrifying speed. You scream and push your body to the limit running as fast as you can. You try to get to the stairs but Fang catches you. "One life down and one to go before you can go into my belly." Fang says as he releases you and begins counting to twenty. You run to the front door and yank it open. You feel like your home free until you remember that the storm door has a bad piston and gets stuck occasionally. This is one of those unfortunate times and the door is stuck. "Five, four, three, two..." You hear Fang say in the other room. You unleash a bitter fury on the door trying to get it open. Are you successful?
1232112.title: Haven't I seen this in a movie somewhere?

choices: Fang lets you out and you play another game
12321121.content: Finally, with one kick the door gives way and opens. Your victory is short-lived as Fang grabs you from behind. "Why do you want to run away from me?" He asks as he hugs you tight. (No neither one of you is gay. Fang just loves you because he is your toy.) "I don't really believe that I won't be digested." You reply. Fang licks his lips and looks at you with his glimmering amber eyes. "I don't want you to be scared of me. I'm supposed to make you happy." Fang says sadly. "You have made me happy." You assure him. "I just don't want to be eaten." You explain. "I understand, but that game of tag sure made hungry." Fang says as he releases you. "Alright I trust you." You say and Fang's face lights up. "Eat me." You say. You close your eyes and Fang puts your head in his mouth. You feel no pain as his fangs are made of foam and his tongue is made of a soft cloth. You slide down his throat into his stomach which is soft and comfortable. "It's so soft in here." You say as you snuggle in. "I thought you would like it in there." You hear Fang say. "It's nice in here. I don't think I ever want to come out." You say. "Well it would be kind of boring for me if I couldn't play with you." Fang says. "What can we do?" You ask. "Well I can let you out at anytime." Fang says. "This is perfect! When I come home from a hard day at work we can play and I can relax in here!" You shout. "I like the sound of that." Fang replies.
12321121.title: *BAM* the door is open! *GULP* you are eaten

choices: You are wearing a knight's outfit with a fake sword
You are wearing a commando uniform with a fake rifle
123211211.content: It has been a really long day. To top it off some robbers are chasing you home. You pull out your phone and dial your home phone. "Hello?" Fang answers. "HELP!" You scream. "OK I think I can help a little more when I know what's happening." Fang replies. "Two robbers are chasing me! I need you to jump out of the bushes and fly off with me!" You say almost out of breath. "Alright I'm on it!" Fang replies as he hangs up. You run onto your street and as you approach your house Fang jumps out of the bushes and you act scared. Apparently you fooled the robbers too and they run off screaming. "Good job." You say to your dragon. "I try." Fang replies. You and Fang open the front door and step inside. "I've got a surprise for you!" You say to Fang. With that you run to your bedroom and shut the door. When you come back out...
123211211.title: Living plush dragons are good for protection too!

1232112112.content: Fang reads your mind and hides quickly. You begin to walk around as if you are a lost soldier in the jungle. You walk along and Fang peeks over the couch. It's dark at the moment and Fang's eyes are glowing a little. You see his eyes and pretend to be scared. Fang ducks down and edges closer. You back away and notice that Fang is at your feet. You knew his espionage skills were good and you weren't surprised that he had already sneaked up on you. "Oh no!" You scream. You pull your rifle's trigger and it makes little clicking noises. Fang dodges your 'bullets' and gets behind you. You pretend to be unaware of this and Fang begins talking to you. "Well look what I've found." Fang says menacingly. You turn around and let out another burst of machine gun fire. As usual Fang had ducked away and was behind you again. "Your a little tough for my taste, but you'll suffice." Fang says as he lifts you up. "No no no!" You scream as you struggle. Fang licks his lips and swallows you. "Aww c'mon I shot you ten times." You protest. "This dragon is bullet-proof." Fang replies. "I WILL win next time." You say. "Yeah, NEXT time." Fang replies. It's nighttime and you decide to go to sleep.
1232112112.title: Soldier in the jungle with a hungry dragon

choices: Wolfie is a male wolf plushy
Wolfie is a female wolf plushy
13.content:
It is late at night and you have had a hard day. Your landlord is demanding the rent by tomorrow, Sally has been so busy with classes that you haven’t seen her all week, you got a term paper due at the end of the week and haven’t started, and your mom is complaining that you never call. It is days like this that just make you want to curl up somewhere warm and wait out this storm called life. To cool your strained nerves, you help yourself to a bowl of ice cream before bed. The cool treat puts you at ease, After polishing up the snack, you go to your bedroom and strip down to the nude. Your plush wolf is facing you while you undress, but that doesn’t bother you, it’s not like the stuffed toy is real.
“What do you think Wolfie, do I need to stop by the gym?” You ask the toy as you flex before it in the nude. Wolfie has become the name for the toy, not that you would tell any of your friends that you named the inanimate object. What makes Wolfie so unique is that it has a specific gender that is obvious as soon as you look at it.
13.title: You and Wolfie

131.content:
It wasnt difficult to figure out your wolf plushie was a male. It had a stern hard chest and washboard stomach, kinda like Arnold Schwartzenegger with a wolf's head.

Deep down, you were kinda jealous of it... you always wished you were built like that toy...

"Vell, perhaps you vetta start skipping to ze gym flabby!" IT TALKED??!!! ...In a German accent?

"Ja, I can talk. My name is Jeager! Pleased to be aquaited vit you!" it said as it bowed it's head!

"W...w...how..." you start to get worried! And you grab a blanket to cover your naked body!

Jeager just shrugs, "...Eh, nothing I havent seen allready..." and hear him say under his breath, "...although I've yet to see THAT much flab!"

You start to get angry with your plush doll! That little punk is insulting you!

"Now now, I am only joking!" he says laughing, "To tell ze true, I have actually come to life a certain reason..."

You look at Jeager strangely, "Umm....what kind of reason?"
131.title: Ich heisse Jeager!

choices: You plead not to get eaten
Offer to record Jeager's weight loss videos
1311.content:
"To sell my weight voss video tapes!" declares Jeager. "I'm vere to pump you up!"

You're not THAT fat.

"Who are you vrying to kid?" asked Jeager. "you are a walking piece of vlab!"

"Look, I can go to a pawn shop and trade your smart ass" you say.

"I vas only joking!" said Jeager. "geez..where's your such ov humor?"

"So...you're just here to sell weight loss videos?" you ask. It's weird for a plush fox to come alive just for that reason.

"Vell...yeah" said Jeager. "that and...well, I have a confession to make....I have a sweet tooth!"

Jeager doesn't look like he pigs out.

"I have a vweet tooth" said Jeager. "for vumans!"

"WHAT?!" you ask.

"You vumans are so tasty" said Jeager. "so after I eat you, I vill start to make vy videos, und people will see why I want to lose veight just like vhem!"
1311.title: Pump you up!

13111.content:
You start begging to Jeager for your life: "Please dont eat me! Im too flabby and high in cholesterol! Id clog up your heart in a matter of seconds!"

Jeager gets a shocked look on his face! "Gut Gott! Youre right! Ugh... zat vould not be gud for mein health!!"

You breath a sigh of relief, "Whew..." Then you just had a crazy thought... are there MORE of him?

"Vy yes... yes there are more! LOTS more!" he tells you with a grin!

Normally youd be suprised that he could read your mind... but after hearing that a talking wolf sells weight-loss tapes... it doesnt really intrigue you!

You finally ask, "Um... what do you mean theres more of you?"

He kinda laughs, "Vell, why do you think your girlfriend gave you me in the FIRST place?! It's just her vay of telling you... her secret..."

"Secret?! What kind of secret?!!" you ask him hanging on to his every word!

"Dont worry... I'll tell you..." You heard someones voice... you turn around...

...SALLY?! uh...she looks different... she seems to have wolf-ears, wolf-fur, wolf-eyes, wolf-claws, and when you seen her smile at you, you noticed her wolf-FANGS!!

"Mein queen! Das ist good to see you again," Jeager says as he bows to her...

"Sally?...uh... what happened to you?" you ask her worried!

"Hello love..." she says with a grin, "I hope youre too frightened of what I really am..."

Youre a little frightened... not because of what she is... but because of what she might DO!!!
13111.title: He wont... SHE will!

choices: You manage to get free of Jeager
131112.content:
Sally licks her lips as she walks towards you. Uh-oh, you don't like that! You back up from her.

"Now don't be like that" said Sally. "I only want to eat you!"

"Uhh...please don't!" you beg your girlfriend. She only smiles and licks your face, which tickles you, but you're in no mood to laugh.

"Oh, come on" said Sally. "you mean, you've ignored all the signs?"

"What signs?" you ask.

"Not very smart, your voyfriend, Mein queen" said Jeager.

"I have always ordered my steak dinners raw" said Sally. Now that you think about it, Sally did like her steak rather raw over the past year.

"And I always growl when someone is picking on me" said Sally. She's right!

"So...why do you want to eat me?" you ask.

"Don't you want to be like us?" asked Sally.

"Like us?" you ask.

"You see" said Sally. "I met Jeager about a year ago. I was human then. Then, Jeager came to life and ate me. But, instead of dying, I got turned into what you see before you"

Sally is a plush toy, you suddenly realized.

"Jeager belongs to a race of magical creatures" said Sally. "and his kind are dying. So, Jeager and his kind are making sure thier species won't die out"

"Now you want me to change species?!" you ask. Sally nods.

"It doesn't hurt...vuch" said Jeager.

"So...what do you say?" asked Sally. "want to join me, your girlfriend, as a plushy?"

"Not really..." you say.

"She's not asking vou" said Jeager. "she's velling you!" Just then Jeager becomes the same size as you are and grabs you. You try to break free, but Jeager is too strong.

"Your dinner is served, mein queen" said Jeager.

Sally grins, showing her fangs.
131112.title: Jeager and Sally

choices: RUN RUN RUN RUN RUN RUN RUN RUN!!!!
1311122.content:
You are terrified for your life... but you try to remain calm because you remember reading somewhere that wolfs can smell fear...

"Mmmm...you smell oh so divine..." she says and opens her wide giving you a GOOD view of the inside of her mouth!

...you almost wet yourself!

But then you get an idea! You turn to Jeager and say, "Hey Jeager... ist das nicht ein 'kick-in-crotch'?"....and kick him HAAAARRRDDD in the crotch!!

"OHHH!!! GOTT IM HIMMEL!!!" He falls over twitching... And you run like hell!

You dash out of the room not caring that you forgot to put your clothes back on! Meanwhile while running, you dont seem to notice that youre slowly shrinking...

By the time you notice that you've shrunk, you run right into Sally. She leans down bringing her face close to you, smiles, and then opens her mouth!!

You want to stop...but the floor's too slippery! You trip on her lip and land in her mouth! She closes it...and swallows...

You scream at the top of your lungs as you fall down the extremely long throat tube...

You FINALLY land in a completely darkened room.... no sign of life... you are alone...

You are terrified of this darkness... You do NOT want to spend the rest of your life in complete darkness!

Just then, you see a huge group of wolf-eyes staring back at you! You also hear loud growling!

You cant see the wolves themselves, however you can hear: "Oh goody...dinner's finally arrived!!!"

Your choices become clear to you:
1311122.title: Whats the German word for "Ouch"?

choices: You don't want to accept it!
13111222.content:
You run as fast as you can in the darkness, away from the wolf-eyes. You come to the exit of the tube that you entered this darkened room from. You try to scramble up it, but it's way too slippery. You fall back into the room and watch in terror as countless wolf-eyes come closer to you.
"Don't worry, Seth" said Sally's voice all around you. "you won't be harmed"
You hear a loud growl from in front of you and...and...you know no more.


---------------

You wake up in your room. You find yourself to be the same size as Jeager was earlier. But now, your body seems different. You notice that your body is made out of plush...and you have wolf-ears! AHHHHH!! You're a plushy wolf!
"You're awake" said Sally's voice from behind you. You turn around and see Sally and Jeager smiling at you.
"What have you done?!" you ask. "I don't wanna be a plush toy!"
"And why not?" asked Sally. "plush toys live forever..and we don't age. We'll be loved by children for generations...and we'll eat them to increase our numbers!"
"Ist too late for you vow" said Jeager. "you're one of us...and you can't change vack into a human"
"I'm gonna help produce Jeager's weight-loss videos" said Sally. "and you can help too"
"But...!" you say.
"Just accept it" said Sally. "you're no longer human"
13111222.title: No longer human!

choices: You turn around and walk away...
Screw that! You stay and FIGHT!
131112221.content:
Becoming a plush toy is DEFFINITALY not one of your goals in life!

"No way! Change me back! NOW!!!" you scream in anger!

"Vorget it human! You are vone of us now!" Jeager tells you, "Now ve can finally take care of your... um...veight problem! Mein veight-loss tapes are guaranteed to make you-"

"GRR!! FICK DU!!" you yell at Jeager... and kick him HAAARDDD in the crotch again!

"GGGAAAUUU!!!" he falls over twitching once more!

"Sean..calm down!" Sally tells you, "It's not so bad.."

"NOT SO BAD?! I am now a part of eliminating the human race and you say it's NOT SO BAD??!!" Normally you'd hurt Sally as well... but since you been taught not to hit a lady... you just kick Jeager again!

"OWW!! VAT VAS ZAT FOR??!!!"

"..For getting me in this mess!" you flip out and start running out of the house!

While youre running... you start thinking of where you should go. Logical choice would be to find the toy-maker... you remember seeing a "Gonez" company name-tag on Jeager...

So you run off trying to look for this "Gonez"...

But just then, you stop dead in your tracks! A wolf and wolfess appears in front of you, growling! You never seen these two before... but they seem to want to prevent you from reaching your destination!

The male says: "I'm sorry... but Im afraid you can go no further..."

The female says: "Forget about 'Gonez'... or we will TEAR that thought out of you!"
131112221.title: Not such a happy-camper!

choices: You think about all that has happened so far..
1311122211.content:
You could take out one of those two...but not both together. You sneer at the two and you turn back and start to head back to your house. You're almost home when Sally meets up with you, followed by a pissed off Jeager.
"Sean.." said Sally. "it really isn't so bad...we are together, at least"
"I want to be human again!" you yell.
"Vell, that's too fad" said Jeager.
"Jeager, please" said Sally. "Sean, the reason why I gave you Jeager is because I wanted to stay with you"
"We could've stayed human to do that!" you snap.
"Jeager turned me into what I am now" said Sally. "at first, I acted just like you are now. But I got use to it..you will too"
"I don't wanna get use to it" you say. "I want to.."
"Don't whine vo much" said Jeager.
"Sean...can we talk alone?" asked Sally. "without Jeager?"
"No" you say. "I don't wanna talk to you..or to anybody...I just wanna be alone and think about this"
Sally nodded. "Okay...you have your wish. We'll leave and return in the morning"
Jeager is about to protest, but changes his mind. With that, Jeager and Sally walk off. You return to your house and enter your bedroom.
1311122211.title: Time alone

With a HUGE belly, you start to waddle back home. Oddly, you find it much smaller than it should be, and you feel very energetic. In many ways, you feel better than you have felt in a loing time!

were-plush? Was that an actual term or was this guy just stoned?

13222112122111211.title: Undigestable girl?

It is coming from behind you!

You are wide eyed! A witch! You should have known. No wonder she didn't digest, especially if she has magic.

Jessica growls. "A witch... like what killed my little..."

Ahe smiles as sparks fly from the wand. There, just as you saw him before, is the farmer, with a fat yet pretty woman right beside. The father looks to the daughter with a groan.

Seems after she ate so many kids with her sisters they decided to become them. Retire from beng officla witches so to speak. The kids in their dreams agreed. Most of them were sent into new plushie bodies and given to a powerful wizard, who gave them the abilities of speech and magic connected with their new form. Some had their memories wiped from before being a plush, so that they could start over.

"The wizard even founded a companty for the plushies: The snuggleplush Teddies Co. Makes a lot of money it does, though most of it winds up in the hands of charities."

She then states that only one child stayed with the witches as a soul, or ghost as it were. And that was Jessica's little brother Tom. He loved being one so much he even practiced haunting people.

"As for me and my sisters," Sandra finished. "We went to an orphange, turning into babies. We have since been adopted by families, like I wa adopted by my mom and dad." She goes to them and hugs. "I have paid for my past crmes, and hope that I can make them happy."

You sigh when her story ends. When you look to Jessica, expecting a reaction, what you see makes you laugh.

She had fallen asleep.

The web site doesn't say why Klondike was sold off.
"Hmmm.." you say. "interesting"
You type in 'Peter Holloway' in the search engine and...bingo!
What you see makes you gasp.
1322211212211121111112211211121.title: Pete Holloway

choices: You head back to Sandra for plans to stop Pete.
There is more to the site.
13222112122111211111122112111212.content:
You find a site that Peer created several years ago while still a small time crook. The site details about his love of plushies and furries, and lists several he has found that were very are.

But what is on there next shocks you both. It is a detailed blog of discoveries, listed as fictoion, but you now know it to be real.

In it are plans to take over small, seemingly meaningless sections of land with his new funds and new friends. Then, using magic and technology, he would make every plush come alive and eat their owners, young or old.

The result is simpole: All humans save for a select few would be turned into furries.

Then, as furries, he would unleash spells of control, to rule over them according to his will.

Up until the part about ruling over them, his idea sounds good, after all, as a fur, you felt better than you ever have.

But enslaving all life? and harming innocents just for his crazy plan?

HE HAS TO BE STOPPED!
13222112122111211111122112111212.title: fursruletheworld.com

132221121221112111111221121112122.content:
You scroll down to see that Peter has asked any and all furries to come to him and help him in his insane plan. There's a list of furries that are on his side too...for some reason.


Klondike (human name unknown)
Species: Grizzly Bear
Age: 13 when turned into a 'furry'
Age: 23
Reason for joining Peter Holloway: Unknown


Mozenrath
Human Name: Chad Perkins
Species: Skunk
Age: 28 (14 when turned into a 'furry')
Reason for joining Peter Holloway: Has been a friend of Pete's ever since childhood


Skywalker
Human Name: Luke Walker
Species: ???

"What does that mean?" asked Jessica.
"I'm not sure.." you say.
"Well, we know that some furries are on his side" said Jessica.
The site also lists some 20 or so furries on Pete's side.
"Why do you suppose they're on that scumbag's side?" asked Jessica.
"Maybe they view themsleves as superior to humans" said a voice from the open window. You look around to see someone is standing at the window.
132221121221112111111221121112122.title: Pete has furry allies

choices: You awake in front of Pete.
You awake in front of someone else.
1322211212211121111112211211121221.content:
You turn and see the same bear you saw before, he grins at you as he speaks.

"Klondike!" You say. "You're going to pay for what you did earlier!"

"I had no choice, you fools!" The bear says. "The two of you are insistant on helping those humans. We have to do whatever it takes in order to enact the plan."

"By hurting and killing innocent people?" Jessica says, growling. Klondike nods.

"Yes, but don't dare call them innocent, especially after the pain they put me through, the things they made me do just so they could have more money. They beat me, called me a stupid animal when I was smarter than any of them, even had me eat people who tried to get a glimpse at me without paying. Well now they will pay. You see, those who will bnot become furs... we will make our slaves."

"We won't let that happen, no matter what!" You say, bearing your teeth and claws. But then you are hit by something that jabs your shoulder. You reachand pull it out.

It is a tranquilizer dart.

"I don't think so. Soon you will be reaping the pleasures of it as well. Human slaves to serve you for all time."

You turn just in time to see a couple of furs in police gear, both of them smaller than you, but holding the guns. Jessica takes the other dart to the chest, and soon falls to the floor.

"We wil.... we will... ..stop.....y....o......u....." She says, then starts to snore. As she does, your vision goes fuzzxy and you fight to stay awake. The last words you hear before dozing off are ominous.

"Take them to him. He will know what to do."

All is black for a long time.
1322211212211121111112211211121221.title: Caught again!

13222112122111211111122112111212211.content:
"Uhhh...."
"Good. You're awake"
You open your eyes and see a middle-aged human with graying hair. He has glasses on and he's about as tall as you are. You're on a steel table and held down with a restraining arm. You look around to see that Jessica is on a steel table next to you. She looks to be dead...but you see her breathing. You look at the middle-aged man, who is talking to Klondike in low tones. A minute later, Klondike nods and walks out of the room.
"Ah...two more furries to join me" said the man, coming over to you. "My name is Pete"
"We'll never join you" you growl.
"Oh, I think you will" said Pete. "or, I'll be forced to harm your mate here"
"I can fight for myself!" snarled Jessica suddenly.
"Oh, and you're awake" said Pete, turning to Jessica. "join me"
"No!" you both shout.
"Why not?"
"We don't want to enslave humans" you say.
"Oh?" asked Pete. "but you're fine with eating humans"
"Well....I have.." you say.
"You two aren't human anymore" said Pete. "so why do you care about humans? Humans are weak and...."
Suddenly, there was a knock at the door to the room. Pete sighed and yelled, "I told you not to disturb me!" to the door.
The door opened and in walked a racoon as tall as Pete was. The racoon glances at you and Jessica as he walks up to Pete.
"Sly?" asked Pete. "and what do you want?"
"We have an intruder" said Sly the racoon.
"What?!" asked Pete.
"We have an intruder" repeated Sly. "we think it's a human girl"
Sandra!
"You THINK it's a human girl?" asked Pete.
"Most likely the brat from the McGern farm" said Sly.
"Ahh, yes" said Pete. "That'll be Sandra...catch her and bring her to me"
"There's just one problem" said Sly.
"And what's that?" asked Pete.
Sly grins and pushes Pete roughly to the desk behind him. "I'm not on your side anymore"
13222112122111211111122112111212211.title: The real Sly Cooper

choices: You and Sly meet resistance on the way to 'down below'
Sly manages to find ways to avoid the guards.
132221121221112111111221121112122112.content:
"You insolent, traitorous... Klondike! Get rid of him!" Pete yells.

But someone has come alone to help Sly.

Standing there, hand palms facing toward the large grizzly, is little Sandra. You smile wide as a pink smoke is all around Klondike, holding him in place.

"Good thing you came along whern you did kid. I might not have been able to pull off our little rebellion." He smiles, tossing Pete aside and coming over to you and Jessica, using a lockpick to get you free.

"We owe you one Sandra!" You say.

"Actually we are even. This is retribution for what happened to Jessica's borther." Jessica gets up, her bonds undone by Sly, wide eyed as she says that.

"What do you mean?" She says, and you are thinking it. "We were good on that when I ate you this morning."

"Oh!" Sandra says, smiling as the bear collapses. "Then yeah, you do owe me. Sorry."

"Can we save the small talk for later?!" You say, smelling furries heading your way. Pete must have called out some reserves when Sly had him pinned!

"Right." The coon says. "I'll need your help down below." He loks right at you. "You ladies think you can bu us some time? We got to put Pete's plan out of commission once and for all!"

"You got it!" Sandra says. "And don't worry about Klondike by the way. He'll be a little dazed, but he just wanted to do what he thought was best. All these furs do really. I think Jessica and I can show them the real way we can do it."

"However you do it just buy us time!" Sly says. "COme on Wolfgang! We got work to do!"

"Wolfgang?" You say. Then again, that name does suiot you. Maybe you should just call yourself that from...

Not now, you got work to do!
132221121221112111111221121112122112.title: Sly and Sandra to the rescue!

choices: Jessica and Sandra convince the other furries that they're on the wrong side
1322211212211121111112211211121221122.content:
It turns out that you're on the top floor of a 50-story building. There are guards everywhere, but Sly lives up to his name. Sly knows secret ways to get pass the many guards. Sandra and Jessica stay in Pete's office to hopefully make the other furries turn on Pete too. Meanwhile, you and Sly are on your way to the basement to disarm the security system that locks the building. You're going to help Sly disable the system, so the building unlocks and you can escape.
The guards are a mixture of furries and humans. You see some squirells 4 feet tall partrolling a room that's labeled 'Experiment Room #4' on the 43rd floor. Sly tells you that Pete is doing experiments on changing humans into furries.
"I thought only magic can change you into a furry" you say as you enter an air duct to avoid a partrol of five polar bears.
"Where have you been for the past year, Wolfgang?" asked Sly. "they have been doing genetic experiments for a long time. It was all over the newspapers 3 months ago"
Come to think of it, you do recall reading something in the local newspaper about a company doing mysterious experiments on animals and humans.
"So...you were once human?" you ask.
"Yep" said Sly. "I was human....now, I'm a coon...and there's no way to reservse it"
It takes a hour to get 'down below'. You wonder if Jessica and Sandra managed to convince the furries that they're on the wrong side.
The Security System that locks the building looks like a super computer. Sly knows how to shut it down, but it's a little tricky. It requires two people to turn special keys in order to unlock the entire building.
You and Sly disable the security system for good.
1322211212211121111112211211121221122.title: Down Below

choices: You are not in time and are shot.
You manage to pin him down!
13222112122111211111122112111212211222.content:
You hear a voice as you turn, smiling at your success... until you see the source of the voice holding a gun.

"Now i have you." It is Pete. How did he get down here? It doesn't matter. You and Sly may have him outnumbered, but he could shoot you both before you got close. "You may have turnedthe furs against me, even my own friends, but I will NOT let you stop my plan. Furs deserve to rule!"

"These furs were one human Pete!" Sly says. "I was human! Wht right was there to change that?"

"The right I know about." He says, not losing his focus. "Hmans have been cruel to me all my life, and to my friends. My best friend was saved because a bear refused to eat him, and allowed him to run away."

"Klondike?!" You say.

"Yes, Klondike. I realized then that it was furs, not humans who should be the masters. I intended all humans to become slaves to furs, even you, though you protect them. Now the furs have turned against me, and the very thing I tried to prevent has to occur."

He aims at you. "What are you going to do, shoot me?"

"I have no choice." He says, looking sad. "I have nothing left, and humasn would never acceptr anything besides themselves, the self righteous bastards. Now all furs either must be made masters... or die."

"WHAT?! NO, YOU WON'T!" Sly says, wide eyed. Whgat is Pete talking about?

"I have no choice. First you two die, then I activate the defenses in this building. The targets will be the furs." He sighs. "Then I will die. I wanted to make a world for furs... but now I must correct my mistake."

He's nuts! You have to stop him, and while the gun aims at Sly, you make your move. You rush in and try to pounce the human.

Fate alone will determine if you are able to do it.
13222112122111211111122112111212211222.title: The final solution.

choices: You and Jessica hook up later
You look for Jessica and Sandra
132221121221112111111221121112122112222.content:
Pete never gets the chance to fire because you jump on him and pin him down! Sly takes the gun away from him, and grins.
"Looks like you're finished, Pete" you say, forcing him to his feet. Pete doesn't look concerned...in fact, he's almost jovial.
"Rex, come here!" yelled Pete.
Another furry has entered the room. It's a Polar Bear the size of Klondike. Rex moves into the room slowly, sniffing the air. You still have Pete in your claws, and Sly points the gun at Rex.
"One more move, and I'll shoot you" said Sly.
"With that little pea-shooter?" asked Rex as he comes closer. "that won't hurt me"
"See...I still have friends" said Pete.
"Shut up!" you snap at him.
Just then, a fox enters the room. A fox with a machine gun. The fox is wearing a police officer's uniform and the name "Ted Beauville" is on the nametag.
"Hold it!" yells Ted in a commanding voice. Rex slowly turns to see Ted and laughs.
"You...you don't work for me" said Pete.
"Nope" said Ted. "someone called in the police...now paws over your head, Rex"
"No chance, officer" said Rex as he steps towards Ted. It all happens in a few seconds. Sly and Ted both fire thier guns at Rex, at the same moment Pete breaks free of your grip and grabs for the gun in Sly's hand. Pete never grabbed the gun, because you manage to grab him and gobble him up. A moment later, Rex falls to the floor with a loud thud.
"Who called the police?" you ask, and belch loudly.
"Jessica" said Ted.
132221121221112111111221121112122112222.title: It's all over

1322211212211121111112211211121221122221.content:
Later on, news crews pile around the building as furs willingly turns themselves over to Ted and his fellow officers. Most of them are set free, only to face a worst problem: the press.

Seems the whole world now knows furs are alive and exist. Lawmakers originally wanted them put in zoos, like Klondike was, but now it has become clear that you deserve to have the right to live as you wish. Especially now that you, Jessica, Sly, Sandra, and her parents are all heroes.

Pete, meanwhile, doesn't even struggle inside you, seemingly accepting his fate. You sigh some. He was mad he was. His idea for furs to rule the world showed his heart was in the right place... but his brain was long gone. He simply tells you that furs will rule the world someday, and only wishes it had been Klondike, not you, that ate him in the end. THen he falls asleep inside you, possibly never to wake again.

You see Jessica the moment you and Sly leave the building. She has her arm in a sling, but she looks alright otherwise. She rushes to you quickly and hugs you, glad that this is all over.

"Well Wolfgang," Sly says, "here is where we part company." He smiles and poits to the roftops. "As a racoon I think my best occupation is burglary, both of valuables and of women's hearts."

"You relaize," Ted says as he comes over. "That if I catch you it is likely you iwll rot in jail. Or be skinned, whichever seems more suitable."

"Then I better never get caught!" With that he leaps away. "Later coppers! And WOlfgang, nice working with ya! We must do it again sometime!"

With that he is gone, leaving you utterly confused.

"Why did he help us? and who was he?"

You may never know.

********************

Days pass and still it doesn't die down about what happened. Many are neutral about there being living furries among humans, but children, of all people, accept them quickly. In a way, Pete's plan still goes on to a degree, as many kids try to talk their parents into letting them play with furs... or become them.

Or be eaten by them.

You and Jessica become the center of the press, going on almost every talk show known to man, and even tlaking with leaders of other countries, many of which find furries of their own and have them meet you.

A year later, furries are offically made citizens in every country, and you even wind up ina high standing job in your hometown. You and Jessica get married not too long after that, and, thanks to the massive sex sessions, have tons of cubs. Many of which become vorish, even have personal best friends they like to eat.

Yup, life is looking up. Pete may not have had the right idea on how furs and humans should live...

But you have a feeling that things are just the way they sdhould be... and always will be.
1322211212211121111112211211121221122221.title: Happy Endings.

132221121221112111111222.content: "I have a secret for you." Jessica whispers in your ear. You look at her, and see a slight bulge in her stomach area... "Aww Geez, don't tell me you're-" Jessica nods. Your eyes bulge, "We're going to have pups?!?!" Jessica cuddles up next to you, "Yep. Lots and lots of pups." You're a bit less than thrilled. "But, but, but-" Jessica puts a hand (paw, thingy) over your chops. (wolves have chops, not lips) "You'll be fine." she asssures you.
132221121221112111111222.title: Your WHAT?!!!

1322211212211122.content:
Jessica enters the sty. She sees six enormous pigs, filling their faces from troughs.
She licks her lips and dives in. You can hear frightened squeals coming from the pigsty. You rush in to see what the commotion is, and are greeted with the sight of Jessica, spread eagle on the floor with a huge pork-filled belly, a fat pig's bottom and hind legs protruding from her mouth. She sees you, and quickly slurps up the pig. She burps loudly, and smiles at you.
1322211212211122.title: Jessica goes after the pigs

choices: The two of you wake up inside a cage!
The two of you wake up someplace else
13222112122111221.content:
Luckily for you, Jessica has left you with some pigs. You eat the remaining seven pigs. Like Jessica, you're spread-eagle on the floor with a huge belly. While you're swallowing down the pigs, Jessica heads out of the pig sty. You hear angry moos and the sound of slurping. You managed to get up and see what Jessica is up too. You gasp as you see that Jessica has eaten at least two cows and her belly is now huge as a bed just about.
"I had my fill now" said Jessica, who can no longer move due to her girth.
"I should say so" you laugh.
"Did you take care of the farmer and his wife?" asked Jessica after a belch.
"I took care of their daughter" you say. "but I don't see her parents anywhere"
"Strange" said Jessica.
"You can really pack it away" you say, coming over to her and patting her huge belly.
"Yep" said Jessica. "those cows were tasty"
"I had my fill with the pigs" you say. "and now, time for the after-breakfast nap"
"You said it" said Jessica, and the two of you drift off to sleep.
13222112122111221.title: A Little Nap

132222.content:
"P..please Ms. Wolf," you try to be polite, "If you let me go.. I'll uh....I'll find you others!"

She grins, "Tempting... but someone as big as you will be just as FILLING!"

...wait a minute! Did she just call you 'fat'? Oh c'mon! Now's not the time to think about that now!!!

You try again, "Um.... I uh....know a lot more um... FILLING people!"

She starts to get impatient with you, "Enough talk! You pleading isnt going to fill my stomach any faster!" she drags you into her mouth... and closes it when youre finally inside.

Thoughts race through your mind about your friends... your family... your girlfriend... all of them will be gone forever! But then you remember the words your grampa said to you on his deathbed: "If youre going down...go down FIGHTING!!" That's when you decide that it's 'do or die' time!

You grab a handful of her tongue... and bite down HARD on it!

"AAAUUGGGHHH!!!" as she screams, you quickly jump out of her mouth! And run like hell!

You think to yourself, "Thanks gramps! You werent such a crazy ol' fart after all!"

The she-wolf starts to get mad and growls, "GGRRROOWWWLLL..... If you wont go down peacefully... YOU'LL GO DOWN IN PIECES!!!!"

You keep running, but where to?
132222.title: All is not lost....not YET anyway!

1322221.content:
You ran behind a table leg and hid from her. She seems to have lost you and you starts to cover your head and bend down with your head in between your legs. Your start to cry and shake.

"I AM GOING TO EAT YOU! YOUR GOING DOWN MY THROAT!" she yells as she runs into the room.

Do you run?
1322221.title: Wolfie is coming for you

13222212.content:
She walks over twords you. "I CAN SMELL YOU!!! YOU CANT RUN FROM ME LITTLE GUY!!!" she yells. She is angery with you and she is huge. To top off everything she is going to eat you.

"I FOUnd..." she is looking right at you with her head down by your head, "you..." she says in a sad voice. You shake and curl up even more. She licks you. This is it. Your about to go inside of her. But it happens again and again and again.

"Hey, don't cry." she says in a soft. She then lays down infront of you and curled around you. "I want you to like me... I don't want you to be afraid of me. I am your toy. I want you to play with me. Why wont you play with me?" she asks in a very cute voice.

She then keeps licking you. "Hey, I can let you out of me after I eat you." she smiles.

What do you do?
13222212.title: Maybe Wolfie is not so mean

choices: You turn the tables and tease her some more
132222121.content:
You sniffle and look at her. “Really?” you ask, suddenly calming down as you hear the playfulness in her voice. “You just want to play?”

She nods her head, her tail swishing behind her. “Yup, Wolf’s honor!” she says cheerfully.

For some reason you are suddenly feeling very playful, perhaps she’s doing something to you or maybe it’s just something you’d always wanted to do. “Okay, let’s play.” And before she can do anything you roll her over onto her back.

“What are you….Oh!.....Murrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!” your hands rub her soft belly and she melts under your ministrations. The softness of her tummy makes you feel like a kid again as you burry your face in her fur, enjoying it’s softness against your cheeks.

Here tail swishes back and forth as her legs stretch. “Oooh! I’ve haven’t had a good belly rub in far too long!!” As she finishes talking her tongue rolls out of her mouth as she murrs in contentment.

You stroke her belly for just a little longer before putting your mouth against her tummy and giving it a raspberry. “Your it!” you cheer as the ticklish sensation of your act causes her to erupt into laughter. Its several seconds before she regains control of herself and is able to get back on her feet.

“Ooooh, you are going to pay for that!” her mouth is spread into a wide grin as she bounds off after your fleeing form.
132222121.title: play time

choices: There are other people in the stomach!
1322221211.content:
You run from Ms. Wolf as fast as you can. However, you've just been shrunken by your plush toy a few moments ago, so you don't get far and Ms. Wolf catches you!

"Aha!" said Ms.Wolf. "Gotcha!"

She then starts to tickle your tiny form. You laugh as she tickles you under your arm and across your belly. You're laughing so hard that tears come rolling down your face. This makes Ms. Wolf smile and tickle you even harder. You're having stomach cramps from all the laughing. She finally stops tickling you and looks at you in hunger. Oh no! She still wants to eat you!

"Don't worry, you'll like it inside me" said Ms. Wolf as she dangles you above her open mouth. She drops you, and you land in her mouth. She runs her silky-smooth tongue all over you, and chews on you with her foam teeth. She then swallows you, sending you to her huge stomach.
1322221211.title: Tickle torture

132222122.content:
"I can get out after you eat me?" you ask.

Wolfie smiles and nods.

There's no point in running from the giant Wolf plushie anymore. She seems to be sorry that she got mad at you.

"But...won't I digest?" you ask.

"Don't be silly" said Wolfie. "I'm a toy. How can I possibly digest you?"

"Well, what are you waiting for?" you ask. "eat me"

Wolfie smiles and picks you up and puts you into her mouth. Her tongue is silky and it tickles you. Next thing you know, Wolfie gulps you down her throat and you wind up in a chamber that could only be her stomach. The stomach is huge to you tiny form. The 'floor' of the stomach is so soft. Maybe this is a start of a beautiful friendship.
132222122.title: Down Wolfie's Hatch

1322221221.content:
You are thrown about a bit as Wolfie heads back to your room. You are ready to ask her all sorts of questions... but you never get the chance as the plushie falls asleep.

Sighing some, you look at your surroundings.

You first notice that the air in here is very sweet, like a bakery or sweet shop. It makes your mouth water some, and reassures you that you won't die from loss of oxygen.

Then you see something else: you are not alone in here. amongst a variety of items that were swallowed (Apparently, WOlfie has been busy eating your stuff), a pair of eyes is following you. You take note of this and keep going.

What suprises you is that you see wjhat appears to be a bed of sorts, made from another of your plushies, a small mouse.... a blanket peice torn from a lager one, and a soft pillow as big as you are.

"Like my bed?" A voice says behind you, beautiful and feminine. When you turn, you see...
1322221221.title: Nice accomadations.

choices: Amy shares her bed with you
Amy makes a bed for you
13222212212.content:
You turn to see a woman in her 20's. She has red curly hair that goes down to her waist. She's wearing a tank top that's a little small on her. She has C-Cup breasts and a charming smile which you return.

"Who are you?" you ask.

"Amy Cunningham" said the woman. "of the Boston Cunninghams" Appearently, this means something, but you don't have a clue what that means.

"How did you get in here?" you ask.

"The same as you" said Amy. "I was swallowed...I've been here for years"

"Years?!" you ask.

"Yep" said Amy. "I like it in here. And it's MUCH safer in here for me than it is out there" You have to argee to that. One gulp from a cat and you'll be gone!
13222212212.title: Meet Amy

132222122122.content:
Amy smiles alittle as you look her over.

"Sorry, not on the first date." She says. "but no worries, I can make a bed for you out of some things around here."

"It's not that really." You say. "It's just.. years! How many years?"

"Since I was 5." Amy says. "Wolf gobbled me up after mom and dad left me at an orphanage. Since then, I stayed here, fed by Wolf, given clothes from dolls, and even let out every now and then for some fun time. Of course, that hasn't happened for years, it is so nice in here."

"I'll bet." You say. "But... don't you get lonely?"

Amy shakes her head. "Nope. I don't need anyone else really. No offense." She brings over a large slice of bread, or at least it looks like one. In actuality, it is part of a plush sandwich, an oddity you have seen sometimes in stores.

"Wolf swallowed this in a joke one time. It's really very comfy, but I prefer the teddy bear I got recently."

"I wondered where it went." You say, blushing. You climb on the bread, it is very soft indeed. You lie down quickly and look to her.

"So you like being alone huh? I'll try not to disturb you too much."

"I didn't say you couldn't." She winks at you and climbs into bed. "Who knows? I might decide to play with you." she snuggles into her makeshift bed and waves good night.

One thing is for sure. this will be intresting.
132222122122.title: Not on the first date.

choices: The rest of the night is X-rated
Amy shows you something special about her
1322221221221.content:
You get to sleep fairly quickly. You think over of what Amy just said. Ever since she was 5, Amy has been in here in Wolfie's stomach. You wonder how long you're going to stay in the stomach with Amy. You fall asleep then.

You are awakened by someone licking your ear. Your eyes snap open to see Amy is on the bed beside you, smiling. She still has on that tank top, and you can see that she isn't wearing a bra. You blush as she notices what you're looking at.

"I said I might come over to play" said Amy. "and that's what we're gonna do"

Amy takes your hand and places it on her breasts. You're getting turned on as Amy slowly caresses your hand all over her breasts.

"I said not on the first date..." said Amy, looking down at you. "but..I have this itch that only a man can cure"

"I'll bet..." you say. "but what about Wolfie?"

"Forget Wolfie" said Amy. "Wolfie is just a toy. Me? I'm real"
1322221221221.title: Playing with Amy

1322221222.content:

As Sheela starts to eat, there's a knock at the door. You can't see the door through the eye holes on Sheela's belly, and anyway you're too busy avoiding being covered in food. Your mother answers the door.
Matt, your friend, comes into the kitchen two minutes later. He's one year older than you. Your mother doesn't follow Matt into the kitchen...she must be talking to Matt's parents or something. As Matt enters the kitchen, he glances over his shoulder behind him. You can't see what's behind him, or what's going on behind him. Matt nods and looks around the kitchen, noticing Sheela.
"Well, hello there" said Matt.
"Hiya, Matt!" said Sheela in a cheerful voice.
Matt looked startled that Sheela talked. Then, he notices the eye holes on Sheela's belly.
"Whoa, nice toy there" said Matt. "is it some kind of puppet you wear?"
"In a manner of speaking" said Sheela, who giggles.
"Good work with the voice" said Matt, coming closer to Sheela.
Just then, your mother comes into the kitchen.
"Matt's here for a snack and to play" said your mother.
"If you want to play" said Sheela. "then come over here"
14212211211.title: Matt

142122112112.content:
Matt smiled. "No thanks man, I want some of your mom's pancakes first. Is there any left, or did your plushie eat them all?"

The mother smiled, trying not to laugh too much. "You could say that." She fianlly said. "But I have three left, and some bacon."

"Awesome! you're the best!" matt says. You hear Sheela grumble a little at not getting HER treat yuet, especially knowing how she likes little boys. Still you cannot help but laugh.

"So, What else can that plushie do, besides make a good costume." Matt asks as he eats.

Sheela smiles some. "Oh, just come alive and eat little boys like you and your friend."

"Oh man, you got that voice down pa... huh?" Matt hmms as sheela slowly pulls you out, as if to prove a point. Your mom tries not to laugh.

You fail at that.

Matt just stares. "Oh MY GOD!!!! IT REALLY IS ALIVE!" He says. You smile and start to speak as Sheela pops you back in.

"Oh crud. Come on Sheela! I want to play with him!"

Sheela pats her belly. "Oh I guess... but i hope you two feed me later, you both look so tasty to me!"

Then your mother chimes in, answeting for you. "Don't worry Sheela, I'll roll them up in a big taco or something for you."

"MOMMMMM!" You shout, but you hear Matt just giggle under his breath.

"I always knew you all were weird. Ah well, I like you guys all the same." He smiles at Sheela, from what you can see through the eyeholes. "and you are just cool. Just one thing... how about a game latert to decide IF you get to at me or not?"

Sheela smiles. "Fair is fair." With a smile, she pulls you out again, licking your legs a little. "Now go play you two, and remember to feed the tiger later!"
142122112112.title: The fun will soon start...

1421221121121.content:
After breakfast, you and Matt go to the living room followed by Sheela.
"So, what games should we play?" you ask.
"Super Smash Brothers Melee" said Matt.
"Oh goody!" said Sheela. "I can play then"
"Of course" said Matt.
So, you pop in Super Smash Brothers Melee. You play it all the time, and have unlocked most of the characters. You and Matt are easily the best at the game. Sheela is fairly good, considering that she never played it before. You ask Sheela how could she be so good at video games. Sheela just laughs.
"When you and your mother aren't in the house, I tend to watch TV or play these games" said Sheela. "video games have come a long way since 'Pong' though"
Your mother comes in and out of the living room, checking on the three of you. After some time, something happened that never happened before. During a fierce fight, Sheela's character threw a pokeball and out came Mew.
"Mew!" you shout.
"Funny how it never appeared before" said Matt.
"Probably a million to one chance of Mew appearing" you say.
You play the game until lunchtime.
"I'm hungry" said Sheela. "One of you will have to feed me...or both of you" she smiled.
"Oh" you say. "I have an idea for that. Next match, me and Matt will play with oursleves and you get to eat the loser, Sheela"
"What a purrrrfect idea" said Sheela.
"I thought you'd like that" You say, while Matt looked aghast.
1421221121121.title: Game time

Taking the character of Marth, your friend takes Roy. The battle that follows lasts about 5 minutes, with it esily going either way.

He never won like that before.

"It could esily have gone either way." He replies. You turn behind you, and start to laugh.

Sheela got really into it form the looks of it, wide eyed and smiling. "WOW." Is all she says, smiling as she gives Matt a big hug in congrats. He blushes some.

"Well..." You say. "I giuess I'm lunch." You look at Sheela. She hmms.

Matt is too smart for that though. "No thanks! But I'll play you later for that bet if you want. Right now I'm still a little nervous about the whole boy-eating plushie thing. No offense."

In the kitchen, She hmms some.

"Because you're so tasty!" laughs Sheela.

14212211211211221122121122.content:
When the five of you arrive back at the house, Sheela smiles and hugs you from behind.

"Sorry," she says. "But I cannot take it anymore. You and Matt look too tasty to pass up!" And with that she opens her mouth wide.

"Wait!" You say. "What about supper?"

THe plushie smiles. "Well, you are my supper I know that. But don't worry, I'll send down some pizza. If I read your mother right, that is what she is making."

PIZZA! Your mouth waters and your belly grum,bles loudly. Your mom is famous for her homemade pizza, and tonight it is on the menu!

"Well if it is pizza.... GERONIMO!" You shout, forcing your way into the plushie mouth. Thge mothers and Matt laugh at the sight, rather comical as the plushie tries to get a good taste of you as she swallows you down.

Matt follows soon after, the belly big enough that you can get cozy and play some games. Sheela swallows your little portable game systems and some lights so that you can play until dinner.

Meanwhile, the mothers set to work, making pizza and homemade breadasticks to go with it. After a time he smell of the meal to come fills the air, and your mouth is watering.

"Is it time yet Sheela?" You ask.

"Almost. A few more minutes. Though part of me wishes you were on that pizza."

"No thanks!" Matt says. "No offense, but that is the last place I want to be. After all, you have to cook those."

Sheela nods. "Point taken. Still, it's a hope."

You laugh and play your game until dinner.

It was a good day.

You're seven years old and this tiger says she wants to eat you. So, you do what all seven year olds would do--go get mommy. You are out of your room before Sheela can make it off the bed. "What is it?" asked your mother.
"My tiger came to life and said it wanted to eat me!" you say. Your mother is still groggy, but she just smiles at you.
"Mom, didn't you hear me?" you ask. "that big tiger--"
"The name's Sheela" said Sheela, coming into the room. Your mother rushes to Sheela and shakes her paw! WHAT'S HAPPENING?!

"I did say that I had a little girl that I used to eat" said Sheela. "and that little girl is standing before us"
"But--" you stammer.
"Sheela has been in the family for a while" saids your mother. "My grandmother's mother had Sheela!"
"Wow" you say.
"I've been eating your family for the past 100 years" said Sheela, who grins. "and you are now on the menu"
"How did you...?" you start to ask.
"...come to life?" finishes Sheela. "well, I really don't remember. Do you remember your own birth?"
The only answer to that is no. You know it, you mom knows it and Sheela knows it.
"So, I suggest we go down stairs and cover this boy in mustard" said Sheela, licking her lips. "I'm hungry!"
"It isn't as bad as you think it is" said your mom. "I did the same as you when Sheela said she wanted to eat me--ran to my mother"

The belly of Sheela is very silky, and the softness of it is so much that you could sink into it. Better still is the air in here, which is sweet and clear, and is sligfhtly perfumed, almost like flowers. That explains why most preyy was female really. Still, it feels wonderful all over, and as soft as being in the sandwich is, you annot help but climb out of it, using the bread as a blanket as you snuggle in.

Outside, you hear Sheela speak. "Oh... mmmm... oh that was so delicious... I had forgotten how indescribably tasty little boys are... and so filling to! OH I hope he is comfy in there, a meal like that deserves a wonderful reception." You blush at this, almost ashamed at the compliments she is giving you. you don't listen too much more, as you feel her rub her belly where you are. the result makes you giggle,s as she rubs where you are the most ticklish.

Finally it stops, and you start to sway about. You wonder what is happeneing.

"I'm walking back you your room, tasty treat." Sheela says. You smile and giggle. She is reading your mind again. Her movement is causing you to rock about gently, the feeling lulling you to sleep. Naked except for some mustard and your bread blankets, the silky surroundings are heaven for a little boy like you, as if you returned to the womb.

"THis is so comfy Sheela... I like it in here." You say. Sheela smiles.

"I'm glad little one. I think we are going to be good friends. Oh! But I hope you have friends you know of who might like me. Especially boys. MMMMM!!!"

You giggle some. Maybe you do. But that can wait until tomorrow. For now, you slip into a soft slumber, the 'bed' you are in too comfy to fight.
1422212.title: So soft and comfy.....

choices: See if you can get out
14222121.content:
The stomach seems to mold to your body..like your own pocket to sleep in. You don't notice this right away, because you are too sleep. The stomach is swaying as Sheela walks, lulling you into the most peaceful sleep you ever had.
You find yourself in the jungle before too long. You've never been to any jungle, but it's a jungle nonetheless, with all the noises you hear in the movies. Suddenly, you come across a river in the middle of the path you're walking on. It's a thin river, hardly more than creek, but it is about 20 feet across. In the river, you see crocidiles. Somewhere off in the distance, you hear a lion roar...or at least you think it's a lion. You decide not to cross the river, or you might end up as a snack for the crocidiles.
The undergrowth of the jungle is thick, and you can hardly see anything more than 5 feet in front of you. And you don't have a sword to cut down the undergrowth to make a path. Suddenly. you're out of the jungle and there's a door by itself. Logic tells you that the door shouldn't be there without a building. But dreams are rarely logical. In fact, dreams have thier own logic it seems. You don't think it's weird when you're in a forest one minute in a dream and in a house the next. The door is wooden, painted white, and has some kind of symbol on it. The symbol is a star within a circle with an orange eye directly in the middle of the star. The orange eye is glowing slightly. You get the creepy feeling that the eye is looking at you.
Suddenly, the door shoots open and a great suction pulls you into the door. When you enter the door, you're in blackness. Suddenly, you see a light..a light from a candle.
"Go away" growls a voice that sounds like Sheela's.
That's when you wake with a start, still in the stomach of Sheela. You have no memory of the dream you just had, and Sheela seems to be asleep. You go back to sleep and you have more pleasant dreams. In one, you are a captain of a spaceship, exploring the vastness of outer space. The dreams seem to collide with one another, always changing and never making much sense. You can sorta tell that you're in the middle of a dream, but can't control what goes on in it.
Finally, you wake up. You felt like you had the best sleep in your young life. You're still in the stomach of Sheela, and under the blanket of that loaf of bread. The stomach still smells like perfume, although there is a trace of mustard in the smell now.

Stretching a little in your 'bed', you think only for a second that everything that has happened has been a dream. But when you see yourself still nude, with a bit of mustard on your chest, snuggled into a belly under a bread blanket... werll, you kinda dismiss that thought.

With a push, you try to get out. It is morning after all, and you don't want to be late for breakfast or school. You see an opening squuezed above you, and start to make it wider. It opens esily, and you start to get up. It is difficult, as soft as it is in here, but you do manage after a bit. You find yourself crawling up a sliky tunnel, which can only be Sheela's throat.

Soon enough, you poke your head up, getting a view of the outside through her open mouth. THe sight makes you giggle some. Now you know how most prey sees the world for the last time when caught by a...

"Tiger perhaps?" You hear Sheela say all of a sudden. She read your thoughts again! Must be awake!

"Morning Sheela!" You say, smiling a little. You can see her smile from the inside, then she reaches into her mouth to pull you out.

"I assume you had a.... mmmm... oh how I love the taste of a boy in my mouth in the morning... mmmmph.... oh yeah, I trust you slept well in there?" She gets out, pulling you out. You are not sure how she speaks, and have a feleing you wouldn't understand anyway.

"I had some weird dreams," You say, as you slip out, licked clean by that silky tounge that is oh so good at tickling, "but it was so nice in there."

Sheela smiles. "Glad to hear it. You were very tasty, and very filling." she embraces you in an affectionate hug. You smile a liottle. If any of your fireneds at school caught you, they might no doubt think you a sisy, but you do not care. You hug back and sigh.

"I got to go to school soon..." You tell her after a bit. She smiles and licks her chops.

"Will you bring me something? A friend perhaps? I love stuffing my tummy as big as I can, and I bet, I can just bet, you have either a girlfriend, or a firend who likes plushies."

You blush some and go to get dressed. Sheela is a lot of fun, but you doubt any of your fellow firneds would think her anything but something for sissies.

Unless....

Henry is a LOT bigger than most of your toys; he's about 5 feet tall with organe fur and black stripes, along with a huge fat belly. Henry's belly is so big that you could use it as a pillow, and you did when you were little.
Henry is a living plush toy. You've discovered this when you were eight years old. You got Henry on your 5th birthday, but didn't know he was alive until you were 8. Henry ate you for the first time on your 9th birthday. Henry does have a stomach...a big one to match his big belly.
Your boyfrind, Tony, knows that Henry is alive. He discovered this only two months ago. Henry says that you taste better than Tony does.
One sunny day, you've returned early from your work only to discover that your apartment has been ransacked. Things are littered all over the floor, as if someone was looking for something. You go to your bedroom to find...
