14312.content:
It seems that a lot of plushie thefts has been happening lately. The first case happened 5 weeks ago, and the cops are baffled as to why would anyone want to steal plush toys. In fact, your neighbor had his one plush toy stolen just last week.
"The thief leaves no trace" said the one of the officers. "it's weird...but the thief leaves no fingerprints behind"
All thieves leave behind fingerprints, right? Or at least something to incriminate them. But, this robber leaves behind no fingerprints, which must mean that he wears gloves during the robberies. But the main question is why would anyone want to steal a plushie, and not something more valuable?
When the cops leave, you ask Henry if he saw the robber.
"Only a glimpse" said Henry. "He--or she--was covered all in black and I couldn't see his face. I thought I saw a tail, but I didn't have time to look at him more closey"
"A tail?" asked Tony. "the thief is a furry, then?"
Furries are animals with human characterics; they can walk on two legs and talk. Furries is the result of genetic testing by humans. All furries vary in size, just like humans do. A furry is usually 5 feet tall, but some furries can be bigger than most humans. The biggest furry you ever saw was a 15-foot tall racoon named Sly. Sly lives in the same apartment building as you and Tony do. Sly is a security guard for a computer company. Sly is friendly and gentle. Furries are offically citizens of the United States, and have been since the Pete Holloway scandal came out 10 years ago.
"I guess so" said Henry. "but I couldn't be sure. Like I said, I only saw a glimpse of the thief"
14312.title: Grand Theft Plushie

choices: You just try and reset your apartment for now.
143121.content:
Tony hmms. "Welll... maybe someone else saw him better. Surely the security team for the building could have gotten something on the security cameras."

You smile. "Good idea!" You look to Henry. "You want to come?"

"Sure. I want to get that guy, whoever he may be. Furry or no I'm going to eat him for taking your plushies!"

You chuckle and head on down to the security room. It is not uncommon for a security team to be watching the halls anymore, especially with the recent crimes. The videos may just be the key you need.

THe police are there already, smiling as you all look at the tapes together. The guards (One a rotwieler fur and the other a human) have bad news hopwever.

"From what we can see there was a LOT of entries into your room. That makes it hard. Still, there are four that match the description your plush gave to us Ma'am."

"Tell us." You say. And they do.

All four seem to be in black all over. One is dressed like a punk, with a long black tail.

Another is in a robe, with several tails. A kitsune perhaps?

A third is a kid with a pin-on tail, fake bunny ears, and a big backpack. You chuickle some. If that is the thief, you can only guess as to the why.

The final one who matches is a punk kid, wearing a "Furs Suck!" Shirt. Henry growls when he sees him, and you know why. It is Toby Mitchells, the son of a local liquor store owner and a well known furhater.

Henry hmmms. who could it be?
143121.title: Let's go to the tape!

choices: When you're done with cleaning the apartment, Sly eats you, Tony and Henry
After cleaning the apartment, you do something else
1431212.content:
You can search for the thief later. Now it's time to clean up your apartment. Tony argees with you and helps to get the apartment cleaned up. Henry helps as best as he can.
Everybody in the apartment building knows all about Henry being alive. The apartment building has 40 humans and 50 furries. Most of the furries are friendly to you and the other humans. Five of the furries aren't so kind. You tell the security guards of the apartment building to keep a look out for the thief (or thieves).
Sly the racoon helps up clean up the apartment. The hulking Sly may seem scary, but he has a heart of gold. Sly lives in a specially-made apartment on the ground floor. All the kids in the building like to play with Sly. When you first moved into the building 3 years ago, you and Sly use to hang out alot with each other. You two were offically dating when you met Tony. Sly seems not to be too effected by your new boyfriend. You're still on good terms with Sly and the other friendly furries.
"Any idea of who did this?" asked Sly, as he sat up a bookcase upright.
"Well, there are 4 suspects" said Henry, and he describes them to Sly.
"Long black tail, eh?" asked Sly. "that could be Sammy"
Sammy turns out to be a six-foot-tall skunk that lives on the wrong side of the tracks...as it were if your hometown had train tracks. Sammy was always stealing things from people.
"I had dealings with Toby Mitchell" said Sly. "I threatened to eat him up if I ever saw him again"
Most furries are carnivores, even when the animal is a herbivore. Most furries eat people, but furries have a second stomach for storing food. You've been in Sly's second stomach before, and it's quite roomy. But, not all people end up in this second stomach of Sly's. Sly is a security guard for a nearby computer company, and he has permission to eat tresspassers or anyone sneaking into the building. Only last night, Sly ate 2 people trying to break-in.
1431212.title: Sly helps out

choices: A call coems in related to the theft.
A news story talks about the theft.
14312122.content:
Sly laughs when you talk about the kid who matches the description.

"if that is the thief, it has to be Joey. Poor kid lives in a sports crazy family and he likjes plushies and furries. You should have seen him when he visited me the other day. Would you believe he tried to hide in my sandwich?"

You laugh some. Joey is one of several humans that some have called 'foodies'. these humans like being food for plushies and furries even more so than normal, and go to great lengths to ensaure they will be on the menu. For the youth, it is a game. for those older, it is a...

Anyway, the last suspect has everyone confused. "I never heard of any kitsune living around here myself." The giant racoon admits, helping you with supper as you talk. "And I would know. I know everyone in this town."

"Strnage." Tony says. "But even if it is a kitsune, why would it want plushies."

"Well, this is kinda off the wall, but kitsunes are more magical than other furries, right up there with nagas, spinxes, and, of course, werebeasts. All of which have some magic to them."

You ponder this. Still, in all cases the theft of plushies is a confusing one to consider. WHy would ANYONE steal plushies.

You may get your answer sooner than you think.
14312122.title: The other supects and their motives.

choices: Blitzen goes on with the report
Blitzen is attacked by a member of an Anti-Furry group
143121222.content:
The news on TV covers the strange theft of plushie's that evening. The reporter who's reporting these thefts is a fox named Fox Blitzen. Blitzen is perhaps 6 feet tall, judging from the people around him. Blitzen is reporting on a street corner not far from your apartment building.
"A string of unusual thefts has broken out in our fair city" said Blitzen. "a number of plushies has been stolen from a number of people, and the police are now getting involved. We talked to the chief of police earlier today--"
Blitzen was replaced by a burly bear in police clothing. The name "Klondike Walters" were on the bottom of the screen.
"These thefts must stop" said Klondike. "We are investigating the Anti-Furry community about this"
Blitzen returned to the screen.
"Anti-Furry groups deny any stealing of plushies" said Blitzen. "Police have come up with 7 possible suspects, but thier names aren't going to be released until they're caught"
"Seven suspects?!" asked Henry. "it seems we're dealing with more than 4 plushie robbers"
"Yeah" you say. "I hope they find the thives"
143121222.title: Fox Blitzen, reporting...

choices: It is an anti-fur, demanding the plushies.
1431212221.content:
Sly shushes you and Henry as Blitzen continues. "What is common in all crimes, the only thing common, is that only plushies are taken. Info on the suspects will be rerleased only at the police office. If you have any information, or are curious as to who they may be, contact the police."

The scene cuts to a local, a little girl. "I have had my little teddy since I was little, and I dun want to lose it. Why would anyone want to take them?!" She then starts to cry.

Sly sighs. "I can relate to that poor girl."

The newscaster then tells of a related story. "In related news, Wolfgang Otopolis, a member of the city council, was attacked again by the anti-fur movement. This time the attack was aimed at his children, injuring one. The anti-fur was apprehended and faces charges of assult."

You turn off the tv, sighing. "Never any good news anymore."

Sly nods. "I knew a WOlfgang... nice guy. Worked with him a while back. Of course I had a different occupation then."

Henry hmms. "Maybe the events are related. After all, these Anti-Furs are crazy enough to do things like steal furry plushies and burn them."

You and Tony nod in agreement. "Well, Maybe we should get more info. I don't want to jump to any..."

Suddenly, there is a knock on the door.
1431212221.title: The rest of the story.

choices: Go to the park to see if the plushies are down there
14312122212.content:
Little Joey Wellington walks right into your apartment before saying hello. Little Joey--as he's called--is wearing a Cleveland Cavs shirt and a Cleveland Cavs hat. Joey's family likes any kind of sport, but most especially basketball. Joey doesn't have a favorite team, he just likes to watch any game he can find on TV.
Joey is 12 years old. For some reason, Joey has always been small for his age. He's 3'6" now and probably won't grow much beyond 4 feet tall. Joey sees Sly and rushes over to him and hugs his leg.
"Hi there, Joey" said Sly, picking him up. "what have you been up to?"
"I'm on the case of the stolen plushies" said Joey.
This makes you, Tony and Henry laugh.
"Seriously, who would want to steal a plushie?" asked Joey.
"They think it's the Anti-Furry group" you say.
"So let's go" said Joey. "the Anti-Furry group is having a rally at Edgewood Park"
Edgewood Park is on the edge of a thick pine wood forest. It's a fairly large park with enough room to hold a sizable rally, or a family reunion. The Anti-Furry group likes to hold its meetings at that park for some reason. The police usually is there to maintain order, but they don't stop the rallies. Freedom of Speech can have a bad side, too.
"As much as I would like to go down there" said Henry. "I would.."
"Oh, let's go down there" said Sly. "I'm hungry!"
"Eat me!" yelled Joey, half laughing.
"As you wish" said Sly, and swallows down Joey in one bite!
"Whoa...you didn't make him into a sandwhich?" you ask.
"Too hungry" said Sly. "I have some friends I could invite to break up that rally"
14312122212.title: Anti-Fur Rally

143121222122.content:
"Wait a sec." You say. "if we break the rally up right away, we won't find anything out."

"What do you suggest?" Sly asks.

Tony hmmms. "I may have an idea. furs are not welcome at these rallies, but humansd are. I think we can get in."

You hmm some. "It might work... maybe we can learn more about who has stolen the plushies and why."

"And if the anti-fur party has them?" Sly asks eagerly.

"THen you get a buffet."

"YAHOOOOOOO!!!!" Sly smiles. "Count me in!"

"Me too!" Henry says. "We'll round up the whole crew!"

"Me three!" Says Joey from the belly. "But please, can I be dessert?"

You all laugh at that. "It's settled then. I just hope we find what wee need to know."

You look to TOny. Hopefully, his plan will work.
143121222122.title: Better idea...

choices: The plushies are there! Buffet time for Sly!
1431212221221.content:
Edgewood Park is somewhat near your apartment building. It's just 10 blocks away. You and Tony are going to the rally, while Sly and Henry are going to hide in the park somewhere. Joey is coming along in Sly's stomach also. You and Tony start to walk to the rally, after you find an old "Say no to Furries" shirt in the dumpster. The shirt looks fairly new, like it was worn a day or two ago. Tony puts on the shirt.
There's a large group of the Anti-Furry movement at the park. People at the rally welcome you to join in. You recongize a couple of people; Gene Starkley and Bill Jensen. Gene Starkley is 35 years old, and was against furries at the very beginning. Gene was your friend in grade school. Bill Jensen (called "William" by his friends) is the oddball of the town. He once said, "Why read when you can pay someone to read to you?". Bill is always getting into trouble, from drinking and driving to starting fights at the local bars.
The leader of the rally is John Armbrewster, and he talks through a megaphone as he talks about how bad furries are; about how they are not worthy of living in houses and stuff like that. There are perhaps 1,200 people at the rally. 3/4 of the people are holding up signs with Anti-Furry slogans on them. There's even some members of the KKK at the rally, complete with hoods. Police are everywhere, and there's not a furry around for miles. You and Tony mingle through the crowd, looking for a pile of plushies. Most Anti-Furry people are against plushies too, so it would make sense if any of the plushies are there.
There's a total of 10 policemen surrounding the rally. Patrons of the park not in the rally are held back by barriers and police. There's about 3,000 people protesting the rally, and the police is trying to keep the two groups separated. Without the police, the rally would turn into a riot. You wonder where Sly and Henry are hiding.
1431212221221.title: The rally

choices: You head tio the police station.
14312122212212.content:
You and Tony search all over the rally grounds. several anti-furs are speaking on the fur problem, and a KKK member is firing some shots in the air.

All you need isd to find those plushies.

But... when you reach the center stage, you find a terrible fact.

they are looking for them too!

"We must find who is protecting the plushies, Fellow Fur haters! the Plushies, who come alive and devour our children only for pleasure! (Shouts and cheers) Plushies! made in the image of those evil furs who seek to enslave us as foodstuffs! (Louder cheers) We must find this thief before the police do... and KILL HIM!!!"

The anti-furs shout and cheer, changing MURDER and KILL. That is all the police need. They charge the assembley, Firing tear gas into it. You and Tony run for it, bumping inmto Henry and his gang of furs. they charge the assembley with the police, grabbing a few of the leaders. The rest will be going to jail for a long time, except for the main leader who escapes.

But it is a pointless victory. You are no closer to finding the plushies than you were before.

But why were they taken?
14312122212212.title: Anti-Furs are.... INNOCENT?!

143121222122121.content:
"Well, that was a dry hole" said Tony, still wearing his "Say no to furs!" shirt. But the shirt is partly covered by a light jacket that belonged to a fur-hater that Sly managed to eat before they all got away.
"If they didn't steal the plushies, who did?" asked Sly walking behind you. Sly is holding Henry in his arms.
"I don't know" you say. "what other people would still plushies?"
For that, there's no answer. You're slightly mad that the Anti-Furry group was....innocent. You can hardly say the word 'innocent' and 'Anti-Fur group' in the same sentence. The Anti-Furry movement started when furries were made citizens of the USA after the Peter Holloway scandal. And you hated it. You hate the Anti-Furry movement because some furries are friendly. But, the Anti-Furry movement focuses on those furries that eat people without remorse. True, there are furries like that, but some people are murderers too. You just don't get it. The KKK was there to support the Anti-Furry movement, because they've focused on furries as well. Those groups belong with each other.
"What's that?" asked Henry.
You look around to see that a Kitsune is walking on the opposite side of the street. The kitsune has four tails.
"Could that be...?" asked Tony.
"Must be" said Sly. "there aren't many kitsune in this part of the country"
"Should we follow him...or her?" asked Sly.
143121222122121.title: Suspect sighted?

choices: Several orphans in rags... each with the stolen plushies!
A mad scientist trying to make the plushies come alive!
1431212221221211.content:
You nod. "Yes... but at a distance." You say ina whisper. "We need to stay safe."

Henry nods, coming down, his belly still turning Anti-furs into plush lining for his insides. "I better stay to the rear... oh, so full..."

Sly tries not to laugh, keeping stealthy behind you and TOny. The kitsune is very fast, moving down to all fours. You have a hard time keeping it in sight, but you are able to just barely keep up with some effort.

It takes awhile, but you finally reach his destination. It is a small home on the outer part of town. When the door opens, happy cheering can be heard inside, and the smell of cooking food fills the air. The home is run down and looks terrible.

"This might be it..." Sly says. "But we better make sure. Come on."

Tony hmms. "Hon, stay back, Sly and I will.."

"I am not a weak girl remember?" You say with a wink, Tony blushing some and following behgind. When you look in a broken window, what you see shocks you.
1431212221221211.title: Follow that Fox... er... Kitsune.

choices: Burst on in and save the orphans and plushies!
14312122212212111.content:
You all peer inside the window to see several children in rags. The oldest child looks to be 14 or 15, and the youngest child looks to be 5 or so. You also see all of the stolen plushies all in a pile. You also see the kitsune talking to the eldest of the children. The window is open by a hair, allowing you to hear what is being said.
"Have you collected all of the plushies like I asked?" asked the Kitsune.
"Yes" said the eldest kid, wearing a ratty old Tee Shirt that looks like it may have been an Anti-Furry shirt, but its so dirty it's hard to tell. The Kitsune smiles.
"Are those orphans?" whispered Henry.
"Looks like" said Sly.
The youngest orphan comes up to the kitsune.
"Jazz, can we go back to our homes now?"
The Kitsune--Jazz--smiles an evil smile down at the youngest orphan. Without warning, Jazz snatches the orphan up and gobbles him up!
"That dirty--!" started Tony.
Everyone ducks out of sight when Jazz looks over to the window.
"I'll take 5 of the plushies now" said Jazz.
"Which ones?" asked the eldest oprhan.
"Those ones" said Jazz. "they belonged to that little brat I just sent to my stomach. He doesn't need any plushies anymore"
14312122212212111.title: Jazz the Kitsune

143121222122121112.content:
You duck out of sight as the door opens. THe man looks awfully familar as he enters. When you look again, who you see stuns everyone.

It's the speaker from the Anti-Fur meeting!

"What the... what is he doing here?" You ask.

Tony and Sly shush you as he speaks to the Kitsune.

"Well? Did the rally go well?" Jazz asks, her voice very feminine.

"Oh shut up. THey all got arrested or eaten!" The man says, the kids giggling. "Shut up, or she will eat you next!!!" They go quiet and whimper.

"You got to into it again didn't you." Jazz said, chuckling as she sat down on some old crates.

"SHUT UP! The only reason we are working to gether is to encourage a fur human war."

"One we furs will win, you know." Jazz says with an evil grin on her face. "and I will have all the tasty children I can eat. And these plushiesd will ensure that."

"That's another thing." The man says. "Why the plushies? What is so special about them?"

"Easy." THe kitsune says. "Kids love plushies. But to make them truly become furs... the plushies have to eat them, digesting away their very soul. THe kid becomes a slave to the plush, and the fur is born, fuill of hate for humans."

"WHAT?!" THe man stands. "But that would mean... you set me up! Yo umadfe me wear that ridiculous fur outfit..."

"You will get your reward do not worry. You and your anti-fur friends will be specially made plush humans. As such, you will be the immortal rulers of humanity. Though they will still be under us.

"I used your own hate of furs against you human. Now you will live the rest of your days knowing you killed humanity."

The children stert to cry and shiver in fear as the five plushies she chose get up, with big red eyes and sharp teeth. The five year old tries to bat them away, but they are starting to grow as well. The kitsune continues.

"And thank you for setting fire to that orphanage too. Did you really think I'd tell you where the furry orphans are? the kids will be the first ones to feed the furries. Though I think the one little boy and the one little girl I'll set aside for me. I am in the mood for some children cake." She laughs manically, as the Anti-Fur, and you, watch the five plushies get closer to the kids.

You have to do something!
143121222122121112.title: CONSPIRACY!!!!

choices: Sly  eats the speaker of the anti-fur movement
1431212221221211122.content:
You, Sly, Tony and Henry can't go on seeing this without taking action! So, Sly breaks down the door in less than a minute. When You all enter the house, the orphans are throwing everything they can at the evil plushies to make them stop coming at them. Jazz is laughing insanely, and the speaker at the anti-fur movement is trying to get the other kids out of the way. After you broke in, Jazz curses loudly and ducks out of sight. Sly regretfully tears all the evil plushies to pieces. You and Tony grab the speaker, and Henry is trying to calm all the orphans.
"Where did Jazz go?" asked Sly, looking around the house.
"She's a Kitsune" said an orphan. "she probably used her magic to escape"
And Indeed she did. You can't find Jazz in the house, or in the neighborhood. The only question now is, what to do with the speaker?
"Please, I didn't mean it to go this far" said the speaker, who was in Sly's claws by now.
"Should I eat him or hand him over to the cops?" asked Sly.
"I say you eat him" you say.
1431212221221211122.title: Jazz disappears!

choices: You go get some help first.
14312122212212111221.content:
"No please I beg you!" The man says, wimpering.

"Your actions cause my friends to get hurt." Sly says. "And for that you must be punished. What better way to do so than to be food?!"

"No! NO PLEASE!!!" But the man cries are futile as Sly glomps him dopwn quickly., He icks some at the bitter taste, then laughs as a psir of voices tralk from within him, the little boy talking all about furs. You smile a little.

"Well, hopefully that will end the Anti-Fur movement." You say, hopeful.

"Not likely." Henry says. "People will always have some who think like this. It is inebitable."

Tony nods. "This is true. But we will keep fighting them."

Sly chuckles. "At least we managed to converyt one, and save these kids."

"Yes... but what about Jazz?" You say. "That Kitsune is still out there."

One of the kids speaks up. "I think I know where she is. Please... I'll take you there."

You all look to one another. "We may need some help."
14312122212212111221.title: One down, one to go.

choices: Calvin, and, of course, your tiger is Hobbes.
Suzy Willis. Your tiger is named Tumtum.
144.content: Ok, so you have a big male tiger, who happens to be hungry. But who are you?
144.title: Be specific on this one!

choices: You're Spaceman Spiff exploring the galaxy...
1441.content:
Your name is Calvin, and you're 8 years old. You're named after the comic strip 'Calvin and Hobbes' because you look like Calvin in that comic. You got a plush toy tiger for your 7th birthday which you name Hobbes. And ever since then, you know that Hobbes is alive. Hobbes is as big as you are. He has orange fur and black stripes, and a big fat belly. Soon after you got him, Hobbes ate you. Hobbes does have a stomach, but he can't digest you. His stomach is big too. It's hard not to wind up in Hobbes's stomach every day. When you get home, Hobbes pounces on you like in the comic strip. Hobbes has read the comic strip, and he likes the fact that he's named after Hobbes in the comic. You two even go on "Spaceman Spiff" adventures. You usually place Spaceman Spiff, and Hobbes plays as a hungry alien monster that eats you up. You have an imagination that rivals Calvin's in the comic.


(I loved that comic!)
1441.title: Real-life Calvin and Hobbes

choices: You return in yoru favorite trunks, tasty looking to Hobbes
14412.content:
Days after school are the bvest for you and Hobbes, though usually for Hobbes. You get off the bus, usually after giving the school bully a nickel for protection, then head up to the door. You open it slowly, and start to count.

3...

2...

1...





POUNCE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You are rolled back about half the yards length.Rolling with Hobbes, you fianlly come up, a little dirty but not badly so.

THing is that Hobbes has you by the neck of your shirt. Lifting you off the ground, he takes you in lie fresh caught prey.

Which, in reality, is basically what you are.

"Come on Hobbes!" You complain playfully. "Just once I'd like to get inside before you decide to have Calvin Cookies."

Hobbes chuckles. "I am waiting all day for them. You have to realize that. Why can't you just be home schooled?"

"I will not be home schooled simply to fill your belly." You say with a giggle, Hobbes letting you down on the sofa.

"Hey, a tiger can dream."

You smile and remove your shirt, putting it in the laundry. "Well... let me ghet into my shorts and then the wait will be over, ok?"

"Fair enough." Hobbes says, licking you with his satiny tounge, tickling your cheek.

You smile and go to get changed.
14412.title: The usual after school plummeling.

choices: "tarzan failed to jump over a tiger"
144121.content:
You walk in agian in your trunks, their white, whit black stripes, just like a zebra.
"yummy, can i eat you now"? did Hobbes say as he licks his lips.
"no, lets play a game, and then you can eat me"did you answer.
"okay, what game"?
144121.title: Game time

choices: You and Tumtum are playing in your room
1442.content:
Your name is Suzy Willis and you're 10 years old. You have a great collection of plush toys. You have one of every animal as a plush toy basically. And you name all of your plushies. The pride and joy of your collection is a great big tiger named Tumtum. It's one of those bigger-than-life plush toys, easily 10 feet tall. It was, in fact, in the local library in the "Kid's Corner", where the liberian would read to a gruop of kids. Your father is the liberian in question. You got Tumtum on your 9th birthday when the library got a new plush toy for the "Kid's Corner". The new plush toy at the library is roughly the same size as Tumtum and is a fox.
Tumtum has white fur and black stripes...and a truly *huge* fat belly. Tumtum's belly is bigger than you are and more wider than you! He deserves the name Tumtum!
You like to snuggle up on Tumtum's big belly, which you could use as a small bed. Tumtum is also alive, and loves to have you inside his big belly. In Tumtum's stomach, you can look out via eye holes in Tumtum's belly. Tumtum's stomach is huge also; easily able to fit in 20 kids or more.
1442.title: Infomation on Tumtum

choices: Tumtum will be having a kid buffet!
Tumtum will be getting a new friend!
14421.content:
On eday, you and TUmtum are playing in the room, working on a game of checkers. TUmtum does indeed prefer you in his belly, but it is not the only thing you do. In many ways, Tumtum is like a big brother. In any case, you find yourself on the losing end of the game, with only one king a nd three peices left, whiel Tumtum still has his three kings.

"Come on Suzy." Tumtum tells you. "I know you can still win."

You ponder what to do and move one of your other peices than the king. TUmtum taks the bait, jumpuing the peice, forcing a triple jump. In one move, the tide turns.

You win about six moves later.

"Nicely played!" Tumtum says.

"Well, you know the deal TUmtum, tonight I sleep ON your bellyu rather than IN it."

"I got to stop making that bet." Tumtum says jokingly. He has a japanese accent to him, and is very lovable.

TOday is a big tday though, and you have to hurry. TUmtum and you are being asked to come to the library to help set up a play for some young kids. Most of the kids know the plushies are alive in the library, while the adults still just believe hewy are people in furry suits. Either way is ok with them, especially since the plushiues are very good at reading stories to the kids.

Donations to the library keep pouring in as a result, and there are many special events that the local kids put on for their parents.

"You all set?" You ask Tumtum, putting on some clothes to help out.

"Sure... I only wish I was goign to be going to eat instead of to..."

"Not now. Besides, the kids have a suprise for you." You winks and tug on the paws of TUmtum. Reluctantly, he stands up.

You can't ait to show TUmtum the suprise. Because, after the show is set up...
14421.title: A very special day.

choices: Tumtum is able to eat all 100 kids
144211.content:
The library has a small stage where the children's plays are held. This year, the children are doing "Little Red Riding Hood" with a real plush wolf that's big enough to pass for a suit. Getting Tumtum to the library's stage is easy, if a little hard. Your carry Tumtum, which is hard for a 10 year old kid, with Tumtum being so big. But you manage to bring Tumtum to the library's stage and reveal your surprise to him.
There's about 100 children working on the set on the stage, including your father. Your father knows that all the plushies in the library are alive and LOVE to eat children (and some adults)*. You tell Tumtum he gets to eat all of the children when the set is done on the stage. Tumtum is overjoyed, and hug you close to his big belly. Tumtum loves to stuff himself with kids.
The plush wolf is there, too. The plush wolf is named Drezzy and has gray fur. Drezzy has a belly as big as Tumtum's. Drezzy is helping with the costumes. As you watch, Drezzy tries on some of grandmother's clothes made for him.
After the stage gets set up, all of the kids line up in front of Tumtum.





*There's a grand total of 10 plushies in the library, all located in the kid section. All of the plushies can pass for a fur suit.
Rita - the vixen that replaced Tumtum and is about the same size
Drezzy - the wolf that's going to be in the play
Klondike - A polar bear
Sally - Another vixen
Flametongue - A red dragon, easily the biggest plushie in the library. He reaches the 30-feet high ceiling. Can't be moved easily from the library
Templeton - A rat named after the character in "Charlotte's Web". He's even fatter than Templeton in the movie.
Pouch - A kangaroo with a pouch big enough for a kid to fit in
Wanda - A hippo
Albert - An Anaconda
Sly - a racoon
Some of the adults that go to the library (about 1 in 50) know that the plushies are alive.
144211.title: Buffet for Tumtum

1442112.content:
Tumtum smiles and starts glomping down kids in order, mming and commenting on how each one tastes. Your father chuckles, loving the sight of happy kids becoming plushie snacks, at least for a moment or two.

Tumtum smiles and looks at you when it comes to be your turn, and opens as wide as he can. Inside him the sounds of wrestling and happy laughter are heard. You shiver with glee as in you go, glomped down quickly by your plushie. You can't see a thing as you are squeezed in among the other kids, but you have a lot of fun in there.

But soon, the kids stop coming. TUmtum moans and rubs his belly as he belches.

"OHhhhhhhhhh... so full!" He says. "But... That was only half..."

You chuckle as you hear a very femine voice speak up. "We'll share the rest Tumtum." You feel as every other plushies give the fat plushie a hug, the kids inside awwing some. You then hear the sounds of eating going on. Carefully, you look out the one eyehole you can get to.

You lauygh at what you see. The othe rplushies are chasing the kids throughout the kids section of the library, being careful to be as quiet as possible, but they are all definately being eatenm up. The dragon, Flametounge, snaps one up who happensd to get too close. Klondike, a big polar bear who is best friends with Tumtum, makes a child sandwich with some of the pillows. In the end, no child escapes.

The father smiles and puts on a show. "Oh no.. .all the kids have been eaten by the hungry beasts... what will I do?"

All the kids laugh. Your father is a terrible actor.
1442112.title: Sharing the feast.

choices: You wake up still in Tumtum's stomach
You wake up on the outside
14421121.content:
The only light in Tumtum's stomach comes from the two eye holes. All of the kids are either wrestling with each other, or settling down to take a well-deserved nap after setting up the play. You wrestle some with the kids. When you're tired of wrestling, you find a nice comfy spot at one end of the massive stomach. You settle in and go to sleep.
No kid escaped from being food for a plushie. All of the plushies in the library had at least one kid in thier bellies. Flametongue only has one kid in his belly. Flametonuge's stomach is like a small cave to the little kid, and he pretends to be a spunleker.
Rita the vixen has eight kids within her belly, all wrestling with each other. She hugs her belly in order to hug all of the children within her as they continue to wrestle.
Templeton the rat has 10 kids within his great big belly.
Klondike, the polar bear, has 13 kids in his belly.
The rest of the kids are in various plushies. Your father closes the kid section, which won't open until the play later that night.
14421121.title: Naptime

144211212.content:
When you wake up, a lot of time has passed. It is gewtting close to play time, and you are gently shook awake by Tumtum.

"Suzy.... Suzy... time to get up."

"mmm... wha?" You say, opening your eyes to the plush. "Hi TUmtum.. .I had a wonderful dream..."

The plushie smiles. "We better take our seats. The play is about to start!" He smiles and hugs you. "You can use me for a seat if you want. Everyone's out now. I lety them out a bit ago so they could get ready."

You smile and ponder. "No... I'll sit by you instead."

THe plushie shrgs and hugs, taking you over to the seating areas. THe kids look all set to go. Drezzy smiles in his outfit... some raggy pants and a bowler hat. You chuckle as your friend Kira comes out as Red Riding Hood, a boy named Joey coming as a hunter, and a older girl named Nancy as the grandmother. You take your seat by Tumtum, eager to watch the play.
144211212.title: Almost play time.

choices: The Hunter comes and he gets gulped down too!
The Hunter comes to save the day
1442112121.content:
You climb up on Tumtum's belly to better view the play. All the parents clap and cheer as Little Red Riding Hood comes up on stage. She's soon followed the hunter.

Hunter: "You must be careful out here, Red. I know that you're on your way to your grandmother house, but there has been sightings of that wolf"

Little Red Riding Hood: (Adjusting something in her basket) "I'll be careful, you brave hunter"

Hunter: (Looking around) "Well, be sure to keep your eyes open. That wolf can be tricky"

The hunter goes off stage, and Kira walks about five feet when Drezzy comes out.

Kira: (backs up slowly)

Drezzy: "And what are you doing out here, little girl?"

Kira: "My g-g-grandmother is very sick and I have a basket of goodies for her"

Drezzy: "I'm sorry to hear about your grandmother. Where does she live?"

Kira: "Why, in a house in the middle of the forest"

Drezzy: "There's some flowers in that meadow over there (he points off-stage) why not go and pick some flowers for her? I'm sure she'll like it"

Kira: "Oh, thank you Mr. Wolf!" (she walks off-stage)

Drezzy: <evil laugh> "And I'll take care of granny!" (rubs his belly)

The scence switches to inside of a house. Nancy, as the grandmother, is sleeping on a bed when the door knocks. Nancy, who is 16 years old, is wearing pajamas.

Nancy: (in a creeky voice) "The door is unlocked"

Drezzy: (enters) "Hi there, old woman!"

Nancy: (gives a high-pitched squeak) "the wolf!! HELP!"

Drezzy: "There's nobody to help you...now, I'll get my lunch!" (jumps on Nancy, gulps her down in one bite) hmmmm....delicious!"

Drezzy changes into his granny clothing, making everyone laugh in the room. You hear one adult female say "the poor man...he has to wear two suits now!" Drezzy gets into the bed and lays down. A couple of minutes later, there's a knock at the door.

Drezzy: (girlish voice) "It's unlocked, my dear"

The next scence takes place and Red is gulped down after a short chase.
1442112121.title: The play

14421121212.content:
THe stage goes dark, and opens up with Drezzy sleeping in the bed, his fat belly hanging out. The Hunter enters and stops.

Hunter (Cocking his gun): There you are you rascal! Ihave been looking for you for months. Now I... (He looks over) Oh, I see someone has been having some lunch. Who weas it this time?"

The wolf slowly wakes up, wide eyed.

Drezzy: What the...? (He gets up and runs, the hunter chasing. The whole of the audiance laughs as the hunter chases him around the stage. he hunter and he head offstage, and there are sounds of breaking plates and a final howl. Aftera few moments, Drezzy comes out, loooking thinner, on a rope leash.

Hunter: Just be lucky I didn't shoot you, villian.

Drezzy: At least I would have had a full belly!

The audiance laughs, you included, then cheers as out comes the grandmother and Red. A short bit later, the play ends, the wolf tied to a doghouse on the far end of the stage, while the other three enjoy a nice lunch. All the cast get up and bow afterward, the audiance stand8ing and cheering.

Not a bad job really.

********************

Following the play, the kids and the plushies have a sort of cast party. Tapes of the play are sold to the families, the money from the sales donated to a local orphanage.

"We did pretty well." Says Kira, still in costume. She looks to Drezzy, then to your father. "Sir, can I stay here tonight, in Drezzy? I want to thank him."

Your father chuckles. "Of course, but don't break anything, and please keep the lights low. Remember that it has to look like no one is here." Your father then turns to you. "Well kiddo, ready to go?"

"sure am!" Yo usay, hugging TUmtum. He smiles and holds you close to him, whispering with the father. Probably discussing wether to let you sleep in the belly anyway tonight, or in your big bed.

Apparently Tumtum lost the argument, cause he looks kinda sad about it. Ah well.

You say good bye to your friends, human and plush, then head for home.

You smile and go with the plush. Yo uare not sure what all he is talking aboutm, but he has never hurt you before, and probably never will. You smile and head downstairs to your father. You think on this.

In the light caused by thew circle, you see that you are shrinking! You are no longer the size of a normal girl, but are slowly becoming the size of a mouse! What is more, you see on your arms a thick fur starting to form.

It's working! You're turning into a mousekid!

Eventually, all is black in the storage room. You do not know if you have been turned into a little mopuse or not, but it sure feels it. Tumtum licks his chops as he loosk you over.

ou look somewhat like the cartoon mice you see on TV, but with prety white fur and a bow on your head. your clothes shruink along with you, fitting quite nicely.
