14512.content:
It's Ashley's 8th birthday, and you decided that its time to reveal your secret to Ashley. That you are alive...and hungry. Since day one, Ashley has snuggled against you, and you've enjoyed it. Ashley uses your big belly as a pillow, even to this day. Well, it's about time she uses your belly as a sleeping bag.
Over the years, you've revealed your secret to all of your owners. And you ate all of 'em on thier 8th birthday. Your so snuggly, Ashley gave you the name Snuggles when she was three. You don't mind that your name changes from owner to owner.
On the morning of Ashley's birthday, Ashley wakes up. At 8 years old, Ashley is 4'5" or so. Your 5'3" and she can't get to sleep without you beside her.
You're a plain tiger plushie with black stripes all over you, and have a big white belly, big enough for kids to use it as a pillow.
Ashley used your belly as a pillow last night.
"Morning, Snuggles" said Ashley, rubbing your belly with her hand.
"Good morning, Ashley" you say.
"You can talk?!" asked Ashley, getting off of your belly to look at you more closely.
"Yep" you say. "I can talk and I'm hungry"
"Hungry?" asked Ashley. "but you're just a toy!"
"Us toys get hungry too" you say.
"What do you wanna eat?" asked Ashley.
14512.title: Birthday morning

choices: You hold her in your tummy for awhile.
You head downstairs with her. breakfast time!
145121.content:
You smile at Ashley. "You." With a lick on her cheek, you open wide.

Ashley is clearly spooked, but thewy always are the first time. Gently you ease her into your soft maw. Oh, she tastes so goood..... Whoever said little girls are made of sugar and spice and everythign nice MUST have eaten one, cause they were RIGHT!

better still, you feel her start to liek it somewhat. "Heee! it's so soft! But why didn't you tell me sooner?"

Using your ESP, you respond. "You weren't old enough yet. Now you are the perfect age. Now... now we can be friends. Like your mom and grandmom were to me."

She eeps, and you see her legs kicking. She is going in pretty fast, and is oh so tasty.

"You.... oh this is snuggly.... you did this to my mom?"

You nod and respond. "Oh yes, she was really tasty. I'll tell you more about that later... after your birthday party. By the way, Happy Birthday."
145121.title: Sugar and Spice, She tastes NICE!

choices: You keep Ashley in your stomach until the birthday party
1451211.content:
Ashley woke up rather early for her. It was around 6:30 in the morning when she woke up. You rub your HUGE belly with little Ashley in it. You sense that she likes it in your stomach a lot. She gets into a sitting postition in your stomach and snuggles with your stomach lining. It feels so nice to have a girl in your tummy again. Ashley's mother had tried to get away from you, but she ended up in your belly anyway. All of your owners have been in your stomach, even the boy who liked to wrestle with you. Boys are OKAY, but girls taste better than boys.
"Snuggles, I can't see in here" said Ashley.
"Well, what do you expect?" you ask. "you're in a stomach after all!" However, you make the eye holes in your belly appear.
"Cool!" squeals Ashley. "I can see out of your belly!"
You decided to keep her in your stomach for a while. Ashley's mother wouldn't be worried, because she would know where Ashley was now. In fact, Ashley's mother peeks in at around 7 AM. She just smiles at you, and you wink at her.
"Hi, mom!" said Ashley.
"Good Morning" said Ashley's mother, Debbie. "I see that you discovered Snuggles was alive" Ashley giggles.
"Well..I'll be downstairs" said Debbie and she walks out of Ashley's room.
1451211.title: Ashley likes it!

14512111.content:
Knowing the party guests won't show up until this afternoon, you just hold Ashley in your belly until then. she sure doesn't mind, mmming happily and looking about.

"sure is nice in here... so soft and warm." She says. "Hey... can I have some breakfast?"

You nod. "Sure, your mom got breakfast inside me too, I'll head on down and get it." You smile as you start your walk. "So, oyu have a lot of friends?"

She giggles. "Nah, just a few. But we go everywhere together." She rubs the inside of your tummy some.

"Wow.... it's so silky in here! and squishy!"

You smile, the feeling kinda nice as Ashley gives your tummy a massage of sorts. you reward her with a hug, squeezing your belly around her some.

Naturally, she giggles and tries to return it.

Once downstairs, her mother has started breakfast. "It will be just a minute more." she says.

"mmmm! Waffles!" You hear Ashley say. After a moment, you both decide to...
14512111.title: Earning the name Snuggles

choices: A friend of Ashley's comes over early
145121111.content:
You both decide to wait until breakfast is ready, and you two could play together afterwards. You sit in a chair in the kitchen. Ashley's massage does feel nice and you hug your belly once again, making Ashley giggle and tried to return the hug.
"I see Ashley likes it in there" said Debbie as she puts the waffle mix into a waffle iron and turning it on.
"Of course she does" you say. "you liked it in there"
"Well, you'll be happy to know that all of her friends are coming over" said Debbie.
"How many?" you ask.
"15" said Debbie. "I had twice as many friends when I was her age"
"Yes, I remember" you say, savoring the memory of eating the 40 kids that came to Debbie's 8th birthday. When you ate the 40 kids, you felt as if you were going to explode, but you loved every minute of it.
It takes a few minutes for three waffles to be done, and you all of them in one gulp. The waffles are excellent, covered in maple sryup. Ashley makes "hmmm"ing sounds as she eats the waffles.
145121111.title: Waffles

choices: GO and play wioth the girls... and maybe eat them.
Just stay here for now and talk to Ashley's mom.
1451211112.content:
A short bit after breakfast, you hear a knoick on the door. In your belly, Ashley giggles some.

"That HAS to be Katie. She ALWAYS is around, and is like a sister to me!"

You smile. TWO tasty little girls already? you cannot wait to meet her!

A few seconds later, in comes Katie and Ashley's mom. Katie is a girl about Ashley's age, if not a little bit older, maybe 9. She has short red hair and freckles, and is slightly taller than Ashley. She carries a backage wrapped with blue and pink paper, tied with a white bow. From the looks of how messily it is done, she did it herself.

"Ashley dear, come on out of the plushie. Katie is here!"

"Happy birthday Ash!" Katie says, calling your owner by her nickname. She gives you a hug too. THat is the best part of it all.

Katie has seen you before. Shhe may not know you are alive... but she might be intrested to learn. You don't get the chance just yet though, as your owner crawls out of your mouth, as tasty as ever.

"wow! When could it do that?" Katie asks, setting her present on the table.

"Always could I guess, just never bothered to try it until today." She hmms some. "It was kinda cold last night."

As she and Katie go off to play and watch a movie in the living room, Ashley's mother smiles at you. "Was she tasty?" she asks.

"She could have used a little chocolate syrup, but otherwise delicious!" You say with a giggle. "And Katie... does she...?"

"Her? No... not yet. But if you want, I am sure she wouldn't mind. She is relaly big into wild animals."

You hmmmm... she DOES look mighty yummy!
1451211112.title: Meet Katie.

choices: Go inside the house to cover the girls in mustard (or anything)
14512111121.content:
You decided to reveal yourself to Katie. So, you leave the kitchen. Last time you heard, it sounded Ashley and Katie were outside in the backyard. You go to the windows and see if they're still in the backyard. Yes they are. They're both playing on the swing set Ashley has. You open the back door and go into the backyard. It's a sunny day with a few clouds. It's early spring, so it's a little chilly. In fact, today is the first warm day in a long time. You go over to the swing set, and it's Katie that notices you.
"Ashley, your tiger...its alive!"
"Oh I know" said Ashley.
"Hello Katie" you say, smiling at the shocked Katie. Katie manages to say hello.
"So..so.." said Katie. "Snuggles ate you?!"
"Yep" said Ashley, hugging you close. "he just came to life today and ate me up!"
"Cool" said Katie.
"Want to know what it's like in my tummy?" you ask.
Katie looks like this isn't a very good idea.
"Oh, I won't hurt you" you say. "you'll love it in my belly"
"First, I want to play with Ashley more" said Katie.
"Okay" you say and smile.
Ashley, Katie and you play on the swing set for more than a hour. At the end, Katie is ready to go in your belly...and so is Ashley.
14512111121.title: Playing with the girls

choices: THe party starts a while later.
145121111211.content:
You are pushing Ashley on the swing when, at last, Katie comes up to you.

"Umm....." she says, nervously. "I... I htink I am ready to be a snack now."

Ashley smiles as she swings. "Really? Trust me, it's scary at firsat, but inside is sooo nice!"

Katie seemed unconvinced, but you smile some. "If you get nervous about this, I will stop. I promise."

Katie thinks for a moment, then nods. "Ok.... eat me."

"Gladly." You say, purring some as you pick her up. Taking a seat on the grass, you open your mouth wide and take a tasting lick. Katie is indeed very yummy, though not quite as much as your owner. Still, She is very delicious overall, and clearly, from her taste, eats a lot of sweets.

"Hey... this IS nice! It's so soft in here... hehehehe!... HEY! Stop tickling!" She says, squirming as you lick her around her clothes. But you cannot help it. The further you go the tastier she gets!

It dioesn't take too long before you are gulping her in at a fast rate. Mainly because you see Ashley getting off the swing, eager for her turn to be gulped. Two tasty girls befiore lunch... who can beat that!

It takes a bit, but finally you swallow Katie on down, burping out her shoes. Ashley giggles some and snuggles your tummy. Inside, you hear and feel Katie getting comfortable.

"Mmm! It IS nice in here! And so roomy! Ashley come on in, we could have a tea party in here!"

THe thought of two girls playng in yoru belly makes you all the hungriwer, and you grab Ashley. She giggles and squirms, pretending to fight being eaten, but of course she wants in your tummy too.

"Please Snuggles!" She says playfully. "PLEASE don't eat me! I taste yucky!"

You smile. "But you don't master!" You start to shove her in feet first. "You taste SCRUMPTOUS!" You slowly gobble uyp the wiggly, tasty girl, smiling happily as you hear Katie cheer you on. Your owner is indeed EXTREMELY delicioous, even more so than the first time.

True of all your owners.

In a few moments, and with a lot of help from Katie pulling her in, Ashley is eaten up as well. You giggle some as you feel them tickle your inside. You are not nearly full of course, but the two make a fine meal.

With a smile, you head back to the house, patting your belly.
145121111211.title: YUM!

1451211112111.content:
As you enter the house, Ashley's mother smiles at you when she sees your big belly.
Before you or Ashley's mom could say anything, the doorbell rings and you lick your lips. Could it be another guest has come early? Yes! It's Jenny, who knows you but doesn't know that you're alive. Jenny places her present on the kitchen table and looks at you. By the time that Jenny put her present on the table, you're sitting in Ashley's chair.
"Hello there, Snuggles" said Jenny. "have you seen Ashley?"
"Well, yes I have" you say, hearing Ashley and Katie giggle inside you. You grab Jenny and gulp her down quickly. Now you have THREE girls in your belly!
"Hmmm...this is nice" said Jenny.
"I could get use to this" said Katie.
You hug your belly, and the three girls try to return the hug as best they could.
1451211112111.title: Jenny is next

14512111121112.content:
You smile as you feel the three of them playing inside you. WIth a chuckle, you swallow down some dolls and some snacks.

"What is this for?" Asked Angela.

"Well, I think having the three of you play in there for now is plenty. I need a nap."

"But the par... I mean..." Katie says, and you can feel her blush.

"Yes," You say, guessing her thoughts. "I'll let you out in time for the party. Trust me. I';ll leave the eyeholes open, as well as my mouth, just in case I am aslepp too long so you can get out."

THe girls smile, Jenny is the most amazed by this. "Wow! What else can you do?"

You smile some. Better not answer that for now. Besides, you need this nap.

You waddle into the living room and plop on the couch. Inside your belly, you can hear the girls playing some. You giggle at some of what they say, but then just yawn some.

With a finbal stretch, you lie back on the couch and go to sleep. TO all the rest of the world, you look like an ordinary plushie now.

But the three inside you, as well as Ashley's mom, all know better.
14512111121112.title: Nap time.

choices: Eat Jamie while nobody is looking
145121111211121.content:
You're a heavy sleeper. You could sleep for DAYS at a time. But, you wake up in time to feel Ashley crawling out of your mouth, with the help of Katie and Jenny. You lick Ashley's feet, making her giggle. When Ashley gets out of your mouth, it's about time for the party.
Not 4 minutes later, all the guests arrive. You count 20 kids, 10 girls and 10 boys. A FEAST!! But, you decide not to reveal yourself until all Ashley's presents are open. All the girls at the party think you're cute and snuggly. The boys thought you were snuggly too.
Ashley opened her presents in the living room after eating cake. She got the board game Monopoly, and Battleship, and the like. A girl named Jamie is using your belly as a pillow as she watches Ashley opening her presents.
145121111211121.title: Party!

choices: The gets everyone intrested in a game.
1451211112111211.content:
Jamie smeels so good, and he is just the right size too....

You smile and lick your chops as you suddenly hug her.

Jamie, wondering what is going on, looks up. You smile and shhhhhhhh her, putting a paw to your lip.

She giggles and obeys, mainly out of curiousity. She looks to your mouth, wriglging some.

You smile and work fast, glomping her head and shoulders before she can change her mind. You swallow quickly, the girl very tasty, something like a cake.

You watch as you eat, Ashley opening up a beautiful set of faux jewelry from a boy. Clearly a boyfirned of sorts.

How delicous.

You smile as Jamie reaches your belly. You cna feel gher get comfy, smiling and watching threough the eyeholes in your stomach.

"This is so cool..." She says.

You watch as well, when the mother comes over. "COuldn'tr wait huh?" She says.

"Nope... so hungry..." You say, patting your belly.

"Well, then I'll get right to work on the BIG suprise for everyone." She winks and goes off.
1451211112111211.title: Appetizer!

14512111121112112.content:
Ashley opens her last present, which is a game for her GameBoy. All the guests, minus Jamie, goes to the kitchen to have some cake. You walk into the kitchen with Ashley's mom.
Ashley's mom tells about you, and also your liking to eat children. At first, the guests were afraid of you, but then they all argue on who gets to be eaten first. Ashley wins since it's her birthday, and you happily grab her and gobble her down. After that, all of the guests form a line waiting to be eaten one by one. As you eat more of the guests, the more you look like a bean bag chair. Finally, you gulp down the last of the guests.
You now look like an overstuffed bean bag chair and you're sure that you could eat more. Your belly is so big that you can't hug it all it once. So you decided to hug your belly in different parts, which makes all the guests giggle inside you.
14512111121112112.title: The feast

choices: Sigh and leave your belly unfilled for now
145121111211121121.content:
You moan in sheer bliss as you feel the kids squirm and wriggle and play inside you. Some pretend to be captured, begging to be let out, but only in fun. But then you start to hear them wrestle.

THat makes you giggle in delight. Still, you don't want them hurt, for one. And two, you are still hungry. So, you look to Ashley's mother with a look she knows very well.

"Alright, alright. I'll go in and keep an eye on them,, you glutton." She says with a wink, smiling and going into the other room. She reemerges in a once peice bathing suit, which looks good on her.

"Yumm!" You say, and open wide. She smiles and does a dive into your mouth. She slides in fast, so much so that you almost do not taste her. But that is ok, since adults do not taste as good as kids. Still, she makes a nice bulge inside kyou, and keeps keep the klids in line.

But you are STILL hungry!
145121111211121121.title: Hey, they need supervision after all!

1451211112111211212.content:
You get up from the floor and wonder where to find more food. You're a major glutton. You waddle as you walk into the kitchen, feeling the kids in your stomach settle down somewhat.
You think of how to get more food; food as in humans. Hmmm. You might be able to call a pizza place and then eat the delivery man...but what if he's quick and gets away? Hmmmm. You might call some more of Ashley's friends over.
There's nothing left of the cake, but there is plenty of ice cream. Sighing, you decide to have some ice cream. All the kids in your belly all giggle as you eat bowl after bowl of ice cream.
But you are soon done with all the ice cream and you still want more food!
1451211112111211212.title: ways of getting food

choices: Think she is tasty as is.... GULP!
145121111212.content:
You smile as the girls enter the house behind you, eager to get into that tummy.

"Wait a second." You say to them. "Let's do it differently this time." You chuckle and head intot he cupboard, smiling as you use magic to conjur up a couple large buns, as big as your friends. You remmeber when you last had a girl sandwich, and now you are going to have two of them! When you bring the buns out, the girls stare, wide eyed.

"How did you...?" Katie asks. You just smile.

"Sorry, that's a secret." You open up the buns, and look to the girls. "Can you girls lie down on these? I'll get some mustard."

They giggle and do so, Ashley lying on her back, a perfect fit in her bun, while Katie lies on her chest, a little worried. "Will he chew us?" Katie asks.

"Naw, he can swallow us whole!" Ashley replies as you start spreading some mustard and ketchup on her. You chuckle and decide to add some pickles as well, so she looks like a big burger. Yo uare about to duplicate the pricess for Katie when she speaks up.

"Ummm... can I be something else?" she asks. "I don't really like burgers that much."

You laugh. "That's fair enough, as long as you are in my tummy!" You watch as she climbs off the bun, and Ashley waits for you to eat her. You set the top bun on and get to it.

You chew slowly, making sure not to bite into her but rather squish everything around her. As a plushie, you rwelaly couldn't harm her anyway, but you are on the safe side just to make sure.

You mmm happily, Ashley making one heck of a tasdty burger. She tastes wonderful, and the garnishes add to her flavour perfectly. You listen to her giggle inside you, and arer unable to kjeep form laughing around your meal as she tickles your insides.

Katie watches, wide eyed. She looks more and more eager to be in that belly. Hiow wonderful.

After a few minutes, the tasty girl who is your owner is in yoru belly, snug and comfy in her little sleeping bag made of bread, mustard, ketchup, and a few pickles. Now for the second course.

You reach for katie and ponder how to prepare her.
145121111212.title: Lunch!

choices: You wait for that-"Knock Knock!"  Party Time!
Have some more fun with your meals, the party is yet to come...
1451211112121.content:
Since Ashley already was in your belly you couldn't reach the drawers with the extra weight anyway. So you simply put the ketchup and mustard all over her.

"Wait," Katie starts. "What will I be?"

"You'll see." You say excitedly. Boy did she look so tasty! You make a quick ponder and magically bring a huge hot dog bun onto the ground before you. You look over to her as she only continues to be wide eyed.

"I get it now!" She squealed. Before you could say anything else she was already laying in the bun as she looked at the ceiling, then at you. What luck! Another one willing, just how sweet?

You started walking around her in a circle, you big belly jingling with your last burger inside. Katie giggles, both from excitement and simply being nervous. Not like it mattered, she'll get used to it. You start at the foots end, licking your lips. You were extra careful with Katie, since she was after all a little scared. You on the other hand at times enjoyed one long process of one meal.

It took a while but nearly ten minutes later you had two little girls in your belly that was also filled with the buns, (or what was still there) the ketchup, mustard, and all the rest of the good stuff you ate with them. The girls were having their own food fight in it too! Oh you enjoyed every minute. Your belly now was so huge your back legs were splitting from the massive belly, you couldn't even walk!

"oh you two were sooo good!" You stated. "I simply can't wait for the party."
1451211112121.title: The Second Course!

1452.content:
You are a living plushie. A female plush tiger, big and fat and snuggly.

You are also a legacy of a wonderful woman.

4 years ago, your current owner, Daniel, lost his mother. You were there when she went. She had a special request to give you and her husband.

"You must raise our son now... I wish.. I wish I could... see him... grow... Please Katrin... do this... for... me..."

She died not three minutes later.

Time has passed since then, and you are still, as far as you know, the only plushie with adoption records. Everyone in the small town where you live knows about you, and that you are alive. Daniel especially knows, asking you a lot about his mother.

But things have noit been well lately. Daniel's father has started to drink, something he had avoided for a long time. But now... he is getting mean...

You have to do something.
1452.title: A sad beginning.

14522.content:
Daniel's father, Tom, didn't use to drink. Tom never touched a bottle in his life, but after his wife died he went into a deep depression and started to drink to drown his sorrows. Unluckily, he's a mean drunk. If he was a jovial drunk, you wouldn't mind at all. Tom comes home drunk at least every other day. And he beats his son...or he would, if you weren't there. When not at school, Daniel is usually hiding in your stomach. Your stomach is Daniel's only safehaven from his father. You heard Daniel crying himself to sleep in your stomach for countless nights. This is no life for a boy. Daniel has told you that he feels safe from harm in your stomach, and you're perfectly willing to eat him. Instead beating on Daniel, Tom has started to beat on you...but you fight back. You may have not claws, but you're able to outrun a drunken man, and throw items at him to defend yourself. The police has come to Tom's house so often that you only need to dial 911 and the police will come quickly. On the nights Tom comes home drunk, he's hauled away by the police. In the morning, when Tom is having a hangover, he apologies whatever he did while drunk. You're getting tired of this, and Daniel deserves so much better.
It's Thursday night and you're reading a bedtime story to Daniel. Daniel is 12 years old. Your bedtime stories are usually about Daniel's mother. You hear a car pull in the driveway. Tom is home. Daniel is already in your belly, so he has nothing to fear.
"Snitch...or whatever your damn name is, come here" said Tom as he enters the house. His voice is slurred. Sighing, you exit Daniel's room and go to see what Tom wants.
Tom has brought some friends over. Two other men has come home with Tom. One man is just as drunk as Tom is. The other man looks to be sober. The sober man is in his mid-20's and has black hair and is wearing a trench coat. The other drunken man is short and fat and has red hair. You think you recongize the sober man, but can't be sure. The sober man must be a resident of the town because he doesn't freak out when he sees you.
"Cook me some dinner" orders Tom.
It's 2:30 AM.
"Tom, I'm really getting tired of this" you say. "you're suppose to take care of Daniel, and being drunk half the time isn't a good way to do that!"
"Stop bitching and make me some dinner" said Tom. "I shouldn't have to repeat myself"
"And I would like some flapjacks" said the other drunken man. The sober man is trying to keep Tom upright.
"I'm not cooking anything for a bunch of drunks" you say.
"Now, you listen here" said Tom. "this is my house,which means you have to do anything I say"
"That doesn't mean I'm your slave" you snarl.
"Where is Daniel?" asked Tom. "I need you, boy! Make this bitch cook me a meat loaf"
Daniel is trying not to listen in your stomach. He hates to see his father like this, and it's 1,000 times worse for him to hear his father.
"Tom, go easy on Daniel" said the sober man.
"I am going easy on Danny" said Tom, sitting roughly in a chair. The other drunken man passes out on the couch as soon as he sits down.
"Daniel is terrified of you, Tom" you say. "his mother dies and you crawl into a bottle...that's no way to raise your son"
"Ah, just shut yer mouth, you fat little bitch" said Tom.
"A bitch is a female dog" you say. "I'm a female tiger" The sober man laughs.
Tom gets up and smacks you upside the head with his hand. You snap then. You grab Tom's hand and you throw Tom into the wall. You're not too strong, but you're able fight off a drunk. Tom, not being able to stop himself, runs headlong into the wall and he falls to the floor and doesn't move.
"Call the police" you say to the sober man.
The police come to your house and arrest Tom. The other drunken man is still passed out on the couch, so the police hauls him away too. The sober man stays.
"What's your name?" you ask, when all the ruckus is over. Daniel has gone to sleep.
"Jerome" said the man. "I was the one who brought Tom home. I..didn't want to bring him here, but you try arguing with a drunk"
You sigh.
"I knew Tom before he started to drink" said Jerome. "he was a good family man, until Harriet died.....it's an old story, a man drowning his sorrows over a loved one that died"
"Yeah..." you say. "I wish I could just leave here so Daniel won't keep hiding in my stomach...I like him in my stomach, but a boy should by out playing instead of hiding from a drunken father"
14522.title: An old story

145221.content:
Jerome is a nice enough guy, and apparently was friends with both Tom and danny's mom, Louise, since they were kids. But not until recently did he know about you. He wished now he had, because he likes you a lot.

You smile and agree. You bet he was a wonderful, and perhapos a tasty, little boy. But that was another time.

"In any case," He says, "TOm needs help, but he refuses to take it. He just keeps going after his son."

"Isn't there some way I can protect him?" You ask.

"One way." Jerome says. "I have a friend who knows about living plushies, a doctor. He may be able to find a special way you can help Dan." He smiles and stands. "I can take you there right now if you want."

You ponder this...
145221.title: Making Plans.

1452211.content:
"Alright" you say. Jerome and you get into his car and drive to the doctor. Daniel is sound asleep in your tummy.
"So how does this doctor knows about living plushies?" you ask.
"Oh, you aren't the only living plushie" said Jerome as he drives. "there are tons of living plushies"
You're not surprised about that. After all, most kids in town own a plushie, and it's a safe bet that at least one of those plushies is alive. You know little Harry Goodson has a living plush dragon that's alive.
"Where does this doctor live?" you ask.
"Just 2 miles away" said Jerome.
"And he won't mind us coming at his home this late?" you ask.
"Oh.." said Jerome, pulling out his cellphone. He dials a number and wait for anyone to pick up.
"Sorry to wake up, Dr. Jennings.....well, I have a living plushie here with a problem......well, she belongs to a Daniel McCormick.....Yes, that's Tom's son....If it's alright, I'm bringing her to you so you could help her.....Oh good! We'll be there shorty. Bye"
As Jerome hangs up the cellphone, you notice that he just turned on Tressler Avenue. Tressler Avenue is really an avenue; it's a divided street with grassy islands in the middle. You know that Tressler Avenue leads to the North Hill neighborhood of Springfield.
"Dr. Jennings lives in the 'hood?" you ask.
"No,but it's the fastest way there" said Jerome.
You arrive at Dr. Jennings house a few minutes later.
Jerome goes up and knocks at the door. You climb up the stairs to the front porch when the door opens.
1452211.title: Down Tressler Avenue

choices: The doctor has an idea to help Daniel.
The doctor knows of a place where they can be safe.
14522111.content:
when the door is answered, a large kangaroo is ont he otherside. Close examination revels that, yes, this is a plushie roo.

It's about the size of a teenager, with a large pouch. In the pouch, sticking out, is a smaller roo, sleeping soundly, if a plushie was ever known to sleep.

You smile at the sight, it is so cute. Now you aresure you can get heklp. Jerome smiles.

"Pouch, its good to see you again. And how is he today?"

"Oh, he is just fine, sleeping now." The roo says, petting the bundle in the pouch. "It was hard for him at first, but no he likes it."

"Wait... what was hard?" You ask.

"Oh please excuse my manners." Jerome says. "Katrin, this is Pouch, assistant to the doctor nd favorite toy to all the visitors. And the one in her pouch is Billy, her former owner."

You go wide eyed. "What?! But he... that would mean..."

"I'll let the doctor explain. it may be a way to help Daniel, and he may have other ideas."

With a mile, Pouch leads you and Jerome into what appears to be a large library, though the boks inside are ones no regular man would read, and a few you have never seen before. There is even a couple magic books, if you can believe thjat.

The doctor sits at the far end of the room, a little girl asleep in the chair beside him, no doubt his granddaughter. he is an OLD man, with no hair on his head save for a couple small white patches, and a white beard. He grabs a nearby cane to help him walk, smiling as Pouch gives him a hand.

"Ah, you must be Katrin. I am so sorry we must meet under these circumstances. Now, I understand you have a problem."

You nod and begin to explain it to him, from beginning to end.
14522111.title: The doctor's assistant, Pouch.

145221112.content:
"Hmm.." said the doctor. "I know somewhere where you can go that'll be safe for Daniel"

"Yea?" you ask.

"Here at my house" said Dr. Jennings.

"Oh, but I don't want.." you begin.
"It'll be alright" said Dr. Jennings. "while you're staying here, I'll try to get Tom into AA"
"Good luck with that" you say sourly. You've been trying to get Tom to go to AA meetings, but he wouldn't hear of it. After Loiuse died, things had gone downhill in a hurry. Tom was mourning by drowning his sorrows, which isn't right.
"Oh..I have a feeling he'll listen to me" said Dr. Jennings, exchanging a look with Pouch.
Jerome had to leave for his own home. Jerome lived alone in an apartment in the city. He leaves just before 3 AM.
"But, I don't want to live here" you say.
"This is only temperory" said Dr. Jennings. "now, you must be tired. Pouch will show you to your room"
As Pouch leads you to your room, you take another look at the bundle in Pouch's pouch.
"What happened to Bily?" you ask.
"...I'll tell you in the morning, Katrin" said Pouch after a slight pause.
Dr. Jennings house is a three-story house, and your room is on the top floor.
145221112.title: Staying in the doctor's house...for awhile

choices: Meanwhile, in the play room with Pouch, Billy, and Daniel...
1452211121.content:
THe moprning comes soon enough, though you hear Daniel crying in his sleep. Poor thing. Oertime you have seen him so much as a son rather than as a human owner.

Dr. Jennings is waiting for you as you come down after letting Daniel out. It took some time to explain it all, but he seems happier now than ever. He is very excited when he sees Pouch, and goes off with him. THe meeting reminds you to ask about Billy.

"Ah yes... I figured that would be coming up." THe doctor says, smiling as he drank some honey tea. "You see... some kids get very attached to their toys. TO some who arew very low in this poor world, they are all they have. But of course, plshies are immortal as long as they are cared for, and humans are well... not."

You sigh and nod in agreement. You saw your most loved owner die, asking you to take care of her son.

"But... there is a way around this. A plushie only has to digest the child they eat."

"But... we can't!" You say. The doctor smiles.

"You are partially right. You cannot break them down into nutrients and all that. You don't need to. But I have found that all plushies can, if the concentrate, convert human flesh and bone into stuffing, silk, and fur. The soul is encased in this conversion, and while it takes some time to adjust, the truth is that the resulting new form is actally very nice.

"However, there is no way to reverse the process. Billy will never again be a little boy. He will be a plush kangaroo as long as he lives, which is a long time for a plushie."

You nod. "Why did he agree incidently? TO give up all his humanity..."

THe doctor sighs. "I suppose I can tell you. You see, he was dying. He had a form of cancer which would have killed him. His parents could have had it removed, they had the money to, but they did not want him. They wanted no children to spend their wealth on. Pouch told Billy he could end his pain... but he would never again be a boy. Billy was so heartbroken by his parents that he gave it all up.

"THe conversion took three days. When he emerged from the pouch, with the cute button eyes and the round little belly, he was initially shocked, even a little sacared. But ever since, he has never been happier. He loves seeing the kids come in, give him hugs and kisses, and then snuggling up in Pouch's... er... pouch."

You hmm some. It is a possibility to consider, if nothing else works.
1452211121.title: The secret of Billy, or how Plushies have kids.

choices: Daniel, Billy and Pouch continue to play
14522111211.content:
The Play Room was a huge room filled with all kind of toys. In it, there was Daniel playing with two plushies. One plushie was bigger than Daniel was and had a even bigger belly than Katrin did. The other plushie was around his size and had a round belly. Pouch's Pouch was big enough to hold both Daniel and Billy.
All three were playing "Crazy Eights" in the middle of the room. Pouch wanted to play poker, but Dr. Jennings didn't have a poker set. So, they all decided on "Crazy Eights".
As they played, Billy revealed that he was once human, which shocked Daniel.
"But how...?" asked Daniel.
"Pouch ate me and digested me" said Billy. "it took three days to change me into a plushie like Pouch"
"Wow..." said Daniel. "I didn't know that was possible"
"All plushies know that can happen" said Pouch. "but, not all plushies do that to thier owners usually"
Daniel wondered if Katrin knew about that. Probably.
14522111211.title: Crazy 8's

choices: Eat and digest Dan, turning him into a plushie.
Say no, and try to save the father.
145221112112.content:
When you enter the room a short time later, Daniel tells you about what he has found out.

You wish he hadn't.

"It sounds so cool! And billy is a wondferful plushie. I can fit inside him esily!"

Pouch looks to you. He knows this decisoon is your s alone.

"Katrin....mom..... I... I want to do it. I want to be a plushie."

You sigh. "I was afriad you would say that."

Dan tilts his head. "Why?"

"BEcause," You explain, "If I DO turn you into a plush, you can never be a boy again. You will never grow up, never have a family of your own, never know the joys so many take for granted. And... your father would not get a second chance."

"On the other hand, you would have me for all time, as well as a whole lot of kids who would snuggle and hug and kiss you. you would never want for food or rest or anything of the soirt... only affection, which a plushie is never short of. Plus, if you wanted to, you could swallow kids to snuggle inside you, to keep safe as I have tried to do with you."

He looks right at you. "Would you want to do it to me?"

You ponder. THis is the hardest choice you have to make. You promised his mother you would care for him.

If you do this... you have that chance to do it for a long time. Yet the spirit of the boy would never see his mother again... unless some way was made for her to come to a plush.

Which is impossible.

THe choice is yours.
145221112112.title: The hard choice.

1452211121122.content:
"No...I wouldn't to that to you" you say firmly. "I want you to experience life as a human being"

Dan seems indifferent of your decision. He was willing to become a plushie, but he did want a family of his own later in life. And plushies can't have children.
Pouch argees with your decision. She only ate Billy because his parents didn't cared if he lived or died. And Billy had that terminal cancer. Billy wouldn't live long as a human, but he would eternal life as a plushie. Besides, you'll be far more happier playing with Daniel's kids and eating them like what you did before. Yes, you would still take care of Daniel as a human and not as a plushie.
Tom, Daniel's father, would have to stop drinking. And, by God, you would stop Tom from drinking if it's the last thing you do. Everyone deserves a second chance. And if Tom doesn't stop drinking....well, let's see what happens then.
Dr. Jennings said he would be happy to haul away Dan's father to the AA.
1452211121122.title: Daniel remains human...

choices: Dan comes out, although he is scared.
14522111211222.content:
Things seemed to be going well, when you notice that the professor suddenly is missing. GEttingf up to find him, you run into someone you did NOT expect.

Tom.

"So..." He says, with a look you do not like. "This is what you stoop to, you stupid doll. Stealiong my son like he is your own. Well he is not, and I am here to take him back."

"Tom please!" You say in desperation. You are ready to fight if need be, since you can smell the booze on his breath.

"Please what? I have my rights. You have kept that bopy away from me for the last time. He belongs to ME! Her.. he is all I got left!"

He breaks down, right there in front of you, something he didn't do since his wife died. And you cannot help but cry with him. You loved her too after all. You go to him and he holds you.

"She's gone.... She's gone..." HE cries, sobbing into your fur. Maybe this was what he needed to do after all. He never did let it out about her dying, maybe he was trying to deny that it happened, drinking himself in such a stupor he wouldn't think about it. It is the only thing that makes sense.

"Tom..." You say. "Let me help you. I know you are a good person. Your son needs to remember that. Let me take you to the AA. And then... then we can start trying to make Dan's life better."

Tom looks at you. "Snitch..."

"Katrin." You say, correctng him.

"Katrin... named after her grandmother." Tom says. "I... I don't know if I can."

"You don't have to go through this alone. I lost her too, as did Dan. But we can help each other through this... all of us."

You slowly feel him rub our side. THough he is usuall y a mean drunk, today he is different. He is nicer, just broken. At last, he holds you again, the first loving hug you got from him in a long time.

Maybe there is still hope.

Dan is nowhere to be seen

"Katrin!"

You stop hugging Tom and turned around to see Dan standing behind you. He looks scarred. More than scarred, actually. He looks like he could pee himself. Tom waves a hand to his son, but Dan fliches. You try to hug Dan, but he backs off.

"Dan, come here" said Tom.

Daniel doesn't say anything, but he looks betrayed. You step up to him and he takes a step back.

"Tom, you do realize this is all your fault" you say, not turning to face Dan's dad. "your own son is terrified of you"


"Daniel" said Tom. "I won't beat you up anymore...this time I mean it"

But Daniel doesn't believe his father. And no wonder. Tom had said that so many times before. Dan looks to you and to Tom and runs from the room.

"DANIEL!" yells Tom, and you and he go after him.

The doctor is right there.

"He's not here." He says, a look on his face that is very sad. "He shouted at me that it was all a trick to get you to give him back to his father."

Tom sits and holds his face in his hands. "This is all my doing... I never should have..."

"Tom, please.. .we have to find him! Where could he go?"

The doctor hmms. "Where does he usually go when home is hard for him?"

You ponder. there are at least two places. One is the park. Since living plushies are common knowledge around here after his mnother... well, several of them hang out there, eager for owners. Maybe Dan will try to find one to be a plushie!

On the other hand there is ios main friend, Susan. Hehas had a crush on her forever, and, like Dan, she has family trouble. He may go to her above all else, because they are close. EVen for kids.

But did you make the right choice?

Susan saids no, that she hasn't seen Daniel that day. That leaves only one place to look: The park.


Egdewood Park is a fairly large park, covering two blocks easily. It's called Edgewood because it's right on the edge of a huge forest. There's some hiking trails that goes deep into forest. Tom parks the car, and the two of you continue the search for Daniel.

talk to Daniel that his dad aint bad no more

You examine your hero, he is waering a torn a blodded cloth a a cape, and some kind of intricate armour, there is something under the cape but you cannot tell, but you see a pair or slightly curved horns pointing straight back ward protruding from its head. you also notice what looks like two samurai swords, one on each side, a large sword which can only be described as a cross between a long-sword and a broad-sword and two daggers in their sheaths on his left leg.

The dragon brings his free arm skywards and a torrent of fire erupts from the ground beneath the wolf, the dragon the leaps up does a full twils in the air, puttin the sword away and creates a large fire ball in his hand a fire it into the inferno then creates two smaller ones in both his hands and throws those in as well.
The fire ceases and all thats left in a pile of ash.

he then collapses onto his back

you walk up next to him, comfirmin that he is a dragon, His lizard like head had a scar on his right eye and a large scar on the left side of his face
he surpises you more when the head morphes into a human face, but with the same facial feature, scar on his eye and cheek, the wings do not dissapeer though.

145221112112221211222.content:
As the dragon who saved you and Tom and Daniel sleeps, recovering in your bed at the house, you talk with Daniel about Tom.

"But..." he starts, crying. "He tries to hit us. He hates us..."

"I never will again." You hear a voice say. Its Tom. He walks to Daniel and hugs him. "Oh Danny boy ... my little son... I have done so terrible by you. But not anymore." He looks at you. "I think I will go to AA. I got to stop. I shouldn't need some hero to keep my son safe."

Daniel cries into Tons chest, and you hold them both. You almost lost Daniel today, but in the end you regained both him and Tom. Maybe happy times are coming. One can only hope for tonight.

You remmeber the day you got it. A big plush hippo as big as you are. It has a HUGE mouth and stomach, and weighs a ton. But it makes a good pillow and blanket.

You sure wish you read the little pamphlet it came with.

"Congratulations on your purchase of a snuggleplush Hippo. You are in for a unique experience as you care for and feed it. CAUTION: Plush has a mind of it's own in many ways, and what you may want to do and what it WILL do are often very different. And whatever you do, do NOT make it angry!"

Now then... your plush is...

1511.content:
The hippo is female. How do you know this? Well, it introduced itself to you a few weeks after you got it. The hippo's name is Wanda. Like real hippos, Wanda's mouth can open EXTREMELY wide, big enough to swallow three people your size! But her mouth is nothing compared to the stomach. Wanda's stomach is so large that you can't see the sides of it when you're in the middle of the stomach.


Now then...what's your age?
1511.title: More info

choices: Plot to have her gotten rid of.
15111.content:
As a little boy you are used to having toys, and playing with them.

But this is all so new to you. Ever sense Wanda came to life, it seems YOU are more the toy than her!

TO make matters worse, your mother seems to encourage this. You were a real brat before, always picking on the other siblings. Then you hsuddenly get this plushie, one you saw in the store and immediately wanted. For some reason, your mother did NOT say no, and already that had you wondering.

Now you know why. Three days ago, Wanda reveled that she is alive. When she did, she also said that his mother knew about her already. But what she said next made you worry then, and still does.

She is now your new babysitter, slash nanny, slash owner.

OWNER?!

Yup. Seems this plush has the ability to sdhrink you, which made your mom so happy that she decided to leave you shrunk for Wanda.

Great. Now, your plushie is huge to you, and you fit in her mouth esily.

Which is very bad for ytou, since that is where she usually sends you when you don't listen.

Today, you are in there again, becasue you wouldn't be a dool for your sister. THis is getting WAY out of hand! You got to do something! YOU are the one who owns the plushie, not the other way around!

Course, on the other hand, at least it is kinda nice inside Wanda... even if she is usually stuffing her face!
15111.title: A toy for the...hippo?

stay in the belly for awhile
151111.content:
Wanda is reasonable. Despite your mean mother, Wanda is kind to you. You hope you can just stay in Wanda's massive stomach forever, and Wanda says that can be arranged. But, you don't want to spend all of your life inside the belly of a plushie. You also don't want to be 2 inches tall. But, once Wanda has shrunk you, you stay shrunk. Wanda can't unshrink you.
Wanda objects to be your owner. Plushies must have owners in order to survive.
"Plushies can't own anything" she says to you. Wanda is about the size of a four-story building to you, and you see her as your house since you spend a lot of time in her stomach.
Wanda hasn't eaten any of your brother or sisters, because your mother has forbidden Wanda to do so. Not that you mind it. It's very comfortable in Wanda's belly and you pretend you're in a big cave...which it looks like to your tiny self.
On the Sunday morning this story starts, you find yourself in the belly of Wanda. She has a HUGE stomach, even if you weren't 2 inches tall. The 'floor' of the stomach molds to you like a glove, and you snuggle it. On most mornings, you're in Wanda's belly.
151111.title: Morning in the belly

choices: She plays a Godzilla kind of game.

1511112.content:
You have changed a lot since Wanda came. Your bratty nature has switched to a kind one, and you honestly wanted your mom to see that.

But she never did. In the end, you were seen as not even a son anymore, because of all the pain you caused.

Still, that is ok. You still have Wanda, and she has slowly become your best friend. You even give her belly rubs every now and then.

On this day, you just lie there in the softness. You have been running around, playing with toys that are swllowed down for you, and munching on a giant cookie.

That's he best part. The sweets. Mom insists you have to be fat and tasty for Wanda. She sure doesn't complain about it, and neither do you. Youy only wish your mother would see how much you changed.

"THinking in there again Little one?" YOu hear Wanda say. You nod.

"Yeah, just about things. I wish I could stay in here forever you know. And I am sorry baout trying to pull out your button eyes..."

"We been through that already, remmeber?" She says, her whole belly vibrating as she laughs. "I simply squished you under by tummy for awhile."

You smile at that. She is a HEAVY plush, and being squished can hurt a little... but as soft as it is it sure doesn't seem too bad. In fact, EVERYTHING with Wanda is fun.

"Why don't you come out for a bit?" Wanda asks. "We will play some."

You smile and get up, taking a lst bite of the cookie, and makign your way to her mouth. It opens slowly, and you get out with a giggle.

Now... what to play....
1511112.title: Comfy Cozy.

15111122.content:
"Let's play hide and seek" said Wanda. "If I find you...then I'll squish you under my tummy" Wanda's tummy is soft and heavy. When she did that to you that other time, you could hardly move under the weight of her tummy. You felt like that alligator in Fantasia that caught the hippo in mid-air.

"And what if you don't find me?" you ask. You're very good at hide and seek. Once, before Wanda came, you hid from your sister and she couldn't find you for the entire day!

"I'll think about it" said Wanda. "now...I'm going to count to 50. Better start hiding!"

You two are on your bed. To you, the bed looks like an endless landscape. You quickly climb down the comforter to the floor and look for a hiding place. You hear Wanda's count. She's counting rather fast, eager to find you quickly. You dash to a mouse hole,knowing that your mother has caught all of the mice in the house weeks before. As you run to the mouse hole, you notice a pile of clothes on the floor. The clothes look to be clean, so you decide to dive into the pile instead of going in the mouse hole.
15111122.title: Hide and seek with Wanda

151111222.content:
You smile in your hiding place, careful to shift when you need to in order to keep from being found. Wanda looks all over the room for you, even looks in most of the laundry.

But, she never finds you.

After what seems to be a long time, she sighs some. "Alright, I give up! Where are ya?"

You giggle and come out of your hiding place, Wanda putting her hands on her big belly. "hey now, I looked in those clothes!"

You smile. "Well that was where I was the whole time!"

She giggles some and sits down by you, snuggling you into her belly. "You are a clever one, I'll give you that. But now... what to do with you..."

"Don't I get a prize?" You ask. She smiles and nods, pulling over a plate.

And on it is a slice of chocolate cake, that to you is a HUGE slice!

"After all," She says. "You're supposed to be roly poly."

You giggle a little and dig in happily, sitting by her.
151111222.title: You win! Hide and Seek at least.

choices: You manage to eat the entire slice
you're too full to eat more
1511112221.content:
You are practically swimming in the slice of chocolate cake while you're eating it. You make holes all over the slice, zigzagging your way while eating all the while. You're able to eat so much because you've gotten fatter since Wanda came here. You're also covering yourself in chocolate, but you don't care.
When you've eaten about one third of the slice, you have a huge belly yourself. It doesn't take that much food to fill you up nowadays, but you're supposed to be nice and fat for Wanda. Wanda picks up the plate while you are taking a break from eating. Wanda opens her mouth WIDE and swallows the cake, the plate and you! You land in her stomach, and still eating the slice.
1511112221.title: Tiny glutton

choices: See to it that you are gotten rid of for good.
Kept inside Wanda forever, willing or not.
15111122211.content:
You giggle as you land, the cake making a mess inside her as it splatters about. But you are STILL hungry, and dive right in, taking massive bites.

"Hey! Take it easy in...."

BURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!

"... There." Wanda laughs, hearling your loud belch, and smiling as you keep at it.

It takes a long time, but soon the whole cake is in your belly. And WHAT A BELLY! You look something like a cream colored apple now, with little hands and feet. You roll about in your bliss, full and happy.

"Now I feel like food!" You say, snuggling into the soft belly wall. YOu giggle as it starts to knead your body, massaging you all over, and converting some of your fat into plush fur.

You are not sure how it does this. Maybe it is a vacuum kind of thing? WHo knows. All you know is the whole process is quite wonderful.

"Comfy?" Wanda asks.

"Uh huh!" You say happily, loving your belly massage.

Meanwhile, downstairs, your mother is making plans...

She plans to,....
15111122211.title: little boy or ball of fat? You decide!

choices: Your mother thinks of a way for you to stay in Wanda's belly
151111222112.content:
While you're rolling around in Wandna's belly, your mother plans to keep you there forever....weather Wanda likes it or not. Your mother feels like the old woman in the shoe; she had a house filled with children and she didn't know what to do with any of them. You were always the bully of the family, and your mother wants you somewhere where you can't be a bully...inside Wanda's belly.
"Wanda" said your mother, coming into your room. Wanda looks up at your mother.
"I want you to keep that boy in your belly for now on" said your mother. "I don't want to see him at all...do you understand?"


(sorry for the short chapter, but I just got a new video game)
151111222112.title: Mother makes plans

choices: She decides to keep you in her.
1511112221121.content:
Wanda hmphs., "Well, he is a lot better now, just as you have gotten worse..."

"Look!" She says. "That is not the only reason!" she sighs. "I can't afford much for the kids anymore, with the price of everything going up. Plus, if anyone sees him as a tiny boy.... Well, what they would do to himk would be atrotious. You ever read these tales online about what happens to shrinken people?"

Wanda nods. "I see your point. But why does he have to stay inside me forever?"

She sighs. "One, HE deserves it. He did a LOT of bad things, even nearly burned down the house. Second, inside you, no one will ever find him. Fianlly, he likes you for some reason, and this way he is always with you."

Wanda hmmms some. She considers this. "Well... I'll think about it."

The mother nods. "Please do." she smiles to herself as she leaves, whispering quietly. "Gets them every time." Wanda does not hear though, and she is thinking about this... Can she really keep you inside her forever?
1511112221121.title: Sob Story

choices: That night, you and Wanda play
Your mother discovers you outside Wanda's stomach that night
15111122211211.content:
You still have that big belly when you ate the chocolate cake. You are snuggling on Wanda's stomach walls. You heard your mom talking to Wanda and you do see her point kinda. What happens to shrunken people on those online is awful. You'd much rather be eaten by Wanda than be eaten by a cat, dog or even human!
"Oh right, I've decided" said Wanda. "I'll keep you in my belly for the day. At night, I'll let you out so we can play"
"But what if mom checks in on you?" you ask.
"She usually sleeps at night" said Wanda, chuckling. "and besides, I like to play with you. If I eat you in the mornings, your mother would never know that I let you out at night"
"Sounds like a plan" you say.
Your mother doesn't hear Wanda's plan, which is lucky.
You can't move very well with your big belly anyway, so you decide to stay put in Wanda's stomach. Wanda swallows a flash light for you, along with other stuff that might be useful if you happen to live in a living hippo plushie.
15111122211211.title: Wanda keeps you in....in the day, at least..

choices: When your mother gets an offer to sele you for millions.
When your mother discovers what is going on.
151111222112111.content:
Your new home sure is nice. Using the flashlight, you are able to read the books Wanda swallows for you. You also get a few more treats, even a slice of pizza, made the way you like it. Your mom seems convinced you are in Wanda forever now, and is making this kinda nice.

The rest of the day goes by fast. You take a nap around noon, so you will be up at night. While you nap, your fat layers are taken away my a magic that Wanda's belly has.

You never know how she does it, but you know it makes it esier to eat all you want.

Around 1 in the morning, you hear the bedroom door lock. It is what wakes you up. Then, you feel the plush move.

"Time to come out!" Wanda says. You giggle and cheer, eager to play!

You emerge a few seconds later, hugging the massive plushie. With a giggle, you begin to play.

First is a board game. Itis hard at your size, especially with dice as big as socvcerballs, but you become the token for the game so that at leats is esier. You wind up losing in the end though, with your punishment being a good squishing.

Wanda does that right away, getting up and laying you down on your back. Then, she sits on you, her heavy plush form making you oof at first. But then it is warm and comfy, like the thickest blanket in the world.

"I think I sat ona bug!" Wanda jokes.

ou smile, wrigglign. "I'm a boy not a bug!" Youfiannly struggle outfrom under her to a big hug.

She reads you a story next. A fitting tale about a boy who is casted out by his family, only to become a lord in another land.

You wonder if you will become like that.

As the night nears it's end, Wanda prepares to eat you. She opens her cavernous maw, lying on her belly to make it look like a cave. You play like you do not know it is a mouth, and look about.

You try and run back out after a bit, and Wanda shuts her mouth just before yu make it. With her plush teeth and ilky maw she chews on you, before fianlly swallowing you to her belly.

FOr some time, this becomes your life. It is blissful and innocent.

And then it all comes to an end...
151111222112111.title: A happy life.

choices: You  and Wanda make friends at the circus
You don't want to leave home, but...
1511112221121111.content:
Your life goes on like that for two whole weeks. Two weeks of playing games with Wanda. Not all of the games are board games; Wanda plays Godzilla--or Wandazilla--with you. Wanda builds a mock city using blocks and legos, and linkin' logs. You always are the hapless citizen of the city, hiding from Wandazilla. Sometimes, Wanda just eats the "buildings", and sometimes she destorys them by knocking them over. Houses made from linkin' logs are flattened by her big tummy. The game ends when Wanda completely destorys the city and eats you.

By the third week, your mother calls Wanda downstairs for a talk. What she said is stunning; She has been offered to sale you to a local circus for $200,000. You mother really needs the money, so she decided that she could sale you. You are needless to say shocked that you own mother would sale you off.
"They want Wanda also" said your mother. "I don't know why they want a plush toy, but it sounds good to me"
1511112221121111.title: Sold to the circus

choices: An accident on the way to the circus.
At the circus, the show gets set up.
15111122211211111.content:
You sigh some when the man comes to pick you and Wanda up. He is as tall as you are tiny, standing at well over 12 feet.

"Here is the money Ma'am." He says in a deep voice. A smaller, more average sized man walks in. He wears a top hat and carries a wand. Must be a magician!

"Well I'll be! You two are just as I imagined. Extrodinary!"

Wanda blushes and introdiuces you both. The magician smiles. "Ahhh yes. Well, I do hope you two like kids. You will be part of a new side show act, the world's smallest circus." He smiles some. "I have a feeling you will meet people there you will like."

You look to your mom. Is she... crying? "Mom?"

"I..." She starts, but then walks out. The magician looks to you and lifts you up.

"Kid, you are going to become the most famous thing the world has ever seen!"

********************

You and wanda are set in a large limo with the magician, the giant driving. Beside you, you see a sight that makes you go wide eyed.

They coulsdn't be any bigger than you. there werte about 7 kids in all, most of them looked to be about your age. They all wewre playing amonst three giant plushies: A lion, an elephant, and a bear in a chef's outfit.

Moreover.. they are all alive!

"Suprised?" The magican asks you as you stare, Wanda getting acquinted with the plushies. "I figured. In this day and age, so many of these are bing found. I am trying to find enough to start a mini circus of sorts, to entertain the kiddies."

"Yeah..." You say, kinda sad. "But I wish I wasn't sold."

"I know. But believe me, when you see what awaits you, you may realize this was meant to be."

You ponder this. You are not sure, but you think ou have just made your first friend who wasn't stuffed.
15111122211211111.title: Meeting the circus folk.

choices: Talk to some of the shrunken kids
151111222112111112.content:
The limo drives out of the city, and enters a park that would rival Central Park in size. The park is called "Pendragon's Park" and you discover that the magician owns the park. You get to meet all of the shrunken kids, there's 7 in all.
William, the owner of the lion plushie. His parents died when he was young and was brought to Pendragon's circus with Leon the lion plushie.
Chester, owner of a roo plushie that's not in the limo. Chester was abandoned by his widowed mother.
Paul, owner of the elephant plushie, is the most quiet kid you've ever saw. You don't hear how he ended up here. The Elephant, Trumpy, is equally silent.
Mary, owner of the bear in a chef's hat. She was raised by her grandmother.
George, owner of a dragon plushie, doesn't know what his parents looked like...since he was found in a dumpster.
Francis Xavier Tucker, the owner of a wolf plushie. Just call him "Frank". He was named after the character in the movie "Scrooged".
And the last kid...
Luke, owner of a frog plushie, was born in a orphanage.
The Magician, David Pendragon, is a real magician and he can change the plushies into the real-life animals that they are...but for only 24 hours. In thier real-life animal form, the plushies can eat people and not digest them.
You ask David if he can unshrink you.
"Only for 24 hours" said David. "see...I'm not that great of a magician...but I'm learning fast"
151111222112111112.title: David Pendragon

choices: Go and meet the kids now.
Find out more info about the circus.
1511112221121111121.content:
When you and the rest of the tiny tots arrive at the circus, you are amazed at what you see. You expected clowns, lion tamers, magicians, acrobats, and so on as you are carried out by Wanda.

You got that and more.

While the standard array of creatures are here, ou also see things you never have seen before, except maybe in fairy tales. You see walking animals much like humans, some clearly looking like they are kids. You see food that talks as it is eaten, which seems to be a real delight for the kids you see. You even see magical card duels, where the cards seem to come to life before your eyes.

And that is just a small sample of what is around here.

"INCREDIBLE!" Wanda says, watching as a plush bear walks by, holding a kids hand. "I have never seen a circus like this!"

Pendragon smiles. "My father left it to me. Many of the creatures you see were altered by him. He was not a nice fellow though, and he made them do TERRIBLE things. When he got old, he realized his evil and felt he should never have been born, but, like me, he couldn't undo his magic."

"What happened?" You ask, watching as the other kids and their plushies head for a special set of tents that seem just your size.

"Well, he told he workers he was sorry, that he abused his power. I was only a baby when he did this. He told them to run the circus themselves, how they see fit, with me as an owner but not as a master.

"They said yes, and turned the circus into what it is now: "THE FANTASTIC CIRCUS"

You groan. "Not muchg of a name, but it does fit."

Pendragon smiled some. "THey chose it not me. THey decided they would aim it at the unusual desires and dreams kids have. It worked. The circus is the best in all the world. We have made a fortune in my lifetime, enough to last all of our lives and many more.

"But when we saw that so many kids were in trouble, in one way or another, we realizxed our work was not over. I myself decided to take in any child that a parent no longer wanted, offering large sums for abused children, doing whatever it took to take them in and care for them. Once here, they become part of a family that loves them. Granted, no one here is what you would call normal. But then again, who is?"

You smile and watch the other kids. Even the saddest among them looks happy now, here amongst their 'family' as David calls it. Perhaps you will like it here.
1511112221121111121.title: Your new home... the Circus!!!

choices: You meet some of the other kids
15111122211211111212.content:
"I never heard of this circus before" you say to Pendragon.

"Well, we're a traveling circus" said Pendragon. "we go all over the state, pleasing crowds whenever we go. But, this park is where we live in the off-season"

"Off-season?" asks Wanda.

Pendragon nods. "We usually do this circus in the spring and summer...and even to late fall. We're about ready to begin our season...just a month away!"

The circus also has a freak show, as any self-respecting circus would have. It has the normal freaks; sword-swallowers, fire-swallowers, midgets, strong men, strong women, and so on. But it does have mythical creatures too, like unicorns and the like. At the end of the line, you see something that makes you gasp. It's a fully-grown naga; Half-snake and half-human. The human half is that of a woman with red hair and large breasts. The snake part of her begins just below her belly. The snake part of the naga goes on to 100 feet long! Pendragon smiles at her.
"I see you've met our star of the freak show" said Pendragon. "Meet Carmen, the only naga in North America"
Carmen slithers to you and shakes your tiny body. Wanda and Carmen both shake hands.
"I found her in the swamps of Louisana" said Pendragon.
"Yess" said Carmen in a hissing voice. "I remember it well" Carmen has a forked tongue as well!
15111122211211111212.title: Don't forget about the freak show

151111222112111112122.content:
You stare at Carmen for a long time, and Wanda just giggles.

"Be careful little guy, or she might eat you up!" She says.

"Excellent idea!" Carmen says, taking you in her lethery hand. "I been hungry for a sssssssnack!"

"That isn't what I meant!" Wanda says, wide eyed.

"Don't worry." she says, her forked tounge inches from you. "He won't be harm in the leasssssst. He'll jusssst be held inssssside me." She opens her mouth, reveling her pointed fangs. Thankfully, David stops her.

"Now come on Carmen, he just got here!" He says, taking you from her at the last second, returning you to wanda. "Besides, you need to be hungry for a much larger meal remember?"

"Oh yesssss!" She says, swaying wirth glee. She then looks to you and Wanda. "Ssssssorry, bt you looked so tasssssty. I couldn't help myself."

"It's ok." You say with a smile, blushing some. "A part of me wouldn't have minded, as much as I am in her belly anyway." You smile and hug Wanda, loving the feel of the plushie.

"That so? Hmmm..." Pengdragon ponders. "P{erhaps we can have a second part to the show.. .I'll talk with you about it later."

You smile as Carmen and David talk. Wanda looks at you with a sly grin.

"Oh now you bored with me?" she asks.

"Not at all!" You say, blushing. "I just like snakes."

Wanda smiles and gives you a lift on her back to where the other kids are. You have a lot to learn here.
151111222112111112122.title: Naga's hungry....

choices: Wanda and you play in the gym and meet the kids in there
1511112221121111121221.content:
There are 40 or so kids at the circus, besides the ones you met in the limo earlier. The eldest kid is 17, and the youngest kid is 6. You and Wanda go around to meet all of the kids. Every kid has a plushie, even the 17-year-old. The plushies are all living plushies and vary in species. There's one human plush doll named Jerome, owned by the 11-year-old Christine.
Pendragon introduces you to all of the kids and each of the kids shakes your hand and Wanda's hand. The kids get along with you and Wanda very well.
They have a tent just for the kids and thier plushies. This tent is slightly smaller than the main tent, but not by much. Inside the tent, there is a jungle gym...one that almost takes up the entire tent. It's one of those massive jungle gyms that's seen in Sea World and other amusement parks. The gym is scaled down to the plushies and the kids. The gym has endless rooms filled with plastic balls, and rooms with windows on two sides. Most of the kids and the plushies are in this gym right now.
"Wow..." said Wanda.
"Go ahead and play if you want to" said Pendragon. "I'm sure you two want to play with each other now"
1511112221121111121221.title: The Jungle Gym

choices: Ali, who has lukemia and not much time left.
Flora, who has been abused all her life.
15111122211211111212211.content:
You go and play, Wanda entering a larger tube while you go in a smaller one. The plushie tubes seem to be used to try and cut off the little children, so they could eat them up. but that is ok, since the maze of tunnels is full of fun rooms.

In one of these rooms, a large soft chamber much like Wanda's tummy, you find the youngest of the group which you have not met. her name is Kim, and she is only 6. Her plushie, a large fox named Sly, is on the other end of a tube out, waiting with a bun just her size. She waves to you once, and talks to you for a moment. Apparently, she was sold as a baby, and got Sly at the circus. A sad tale really, she sure seems a lot happier now. You giggle as she slides down to Sly and the waiting bun, eager to be a snack.

In another room you meet some boys just your age. A few you met before, but two are new to you. one of them, Charles, is a freckle faced kid who seems to keep to himself mostly. His plushie is a huge plush pikachu who is currently playing with some of the others. As for his origins, he does not say. The other boy is Wally, named after the Leave it to Beaver character. he is rough and loves to wrestle, but never hurts anyone. He was taken in when his father died of cancer. his mother is unknown. His plushie is the wierdest so far, a plush... flytrap? No, it is relaly an Audry II, though Wally named it Snapper. They play happily with you for some time before you move on.

You meet the oldest of the group nextr, in a room that is kinda ordinary, where he is writing on a tablet twice his size. Barret is his name, and he tells you he is here by his own choice, the only one so far who came from a happy family, to act as a sort of big brother to the others. His plushie, wo is the Care Bear Tenderheart, was a final gift from his mother before she was killed in a car crash. barret says he is not a kid eater like the others, bbut more of a big brother too, one the others can go to if they ever have a problem opr just want to talk.

One by one you meet them all, some of them here by choice, others came because they had nowhere else to go. But one stands out to you, the last one you visit:
15111122211211111212211.title: Meeting the kids and having a blast!

choices: You make Flora to talk with you
Flora just runs from the room with Albert in hand
151111222112111112122112.content:
Flora is in a room all by herself. The room is near the very heart of the maze of tunnels. She's currently playing a Nintendo DS and looks to be 12 or so. It's hard to tell that Flora is a girl, because she's wearing boy clothing. Her hair is short and bushy and she's wearing a hat with a baseball team's logo on it. She looks up when you enter the room. She backs up at once when you try to get near her.
Barret has followed you and enters the room with you. Barret explains that Flora's parents (her mom mostly) had abused her all of her life. They wouldn't feed her dinner, they would beat her. and they would do all that terrible stuff that abusive parents do. Flora's dad was a bit nicer to her than her mom was.
Flora was sold to the circus when she was 7. She hasn't spoken a word since coming to the circus, and most think she can't talk. Flora is on the skinny side, but not dangerously so. You feel for her because your mom has abused you too. Your father died 3 years ago in a freak accident at his job.
Flora's plushie is the only snake in the circus (apart from Carmen), and is the only plushie that can go through the rooms for kids in the maze.
Albert is the snake's name, named after Flora's father. Albert speaks, and he tries to get Flora to talk. According to Albert, Flora can talk and only talks to him.
"Poor kid" you say.
"Yeah.." said Barret. "most of the kids wanna play with Flora, but she usually runs away with Albert"
151111222112111112122112.title: The sad tale of Flora

1511112221121111121221121.content:
You look to Flora, sighing some. You and her are very much alike. "Maybe I can talk to her."

Barrett sighs. "If you think you can." He smiles some and heads off to find his plushie, while you enter the room. You just sit there, waiting for her to look your way.

Whenshe does, she goes wide eyed and backs away in fear.

"Flora... I just want to talk. I'll stay right here."

She looks at you, but says nothng.

"I can relate you know. I was sold too. My mom also had me shrunk and tried to get Wanda to keep me in her belly."

Flora went wide eyed, coming a little closer.

"Yah, she bought Wanda to punishme for all the bad things I did. Buit when I got better about it, she kinda cast me out." You sigh a little and say your name.

Then she says something that gives you hope.

"I... I'm Flora." She says. "Flora Applegate." Her voice is horse and sad, like she had not spoken for years.

"Nice to meet you." You say with a smile, coming closer. She stars to back away bit decides against it.

For the next few minutes, you talkj about how you came here, and your time with Wanda. She mostly let's you talk, but by the end she is starting to smile.

Then, she starts to speak. Her snake plush was a gift from her father, or so it had seemed. In actuality, he had meant Albert to digest her away for good. When he didn't, the problems all began with her mother. What clothes and food she got were by Albert sneaking them away for her. At last, David came by with an offer to buy the two of them. THey agreed, but only if she would become animal chow. David lied and aid yes to save her.

"I never saw them again... they.. they never wanted me.... Dad wanted a boy, and tried to make me one." She sobbed some, and you trieds to comfort her.

"I don't think my mom wanted a child after my big brother." You smile. "In a way, we are both the ones no one wanted."

Flora nods. "Yeah... I suppose so... no one but the circus."

You smile. "Maybe we can play together?"

flora looks to you. "Welll... I dunno.... Albert might get jealous."

You chuckle. "Well, where is he? Maybe we can talk?"

Flora smiles a little.
1511112221121111121221121.title: Bonding.

choices: Wanda has her mouth over the end of the slide
You make it out of the maze
15111122211211111212211211.content:
"He's right behind you" said Flora.

You turn around and see a long snake plushie. Albert the snake looks to be 100 feet long, but is skinny enough to enter the maze of rooms and tunnels. You always have liked snakes. At the zoo one time, you saw a snake swallow an egg whole. You assume that Albert can swallow you, but at the moment, he doesn't look able to. Albert smiles at you.

"I seee you made Flora to talk to you" said Albert, sticking his forked tongue out at you--a snake's way of smelling.

"Yeah" you say. "me and Flora are the same..kinda. My mother didn't abuse me...she made Wanda abuse me"

"Wanda's your plushie?" asked Albert. You nod.

"Let's play, Albert" said Flora.

"Alright" said Albert. "what game?"

"Hide-and-go-eat" giggles Flora.

"My favorite" said Albert. "I assume you're playing too?"

"Of course" you say.

"Good" said Albert. "you go and hide. I'll count to 50"

You and Flora rush out of the room and started to head towards the very heart of the maze.
You two enter the biggest room yet. The room is a chamber much like Wanda's stomach, but has a TV in it. It also has several video game systems in it and a rather shabby-looking sofa.
"This is called 'The Hub' " said Flora. "come on, this way"
She leads you through The Hub and into a long tunnel that leads out of the maze.
"Shouldn't we stay in the maze?" you ask.
"Outside of the maze is 'safe' in our games" said Flora.
The tunnel ends at an opening of a long slide.
"Here I come!" comes the voice of Albert in the distance.
"Down this slide" said Flora. You dive head-first into the tunnel and Flora follows behind you.
15111122211211111212211211.title: Games with Flora

151111222112111112122112111.content:
You and Flora slide for a long time, laughing somewhat. But as you look up ahead, you see something that makes you wide eyed.

Wanda has her mouth on the end of the tube, winking at Albert. It was a trap!

"Hey! Now that's cheating!" You say as you slide full speed into Wanda's mouth. You keep on sliding as you hit her throat, falling down the long tunnel into her belly.

Behind you is Flora, laughing now for what seems to be the first time. Youy like her laugh, it is almost musical. Besides, she is a lot of fun!

Even as you think about this, you land with a bounce in Wanda's large tummy... and Flora lands right on top of you. THough you both get a little bruised, you can't stop laughing to think about it.

"WHAT A BLAST!" You finally let out after taking a deep breath. Flora laughs a bit more and nods.

"Yeah, you are a lot of fun! But I am sure Albert rigged the whole thing."

"You can say that again!" Albert says. The snake came in Wanda's mouth to! "And now I got you two little morsels trapped. I think that means I win."

"You cheated Albert!" Flora says, poking fun. "You know that if Wanda wasn't there I would have gotten away again!"

"True true... but I was hungry. And this time, cheaters DO prosper." He coils around you, miles and miles of coils surrunding youboth, the plush fur on them inches away from you two. "Now then, who goes down first... the meaty little boy, or my own sweet little girl?"

"Wha? But Albert..." Flora says. "I thought that..."

"Flora, this boy clearly likes you, and you him. It's time you made soem friends. Besides, I could use an extra treat."

Flora gigglews at the last part. "Well, ok, but I just hope no one hates me because of what happened..."

"That is in the past my friend." THe snake says. "And now... Snack time!" He opens wide....
151111222112111112122112111.title: CHEATER!!!

choices: You and Flora sleep....and awake outside of Albert and Wanda
1511112221121111121221121112.content:
