Albert's mouth opens WIDE...almost as wide as Wanda's mouth! Albert slowly puts you in his mouth, while making sure you're surrounded by his coils. You're able to look in Albert's mouth and see nothing but darkness. Albert gobbles you up quickly...he must be hungry! You enter a chamber that's no bigger than you are. The stomach of the snake is long and flat, and you back up to make room for Flora. A few minutes later, Flora comes into Albert's stomach with you. Compared to Wanda's stomach, the stomach of Albert is cramped. You remember seeing that egg making its way through the snakes body...and realize that you two are nothing but a buldge in Albert's body.
You are forced to snuggle with Flora because the lack of room. Albert gives out a loud belch, making Flora giggle.
"Well...this is the first time another plushie has eaten me" you say.
"This is the...1,345th time that Albert has swallowed me" said Flora.
"You keep track?" you ask.
"Yes" said Flora. "I've spent half my life in Albert's belly"
"Now what?" you ask.
"Albert likes to take a nap after he has a big meal" said Flora. "so....we wait for Albert to wake up"
1511112221121111121221121112.title: In Albert's stomach

choices: Where you saw her yesterday, sleeping soundly with Albert.
Getting breakfast in the dining area of the maze.
15111122211211111212211211122.content:
Tired as you are from all that is happened,you decide to take a nap too. Flora smiles and snuggles up with you.

"Thanks for being my friend." She says, yawning. "I have to admit... I had forgotten what a friend was, other than Albert."

"I'm glad we're friends too." You say. The belly is tight, but still very cozy. With a sigh, you drift off to sleep.

That night you have dreams that you and Flora arer Hansel and Gretel, being fattened up by Wanda dressed like a witch. Albert is there to, reading recipes on how best to cook you. Oddly, the whole drema is funny to say the least, and you wind up laughing in your sleep.

****************


The next day, you wake up alone. You are in one of the bedchamers in the maze of tunnels, and several kids are all baout here, many of which still asleep. Where is Flora? and the Wanda and Albert? You have no idea. All you know is that yesterday was the most fun you have had in a long time. You wonder where Flora is though, and go looking for her.

As you go, you see a few early risers in the common room, playing games with one another or having breakfast. YOu also spot a little girl, not Flora, trying to wrap herslef up in a pancake. Must be she's going to be a treat for her plushie, turned real for a day by Pendragon's spell.

Finally, you find Flora. She is...
15111122211211111212211211122.title: Awwwww...

151111222112111112122112111222.content:
The dinning area of the maze is located on the lowest level. The maze turns out to have five levels and after 10 minutes of wandering the maze, you manage to find the dinning area.
Easily the biggest room, the dinning area has 4 long tables in it, all connected. You see Flora sitting at the table, having breakfast of eggs. Albert is nowhere in sight and you decide to get breakfast too. Breakfast included; two scrambled eggs, 5 slices of bacon, 2 pieces of toast, tons of hash browns and 3 pancakes with syurp. You sit next to Flora.
"How did we get out of Albert and Wanda?" you ask her.
"I dunno" said Flora. "I woke up in one of the sleeping rooms and came down here"
The last to enter the dinning area is Barret. Barret walks to the head of the table and speaks to the table at large.
"As all of you know, we have a new member of our little circus" said Barret. "It's also has come to my attention that someone is still throwing up in the slide and not cleaning it up.
"As you also know, the circus will be hitting the road next month. The first city on our stop will be Springfield"
Springfield is only two hours away.
"And after that, we'll be moving onto Brooksdale, New Haven, and Wadsworth"
Brooksdale is in the southren part of the state. New Haven, you're sure, is in the southren part of the state as well. Wadsworth...you're not sure where Wadsworth is.
"It's time to practice our acts" said Barret. "So, today...we'll help with the...
151111222112111112122112111222.title: Breakfast with Flora

1511112221121111121221121112222.content:
Barret smiles and hands out assignments. "As we are helping the side show, many of these will also become your main acts. After all, we are sort of a mini circus." He smiles and hands them out. Many of them are happy with their assignm,ents, and a few break out in laughter. You wait patiently for yours.

"Flora this is tyour assignment. I figured this year you may want to..."

"No need to say any more Barrett." she says. EVERYONE goes wide eyed. You just smile. You broke the barrier itr seems. She takes her assignment, giggles, and shows you.

It reads: Animal Tamer/Animal Feeder.

You laugh yourself at that one.

"And finally our new guy." Barrett hands you the last peiceof paper, and you smile at what it says. You are going to be...
1511112221121111121221121112222.title: Side Show Supporters

choices: The animal you get to tame and feed.....is Wanda!
You get to tame and feed some other plushie
15111122211211111212211211122221.content:
You're also gonna be an animal tamer AND feeder. Barret hands out the assignment to the kid next to you and he seems excited. You ask Flora what kind of animals will you two be feeding.
"The plushies, of course" giggles Flora. "we'll take turns on 'taming' a plushie, then we let the plushie eat us"
"Sounds cool" you say. "do we get to pick what animal we get?"
"No...it's completely random" said Flora. "we'll be grown to our normal sizes along with the animals"
"Oh right, people" said Barret, finsihed with handing out all of the assignments. He gets to the head of the table again and talks again.
"I want all Tamers and Feeders to stand"
You, Flora and two other kids stand up. The two other kids are named Jerome and Alice. You've met Alice yesterday; she was sold to the circus when she was 7. Alice is 12 now. Jerome is the second eldest kid there, at age 15. All of the tamers and feeders are to report to the side show tent in 10 minutes.
"Now, I want all of the clowns to stand up" said Barret.
"Come on" said Flora. "it'll take us 5 minutes to reach the side show tent"
So, you and the rest of the tamers/feeders make your way out of the maze and head for the side show tent. On your way, you see a big semi-truck making its way to the freak show.
"Breakfast for Carmen" said Alice, as she looks at the truck.
"That is just for Carmen?!" you ask.
"Yep" said Flora. "she's a big eater"
"I can see..." you say. "what does Carmen eat then?"
All three tamers laugh at this, including Flora.
"You mean what doesn't she eat" said Jerome.
You make your way to the side show tent and enter it.
15111122211211111212211211122221.title: Tamer and Feeder

choices: You do the rehersal without getting eaten.
151111222112111112122112111222212.content:
You are wide eyed as you see who the tamers will be working with.

There before you is a large green dragon plush, with large wings and a huge mouth. He breathes fire as you enter for show.

You met it before. It is Torch, the plushie that is owned by George, one of the kids you met on the first day.

"THIS is who we have to tame?" One of the kids ask. David nods.

"Yup. One of your shows will be with a middle ages theme, and one of the lady tamers will be a sacrifice."

TOrch smiles. "I love these ones. The kids love them do."

David and Barrett hand each trainer their equipment. Flora and Alice each get princess outfits to change into, something Flora is obviously not to keen on, while you and Jerome get sheilds and swords.

"Standard tamer fare otherwise. But remember, Torch is supposed to be a hungry dragon. Be on your guard!" He winks some.

Afterward, Jerome and you take up yoru positions, waiting for the ladies. Once they reappear in their dresses, they are tied to posts in the ring.

Torch smiles and gets into a nearby 'cave', waiting for the cue. As you wait, Bartrett tells you how to use the sword, and how to use the whip you are each given if needed.

"Stand fair, make the dragon do some tricks and such. If one of you gets eaten it's ok." He winks. "Kids love it sometimes when the dragoin wins too, so keep your eyes peeled. Other than that, have some fun!"

Pendragon smiles and waves his hand. "Alright! LEt's do it!"

Torch comes out, ready for a fight it seems. You smile and enter the fray with Jerome.

This is going to be fun!
151111222112111112122112111222212.title: Here there be Dragons!

choices: You and Flora go to find Wanda
You and Flora go to visit Carmen
1511112221121111121221121112222121.content:
Torch roars when he exits the 'cave', and breathes a column of fire for show. You and Jerome each take your places in front of the 'princess's' and try to defend them. You slash at Torch, making him rear up to his hind feet just like a lion. Jerome moves to make Torch to back off with his whip, but Torch grabs the whip and yanks it out of Jerome's hands. Torch throws the whip well out of Jerome's reach. You make to get Jerome's whip, but Torch dodges Jerome's sword and grabs him with his mouth and gobbles him up.
You back off and pause, wondering what to do next. While you're waiting, Torch picks up Alice and rips her off of the pole she was tied too. Alice goes into a fit and begs for her life. She knows how to put on a good act. You go bravely to Torch, but it's too late. Torch eats Alice in one bite. Torch rubs his stomach and belches loudly.
"Ye dragon, perpare to face thy fury!" you yell as you rush at Torch. Torch dodges you, and goes to grab you...but you manage to leap out of the way right in time.
You get Torch to run around in circles with your whip. And you get Torch to do tricks, but you manage to not get eaten somehow. Near the end of the act, Torch makes a wild grab for Flora as you're chasing him. Torch manages to tear Flora free of the pole that she's tied too, but doesn't get her in his claws.
"Very good!" said Pendragon when the rehersal was over. "Torch didn't eat you...which is a major feat! Torch usually eats newcomers like you"
You're tired from the act, and so is Torch.
"Now what?" asked Flora, still in her princess outfit.
"We'll repeat the rehersal this afternoon" said Barret. "until then, you're free to do whatever you like"
"That's how we usually do this" said Flora, after she gets out of her princess outfit. Alice and Jerome are still in Torch's stomach. "one rehersal in the morning, and one in the afternoon"
"Well, what do you want to do now?" you ask.
"I haven't visited Carmen in a while" said Flora. "we could go see her. But, she's probably still eating her breakfast"
1511112221121111121221121112222121.title: Escape from Torch

choices: She adds some flavorings to you.
She takes you both as is!
15111122211211111212211211122221212.content:
You smile and ponder who to visit. You think Wanda for a moment, but she is proabblpy having fuin eating other kids.

Besides, you want to see carmen again yourself.

"I'm sure she will let us in." You say. "Who knows? Maybe we an have some fun with her. Although she did try to eat me yesterday."

"She did?" Flora says. "Wish it was me."

"You really like snakes huh?" You ask as you had off to her tent. "We really are very alike."

"Yeah, snakes are so cool." She giggles and follows.

More and more you are liking Flora. Anyways, you both are soon in her tent... and stare in awe at what you see.

Before you is a large banquet. Pies, cakes, fruits, roasts, turkeys, and that is just some of it! There are also boxes of mice and bunnies who seem happy to see Carmen, pigs and cows covered in sauces, and, the biggest suprise of all, several large barrels (Yes, Barrels!) Of beer. And in the midst iof this mountain of gluttony is Carmen, who has clearly been eating a lot. Part of her tail has plumped out.

But it is also clear she has plenty of room left.

"Carmen!" You call, waving. The naga smiles and drops a barrell of Budwiser and waves hello. "children! How nice to ssssssssssssee you again! And Flora, you never looked happier!"

"Thanks Carmen. I see you are eating light today." She says.

This is light? You have to wonder what a BIG meal is to her!

"Yesssssssssss." The snake replies. "I am trying to keep my weight down for the ssssssssssshow ssssssssssssoon."

"Wow. This is like when I ate that huge peice of cake!" You say. You rmember that from back before you left home. You were round and fat all night, and it felt so nice."

"Ah yessssssssss." Carmen says, downing a bunny. "Your pklussssssssshie told me about you lasssssst night. Intresssssssssssing sssssssssstory." She licks her lips with that forked tounge of hers. "Perhapsssss I could talk you two into being a part of my meal?"

Flora looks excited, smilign wide. "oh yes please! I'd love to be eaten by you!"

"Now hold onj Flora." You say, cautious. "One, as small as we are we are hardly a mouthful. A trip to Pendragon is needed first. But second, she is not like a plushie, and..."

"Oh no worriessssssssss children." Carmen says. "I have a sssssecond ssssssssssstomach I ussssssssssssse to ssssssssstore ssssssssssome of my little friendssssssssss here." She motions to the aninmals, all of hom, if you didn't know better, look like they are... smiling?

"Well..." You say. "Um.... Er... Oh what the heck." You smile. "Ok, we'll be eaten up."

Flora hugs you, almost knockinjg you over. The naga also loks pleased. "Luckily for you, I know Pendragonssssssssss ssssssspell." She smiles and waves the end of her tail over you, and tyou feel yourself growing. You gaze in awe as the world around you gets buigger.

In no time, you are both four feet. Still tiny compared to the massive size of the naga, but now you are more than mouthfuls to her.

"Now.... how to best do thisssssssss..." she says, wrapping her coils around yiou. You can feel some of the mice inside, and hear them squeak.

That will be you soon enough.
15111122211211111212211211122221212.title: Seeing Carmen.. and  being part of breakfast!

choices: you play with the other kids in the stomach
151111222112111112122112111222212122.content:
Carmen the Naga is still huge to you. The snake part of her must be 100 feet long--or more! Carmen is able to wrap her coils around you and Flora, forcing you two together in a tight hug. Carmen looks at a tub of Bar-B-Que sauce and shakes her head.
"I like humansssss jusssst they way they are" said Carmen.
Carmen opens her mouth...wide! If that snake in the zoo could swallow an egg whole, then Carmen could swallow an entire cow whole! Her mouth is so big that you and Flora could fit inside together...and indeed, Carmen takes you two in her mouth. Carmen has two pointed fangs just like a snake, but you only get a glimpse of them. Carmen gobbles you two down quickly and you enter her second stomach.
Carmen's second stomach looks like any other stomach, but it has no stomach acid in it whatsoever. The second stomach has some kids in it, along with thier plushies. There's light in the stomach, coming from one of those big flashlights that lights up an entire area when out camping. The walls of the stomach are pinkish red and slightly slimy to the touch. The stomach is 25 feet across! It's like a small house in here!
"Carmen likes to eat us whenever she has a chance" said Flora.
"You said she was eating light" you say. "how much can Carmen eat?!"
"Much more than that out there" said Flora, who smiles.
"How much?" you ask.
"Well, put it this way" said Flora. "she can eat EVERY animal in a zoo...and still have room for more!"
You just stare at her. Flora giggles.
151111222112111112122112111222212122.title: Carmen's 2nd stomach

1511112221121111121221121112222121221.content: After she was finished, Carmen decided to
1511112221121111121221121112222121221.title: Carmen finishes her breakfast

choices: You are let out soon after that.
You stay in and relax for awhile
1511112221121111121221121112222121222.content:
As the sound of the Naga eating her large breakfast fills all about you, you and Flora go and play with the other kids and their plushies. All of them have been given the same groth spell as you, so they are all about the same size as you.

Wghat suprises you is Flora. She is slowly becoming more outgoing, which also suprises all the other kids. Moreso is her creativity, as she tells a tale after a bit. It sounds familar to you, like a Grimm tale, but in the end the heroes get eaten. THey are not hurt however, just kept inside ofg the creature that ate them forever, cared for and protected.

The story makes some laugh and others clap. You just stare.

After that, the kids and the plushies engage in wrestling matches, you and Flora taking on a big fat bear. He roars and gtrowls playfully, trying to bite with his foam teeth, but ijn the end you manage to pin him.

AFter that is a game of tag, with two of the plushies it. But in this game, those they catch become snacks. You are among the first caught, unfortuinetly, with Flora not joining you in the plushie belly iuntil much later. By then it is very cramped.

Other activities occur once you are let out. All the while, you can hear the naga eat and occasionally rub where you are. By mid afternoon, you are worn out, but never have you had so much fun!
1511112221121111121221121112222121222.title: Tummy fun!

choices: Carmen lets you out at dinner time
Carmen keeps you in her stomach until tomorrow
15111122211211111212211211122221212222.content:
Carmen keeps you inside her. She knows that you'll miss the afternoon rehersal, but she doesn't care. By mid-afternoon, all the kids and plushies in Carmen's second stomach are all worn out. You don't hear Carmen eating anymore, and you try to imagine what Carmen might look like if she ate every animal in a zoo. You hear Carmen's heartbeat, slow and steady. It's quite warm and cozy in the stomach.
"How did Pendragon capture Carmen?" you ask Flora, whose sitting next to you. All of the other kids are either sleeping or playing cards with thier plushies.
"Carmen lived in the swamps of Louisana" said Flora. "David had heard of nagas, but hadn't seen one yet. Anyway, David heard this rumor that the only naga in North America lives near New Orleans, so he goes down there with a group of people"
"Plushies?" you ask.
"No" said Flora. "David used to hang out with a group of people who called themsleves 'The Ministry'. They searched the swamps for the naga for four days straight. On the fifth day of searching, they found Carmen sunning herself on a log"
"Sunning herself?" you ask.
"Yeah..." said Flora. "nagas are cold-blooded, you know. David convinces Carmen to come to his circus and be part of a freak show. Carmen argeed and the rest is history"
"If nagas are cold-blooded, what do they do in the winter?" you ask.
"Hibernate" said Flora. "Carmen usually stuffs herself near fall, to be ready for her long winter nap. And when I say 'stuffs herself', I mean she gorges herself until she can't move. See, she needs a lot of enegry when she hibernates, or she could die from the winter's cold. So, she eats a ton to give her that energy. Carmen usually eats all of us too, keeping us in her second stomach until spring"
"Interesting..." you say.
Flora nods. "Carmen hardly gets up in winter...just wakes up to go to the bathroom or something like that"
This past winter was unusually warm....but not to a cold-blooded creature like Carmen.
15111122211211111212211211122221212222.title: Infomation about Carmen

151111222112111112122112111222212122221.content:
You ponder. "Wait... if you're in here all winter... how do you survive?"

Flora smiles. "That is the fun part. She swallows TONS of food for us, as well as ways to store it. You see how big it is compared to us at four feet right?"

You ahh! "You're right, it would be a LOT bigger if we were all tiny."

"Right! So we get enough food to gorge on every day, though we never do. Plus we get plenty of room to run and play. It is mainly to keep us safe, so no one will steal us."

Makes sense, you think. If someone did steal you at your smal size.... not a pleasant picture.

Suddenly, you hear David speaking. "Alright Carmen let them out. It's suppertime. And once again, you made them miss the afternoon practice." He chuckles. "ah what the hell, I cannot stay mad at you." You feel him hug her, and hear her hiss in delight.

That makes you wonder the full extent of their connection.

"All right kidssssssssss... time for sssssssssupper!" She says. You suddenly feel your self moving upward, being pulled by massive force.

"What is going on?!" You scream out. But Flora is just laughing away. What you hear next makes you wide eyed.

"Ready the landing mat!"

Oh no....

PATOOOIE! One by one each of you are spat out in rapid succession onto a large net. You are one of the last to go, and you land tumbling across it.

Unhurt but a little dazed, it takes a bit for you to regain your focus. And when you do, what you see makes you laugh.

THe naga is bulgy all over her snakey form, clearly having had a large meal. She smiles and rubs each one, slowly but surely each shrinking down to become energy and fat on the naga. She smiles and hisses, giving all of you a hug with her coils. "Enjoy your sssupper kidsssssssssss, and thanksssssssssss for the sssssssnack! You were delicioussssssssss!"

"Bye Miss Carmen!" YTou all say, then head off for supper. What a day this has been!
151111222112111112122112111222212122221.title: More info on Carmen.

choices: You and Flora return to the maze
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
You and all of the kids head to the dinning area of the maze. David shrunk you down again so you could fit within the maze. You sit by Flora at the dinner table again and have an excellent supper of pizza. Barret comes to the head of the table again.
"You all did a good job today" said Barret. "tomorrow, we'll continue to work with the side show"
You see Jerome and Alice sitting near Barret, and they wave at you and Flora and you two wave back. All of the kids are imprssed by Flora's new attitude.
After supper, you're free to do whatever you want until bedtime. You spend the evening with Flora in The Hub playing video games and watching movies on DVD. They have quite a collection of DVDs, along with VHS tapes. You sit down and watch "Charlotte's Web" with Flora and some of the other younger kids.
You wonder what Wanda did all day. When the movie is over, you and Flora go to look for Wanda. You take the same slide you did yesterday, but there's no Wanda waiting at the other end.
"We should stay in this tent" said Flora. "this park gets a lot of animal traffic..and at our size..."
"Yeah" you say.
The sun is setting, and the sky looks beautiful.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Suppertime!

choices: Later, when the season started, things got REALLY intresting!
Something happens before the season starts.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
As you and Flora look out at the setting sun, you think you hear somthing behind you. You chuckle some and wait until it gets real close, then you speak.

"Hi Wanda."

The plush hippo is wide eyed as she moves besdie yu and Flora. "How did you know?"

"Come on, that is one of your oldest tricks." You smile and snuggle in next to the belly and watch the sun go down.

"It was a good day." You say. Best I have had in a long time."

"Me too." Flora says, snuggling next to you. Now usually, as a little boy, you would be grossed out a little by this.

But for now, it's ok.

"Something tells me things will be very intresting when the season starts." Wanda says.

"You haven't seen a thing yet!" Flora says with a giggle. You smile and just lie against the belly of Wanda, pondering the future.

When the sun sets, all three of you head back to the maze. Wanda goes beside some of the plushies, smiling as she looks at you, waving good night.

"Meet me out here for breakfast. Before you work, I want some kiddie snacks!" She says. Flora and you giggle some, then head in.

Thus ended your first fuill day with the circus.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: The end to a wonderful day.

choices: The season starts...and INTERESTING stuff happens!
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Some time passes. Your days are filled with work and fun. Next month is the new season, and you all work hard to get ready for it. You, Flora and Wanda get to be Carmen's snack a week before the season starts. When it gets to be evening, Carmen lets you out and you three head towards the maze.
That's when you see a man in a dark cloak, much like the ones in Kingdom Hearts II. This man in the cloak has a big letter 'M' on the hood of the cloak. The hood is currently up, hiding the man's face in shadow. The cloaked man is near the main tent, and seems to act like a lookout. You, Flora and Wanda watch as the cloaked man glances in your direction. But, the cloaked man doesn't do anything when he sees you. He just looks at you for a minute, then looks in the opposite direction.
"Who's that?" you ask.
"Someone from 'The Ministry' I guess" said Flora.
"What is this Ministry?" asked Wanda.
"David used to hang around those guys" said Flora. "I don't know anything about them"
Just then, Pendragon and another man in a dark cloak exits the main tent. This second man in the cloak has his hood down, revealing the man's face. The face looks handsome with dark red hair. Pendragon is talking to the man with red hair, but you can't hear what is being said. You three continue to walk to the maze tent, when you hear something like a gunshot. You all whirl around to see the men in cloaks are gone, and Pendragon entering the main tent.
"What was that all about?" you ask.
"I have no idea" said Flora.
"And where did those men go?" asked Wanda.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: A visit from the Ministry

choices: Do as David says and run for it.
Tryand find a way to resist.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
When the season kicks off, you are all ready. You wind up as both a tamer and as a 'tiny actor' That is a special position in the freak show. You and several other kids act as the worlds smallest basketball team, taking on a team of trained mice. The kids adore the act and give everyone cookies.

But it is the tamer acts that get you the most applause. A few times you work with Wanda, but mostly it is liions, bears, or the dragon form before. Everyone adores the tricks ytou and the other trainers do, and bust out in laughing when, in a show in Waldorf, Flora makes the bear you are working with lift you up by your pants. THough you find it hard to sit after that for a moment, you get rousing applause.

Payment is given to the workers evenly. The kids each get about $40 a show, which is quite a bit at your age. Mostly it is just for showing off, since there is nothing you want to buy anyway.

Oddly, Pendragon seems distracted about something. what is up with him? Was it the meeting with the Magistry?

It isn't until three weeks of shows that you get the answer. Yo uawake on a sunny day in the state of Kansas to the sight of a hooded man. The Magistry has returned!

"So..." The man says with a deep, evil-sounding voice. "THIS is what you did with your father's powers. We are ashamed."

"look, we talked about this!" Says Pendrgaon, just behind him. "You know I had to do it. These kids need soemone to care for them."

"They make you money, and that is all you care about."

What did he say?

"Yes I;'ll admit I have gotten very rich with the circus, but I use the money to accquire kids who need a home!"

THe man is clearly not impressed. "You have let us down for the last time Pendragon. We have seen your shows and are impressed with the kids, but they will not stay here. We are taking them and the naga. The rest you may keep."

"What?!" You say. But the Ministry man looks to you.

"Silence child! This does not concern you!"

Pendragon sighs. "I have no choice do I? THey do not deserve to be punishged for my mistake you know. They like it here.... they are a family."

THe man sighs. "Say your good byes to them. As for the Naga, we are taking her now."

The man walks away, and Pendragon looks to you. "Wake the others. Tell them to get in their plushies and run for it. Otherwise... Forgive me... I had hoped they would not stop the circus. Now I see they used me all along."

He sighs, leaving you to decide what to do.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: The Ministry comes for you...

choices: You all make it to Moon Scar Island
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
You're not sure what's happening, but it doesn't sound good. Why do they want Carmen now? Oh well...no time to think about it now. You rush to the maze and tell everybody what happened.
"I knew this day would come.." muttered Barret. "oh right, everyone! You heard him! Let's get into our plushies and go!"
Wanda eats you, Flora and Albert the snake before heading for the hills (well...there's no hills in Kansas, but work with me here!). All of the plushies and kids are to meet in the center of town in 20 minutes. Wanda is able to slip pass the Ministry guys, who are too busy with Carmen to notice her. Later on, Wanda tells you that Carmen put up on heck of a fight, and she managed to eat one of those Ministry people. But, Carmen was knocked out by a spell.
The Ministry doesn't go after the plushies or the kids...not yet, anyway.
Hours pass and you're still in Wanda's stomach. She meets up with everyone in the center of town. There, they decided to head for a place called 'Moon scar island'. You ask Flora what's Moon scar island.
"It's where Pendragon came from" said Flora. "it's where he lived before creating the circus. I don't know why we would go there"
"Pendragon's house is more protected than the circussss" said Albert. "if those Ministry guys are after us, that'ssss the sssafest place to go becausssse those Minssstry people won't be able to enter Pendragon'sss house"
"Where's this island?" you ask.
"Somewhere in Louisana, not far from where Pendragon found Carmen" said Flora. "he showed us where he lived once...and said 'if anything happens to the circus, come to my house. There, you'll be safe' "
"And how do we get to Louisana?" you ask. "hitch a lift?"


---------------


"Is the naga asleep?"
"Yes...but it ate Benson"
"No chance of saving him?"
"Not without killing the naga"
"Nevermind that. We need her"
"What for, If I may ask?"
"For our plans. Now, where's Pendragon?"
"He vanished"
"Probably at his house by now..."
"But.."
"Shut up. Just keep an eye on the naga"
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Moon scar island

choices: The poor girl becomes cat chow.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
The trip to Louisiana is difficult. Considering the starting point and the mode of travel, the trip becomes a long, tedious journy.

It takes three days just to reach the borders of Kansas. By then the whole of the group ius very hungry. The plushies manage to get ahold of large sized (To you at least) Apples and Little Debbie cakes, among other things, but the food is still rationed out.

After about a week, the whole of the group is in Arkansas. Worn out from constant traveling and in a state of disrepaior, the plushies need to rest in order to recover.

They let all of you out, even Albert, in order to do so. You all make camp in a abandoned barn, so you are not seen.

Many of your fellow friends are very scared, huddling to their plushies. Flora is one of them, crying some at recent events, staying close to you, Albert, and Wanda.

Wanda is in bad shape. She is dirty, and her stiches are torn in several areas. You manage To fix many of them with Flora's help, but she still looks in bad shape.

"I sometimes hate being a plush." Wanda says. "Ah well, at least I can keep you kids safe. I am THAT tough agauinst animals."

Flora shivers. "But... what f they catch us?"

You don't even want to think about that. At your size you are more like mice than little children, and almost everything around here would love to have you for dinner. You snuggle in close to Wanda when you hear a cat.

"She's close." Wanda says. "everyone, get insdie us."

But it is already too late. A feline emerges in a window. It is a large calico, though it looks very thin. It bounces down and sniffs George, the owner of the dragon.

"Leave him alone!" The dragon says, charging. The cat backs away, mewing pitifully. All the kids look at it.

"Awwww... poor thing..." One of the girls says, startign towards it.

"NO! DON'T!" You say. But the cat pounces. Pinning the girl beneath her paws, it licks it's chops and leans closer...
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Troubles in Travel

choices: You all end up in Carmen's stomach
Carmen knows a place where all of you can rest up besides her stomach
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
The cat finishes the girl in one bite. All of the plushies and kids tremble in fright. The cat looms closer and closer, eager for another tasty treat. Wanda comes in front of you and Flora to protect you two from the cat. The cat pauses to sniff Wanda.
All of other kids are entering thier plushies now, but it's only a matter of time before the cat pounces again. You and Flora both cower behind Wanda. You think that this is it, that you'll all be cat chow. But no.
Suddenly, a dog barks nearby, causing the cat to look behind itself. The dog is a big german shepard that's bigger than the cat. A dog is no better than a cat; a dog would still eat little humans. The dog isn't skinny or undersized. In fact, it looks well-fed and you think you see a collar around its neck. The cat just stares at the dog as it comes closer.
"Go away!" yelled Flora. "just go away, you evil cat"
The cat looks back at you and Wanda. It bends down, ready to pounce. You close your eyes, not wanting to see death coming at you. You only hope that it'll be a quick death.
"Get away from them!" yelled a voice that you recongize. Carmen!
You open your eyes and see Carmen where the German shepard was. The cat looks back at Carmen and goes wide-eyed. The cat hisses, and tries to make it past Carmen. But Carmen is too quick. She grabs the cat and eats it.
"CARMEN!" you yell as you rush past Wanda. All of the plushies and kids rush to hug Carmen, and Carmen looks happy to see all of you again.
"How did you escape from the Ministry?" asked George.
"It's not easy holding a naga in a cage" said Carmen, who smiles. "plus, I know a little magic"
Carmen is saddened that the cat ate one of the kids, and she ate the cat.
"It's alright" you say. "there was no helping her when the cat jumped on her"
"Lucky thing I found you" said Carmen, lookig over you all. "Heading for Moon Scar Island? Well, I'm sure the journey will be much easier in my stomach"
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Carmen comes to the rescue

choices: She was telling the truth, you arrive at Moon Scar.
She was working for the Ministry!
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
You smile and nod your head, as do most of the plushies. "Agreed, we are pretty worn out from the journey. Besides, we missed being inside you!"

The naga smiles and coils around you ."Well then come on, I'm STARVING!" She openins wide and the kids start to pile in. But Flora and one of the plushies are near tears. You go to her and try to comfort her.

"She always liked cats..." THe plushie said. "Now... she was eaten by one... It's not right you know..."

"I know..." You say. "But we cannot stay or we will be next. I am sure there is some way we can help her still."

"I'm not sure I want to go into Carmen." Flora says. "Something isn't right about this... something..."

You hmm and nod. She is not hissing for one when she talks, and for another, she seems VERY eager to get you in her belly. Still, you really have no choice.

"I'll protect you Flora." YOu say, thoug you have no idea how you could. Flora smiles slowly.

"O...ok... but.... I'm scared."

"I know... just hold my hand."

She does so, and the plush follows behind. As soon as you are in her mouth, it shuts, leaving you in darkness. You then feel her swallow you down to her belly.

It is only a matter of time now that can tell wether she was telling the truth or lying.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Into her belly

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
It takes Carmen a week to get to Moon Scar Island. If Carmen hadn't come, it would've taken all of you a few months at the rate you were going! You think it was odd that Carmen wasn't hissing as she spoke, and all of the kids thought it was weird too. Wanda and the other plushies are in BAD need of repair. You and the other kids repair the stitches as best as you could. But it's much easier traveling in Carmen's stomach. Carmen sent down some food to her stomach so you all have something to eat. A week later, Carmen lets you all out.
"Welcome to Moon Ssssscar Isssland" said Carmen.
Moon Scar Island turns out to be the oringal home of Carmen. It's a fairly large island in the shape of a half moon, thus its name. Pendragon had been living on the island for two months before he knew Carmen was living on the island as well.
Pendragon's house is actually a mansion with four stories to it. The front door of the mansion has symbols on it, to ward off intruders, or so saids Carmen and the other plushies. One of the symbols on the door is a large star with an orange eye in the exact middle of the star. The "eye" is glowing slightly, making it eerie to look at.
"Pendragon callsssss that an 'Elder Sign'" said Carmen when you ask her about the symbol. "it'ssss ssssssssome kind of ward"
Carmen use to live on a run-down river boat that's on the other side of the island. The river boat looks just like the river boat in the Walt Disney movie "The Rescuers". Carmen lets you see it. On each door of the river boat, there is another one of those Elder Signs, or another warding spell.
"Pendragon doesn't like company, or not?" you ask.
"Let's jussssst ssssssay that he runsssssss into some interesssssting people" said Carmen.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Moon Sssscar Issssland

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Most of the kids head for Pendragon's house, sounds of their excitement echoing from inside. But you are still a little wary. Something doesn't seem right about Carmen still, and you are hoping that she is really still on your side.

"Can I look at your house Carmen?" You ask. Wanda seems to agree, curious as well.

"Of courssssssssssse." The naga says. "I wassssssssss hoping you might come for dinner. Pleasssssssssse, follow me." She looks at you kindly. You look for Flora to come with you, but she and Albert must have already headed for Pendragon's home.

"We'll meet up with them later." Wanda says. "For now, we better just stay on our guard."

You agree, following Carmen into her home. For an old riverboat, it looks amazing. But it is clear that eating is the main focus of the naga, as recipe books ofr HUNDREDS of meals line the shelves, as do pictures of nagas from around the world. A few of her rooms feature trophies from hunting, possibly gifts from her own, though you do see a feww human statues here and there.

"Poacherssssssss mossssssssssstly." She says, lickign her chops. "Though I prefer my mealssssssss happy and cute."

You blush at that. Did she just call you cute?

****************

"Tere is a problem sir. Not all of the little children entered Pendragon's home."
"What? But that means..."
"Yes, he can find out what we did to her. And if he does, the whole project is in jepordy."
"Damnit... Wait a minute... this kid, who is he?"
"Don't know sir. He is not a circus regular, just joined."
"That complicates it even further. We may have no choice. when the moon shines down, he will notice what we did to her, then project UST will be in trouble."
"What can he do though? He is just a kid?"
"THat is a problem. if she eats a kid following the transformation, he will find them."
"Then it is time to move to plan B. break the barriers around Pendragon's home, and take the children. We may be able to use them to our advantage."
"You may be correct. We can either use them as bait or for... Alright, proceed."
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Invited to dinner.

choices: Carmen eats you and Wanda for desert
Flora and Albert comes to see you
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
It turns out that many poachers have tried to kill or capture Carmen through the years. She eithers eats the poachers or...use them as sex toys. Carmen has a very beautiful human half, but you don't want to think about what she does to the tiny poachers. Some poachers have met thier deaths in Carmen's stomach by digestion.
Carmen was born on the riverboat some 100 years earlier. It turns out that nagas have long life spans. Carmen's mother, Janica, had been evil. It was Janica who ate the crew of the riverboat, making it crashing into Moon Scar Island. Carmen was only 24 when Janica died of old age. Nagas live to be 300 or so.
Carmen is the only naga in North America. There's a LOT more nagas in other places in the world. Since nagas are cold-blooded, they tend to live in warm places, like the Tropics and such. Janica had been living in Mexico City, when she moved northwards to Louisana. The reason why Janica moved to Louisana isn't known to Carmen.
Carmen tells you all this when you all have dinner. Carmen is a great cook, but she sees little use of it. Nagas swallow thier prey whole and alive, like snakes. Carmen cooks a chocolate cake just for you, and she catches a deer that was wondering near the riverboat. You watch as Carmen slowly swallows the deer, wrapped up in her coils. Wanda's stitches have been repaired. Wanda has no dinner, but she'll eat you later.
"So, Carmen" said Wanda. "why don't you eat humans like your mother did?"
"A human ssssssaved my life once" said Carmen. "hisssss name wasssss Jim Hopkinssss. I wassssssss captured by a poacher'sssssss cage. And then, Jim comessssssss along and freed me. Since then, I only eat poacherssss and not innocent humanssssss"
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: dinnertime

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
You talk with Carmen more and more, listening intently to her life story. It is rteally very intresting, though when she joined the circus she gained her gluttonous streak and need for hibernation. That was when she found a taste for a new and wonderful treat: Kids.

"You sssssssssssssssssee..." she explains. "A sssssssmall child came into my home when I firssst joined the ccircusssssssss. He wassssssss qute ssssssssweet, petting my coilssssssss and sssssssssuch. Then, he assssssssssked me to eat him, just to sssssssssssssee how I did it. I ssssssssaid no, bnut then I got curioussssssss..."

"And let me guess." Wanda says, snuggling you into her fat plush tummy. "You gave in and gobbled him up."

"Yesssssssss..." She said, licking her lips. "And he wasssssssssssss ssssssssso happy in my sssssssssssstorage belly. I let him out later, but then David decided to let the kidssssssssssss sssssssssssstay in me when winter comesssssssssss about."

You smile, as the rest of the story is obvious. Suddenly, just as you are about to ask for more cake, you hear footsteps.

"Too sssssssssssmall to be more than a mousssssssssse." Carmen says. "How nice, I wasssssssss hoping for sssssssssssome desssssssssssssssssert." She smiles and listens. But when they get closer, you see it is NOT a mouse.

It's Flora and Albert!

But they do not look in good shape. Dirty and out of breath, they collapse at the door to the dinign area.

"What happened?" You ask. You and Wanda and Carmen rush to help them, letting them catch their breath. When they do, they bring bad news.

"The... Ministry..... they... they atttacked.... took.... everyone... Pendragon's.... hurt bad..."

Wanda growls. She looks to Carmen. "You did this! You led them here I'll bet!"

"No! I ssssswear I didn't!" She pleads. You just look to Flora.

"Where are they taking them?" You ask her." Did you hear them say where?"

Flora nods. "New Orleans."

You sigh. It's not that far from the island. Carmen could take you there fast. But can you trust her?
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Terrible news.

choices: Carmen makes it to the French Quarter
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Carmen wouldn't betray you, right? You don't know much about nagas, but you feel as though you can still trust Carmen. If she betrayed you, wouldn't she have led you all to the Ministry's hands?
"Where in New Orleansssssss?" asked Carmen.
"Somewhere in the French Quarter" said Flora. "I overheard them talking about that place"
"Can you take us there, Carmen?" you ask.
"How can you still trust her?" asked Wanda. "for all we know, Carmen led us here to be captured by the Ministry"
"Don't be ssssssssssssssillly" said Carmen.
It's 20 miles to New Orleans by boat. But, you aren't going by boat. You're going to ride in Carmen's storage stomach. By that route, New Orleans should only be 5 miles away. The area around Moon Scar Island is nothing but swamp, and Carmen is able to make her way through areas where boats can't go.
You, Wanda, Flora and Albert are all in Carmen's storage stomach.
Pendragon had tried to defend the kids, but he was badly hurt and taken with the kids.


It's night when Carmen moves out of the old riverboat that's her home. The moon is in the sky, but clouds cover it from view. Carmen glanced up at the sky.
"Stay covered, moon" whispered Carmen to the darkness around her.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: To New Orleans

choices: Your sister, corrupted by the Ministry.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Carmen soon arrives on the very edge of New Orleans, looking about for anything that might suggest trouble.

Unfortunetly, she missed the Ministry people hiding in one of the buildings.

In a flash, they are upon her, using magical webs to hold her down. One emerges from hiding, with very ornate robes that can only mean she is high ranking, one you had seen before, but know too well.

For the person is a she, and this she is of your family.

"You!" The naga hisses. "Releassssssssssse me!"

"Take hger away." The person says. "And as for those inside her... have them made ready for the special feast."

She laughs manically. You geta glimpse of the person as you are teleported out of the belly. Yoiucannot believe it! it is...
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: The Ministry... again.

choices: Your mother enters the room and answers
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
"Mom?!" you shout as soon as you see your mother in the ornate robes. Wanda also looks shocked, as does Albert and Flora.
Your mother merely glances at you and doesn't say anything. You're in the hands of another ministry member, a man about 34 or so. Wanda is taken away by your mother, as is Albert. You and Flora tremble in fear as the man enters a building with a red "M" above the door.
Carmen is in the building, trying to fight off her guards, but it's no use.
"Why is your mom with the Ministry?" asked Flora.
"I wish I knew" you say as the man takes you to a room and places you two in a bird cage. The man looks almost sad for a moment, then turns and leaves the room. The bird cage is hanging from the ceiling by a chain, and you and Flora look around the room. The room has several chairs in it. The tallest chair has a person in it; A man with gray hair and an eye-patch over his right eye. The man seems to be in charge, as his robes are the most ornate you've ever seen.
"Welcome" said the man. "I am Xaldin, leader of the Ministry"
"What are you planning to do with us?" you ask. Flora is cowering behind you.
"Feed you to the naga" said Xaldin. "but...you won't enter the storage stomach"
"Why are you doing this?" asked Flora.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Xaldin

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
"Because..." You hear a familar voice say. "You children are no longer needed. Just as you never were really wanted, you little brat."

You turn and see your mother, glaring at you with a look you know only too well. A look of hatred. "And I suppose muy brother and sister are gone too."

"Of course." Your mother ays. "And do not call me mother anymore, I am now Jenova of the Ministry. I have no need for children."

"What did you do the others?!" Flora asks. You are about to ask that about your fellow siblings when the mother answers both questions.

"Your friends are in the preparation room, being made ready for the sacrifice at the full moon, when Carmen will become ours to use. As for your siblings, brat, they are no more..." She smiled and patted her belly. "I took care of them myself. It was a pleasure really."

"YOU MONSTER!!!" You scream, but as you go to charge, Xaldin binds you to the floor in a kneeling position.

"Pity, such spirit would have been welcomd in the Ministry." Xaldin says. "Perhaps it still is. Agree to join me, and I will let you and your firned here live, as members. Otherwise, you will be prepared for the sacrifice."

"What about the others?" Flora says.

"They will die."

Flora looks to you with wide eyes. "Don't do it! Don't join them!"

"No worries." You say boldly. "I rather die than be a part of this."

"As you wish." Xaldin says. "Take them away Jenova. Then return to me."

Your mother picks you both up, squeezing you in her palms. Things are not lookig good.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Answers frm the worst source.

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
The Prepartion room is filled with kids and other live animals. In the middle of the room, Carmen is chained to the floor and is at the head of a long table of food. Your mother---your heartless mother--sets you in front of Carmen.
"Eat these ones first" said your mother cloldy.
"I'll never eat them!" yells Carmen.
"Oh, yes you will" said Jenova. "because when the moon is visible, you're under our control"
"How is that possible?" you ask.
"We put a spell on Carmen" said Jenova. "a spell that makes us control a naga when the full moon is visible in the sky. And It's a full moon tonight"
Carmen struggles in her chains. "You heartless bitch!"
"Why, thank you" said Jenova. "and now, as much as I would like to watch...I have other little people to eat" Jenova laughs and exits the room.
"Carmen, is it true what she said?" asked Flora. "can they control you?"
"I'm ssssssssorry to sssssssay yesssssss" said Carmen. "when the full moon is vissssible, I'll have no choice but to eat the two of you"
"Isn't there anything we can do?" you ask.
"Pendragon was planning to attack the Minisssssstry" said Carmen. "but he wasssss badly hurt earlier"
The room has a view of the night sky. You can see that the moon is covered by a thin cloud.
"I'm ssssssoory" said Carmen. "I'm sssoory of what I'm going to do with you two"
"At least we won't die alone..." you say, looking back at the Feast.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Carmen's under a spell

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
You hold Flora tight. She is in tears by this point, and her spirit is broken completely. "I... I never thought it would enbd like this..." She holds you tight, waiting for death.

"I... I'm sorry... I couldn't protect you." You say. Flora looks at you.

"It's alright... you tried." She strokes your cheek, watching as the cloud starts to ncover the moon, the naga looking sadly to you.

"Forgive me..." She says, the mon starting to be uncovered....

And then....

"SENA MENTAR FULGORA SANTIAGO!!!!!" You hear a commanding voice say, followed by flashes of light and fire. You and FloraDuck your head as it strikes Carmen.

"PengragonnnnnnN!!!!!" She shouts, a mix of pain and joy. She then collapses. You are afriad she is dead.

"Just a sleeping spell. She'll say that way until the spell of moon control is broken." You turn and see the source of the voice.

IT'S DAVID PENDRAGON! He is badly hurt, but apparently still abl;e to use his spells.

"David!" Flora says. You smile and repeat it, rushing to him. Most of the other children on the feasting table do the same.

"Please... be easy children. The Ministry can no longer use Carmen to devour the unmagical, but they still have ways they can win. The time to fight has come. Barrett, you are the oldest, you know what everyone is good at."

"Yes sir." He smiles and looks you rway. "But I think some have personal reasons to fight."

Pendragon nods and loosk to you. "Yes, your mother. I never thought sahe could be Jenova. She is a cruel consumer of life, and belives the problems of the world lie with the children. WHy she had some of her own must have been to devour them."

You cry a little, and start to get angry. Pendragon nods some, making you grow to your normal size and handing you a sword.

"TUrn that hate into a will to fight my boy. But remember this is not for vengence... if she escapes, as well as the leader, they will find other ways to fight and destroy us all." He looks to you. "Avenge your family. but be wary. Jenova is a powerful mage. That sword can repel her spells... but you cannot rely on it alone." He smiles, winking. "look for an old friend: That plushie who was with you frm the start."

Wanda! You forgot all about her!

"As for the rest of you, the time to fight has come. I know you are only kids, but kids have a way of doing AMAZING things. I know we can do this."

The kids are uncertain, but Pendragon smiles. He begins to mumble words, and suddenly every child is filled with courage.

even you.

And you know what you must do.
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.title: Rise up and FIGHT!!!

choices: You find Wanda...corrupted by the Ministry!
You run into Xaldin, trying to escape
1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Your heartless mother, Jenova, deserves to die. Can you do it, though? Can you kill your own mother? Yes. When your mother have kids so that she can eat them, it's time for her own son to kill her. Thanks to your mother, all of your brother and sisters are dead. You must avenge them! You can look for Wanda later.
"What will you do?" asked Barret to Pendragon.
"I shall go to...." started Pendragon. Then he whispers something to Barret. Barret gets wide-eyed, nods and orders the kids to follow him. You and Flora exit the room too. You start to hear fighting going on everywhere, and spells going off.
You manage to duck and wave through all the fighting. You lose Flora at some point, but she has a sword to defend herself. All that you can think about is finding your mother and kill her. Kill her for her crimes of eating her own children.
You burst into a room, and find that your mother is sitting at what looks to be a dinning table. On the dinning table, there is a cage with one person in it; one of your older brothers! Your older brother is on his hands and knees, begging to your mother not to eat him. Jenova is wearing an amused look. When you burst in the room, Jenova is about to reach into the cage. Jenova turns to you.
"How did you...?!" she starts to ask, then answers herself. "Pendragon saved you, didn't he?"
"Jenova!" you shout. "I'll kill you!"
Jenova gets a spell ready, but you are too quick. You slash her with your sword and she falls down, dead.
"Go to hell" you say. You free your older brother, Leon, and place him in your pocket. Leon looks like he has lost the will to fight altogether.

The situation worsens for them when the plushies are recovered, even Wanda, and they send them into their large prisions. It doesn't take long for them to surrender.

But Xaldin is not among them.

**********

You run into him as he starts to head down an escape way. You look riught at him. HE was behind everyhing, and even tried to have you and the others killed. You cannot let him get away. If you do, he'll return.

And you will never be safe.

"Stop!" You call, mustering all your couyrage and rage. "If you are such a great leader, then why leave?"

Xaldin turns and faces you. "Bold words from alittle brat. You may have gotten Jenova, but that was one who didn't even fight." He brandishes a spiked sword, which looks cruel and demonic. "I, on the other hand, will not fall. I will escape this place."

"I doubt that. I'll stop you from hurting anyone ever again!" You charge him, blades clashing.

The final battle has begun!

1511112221121111121221121112222121222211.content:
Xaldin is skilled, there is no two ways arounfd that. His blows are precise and block yours perfectly. But you have been training with the blade for awhile now, and you are much more athletic.

IOn short, it is an even match.

You duel for what seems to be hours the battle heading to the outside, onwhat appears to be a bridge between buildings. The moon shines down on you both, and below the battle in all other aspects is won. Wanda and Flora watch with wide eyes as they see who is fighting.

But you do not see them. All you are focused on is this man, who resulted in the death of your family, all but your brother Leon. He leaps out of your pockjet and watches as the duel goes to the sides of the bridge. Yopu are careful not to fall over the side, but Xaldin is usinfg that to his advantage, streikign in ways that push you ever closer.

Fianlly, it happens. He strikes at you with an overhead slash, the blow missing only just. But the damage is done as he falls forward, hanging on to the side by a hand. The sword he has falls from his grip.

You look at him.

"Save me please!" He says.

Can you save him after all he has done?

Then... you see Wanda. She is shocked at what she is seeing, maybe scared. You realize now what Pendragon had to have meant. Long ago as a child you were falling into darkness. Was Xaldin the same? Did he have nothing left but hate?

You know what you must do, though it turns your stomach. Even as he loses his grip, you grab his wrists. Despite being just a child you hold him there.

"Why?!" He says simply.

"Because..." you reply straining to hold him. "I'm not like you. I still have a family."

Xaldin slowly manages to climb up. He is too weakened to try anything for now bit you keep your guard up. Below everyone is cheering.

Its over.

1521.content:
You grip it tight as you start to fall asleep. You just cant help yourself! The cow is just so damn CUUUTTTEE!!

"Aww...you think?" it speaks in cutesy girl-voice!

...wait a sec! ...did your cow just talk? At first you think since your roomate's a pot-head, perhaps he's been smoking again and youre getting high off the smell again!!!!

"No... youre not high! Everything is real!!!"

Ok.. this is getting weird! But even if you ARE high, you decide to play along!

"Um..hi, hows it going?" you greet the cow!

"Hello there!" it replies, "My name is Belle! What's yours?"

"Uh...Shane! Nice to meet you!" You smile at Belle!

"You still dont think Im real, do you?" she asks.

You come clean, "Um..no offense, but it's not every day you meet a talking toy cow! I just hope I can sleep this out of my system..."

Belle tells you, "For the last time, youre not high!! I'll prove it!" She squeezes her udder over a glass and milk starts pouring into it! She hands you the glass of millk!

You just look at her weirdly and take a sip... "Wow, this IS real!!!" you say, "And not bad coming from a PLUSH cow!"

Belle smiles, "You know what would go great with milk?"

"No, what?" you ask.

She closes her eyes and smiles, "...YOU!"

You look at her strange! "Um...what?"
1521.title: Damn roomate!!!

15211.content:
You take a step back from Belle. That's when you realize that you can't take a step back in bed. That's when you notice that you've been shrunk! Belle is about the size of a house to you now! Belle giggles and takes a giant step toward you.

"Human with some milk" said Belle. "sounds delicious!"

You try to run, but Belle picks you up and dunks you in the giant cup of milk. The cup of milk is the size of an Olympic pool compared to you. Belle picks up the cup of milk and starts to drink it. You have nowhere to go but in Belle's waiting mouth.

"WAIT!" you shout. "Why do you wanna...?"

Belle spits you out in the cup of milk and glares down at you.

"Why do I wanna est you?" asked Belle. "well, why do you humans wanna eat hamburgers? hmmmm?"

"But we don't swallow cows whole and alive!" you yell.

"We do" said Belle.

"Huh?"

"Gary Larson had it right" said Belle. "we cows are smarter than you humans"

Gary Larson? Who the hell is Gary Larson?

Belle sighs. "You've never read 'The Far Side' ?"

"Oh...no" you say. "our newspaper never picked up that comic"

"Well, how would you humans feel if we cows started to eat you instead?" asked Belle.

You have no answer to that.

"Well, down the hatch for you!"

And Belle drinks you down with the milk!

You enter a large chamber that could only be Belle's stomach. Her stomach is beyond large; it's the size of a small baseball studium! Cows have four stomachs, so that means that Bell also has four stomachs! But it seems that Belle's four stomachs are one BIG stomach. There's no stomach acid.
15211.title: Belle's stomach

152112.content:
What's that in the distance? ....Oh my god! It cant be a barn!! There's a barn inside Belle's stomach?!!! Weird...

Still, since you have no other choice, you head toward that barn in the middle of nowhere, curious of what is there..

...As you step closer and closer to the barn, you can make out someone sitting in a lawnchair beside it. It seems to be a cowgirl... wearing a black-white cow striped vest and skirt along with a cute brown cowgirl hat and yellow cowbell around her neck along with it!
Wait a sec... the closer you get to the cowgirl, the more you notice STRANGE things about her!!

She.. she's part cow! Below her skirt, you see her cow legs with hooves along with a thin tail sticking out of the lawnchair she's sitting in! Not only that, but she has horns sticking out of her hat and little cow-ears underneith! ....Could this be...?

She looks toward you while sipping a glass of milk. "Howdy!"
You just look at her strangely, "Uh... Belle?"
"Yep!" she smiles, "Welcome to your new home: ME!"

Hmmm... this is odd. If this is a stomach, why arent you being digested?
"Because this stomach only stores food!" Belle answers your thoughts, "My OTHER 3 stomachs are the digesting ones!"

"Look uh..." you try to start a conversation, but the words are hard to come out, "It's um.. not that I dont enjoy being here, but... I REALLY need to get out of here! Please send me back home!"

She just takes another sip of her milk, "...Nope!"
"WHY NOT?!"
"And leave you back to your cow-eating lifestyle? No way!" Belle answers, "Plus... I havent had a hard working servant in quite a while!"
"Uh... a servant?"

"Oh yes," Belle nods, "I need a big strong man like you to do me some favors... do a good job, and I MIGHT let you out of me!"

Not having any other choice, you figure you might as well play along. "...Uh... what kind of favors?"

She blushes a little as she starts to unbutton her vest, "I..uh...need you to milk me."
"....WHAAAAT??!!"
"I need you to milk me!!!" Belle shouts at you while still blushing, "...Well what do you expect?! I AM a cow!"

But just before you could have second thoughts of being her servant, she crosses her cowlegs and glares at you, "...Need I remind you, I am STILL hungry? And Id be more than obliged to finish my meal in the OTHER stomachs!!"
152112.title: Got Milk?

1521121.content:
Well, as there doesn’t appear to be any escape it seems that it would be in your best interest to do what she wants. “So, uh, do I need to get a bucket or something?” you ask, trying to seem as helpful and accommodating as possible.

She leans back in her seat, a relieved smile on her fac,e as she finishes unbuttoning her vest. “There’s a bucket over there…” she inclines her head to a rather large bucket that’s sitting well within sight of her. “Of course…” her face actually reddens a bit more at this point. “You could…ah…take your fill of me as well, straight from the tap as it were.” her head is bowed but you can see the grin on her face. “I wouldn’t mind…”

You blink as you realize what she’s offering, your jaw nearly dropping to the floor as she finally gets her vest off, displaying her milk engorged breasts. You shake your head and regain your wits as you try to decide what to do.

You are about to reach your arms out for her when you see something in her hand. You snag her wrist and hold her palm out and up so you can see. “Eye irritant…” you say incredulously. “You faked your tears!” you let her hand go and her face changes, the sadness leaving in a blast of irritation.

“You just have to make things difficult don’t you.” She crosses her hands under her chest. “Fine then, I’ll make things abundantly clear for you.” She stands up to her full height and manages to give the impression of glaring down her nose at you. “You do what I want, when I want, however I want or…” She licks her lips, a disturbingly sinister glint to her eyes. “I make you my next meal.”

Okay, you are screwed, that much is obvious, but maybe a quick death is preferable to being her lackey till whenever she get’s bored with you. Yet there are things you kind of wanted to do with your life, so maybe playing along for now will allow you to find a way out of this. Hmmm, what to do.

She sees your hesitation and shrugs “Either way you’re going to satisfy one of my hungers.” She comments and you come to a decision.
15211212122.title: Her true face

152112121221.content:
Wait a second... if she wanted to eat you, what was the whole point of making you do so many errands? Why couldnt she have just eaten you allready?!

"Wha...what's that supposed to mean?" Belle looks at you strangely hearing that certain thought! Long story short, youre sick of her little 'attitude' toward you... you know you might be eaten either way, but at you'll go quick then work your ass off and be eaten anyway!

"You know what?" you look her straight in the eye, "...Eat me!"

"Uh...excuse me?"

"You heard me!" you tell her, "Better than being your little servant boy! C'mon! Just get it over with!"
Strange... why is she starting to shake nervously?

"Uh...Y..y..you know it'll be v v very painful, right?" Belle tells you while sweating.

"Fine by me!" you show no fear on your face, "Let's get this over with!" You decide to rush things by putting your hands in Belle's mouth and prying it open while trying to stick your head in it!

She just pushes you off of her! Why is resisting so much? ...Could there really be some truth in what she said before? ...Is she really... LONELY?

"O-o-o-of course not!!" she shouts at you, "your ignorant human brain believes there was truth in that obvious lie of mine?!"

"Then what are you waiting for?!!" you slowly step toward her as she slowly steps back, "EAT... ME!"
152112121221.title: Grabbing a cow by the horns...

choices: To cut a deal with her
1521121212212.content:
You look at her, eyebrow arched in question. “Well… what’s wrong?”

She glowers at you but eventually speaks. “I can’t eat you, okay.”

Oh this is priceless, she’s been bluffing this whole time. “You want to run that by me again, in detail this time.” You fold your arms over your chest and wait for her response.

She chews her lower lip. “None of this is actually real. Your actually asleep inside me, I need you alive so I can feed off your energy. I just do this so I can have some fun and so you…

You cut her off as realization dawns on you. “…So I don’t wake up. That’s it isn’t it”

She cringes and shakes her head vigorously “NO! No it’s so you won’t get bored, I assure you that you are quiet stuck inside me. So you might as well enjoy yourself.” She shakes her hips in an attempt to distract you.

You smile craftily “You’re lying. I get it now. If I wake up, I can get out can’t I.” She continues to shake her head but you proceed with the thought. “Powerful as you are your still a stuffed toy, if I wake up, I can get out of you and you’ll have no more power over me.” Your rub your hands in glee as you realize that power has just shifted to you.

Belle looks seriously distraught at your wide grin. “Okay look, being inside me doesn’t have to be bad. What’s say we put the past behind us and work out a deal that will be beneficial to everyone?” Her tone is hopeful and you decide…
1521121212212.title: The truth

choices: You drink from the chocolate pool
15211212122122.content:
"Well, it's been bad for me for the past few minutes" you nearly shout at her. You DON'T want to be her servant forever! "So if you want me to stay with you, cut the servant stint"

"Okay, deal" said Belle. "I did that just to see how far you would go, anyway" She giggled.

"So" you say, looking around at the barn and barnyard. It looks like an oridanary barn in a grassy expanse of land out in the middle of nowhere. There's a forest out in the distance, but you can't tell how far away it is. There's a pool of what looks like chocolate milk beside the barn. "This is all in a dream?"

"Why, yes" said Belle. "it's a cross between my imagination and yours. You can't be harmed in this dream world of mine. We can do anything we wish, and we won't get hurt in the slightest. Why, you can even swallow me if you want and I'll be okay"
15211212122122.title: Deal

152112121221221.content:
You know what? Why not? She ate YOU... might as well show her how it feels!!

"Ok then!" and in an instant, you grab her by her horns and pull her head toward your mouth... you slowly and carefully jam her into your mouth while trying to watch out for her horns!

Youre actually suprised how you managed to fit her WHOLE head into your mouth! Still, you continue your meal and work your way down her neck. Luckily her boobs(or 'utter') are squishy enough to sqeeze down your throat, otherwise you'd choke on them!

Still swallowing her stomach right down to her cow legs is a breeze! Suprisingly her entire body can fit inside you!! After one big GULP, you slurp up her tail and down she goes...

Strange... you dont feel any different. Youre dont feel full or anything! It's like you ate air!

"Probably cuz you did!"

"Huh?" you turn your head to who said that, "AAAHH!!" It's Belle!! "WHAT?! How did you....??!!!"

"Didnt I tell you?" Belle smiled, "It's all in a dream!"
"..Whoa.." is all you could say.

"Now..." Belle smiles, "If you dont mind... It's MY turn!!!"

...HER TURN?!!
152112121221221.title: ANYTHING can happen in a dream!

choices: Belle floods the city with her milk
Belle starts to destory the city
1521121212212212.content:
"Yep, my turn" said Belle, grinning.

"Wait a minute...I thought I ate you" you say, looking down at your flat stomach.

"This is a dream" said Belle. "and I'M the only who controls it"

Oh boy. This dream just gets worse and worse. You want to wake up from this nightmare and crawl out of the REAL Belle. Why can't things go your way just once?

"I'll let you have your fun later" said Belle. "now, it's time for a game!"

"What game is that?" you ask, dreading the answer.


Belle thinks for a minute and an evil smile comes across her face. That can't be good for you!


The scence switches to a big city that looks like New York and Chicago combined. There's the Hancock building and right next to it is the Empire State Building. You're on the street, which is deserted. The city is highly detailed, and people are walking up and down the sidewalks.
"Any other day in a big city.." said Belle's voice from somewhere above you. You look up and you don't see Belle anywhere. "..people are going about thier buisiness. But, miles away, a cow drinks some toxic waste spilled by a truck in an accident. The toxic waste the cow drinks causes the cow to grow and grow...and grow!!! Now, the cow spots a city in the distance and goes to it. The city isn't prepared for...COWZILLA!"
As Belle's voice says this, the ground below you rumbles. You gasp as you catch sight of Belle coming down the street...and she's 400 feet tall!
1521121212212212.title: Cowzilla

15211212122122122.content:
You see hundreds of people running and screaming in terror as Cowzilla steps toward their little city!!

You can only watch in horror as giant Belle rips a humongous building off the ground and tosses it up in the air!

"Oh no!" Belle continues to narrorate, "It appears Cowzilla has tossed a simple building thousands of feet into the sky as if to just show off what she's capable of! What will she destroy next?"

That's when she steps toward what seems like Seattle's Space Needle, rips it right off the ground with just one hand and chucks it afar like a javelin!

"Yikes! Is there no end to her terror?!" Belle narrorates!

Normally your instinct would be to run... but for some reason, youre a little intrigued! Besides, it's just a dream, right? She cant possibly hurt you... can she?!!!

Meanwhile, Belle looks down a bus that stopped right in front of her left leg. She smiled and picked the bus right of the ground as the passengers screamed to high hell!
"..Did I forget to mention Cowzilla has an unquenchable appetite?!" she rips the bus in half and tilts the halves in over her mouth to 'catch' all the screaming people inside!

After gorging herself on those poor passengers, she tosses the bus parts over her shoulder and continues to narrorate, "...The bus was not enough to satisfy Cowzilla! She continues to search for more little people to feast upon!"

...That's when she looks down at YOU! "...But what's this? It appears something has caught Cowzilla's attention! What does she have planned for this tiny person that catches her eye?!"

And with that, you see her hand reaching for you!! ..Admittingly youre a LITTLE scared, but since it's all a dream, she cant possibly hurt you! Still.. why are you still worried?!
15211212122122122.title: Someone's enjoying themself!!

152112121221221221.content:
Even though it's just a dream, and Belle can't possibly hurt you, your instincts tell you to run. So you do. You run as fast as you can away from Cowzilla/Belle. Cowzilla runs after you, crushing cars and destorying small buildings as she runs after you. The people in the city are running every which way. You turn down a street and find youself on a street that leads into a tunnel. You're about to run into the tunnel, when you realized that the 'tunnel' is Belle's open mouth! You stop short and run in the other direction.
"And the little human gives Cowzilla a merry chase" narrates Belle. "How long can the little human last until Cowzilla grabs him?"
You're running down a street, when Cowzilla finally catches you!
Belle lifts you up to her face.
"What will Cowzilla do to the little human?" she narrates.
152112121221221221.title: Caught

choices: You grab onto one of the planes!
1521121212212212212.content:
And so, Cowzilla or Belle begins her little narroration of what's happening!

"Cowzilla stares at the tiny little human in her grip... pondering what to do with him. She could easily eat him, however she hesitates!! Why, the little person begins to wonder!"

" 'Aeeeoooommmm'.... just then, little fighter planes fly through the city buzzing around Cowzilla! 'KRRSSKK! Attention, monster!' one of the plane pilots says through his intercomm, 'Let the young man go nice and easy and give yourself up!' "

" 'Awww, but I dont want to!' Cowzilla pouts as she swats away some of those planes with her free hand!"

You notice Belle starting to eye the Empire State Building... and have a BAD feeling of what happens next!
'What's this?! Cowzilla is actually climbing up the Empire State Building?!!'

You start to look down at the ground... as it starts to disappear from your sight!! Youre not normally terrified of heights, but you know that a 1200 foot fall can kill you!! And what they say about you passing out before the hit the ground... IS NOT TRUE! You see it all the way down!!!!

You try to reason with her, "Uh...Belle?! Ok! Fun's over! Can we stop playing now?"

She just continues her little narroration, "Cowzilla ignores the tiny little human's pleas for mercy! She continues to climb up to the pointy top! More and more planes but around her as if to try and hurt her... none succeed!"

As she swats at the planes you start to get dizzy staring down below. You just hope to god she knows what she's doing!

BZZTT!! "OW!!!!" Belle screams as a plane collides into the hand with you in it, causing her to lose her grip on you!!

With nothing left to grab on to...
"Wha...wha...AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA...."
1521121212212212212.title: A 1200 foot fall will kill ya'll!

choices: She decides you’re her new lollipop
She uses you to scratch that itch
15211212122122122121.content: Her massive hand snatches you up before you fall too far. “Cowzilla saves her pet human then turns her attention to the bothersome planes...” her other hand lashes out, batting the planes out of the sky one by one. Eventually she is victorious and let’s out a triumphant below. “Victorious Cowzilla considers the best way to savior her victory over the inferior planes.” The way she grins at you makes you wonder if you would’ve been better off grabbing a plane.
15211212122122122121.title: Oh no! You've been saved!!

choices: The army comes to attack Cowzilla
152112121221221221211.content:
Belle/Cowzilla looks at you and thinks for a minute. Then, she sticks you in her mouth and starts sucking on you. You're up to your waist in her mouth, and you're covered in her salvia. Belle tries not to suck you all the way in, and treats you like a lollipop. Her big tongue is about the size of a two-story building and it tickles you as she sucks on your upper body.
Belle/Cowzilla spends 10 long minutes sucking on you, and pops you out of your mouth. Your hair is matted down with salvia, and your whole shirt is now stuck to your skin. You see that Belle/Cowzilla is still destorying the city...either by stomping smaller buildings, or crushing people with her giant hooves.
"Cowzilla now thinks that her human pet tastes great" said Belle. "in fact, Cowzilla wants to show her pet human the inside of her stomach...or, four stomachs, i should say"
152112121221221221211.title: Lollipop

1521121212212212212111.content:
Begging her not to eat you wont help. It seems you have no choice but to hope to God you wont be hurt...

Belle dangles you over her mouth as she narrorates, "Could this be it for our tiny little hero?! Is this the end of poor Shane?!....-ULP!!" The second she finishes her last sentence, Belle drops you on her tongue and closes her mouth!

However, she doesnt immediately swallow you... She doesnt even bother to chew you or at least swish you around! Your left stranded on her tongue that seems to go on for almost a mile between humongous shiny white teeth and a completely dark tunnel with a big uvula dangling from the ceiling!

Just then, you can see a taste-bud starting to rise over the tongue ground and start to change shape!

It slowly morphs into a figure... a woman's figure... with cow-ears, cow-legs and a tail... oh my god, this taste-bud changed into the shape of Belle!

This reddish Belle-like being smiled at you.. and hugged you TIGHT!!! You just couldnt enjoy this embrace, because it was soaked head-to-toe in saliva!

You just shrugged and started pushing 'her' off! Finally, you push her off and run as fast as you can toward the humongous teeth-walls...however ANOTHER taste-bud rises from the ground and morphs into Belle-like form in front of you!
