You quickly change direction... only bump into the uh..utters of ANOTHER Belle-bud!! You stick your head out of the chest and see it smiling down at you!

By this time, more and more Belle-buds have sprouted out of the tongue and surround you from all over! Each of them start marching toward you smiling while the one you bumped into has wrapped its arms around you!
1521121212212212212111.title: It does a body GOOD!!

choices: You meet people that Cowzilla has eaten so far
15211212122122122121111.content:
The Belle-buds are about one foot taller than you are, and they just keep on coming! Lukcily, the whole mouth isn't filling with Belle-buds. Each time a Belle-bud grabs you, it covers you in salvia and tastes you all over. You dart between the Belle-buds, heading for the back of Belle's gigantic tongue. You make it to the edge of her tongue and the opening of her throat. Her throat is bigger than a building and looks like a bottomless pit to you.
"Looks like the human pet only has two choices" narrates Belle. "One: to jump down Cowzilla's throat or stay in her mouth and see what the 'buds' has in store for him"
Well...two choices. You really don't want to jump to Cowzilla's stomach, but you don't really want to be molested by the Belle-buds either! You take a deep breath, and jumped down Cowzilla's throat, head first. You fall for what seems like forever.
You enter a large chamber and land in ankle-deep stomach acid. You take a look around. Somehow, you can see in Belle/Cowzilla's massive stomach...and boy, is it big! It's so big that it can hold an entire football staduim with some room left!
15211212122122122121111.title: Down to the stomach

choices: Both of you plot a means to escape...
152112121221221221211111.content:
CLLLIIIICCCCKKKK!!!(/i)
You hear the sound of a shotgun cock and feel it being pressed behind you!!

"Who are you??!!!" a disgruntled voice shouts behind you, "What are you doing here??!!!"
You try your best to remain calm as you slowly turn your head to whoever's threatening your life!

"Wha...what the?! Greg??!!!" ...you recognize this guy! Greg! ...SALLY'S FATHER!!

"..Huh?! How do you know my name?!!" he shakes his gun a little as he asked you.
"Dont you recognize me? Im Shane! Your daughter's boyfriend!!"

He gets a good look at you... then drops his gun, "..Shane?! Youre... oh my god!! Im so sorry!!"

Damn... how did Greg wind up inside Belle too?! Does Sally know?
"Shane, listen carefully!" he warns you, "How did you wind up here?!!"

"Uh... I got swallowed by a plush cow and then some weird cow-chick!" you answer.
Greg grits his teeth after hearing that, "Dammit!! She's gotten others?!!"

"W w wait! What do you mean 'others'?!" you ask "What do you know about all this?!"
Greg sighed, "...This toy... is cursed. I dont know how, but it's possessed by an evil animal spirit feeding off the life-source of our dreams! The moment I made this toy... it came to life and just swallowed me!"

"Oh crap!" is all you could say before, "How do we stop it?!"
"I dont know.." Greg answered, "If I knew that, Id have allready done it! But now..."
152112121221221221211111.title: Meet the Parent!

1521121212212212212111112.content:
“Ah! Are you both really so eager to leave? I’m hurt, I work hard to provide a good home for you and this is how you repay me, with treasonous thoughts? Hmph!!” you glance about and realize acid is coming out of the walls. “It seems I’m going to have to teach you boys a lesson!” as you watch, horrified, the acid rises to knee deep then stops. For a moment all is tranquil and you only feel a mild pain. Then the liquid begins to swirl menacingly before you.

“Shane, run!” Greg says and hefts his gun just as the acid shots up in a massive spray that slowly takes the form of Bell.

She places a hand on her hip and wags an admonishing finger at the both of you. “Naughty boys, trying to leave poor little me!” the acid spirit grins “I’m going to kill you with kindness for that.” You note that the figure stands almost twice as tall as either of you, as it reaches forward.

“Run boy!!” Greg yells and fires. The crack of the gun get’s your legs moving and you start to run. A strangled cry from behind makes you turn around to find Greg being hugged to the bosom of the beast.

“I will love you and squeeze you…” she begins as Greg’s body smokes from contact with the acid. As you watch you see his clothes dissolve and he’s left bare before her. “Ohh bath time naughty boy!” she then opens wide sucks him into herself.

You watch through her clear form as Greg struggles in what looks like her belly. He gives off a soundless scream as the constant pain of the acid assaults him. But for some reason he doesn’t dissolve. Belle pats her belly. “Yummy! I’m going to keep him in there for a good long time.” The acid spirit then swings its gaze to you. “But I think he’ll need some company.” With that she strides towards you, legs positively devouring the distance.

You start running as fast as you can, head whipping about looking for escape.
1521121212212212212111112.title: Bovine Justice

15211212122122122121111121.content:
Luckily youre able to outrun her what with the excess weight inside her! Although you feel sorry for Greg, youre gonna have to worry about yourself right now!
"Aw c'mon! Slow down!!" the Belle-acid whines as it continues to chase you, "I promise it wont hurt!!"

As youre running, you find a door standing by itself in the middle of this 'field'... you dont know where it leads to, but you feel like taking the risk since it's either that or HER!

You turn the knob..
*CLICK!*
Damn! It's locked!!! Guess you'll never know what's behind it...

"...Shane? Shane!! Where are you? Are you in here?"

Wait a second!! That voice!! SALLY!!! Your girlfriend's voice is coming from behind that door!! Could THAT be the doorway out of Belle?!

"SALLY!!!!" you scream, "CAN YOU HEAR ME???!!! IM STUCK IN THE PLUSH COW!!!!"
15211212122122122121111121.title: Contact with the outside world!

choices: The door opens and you are saved
You are left in her clutches
152112121221221221211111211.content:
“What?!” her voice comes back and a wave of relief washes over you, “Shane I hear you but where are you?”

“In the toy, I’m in the plush toy! Look I know it’s crazy but please open its mouth and pull me out!!”

That’s when you feel a stinging sensation slide over your shoulders as a pair of clear liquid arms wrap around you, their hands dangling just below your neck. You gulp as the same stinging presence presses itself to your back. “You’ve been a naughty boy, Shane!” the belle-acid whispers into your ears before she painfully nibbles an earlobe. “Leading me on a chase like that.” You are lifted off the ground and turned to stare into her clear, mischievous face. “Oh the things I’m going to do you!” She teases.
152112121221221221211111211.title: So close….

1521121212212212212111112111.content:
As the acid form presses her body against you, your clothes start to melt off! Parts of your shirt quickly dissolve just by Belle's touch! You dont have much time left! You better hope Sally'll open Belle's mouth in time!

"How's about a kiss, stud?!" The Belle-acid grins at you and puckers her lips up to press them against your face!! You KNOW what kind of damage it could do to that face of yours!!
You lean against the door when all of a sudden, it swings open! "Wha....WWHHHHHHAAAA"

---

"...WWWHHHHHHHAAA! ..Huh?" Youre back in your room! At normal again too! Your girlfriend immediately greets you with a hug!
"Sh...Shane!! Are you ok?"

You breathe hard and tell her about what happened, "Y..Your father... we've gotta help him!!"
"M.. my dad?!!" she immediately lets you go, "What happened to him? Is he ok?!!!"
But before you could answer... the plush cow starts to shake!! It jumps up and down as it starts to shake around!! Every time it jumps, it changes a different color! From white... to red.. than blue... than green... then *BBOOOOOMMMMM!!!!*

The little toy bursts.... and what's left... is a big glowing ball. A glowing ball that morphs into the form of a woman... of cow-woman... a CERTAIN cow-woman!

She opens her eyes and stands up facing you and Sally! The first thing that comes out of her mouth is, "....HI!"
"What is THAT?!!" Sally asks.
"That's Belle," you tell her, "the THING that took your father!!"

Belle just crosses her arms, "Oh, is THAT how you greet a lady?! Geez, even after I let you suck my tits too!"

Sally's eyes widen after hearing what she just said, "You WHAT?!!! Did you actually....?!!"

Youre left speechless for a moment! What could you possibly say to her at this point?!!!
1521121212212212212111112111.title: Belle, Sally. Sally.... BELLE!!!!

15211212122122122121111121111.content:
You burst into tears, sobbing in shame as you tell your girlfriend how this evil cow forced you to do her sick bidding under threat of devouring. “I’m so sorry sweetie.” You sniffle, those years in drama class finally paying off. “If…if you want to leave me…I’ll understand. But first.” You stand up and square your shoulders. “First we have to rescue your father.” You smile on the inside as your girlfriend hugs you, having bought your act. It wasn’t a lie after all, it was just a dramatization of the truth.

Your tender reunion is interrupted by clapping. “Bravo! Bravo!” You turn to find Belle clapping at your performance, her lips quirked up in amusement. “Truly a talented actor!”

You are about to say something but your girlfriend beats you to it. “Listen hear you heifer, you’re going to give me back my father or so help me I’m cooking my sweetie here steak for the next week, got me!”

Bell pauses, eyebrows arched as she looks your girlfriend up and down. “She’s a feisty one.” She says to you. “I can respect that.” She walks up to the two of you and holds her hand in her chin, as she contemplates something. “Sally was it? I’ll make a deal with you. I’ll give you back your daddy, safe and whole, I’ll even grant you some of my power and all I ask is one, tinny, tiny, insignificant thing.”

The two of you look at each other wearily “What is it?”

Belle grins and points at you “Him. I want him, in my belly or just in my power at least two nights per week.” She laces her hands around your neck and hangs off you, looking like nothing more than a love struck girl. This proves she’s at least as good an actor as you. “I promise not to cause him any permanent injury or harm, and he’ll be returned as good as new to you each morning. What do you say.”

You blink as you see your girlfriend considering it. “Uh…sweetie?”

Sally opens her mouth and says.
15211212122122122121111121111.title: This might not end well

152112121221221221211111211111.content:
"Deal" said Sally.

"WHAT?!" you ask.

"It's the only way we can save my father" said Sally. "But I do you one better, Belle. I have to go with him if he's going in your belly"

Belle laughed. "Deal!"

Belle then spits out Sally's father, who is unharmed. Sally and her father hug each other and you are looking at Belle up and down. No longer is she a plush toy, but a real cow-person! She's more cow than human.


"Um...Belle?" you ask. "how can you not be a plush toy anymore?"


"I was placed under a curse a while back" said Belle. "I was once human that ticked off a witch. The witch turned me into a plush toy, and the witch told me that the curse will end when I have somebody in my belly. Now the curse is lifted...but I thought I was going to change back into a human, but I guess not. It doesn't matter,anyway...I'm used to being a cow"

"How long were you a cow?" asked Sally.

"1,200 years, give or take" said Belle.

"WHAT?!" you all shout.

"As a plush toy, I was immortal" said Belle. "now, I'm mortal again"
152112121221221221211111211111.title: Belle's Curse

1521121212212212212111112111111.content:
Belle looks all around the room all of you are in. "Ah.. finally! The outside world! Ive been away from it for FAR too long!!"
"So uh.. now that youre human again... sorta, what are you gonna do?" you ask her.

"You know, I am really glad you asked!" she smiled at both you AND Sally... then with a snap of her fingers, everthing's dark!

-------------

"SHANE!! WAKE UP!!!" the loud scream of your girlfriend jumpstarts you!

"What? Sally! What is it?" But right after you ask, you quickly get the idea that you aint in your bedroom anymore! It appears that youre laying on a strange white floor with creamy white stuff underneath you! The two of you are surrounded in big red round wet wheels with seeds as well as huge pieces of fragile green things everywhere! The ceiling looks just like the floor and is only a few feet above you!

"Um... where are we?" you ask.
"WHERE DO YOU THINK?!!" Sally yells!!! ...Red wheels=tomatoes, green things=lettuce, floor and ceiling=bread slices... SANDWICH!! You turn your head to see what's outside the sandwich. And all you see is a humongous cow-girl's head licking her lips!

"B..BELLE!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING??!!"

"What can I say?" Belle just smiles sweetly, "Bad habits die hard! Say... since Im mortal again, I wonder if I still have my magical stomach or my old human stomach back? Guess we'll just have to find out!!"

"But... Belle!" Sally shouts to her, "...We had a deal!!"
Belle just snickers, "Geez, youre even stupider than that witch! I aint letting ANYONE get in the way of my dream.... of permanently putting a stop to humankind's cruelty to cows!!"

"But...but... Dad!! Where is he?!!!"

Belle just raises her glass with a little parasol in it... Greg is tied and gagged to that little parasol!

"Greg!!" you scream at the guy tied to the umbrella.

"AHEM!! I perfer silence while I eat!" Belle says to you... RIGHT before she takes a bite out of her sandwich!!

*CRRRRUUUUNNNNCCCHHH!!!*

...Whew! She BARELY missed taking a bite out of your head... Uh oh! Here it comes again!

*CRRRRUUUUUNNNNCCCHHH!!!*

"SALLLY!!!!!" Belle's mouth closed on your girlfriend... only her legs were still sticking out! And the cowgirl does not seem reluctant to swallow!

"WAIT!!!" you scream, "Dont eat her!! Uh... please dont! I'll do anything you want! I swear! ANYTHING!!"

Belle just looks at her for a few seconds while Sally squirms around in the inside of her mouth!!

...Finally, the hungry cowgirl responds...
1521121212212212212111112111111.title: YOUR curse!

15211212122122122121111121111112.content:
Belle swallows the bit of the sandwich in her mouth...along with Sally!

"Oops" said Belle, who smiled and took another bite of the sandwich, and you find yourself in her mouth! You try to squirm out of her mouth, but she swallows before you can get too far. You fall down, down, down into the blackness of Belle's throat. You hope and pray that Belle still has her magical stomach as she called it.
You fall with a soft squishing sound in a large chamber. You don't know about a cow's anatomy very well...but you know a cow has a four-chambered stomach. So Belle's stomach is huge to you. Much to your relief, the stomach has no acid in it...seems like Belle does have her magical stomach. You look around the pinkish chamber, and see Sally in a corner of the stomach. Sally sees you and rushes to you. You two hug.
15211212122122122121111121111112.title: Still has that magical stomach

choices: "Yes, I do have a problem with that!”
152112122.content:
You lick your suddenly dry lips and stare down at what you’ve become. You decide it might be in your best interest to learn what else you’re going to have to do. “Um…what other duties will I have aside from milking?”

Belle purses her lips together. “Well you’ll have to do some cleaning, brushing and a few other tasks I have in mind.”

You nod, and look at the barn. “So I’ll be taking care of the barn?”

She smiles “Well that too, I actually meant me.” Seeing your surprised look she continues “Well I work hard and it’s long past time that I was pampered and you are the one who’s going to do it.” Her face starts to look less friendly “You don’t have a problem with that right, servant.” It’s obvious that she is not interested in hearing a negative answer.

So you say…
152112122.title: Just a few questions

1521121221.content:
You knew from the beginning that cow doll was more powerful than it looked! It came to life, it swallowed you, it forced you to milk its humanish form, and now it plans on making you take care of it! You know worse could happen if you disobey her..

You swallow hard and say, "Nope! Not a one!"

Belle begins to smile sweetly again and her attitude calms down.. a good sign! "Um... did I tell you to stop milking?"

You let out a loud sigh and put your mouth on her... uh... utter again and continue to suckle!
Her moans start to echo in your ears... they start to get annoying seeing as they get louder and louder making your eardrums feel like theyre about to burst!

"OooH....OHHHhhHh... Oh... OH! Oh ok that's enough!!!" Belle giggles, "I believe theyre empty enough for now! That's a good boy!"
You take your mouth off of her and breathe a sigh of relief... but by that time, only a few parts of you are still human! Youve grown long horns, your feet turned to hooves, and there's a ring in your snout! Youre practically a man-bull!

"So, long-horn..." Belle grins at you, "you ready for your NEXT task?"
"Allright... what is it?"

"Simple," she answers and brings her leg in front of her face, "I just need to give my hooves a manicure!" she hands you a nail-file.
You just look at her in disgust, "Uh... youre kidding, right?"

"Why of course Im kidding!" she smiles, "...Im ALSO still hungry!! ...And I still wouldnt consider it cannibalism at this point!"
1521121221.title: Good boy!

15211212211.content:
Right, she can still eat you, you forgot about that part for a moment. “Of course ma’am” You take the file and immediately begin to give her the manicure she wants. After a while she starts giving you instructions on what to do. As she does so her voice tends to crack like a whip whenever you screw up, and since this is your first time that happens a lot.

“No no NO! Not like that!” Your ears ring with her voice as she chews you out once more and you entertain a brief fantasy of gagging the cow. “And don’t even think about it.” Her voice snaps and you blink, how’d she know?

Eventually you manage to get your job done to her satisfaction and she allows her self a stratified smile “That will be adequate for now.” You stand up and arch your back. “Now I have another task in mind for you.”

You cringe and look at her smiling face “What is it?” you ask
15211212211.title: Like you had a choice

152112122111.content:
She points behind her, "See that barn? It needs a good paint-job! Im thinking pink! Your job is to paint the barn!"

You drop your jaw, "The WHOLE barn?!"

"The WHOLE barn!" she smiles as she mocks your shocked expression! "C'mon! Chop-chop!"

You wipe the sweat off your head, trying carefully not to get punctured by your own horns! "But... it's like 150 degrees here!!"

"Take your shirt off, big guy!" Belle says with a devious grin on her face. Great... not only do you have to paint an entire barn in extremely hot weather, you gotta do it without a shirt! Being as obedient as you are, you take your shirt off. Your chest seems to be mostly humanish but with a couple of brown spots with fur!

Nevertheless, you grab a paintbrush and get to work! As you stroke a coat of pink paint on a side of the barn wall, you can just sense Belle's eyes burning a hole into you..

You feel humiliated as you paint while Belle continues to sit in her chair and stares at you... You just feel like you could burst!
152112122111.title: ANYTHING to get out...

choices: You choose to keep your pants on
1521121221112.content:
You can not believe how humiliating this is. Between that and this unbearable heat you start to consider that maybe death is preferable. Still, the idea of being slowly digested is enough to keep you from throwing down your tools in disgust.

You’re about to move the ladder when you are hit with a steady stream of cold water. “ACK! What the!!?” you try and stop the stream with your hands with little effect, and soon you are completely drenched. You look up and glare at Belle who is holding a hose, as her hungry eyes rove over your soaked form.

“There your cool now right?” she gives of a wolf whistle and you turn your back on her. “SHAKE IT Baby!!” she calls and you grumble darkly as you snatch up the paint can to continue working.

You’re just about to start on the other side of the barn when she tells you to stop. “Now, since we don’t want you to catch a cold, shouldn’t you get out of those wet pants?” The way she licks her lips tells you that she has an ulterior motive for wanting your pants off.
1521121221112.title: Humiliation

1522.content:
Morning sunlight bounces off your face making you squint. Growling you turn over, you did not need to be woken up on the first day of your holidays. Since pretty much every single one of your friends were going away for a holiday you needed to burn as much time as possible so not to be bored.

Still grouchy about having to get up so early… you peep at your clock; 2.00pm. Bah, still too early. You still had a hang over from last night. You snuggle up to your plush cow, you named her; Bessie, just because it sounded fun when you won it at the fair. The guy who handed it you seemed a bit weird, but nothing ever came of it so why ponder on him? Right now you were enjoying Bessie’s soft belly and chest just above her udders.

You could just stay like this forever. Even your hangover seemed to ease in her embrace. Sally better watch out, she might have competition thanks to Bessie. “Aww thanks.” Your eyes fling open. Where’d that come from? You spin round checking your room. Nobody there, did you just imagine a voice? That’s the first sign of insanity. You shrug and go back to snuggling Bessie.

“Oh don’t be scared. I wouldn’t hurt you.” You promptly fall out of the bed at this comment. “Who’s there?” You say to the seemingly empty room. You simply standing in your boxers mustn’t look too threatening because in reply; “Hehehe, calm down. Look at your bed.” Slowly turning round you had not prepared yourself for what you saw. Sitting there –remarkably cutely- was Bessie. Things were different about her. No longer did she have a mouth less muzzle, but a grinning muzzle.

“I… you… but… *sigh* …ok… What the hell.” She giggled into her hoofs which now were separated into fingers. “Come sit down silly.” Since you didn’t really knew what to do at this point. You did, but right at the very end away from the now living plushy.

“Hey, come here, I won’t bite. Hard, I got no real teeth.” she said while showing her teeth which were also plush.

Go closer or stay here? Decisions decisions.
1522.title: Is her moo worse than her bite?

choices: Bessie likes you at your current size
15221.content:
You go closer to Bessie. You're utterly convinced that this is just a side-effect of your hangover. There's no way that a toy cow can talk! You sit on the bed besides Bessie, who starts to cuddle with you. Her big fat belly rubs against your belly.

"Your hangover has nothing to do with me" said Bessie as she snuggles you. "I've been alive since you got me at the fair!"


The fair had been one month ago. You went to the fair with your girlfriend Sally. At the fair, you saw some pretty amazing sights; You saw the fattest woman in the world (she weighed 1,400 tons!), you saw the only naga in North America, Carmen; you also saw one or two 'furries' at the fair. A furry is an animal that has human traits; they can talk, walk on two legs, etc. A furry varies in size just like humans; some furries are only 4 feet tall, while the tallest furry was reported to be 20 feet tall! You and Sally went to a booth at the fair to knock over a stack of bottles for a prize. All the prizes were plush toys; Bessie was the second-biggest plush toy there...the biggest plush toy at that booth had been a huge Kangaroo with a baby kangaroo in its pouch. There were other plush animals too, but Bessie caught your eye. You tried to give Sally your prize, but she insisted that you keep Bessie since you won her. You just shrugged and decided to keep Bessie. You like to cuddle up to her nice soft belly.


"You know what?" asked Bessie, looking at you in the eyes. "I'm hungry"

"Hungry?" you ask. How can a toy be hungry? "for what?"

In answer, Bessie licks your face. "You!"
15221.title: Beware of the man-eating cow!

153.content:
You look at the catgirl plushie that your girlfriend gave to you. It's finely detailed and looks almost like a miniture human made out of plush. It's got a skirt and shirt sewn onto it, and has cat ears and tail.
Your not sure why your girlfriend would give you something like this, but you promise her that you'll keep it.
153.title: It's so cute!

1531.content: You set it on your a dresser in your room and fall asleep on the bed. When you wake up, you notice your plushie isn't on the dresser anymore. You try searching for it, but it's not anywhere in your room. You hear something coming from your kitchen, and rush to see what it is. You walk inside and notice someone bent over in your refrigerator. Normally, you'd be angry and start yelling. But the culprit doesn't seem right. Mostly because of the large tail protruding out from over a small skirt.
1531.title: Frigd-o-raider.

15311.content:
YOUR PLUSH TOY HAS COME ALIVE??? You'd normally get shocked at the thought...but it's SO cute!

As you step toward her she then turns her head and notices you! "ME-OW"?

You slowly step toward her, "Here kitty kitty kitty.." but when you try and grab her, she scratches you and runs!

"OW! That little..." but now you start to feel a little strange... you start to get dizzy. And that's when you notice...YOURE SHRINKING! You now shrink to less than half the size of the Cat-girl!

"Wha...what happened to me?...Uh.."

"ME....OW!!" She stares at you and starts approaching you! You get worried about what she's gonna do with you! You slowly step back while she steps forward!

"Um...n...nice kitty....GOOD kitty" but then BAM!!! She pounces on top of you and pins you down!

She starts to lick your face... it kinda tickles, but you dont laugh...because youre not sure whether she likes you... OR LIKES THE WAY YOU TASTE!!
15311.title: Good ol' Cat & Mouse!

choices: Of course you don't believe her!
153111.content:
"Please don't eat me!!" you yell to the cat. "I'll taste horrible!"

"Let me be the judge of that" saids the cat! This cat can talk?! But it's just a toy! But then, you don't care if it's just a toy.

"Yes, I can talk" said the cat. "my name is Minx and I'm hungry!"

"Well, don't eat me!" you yell. "I'm to young to die! I want to have kids with Sally...I want her to ride me like a stallion!"

"Too much infomation" giggled Minx.

"Why do you want to eat me?!" you ask. "why not eat something else?"

"Because I like the way you taste" said Minx. "and you're smaller than me. And the law of the jungle is that big eats little. But, don't worry...you won't get hurt"
153111.title: Minx

1531111.content:
Well...to be honest... you are a LITTLE curious about how it'd feel to be eaten alive...and she DID say you wouldnt get hurt!

"Um...ok... but... wouldnt I get digested or something?" you ask Minx.

She shakes her head, "Of course not! My stomach is only meant for storing food...not digesting it! Im not even real! Well...I AM but...well you know what I mean!"

You look at her strangely..."Well....ok! Make it quick!" you close your eyes...and wait.

"Aw...no screaming in absolute horror?" Minx says disappointed, "...oh well! Just makes my job easier!"

She grabs you, picks you up, and tosses you into her mouth. Her tongue kinda tickles you a bit as you start to slide head-first down her throat.

Her mouth then closes as she finally swallows you in one huge gulp!

After a bit of sliding... you finally land in the stomach... it's not a reddish organic stomach with stomach acid... it's actually a fuzzy soft fabric-filled room!

"Whoa... COOL!" you think to yourself.... but then you look around... and you notice some skeletons... HUMAN SKELETONS!!!

"What the hell?! But I thought... OH DAMN!!" you notice one certain skeleton with a pair of dark-blue sunglasses! You know whose sunglasses those are...

"TOM!!!!!!" Your old roomate Tom Yelnats! You kinda suspected something when youre roomate suddenly disappeared a couple of weeks ago without telling you!

"Um...MINX!! I WANT OUT!!!" You scream out loud!

But she just licks her lips and giggles, "Heheh...idiot!"

You start punching the fuzzy walls over and over... but no good!

Oh damn... she was right... you wouldnt get hurt in her stomach... but you'd probably starve to death or pass out from the heat in the room!!!

You continue to fight, punching and screaming, but it doesnt seem to affect Minx a bit... in fact an hour later, she forgets you even existed!!!

You've been tricked! Youre trapped and you cant get out!

All I can say for you now is:

WELCOME TO YOUR NEW HOME! AND YOUR FINAL RESTING PLACE!
1531111.title: Your new home... and final resting place!

choices: Try to break free of her!
Flirt with her! Maybe she might like you....
1531112.content:
PLEASE! She's a cat! A cat LOVES to hurt its prey! A LOT! Besides, you remember having a nightmare about a dragon plush toy that could read your mind named Nithog eating you and turning out to be your mother!! (Oh dear, did I just give away a story-line?)

"Um...Minx...you ARE going to hurt me arent you?" you ask worried.

She shakes her head, "No! NO! No no no no NO!.... well yeah!" she smiles as you and pulls out her claws! "Now which part of you has the most flavor?"

You hope to God Minx doesnt use those claws to chop off certain parts!...and hope she didnt hear you think that!

She thinks to herself, "Hmmm...your chest looks kinda meaty..." You want to try and break free of her, but since she's pinning you down pretty hard, you cant move...
1531112.title: At the mercy of your preditor...

choices: you come up with an idea
15311122.content:
"Did I ever say that I liked cat-girls?" you ask, trying to take Minx's mind off of eating you.


"And how many cat-girls have you met?" asked Minx slyly.

"Um..." you say. "your eyes are like emeralds!"

Which is true. Minx's eyes are green and are glowing slightly.

"Why thank you" said Minx.

"And..and..." you stammer. "what lovely teeth you have"

IDIOT!! Why did you say that?! Little Red Riding Hood used that line and ended up in a wolf's stomach!

"I mean sparkling white teeth!" you add. "do you use toothpaste?"

Minx is giggling now.

"You're silly" said Minx. "that's what I love about you humans..trying to flirt with me because you don't wanna get eaten..the things you guys say are silly!"

Flirting with her isn't going to work! Maybe you should just accept your fate? Minx said that she wouldn't hurt you. But you don't really trust her, because she pulled out her claws!
15311122.title: Flirting with your predator

153111221.content:
You sigh some in defeat. It's all over. You're dead.

"Fine, just get it over with then. What do you care right?" You say angrily. Minx stops or a second, waiting for you to start begging or pleading again.

Yopu just lie there.

"Guess I overdid it." She says sadly. You start to say something, but don't get the chance as she bites into your leg. Oddly enough, it feels.....

it feels....


WONDERFUL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You never felt anything liek this before. It is like her chewing on you is more of a deep massage. No, more than tht. it seems to even go to your soul.

But.. how is this possible?

She looks at you as you start to enjoy your fate, managing a smile. "Welll... I lied about hurting you. I wanted you to struggle and wriggle all the way. It makes me feel wonderful all over. Of course, thagt didn't mean you didn't have to hate it. I like wriggling in pleasue just as much."

You look to her. "Why didn't you say so in the first place? Why didn't you tell me how good this would feel?" You say, still angry.

"You never asked. Oh wait... yeah you did. Never mind."

Groaning and lyng back, she continues her feast. You notice two things as she eats. One is that there is no blood. The other is that the more of you is eaten, the more wonderful it feels. Soon, she has eaten one of yoru legs, an half of the other is mising as well.

"Ahhhh.... nice and juicy. Though you could use a little cajun pices." She gigglwes some. "Now, can you please squirm about? it makes the meat taste better!"

You sigh some, bth in pleasure and in annoyance.
153111221.title: Chewed and torn apart.... and loving it!

choices: What's she gonna do with you?
What's she gonna do with you?
1531112211.content:
...Aw what the hell? You might as well play along!

You start moving around pretending to struggle to break free, "No... no stop. Please. I dont wanna die. noooooo..."

Minx giggles as she continues her feast a la you! So far, she has eaten you up to your chestline! She really likes the way you taste and you like the way it feels!

You continue to play along,"No...NOOO...YES! uh I mean.. NO!"

She pulls apart your arms like chicken wings and starts chewing on them! Luckily, there is NO pain whatsoever... just an AWESOME feeling!

Finally, Minx eats all the way up to your throat! Youre now nothing but a head with barely a neck!

She stops eating and burps a little, "urp! ...heheh, excuse me!" She blushes.

"No prob!" you smile at her, "Now uh... how's about finishing me off?"

But she just shakes her head! "Nah! That's about enough for me!"

"WHAT?!!" your head jumps! She just shrugs, "Devouring your WHOLE body will cause me to puke you back out in your complete form! I do NOT like that feeling! Besides..." she licks her fingers/paws... "That was the best meal I had in a LONG time! I am NOT giving it up so easily!"

NOT what you wanted to hear!! "W W W WHAT??!!" your head jumps up and down, "BUT....what about ME?! I cant live like this!!! Im just a little disembodied head now!!"

Just then, she picks you up and brings you to her face... she smiles wickedly revealing a pair of sharp fangs, "Correction: Youre MY little disembodied head now!!"

Your only thought, despite the fact Minx can hear it, is "...oh hell!"
1531112211.title: Of course there was a friggin catch!

choices: Run like the little mouse that you are!
153111222.content:
Minx uses one of those claws to gently cut your chest... and licks the blood that comes out! Oh dear! It looks like she'll tear you apart and eat you piece by piece!!!

You start to think....And you get an idea! Luckily...for some odd reason... you have a ball of yarn in your pocket! You carefully use whats left of your unpinned arm to pull it out of your pocket!

"Hey Minx...." you say and you bring the ball of yarn to her face! Her eyes are locked on to it!

All she says is, "Uhhhhhhh.....me...ow?"

Then you yell, "FETCH!" and toss it! She jumps off you and tries to attack the ball of yarn! You start running like hell....but unfortunately, you dont get far!

You notice a whole group of multi-colored cat-girls all staring at you slowly approaching you! You think to yourself, "I KNEW IT! I KNEW my roomate had a drawer full of those things!!!"

They start to slowly step toward you as you slowly step back.... what should you do NOW?
153111222.title: Good idea... but youre still doomed!

choices: Minnie tries to eat you (or Tom)
1531112222.content:
You run away from the army of cat-girls you see like a little mouse that you are. The cat-girls chase after you, but you're too quick for them. As you approach a mouse hole, you see that your roommate has also shrunk and also running to the hole. You both enter the hole and pant.
"What happened to you?" you ask.
"The same thing that happened to you" saids your roommate, Tom Yelnats.
"Come out, come out" sang Minx's voice in a sing-song voice. The cat-girls try to get you two, but they can't get a hold of you.
"What now?" you ask.
"I suggest you get outta my hole" said a female voice directly behind you. You whirl around and see a plush toy mouse that's about your size.
"Hey, I've missed you!" yells Tom.
"Well, you kept on getting those cats" said the mouse. "what would've you done?!"
"What's your name?" you ask.
"Minnie" said the mouse, pointing to her tag. On it, it saids the name "Minnie". But she doesn't look like Minnie Mouse.
1531112222.title: Meet Minnie

15311122222.content:
The three of you hide inside that hole for hours while the cat-girls try to pull you out! Hours pass... and stomachs growl...

"Aww...Im STARVED!" Minnie says with a groan...

"Me to...." Tom says with a groan...

You just smile!, "HA HA! Lucky for me I ate that Six-dollar burger RIGHT before going to bed!"

Minnie and Tom then look at you with angry looks on their face!

"That does it!" Minnie jumps on you and starts licking your face.."MMMMMM!! NOW I see why these cat-girls want a piece of you so much!" You then a shocked look on your face!

"Umm....Minnie! What are you doing?"

"Sorry...desperate times call for desperate measures." She then opens her mouth wide about to bite your head off...but then...

"NO! DONT EAT MY BEST FRIEND!" Tom pushes her off you! "Whew... thanks Tom!" But then he says, "IM gonna eat him!"

WHHAATT??? You try running from them.... but then you get snagged by a cat-girl's hand/paw! Minx's!! She looks down at you and licks her lips...

"Found you little guy!" She starts to open her mouth, but then the other cat-girls argue with her!

"HEY! I want to eat him!"

"NO! ME!"

"C'mon! I didnt get to eat anything all day!"

"Can I take a bite outta him?"
15311122222.title: You must REALLY taste good!

153111222221.content:
"I saw him first!" yelled Minx.

"I want to eat him" says another cat-girl.

"Well, that's too damn bad!"

The cat-girls start to fight over you, letting you return to the hole where Minnie pounces on you. Tom is right there fighting her. You are totally clueless as to why Tom would want to eat you. Then, you notice that Tom has cat ears and tail. WHAT THE HELL?!!

Tom and Minnie continue to fight over you, as does the army of cat-girls outside the hole. You scream as Minx almost grabs you again, but you ran deeper into the hole. You rush past Minnie and Tom and head deeper into the mouse hole. The mouse hole turns out to be a labyrinth that double-backs on itself several times.
It takes a hour to cross the labyrinth, and when you do you find another opening leading into a room. You peek out of the mouse hole. The coast is clear. You breathe a sigh of relief, when someone grabs you from behind!
153111222221.title: Through the Labyrinth

1531112222211.content:
"YIPE!!!" you scream as someone grabs you! When you turn your head... it's your roomate Tom! You still continue to notice his cat-ears and tail!

"Hiya pal!" He smiles at you.

"Tom?...uh, wheres Minnie?"

"I dont know... I cant find her anywhere....*COUGH*!" he coughs up Minnie's nametag....oh hell...

Normally you dont beg your roomate for ANYTHING but...

"PLEASE DONT EAT ME PLEASE DONT EAT ME PLEASE DONT EAT ME PLEASE DONT EAT ME PLEASE DONT EAT ME!!!!!"

He just laughs, "Relax! Im not gonna eat ya! However, I do know that YOU know my little....secret.."

"What? That youre part-cat?"

"Yep!" you says with an evil grin! "And of course I cant let you walk away knowing that secret!"

"What? Why not?" you ask him.

He thinks for a while, "Because...uh....ummm....well just because! And therefore, you must die!" he tells you.

"WHAT???!! WHY???" you yell in terror!

He thinks for a while AGAIN, "Umm....uh.... oh... it's....well.... AW THAT'S IT!" He picks you up and tosses you across the labyrinth!

"YYYAAAAAHHHHHH!! OW!" You land face down on the ground.... when you get up... you notice the cat-girls are back! They all got little bibs on and are carrying forks and knives!

"Umm...hey ladies..." you say trying to remain calm while deep down you are as terrified as hell!!!!!!!
1531112222211.title: The cat's out of the bag

choices: Jibab explains why everyone wants to eat you
You realize this is all a dream...
15311122222111.content:
You keep on running from the cat-girls, and Tom. You ran to the opposite wall where there's another mouse hole. Minx swipes at you, but misses! The inside of this mouse hole looks safe enough. You are getting tired from all this running.
"Hey, Pal" said a voice from behind you.
You whirl around and see a normal person like you! The person has red hair with a gray streak in the middle.
"Who are you?" you ask.
"Call me Jibab" said the man.
"What are you doing here?" you ask.
"Looking for someone to eat" said Jibab. You then noticed that Jibab has got cat ears!
"What is with everyone trying to eat me?!" you ask.
"Hehehehe...I'll never tell!" said Jibab. "and who says I want to eat you? I'm a veggie eater"
15311122222111.title: Jibab

choices: Find a shortcut out of the house!
153111222221111.content:
"Um...I'll buy you a V8 if you tell me", you tell him.

"A V8??!! COOL!!" Jibab says excitedly!

"So Jibjab..."

"Thats JIBAB!"

"Thats what I said!"

"No it's wasnt!"

"Well thats your opinion.... anyway, why is everyone trying to eat me?" you ask it.

He tells you: "A couple of hours ago, a female master of the dark-arts who happens to love cats dreamt of living in a world full of cat-people. So she casted a spell on anything cat-person like to come alive... and eat out the human population! Your roomate made a deal with the evil woman, and chose to become a cat-man himself!"

....o....k. THIS is getting weird! But since it doesnt really seem far'fetched since there ARE cat-girls and a cat-guy hunting you down!

You bring up the courage to ask, "Umm...tell me, Jub Jub: Who is this... master of the dark-arts?"

He smiles, "Her name is Sally Felinus!"

SALLY FELINUS???!!! YOUR GIRLFRIEND??!!!

He continues, "Yes...and one day this whole planet will be the perfect utopia for cat-people to live in... as soon as we get rid of all the human trash!"

It seems quite obvious... you have to confront your girlfriend and talk to her....but um, how are you gonna get past all those cat-girls?!
153111222221111.title: Your girlfriend's TRUE colors!

choices: Try out this being eaten stuff. A lot.
1531112222212.content:
Minnie grabs you from behind, chuickling and holding you tight. "Gotcha! I could eat you all up right now! Except..."

You shiver. "Except... what?"

"Except..." She turns you around, showing off a MASSIVE belly. "I just ate."

You start to cry. Your besat friend, Tom, has been eaten. You look at her belly, at what remains of yhour friend, and you remember he was going to eat you.

EVERYONE wants to eat you.

But why?

"Because you have been cursed." Minnie says, reading your mind. She sits down, straddling her belly bulge. "See, you were given a special cat plush right?"

You nod.

"One that wanted to eat you for her meal right?"

Again a nod.

"Well, that initiated it. Until thatparticular plush catches you, eats you, and reforms, you, EVERYONE and EVERYTHING will find you delicious. Especially us plushies. If I wasn't so full, I'd be slapping you into a roll with some chesse and yum yum yum!"

You cringe. Greta, the only way to stop this is to be eaten. So you are dead no matter what now.

Wait a minute... She said reform...

"Um... Minnie... this eating and reformning stuff... does it hurt?" Yo uask, curious.

"Hell no! I been eaten 2376 times! Each time felt better than the last. I essit is because I am a plush of sorts though. Still...."

You suddenly start to ponder what to do...
1531112222212.title: Full mouse.

choices: It's a plushie (you get to pick the animal)
15311122222121.content:
So, the only way to stop everything and everyone from eating you, is to be eaten by Minx.

"You're catching on" said Minnie who giggles. "like I said, if I wasn't soo full, you would be in my belly by now!"

"I was..." you start.

"You were afraid because you thought you would be dead" said Minnie, grinning at you. "well, don't be afraid anymore! You'll live through this. Trust me"

"What about Tom?" you ask, patting Minnie on her massive belly.

"Oh, he'll reform too" said Minnie. "Find a plushie to eat you. It shouldn't be that hard!"

Smiling, you wave goodbye to Minnie. Minnie waves back. Minnie can't even chase you thanks to her big belly.

The room you've just entered is another bedroom. The bedroom of a little girl, it looks like.

Suddenly, you get grabbed from behind again.
15311122222121.title: Being eaten isn't so bad...

choices: Oppurtunity:Convince her to eat YOU instead!
153111222221211.content:
"AAHH!!" you jump! When you turn your head, you see a blue plush hippo staring down at you!...with a worried look on his face!

"P..p...p..please! Ya gotta help me!" he tells you terrified!

"Uh...who are you?" you ask.

"I...Im Georgie!" he tells you while shivering, "P...please help! Th..there's a crazy ninja-girl doll after me! S...She gonna eat me!"

You say to Georgie, "So? Wont you reform back after youre eaten?"

He grips you tighter and shouts, "NOT IF YOURE DICED INTO PIECES FIRST!!!! If I get sliced up first, I wont live to be reformed afterwards!"

You sigh, "Oh allright uh...Georgie! Let's go!" The two of you explore this girl's room... Unfortunately the two of you dont get far...

"I HAVE FOUND YOU AT LAST, GEORGIE-SAN!"

"What the hell?" you turn around... nothing... but when you turn back around... SHE's about a few inches away from your face! She quickly does a back-flip in the air sending a flying a few away before safely landing on her feet!

Some odd ninja-girl... with black hair, blue eyes, wearing a black Eastern short-skirt dress with net-stockings, and a black garb covering her mouth!

Georgie hides behind you shaking, "T..T..t...THAT'S HER!!"

She bows to you, "A thousand tidings of honor to you for finding my prey! The rare 'Cute-Blue Georgie the Hippo' is said to be quite a delicacy if the blubber is sliced and cooked thoroughly!"

You immediately think to yourself, "What the hell is going on?!"

"Just some matters involving a hunter and the hunted that do you concern you, westerner!" the Ninja answers you! So... she can read your mind too!

"That is correct, westerner! It takes years of intense training for a true ninja to master the art of mind reading!"

Georgie corrects her, "Um... actually... you dont need training! I can read this guy's mind too!"

She just glares at him, "It is not smart for the cow to correct the butcher!" Georgie grabs you tight and shivers heavily at the response!

You feel kinda sorry for the hippo... You step toward her in his defense and say, "Look, this is all just one big misunderstanding... so why dont we just-"

Before you could finish, she pulls out her katana and dashes at one of the legs of a bed... she slashes at it and quickly rushes back to you! In a few seconds... you see the leg split in half causing the bed to tip over!!

Your jaw drops... her sword is REAL??!!!

"That is right, stranger!" she points the blade at your throat! "I will not ask you again, 'otoko-hakujin'('white boy'!)!!! Will you hand over the hippo? Or shall I take him... THROUGH FORCE?!"
153111222221211.title: Makes no sense...or PERFECT sense?

1531112222212112.content:
"If you want to eat someone, eat me" you say. Georgie the Hippo's ears perk up and the ninja-girl's jaws drop. It seems you've shocked the two plushies!

"You actually WANT to be eaten, human-san?" asked the ninja.

"The name is Sean" you say. "and yes, I want to be eaten...but not DICED!!"

"Humans like you always don't want to be eaten" said the ninja. "but you want to be eaten. Hmmmm.....it sounds tempting"

"I saw him first!" said Georgie. "I should get to eat him!"

"Be quiet, you" said the ninja to Georgie coldly. Georgie was quiet while the ninja was thinking.

"Okay...I'll eat you and leave the hippo alone" said the ninja.

"Cool" you say. "what's your name?"

"My name is Eboshi" said the ninja.
1531112222212112.title: Eboshi, the ninja girl

15311122222121121.content:
"Nice to meet you Eboshi!" you smile.

She just stares into your soul, "You will address me as LADY Eboshi!" You jump back! "uh... ok... Lady Eboshi!"

She pulls out a smoke-bomb and tosses it on the ground! Your vision is clouded by all the smoke.... but finally when it clears... you find yourself.. all alone... in a dark, dusty attic... it's kinda cramped... and VERY dusty!

You look around checking for a way out... then when you turn back, SHE is about a few inches away from your way again!

She does her little back-flip away from you AGAIN!

"Welcome to my private domain, Sean-san," Eboshi tells you, "Like a web-spinning spider, I perfer introducing my prey to my home... before introducing them to THEIR new home!"

"Eb...uh...Lady Eboshi!" you say, "Youre a little..uh... small... just uh... how am I gonna... you know... fit?"

"I am ever so glad you asked..." the ninja-girl tells you... and pulls out her blade, "It has been so long since I have dined on diced human... I hope it is still as succulent as I remember!"

...Figures!

"W w w wait, Lady Eboshi!!!!" you plead, "I said I didnt want to be diced!!!"

Eboshi just laughs a little and slowly steps toward you, "Heheh... Food has very few civil liberties! A mouse cant ask a hawk to be eaten without being skinned first! You do not get a say in the matter... PREY!!"

Great... just GREAT! At this rate... you were better off with Minx! As she slowly approaches, you look around hoping to find a way out!

She just stares at you with a wicked shine in her eye, "Even if you find one, you will not get far from me! You have made your choice to be my prey... I will catch my prey no matter WHERE it runs or hides!"

...is that a risk youre willing to take?
15311122222121121.title: Snacks have very few rights...

153111222221211212.content:
No... youre tired of running. No matter where you go, youre gonna find more and more predators wanting to eat you... You cant keep running forever!

You close your eyes and stand your ground, "...Make it quick!"
Eboshi just stares at you strangely, "I sense no fear within you..." but still raises her blade in the air.... and strikes!!!

You brace yourself!!....but you dont feel a thing! No blade piercing your flesh or anything! When you open your eyes... you see her sword stop RIGHT between your eyes!

She smiles, "You are brave, human! Standing your ground to a hungering predatoring wanting to maul you before devouring you! You have impressed me!"

You smile in relief, "..So you gonna let me go?"
"No, I'll still eat you."
Your smile drops... but then she says, "...However, I am feeling rather generous. Perhaps, just this once, I could try and simply swallow my prey without chewing."

Normally you would STILL be scared of being eaten... but ever since Minnie gave you the good news, youre a little curious about what will happen you..

"Curious, eh?" Eboshi smiles as she removes the black garb covering her mouth and opens wide... just then... strong gusts of wind come bursting through the attic! These gusts of wind... blow into the direction of Eboshi's mouth!! You start to lose your balance as the wind starts sucking you up!!

The wind quickly picks you off the ground and flies you toward the ninja-girls mouth!! ...Your legs slide right down her throat!! Then your chest....then your arms... and finally your head gets sucked down her throat!!

You get sucked down a strange small tube that you BARELY fit in!! As you slide deeper and deeper... the tube gets bigger and bigger... It seems that it goes for miles... and for some strange reason, the ride is making you drowsy.... you start to drift off... and finally... you black out...
153111222221211212.title: Enjoy the ride!

choices: You and Minnie return to your room
1531112222212112121.content:
The last thing you remember is entering Lady Eboshi's mouth and going down her throat. You don't actually remember entering her stomach, but you must have. You open your eyes to see Lady Eboshi smiling down at you. Her face is just an inch from your face, making you gasp when you open your eyes.
"Enjoy your trip?" asks Eboshi as she helps you up from the floor.
You're not sure if you did...it all happened so fast.

"I don't usually swallow my food whole" said Eboshi. "when I do, I usually suck them in like what I did to you. I bet you passed out, didn't you? Most people do thier first time. As you get used to being swallowed, you'll be able to remember what happens when you enter a stomach"

You look around. You two are in the little girl's room where you met Georgie and Eboshi earlier. Georgie is nowhere in sight, but Minnie is still by the mouse hole. Minnie's belly looks normal now. You wonder where Tom went after he re-formed.

"You know that mouse?" asked Eboshi.
"She's the one who told me I'll re-form if I got eaten" you say.
"Ah...that's why you were brave" said Eboshi.
Minnie comes over to you and Eboshi.
"So...how does he taste?" asks Minnie to Eboshi.
"Delicious" said Eboshi. "you'll enjoy eating him"
"I bet I will" said Minnie, smiling at you.
1531112222212112121.title: Meeting up with Minnie again

choices: The three of you continue socializing...
15311122222121121211.content:
The two of you head through the mouse-hole that leads back into your apartment. The minute you step out of that mouse-hole, someone rushes you and grabs your legs!

It's Georgie!

"THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!" he tells you over and over!

Minnie was suprised to see him, "Georgie? Is that you?"

Georgie turns his head, "...Minnie?" The two of the run to eachother and hug!

"You... know eachother?" you ask.

"Oh yeah," Minnie says, "He's an old boyfriend of mine! One that hasnt visited in a while! Why not?"

Georgie explains, "Um... I was a little busy dodging some crazy ninja! Speaking of which... Sean what happened?"

You tell him, "She uh... ate me."

"ALIVE?!" his jaw dropped, "Ive been trying to get that crazy girl to me eat alive for MONTHS now! How'd you do it?"

"AHEM?!" Minnie gets a little jealous, "I thought you said I was the only girl for you!!"

"Of course you are my dear," he tries to explain himself, "It's just that since I was being hunted down... Id rather go WITHOUT the dicing process!"
15311122222121121211.title: Ol' Flames

choices: you talk some more with the plushies
153111222221211212111.content:
"Who is this ninja-girl, anyway?" asks Minnie to you. "you better tell me, or I'll eat ya!"

"Is that supposed to be a treat?" you ask. "Lady Eboshi is a plushie of a ninja-girl. She was chasing Georgie in that apartment you found me in"

"And she wanted to dice my Georgie up?!" asked Minnie. "I'll show her!"

"Uhh...can we discuss this later?" you ask. "I want to know how's come all of you plushies are alive suddenly"

"What do you mean by 'suddenly'?" asked Georgie. "we've always been alive"

Uhh...right. And no human ever noticed?

"Quite a lot of humans have noticed" said Minnie. "some are close friends with thier plushies"

"How..?" you ask.

"We're not sure why we are alive" said Minnie. "some of us believe that a wizard made us alive"

"So...how's come..?" you start to ask.

"..we can read minds?" asked Georgie. "well..it's part of the magic that makes us able to move and talk"

"And.." you start.

"Look, we don't know all of the answers" said Minnie. "we're just alive, and that's all you need to know"

Suddenly, you are pounced from behind by Tom!

"Gotcha!" yells Tom.

"Get off!" you yell at Tom.

"He's already been swallowed" said Minnie. "so he's not so afraid of us anymore"

"Who swallowed him?" asked Tom. "was it you, Georgie?"

"It was Lady Eboshi" you say. "and you know Georgie?"

"We were from the same shop" said Georgie. "and Minnie came from a different shop"

"Uhh...could you unshrink me?" you ask, looking up at your huge bed.

"We can't" said Georgie. "we can only shrink people"

"Figures" you say, sighing.

"Hey, don't be like that" said Minnie. "after all, you got us as your friends"

Friends of mine don't usually eat me, though. This makes Minnie, Georgie and Tom giggle.
153111222221211212111.title: Don't forget Tom

choices: ...What is she planning to do with you?
1531112222212112121111.content:
While the four of you were chatting to eachother, you suddenly hear giant foot-steps!!

"It's another human! Let's hide!" Minnie shouts, and Georgie and Tom scatter. You on the other hand, stand your ground!

You turn your head... it's a woman... she looks FAMILIAR... but from where?

She bends down... and stares at you... with a pair of familiar jade-colored eyes!

"Hi Sean! Remember me?" she smiled...

You recognized that voice, "MINX?!"

She nods, "Check it out! Im a human now! Pretty cool, huh?"

She's in HUMAN form now? How is that possible?!

"A little help from the 'stranger with no tongue'! Eep.. just looking at the guy gave me the creeps! EWWW!! And he breathed with his mouth open too!" she shivers!

Your jaw drops, "Uh... can this guy change me back to normal size?"

Minx just shrugs, "I dunno... but I kinda like you this size!" She smiles WIDE!!!

In lightning speed, she quickly snatches you off the ground and grips you tight!

"Aww... such a CUTE widdle toy!!!" she starts toying with you.

"Aarrrggh...let...let me go!!!" you shout while struggling to break free.

She just shakes her head, "Nah... Im tired to being treated like a toy... it's time I have a little of my own!!!"
1531112222212112121111.title: With a few CHANGES!!

15311122222121121211112.content: what does she do with you?
15311122222121121211112.title: The Catgirl's Plan

1531112222212112121111222.content: Maybe she wants to try out some things with her new human body now that she's more than just a doll.
1531112222212112121111222.title: other

choices: Smother you between her massive boobs
Use you as a living dildo
15311122222121121211112221.content: how will she try out her new body on you?
15311122222121121211112221.title: No longer just a toy

choices: Force you to worship her beautiful feet
15311122222121121211112222.content: what else could she do with you?
15311122222121121211112222.title: more other

choices: Sit on you and proceed with some fart torture
Squeeze the life out of you with her bare hands
153111222221211212111122222.content: okay! this is the last one!
153111222221211212111122222.title: Still more other

choices: Demand her to tell you where you are!
Ask her politely where you are.
15311122222121122.content:
You take a deep breath and step up toward Eboshi... "So... how are we gonna do this?"

"Close your eyes, human-san!" she answers. Georgie immediately starts shaking his head, "NO MAN! Dont do it! It's a trick! She'll-"

The second Eboshi gives the big blue hippo the cold stare, Georgie immediately shuts up! "Uh...um... nice knowing ya, pal!"

"Now close your eyes please..."
You do as the ninja says and just close your eyes. You start to wonder what it'll be like to be eaten alive. Hopefully it wont be painful... maybe it'll be quick and it will just happen before you even know i-
*GLLLOOOOMMMMPPPPP!!!!!!*

Just then, you can feel a strong grip against your body coming down on you! The moment you open your eyes, the first thing you see a pinkish thing dangling over your head! Your face is pressed against a slimy tongue! Worse even, youre lifted up off the ground and down toward the direction of the throat!!

"WWWHHHHAAA!!!" You cant fight it! With a loud GULP youre sent down a long nearly endless tube! It twists and turns... and you think you can hear Far Eastern music play in the background...

The next thing you know, the tube ends and you fall out of a big blue sky onto some uncharted island... this island is covered in bamboo trees and cherry blossoms. Like youre stranded somewhere in Asia. Could THIS be the ninja-girl's stomach?! Are all the plushies stomachs like this?!

...All of a sudden, an arm wraps around your neck and you see a little kunai blade pointed to your throat! You slowly and very carefully turn your head to your captor... EBOSHI!!

"Welcome to your new home, Sean-san!"
15311122222121122.title: The Exotic Flavor!

153111222221211222.content:
"Umm....where are we?" you ask, looking around. The island is out in the middle of an ocean of blue water...the sun is shining down and there isn't a cloud in the sky. You look around confused...maybe all plushies stomachs were like this. Eboshi smiles and you suddenly noticed that Eboshi looks more human than plushie! What the hell?!


"We're on my island, Sean-san" said Eboshi. "This is my true form right here. I was cursed in this plush toy body by an evil wizard a long time ago. I don't know how to break the curse"

The island you're on is about 30 miles across in every direction. It's covered in bamboo trees and whatnot.

"That doesn't explain why this island is here inside your stomach" you say.

"Sean-san, you have much to learn" said Eboshi.
153111222221211222.title: Island in the sun

1531112222212112221.content:
Finally, she brings her little kunai knife away from your throat and lets go of you. You breathe a sigh of relief as you stare into the eyes of your new friend/host.

"Since you're going going to be my permanent guest here," Eboshi tells you, "you should at least know how I have become what I have become.
Because you have no other choice, you decide to listen to whatever she has to say...

"Long ago, I used to be a young pupil training to be a true-blooded ninja assassin of the Onimaru Clan. I was one of their top students.. NO ONE could ever get by me without me knowing! In only a year, I was assigned my very first mission as a full-fledged ninja!"
"....My mission was to assassinate a top general by the name of Zan-ki. However, Ive never accomplished it... as I was leaving my village, I bumped into a strange sad looking man that did not speak... the Wizard that cursed me!"

"Then what happened?" you asked her, wanting to know what came next...

Eboshi just shook her head, "That is a story I shall tell for another time. For now Sean-san, if youre going to live within me, you are to be suited to be!"

"Uh... what do you mean?" you ask.
And unfortunately, you get your answer: "For example, those clothes of yours are NOT dress-casual within my island. Please take them off!"

After hearind that, you immediately jump back and look at her strangely, "W w w wait! Take them off?! Now?! HERE?!"
"Did I not stutter?" Eboshi asks you, "If you will not remove your clothing..." you think you can almost make out a little grin under that garb of hers, "...I will remove them for you!"

Not wanting to piss off a woman that could kill you 3 times before you hit the ground, you step behind a bush and duck underneith...

You unbutton your shirt and drop in on the ground. Then you unzip your pants and slide them off. God, you've only been here for a few minutes and allready youve resorted to stripping down naked!!
Man, whatever is gonna happen better be worth it! Maybe youre just going to be fitted to be wearing exotic clothing like Eboshi... either that or she's really really really really REALLY lonely!!

"Um.. ok!" you shout back to her, "theyre off! So what do I have to wear instead?"
1531112222212112221.title: Make yourself at home!

choices: You like the sound of that
15311122222121122212.content:
"Who said you're wearing anything?" asked Eboshi,smiling like the Chessire Cat in the books of Lewis Carrol. When you hear that, your eyes go wide and you keep yourself behind that bush.

"I have to be naked?!" you ask.

"Yep" said Eboshi. "I like my men in the nude. However, you could do with some excerise. You're too flabby for me, Sean-san"


"I'm not that fat!" you yell.

"Compared to me, your fatter than a Sumo Wrestler" said Eboshi.

"I am not!" you yell. You're still hiding behind the bush, and Eboshi is walking towards you slowly.

"If you want to live with me, Sean-san, you have to exercise" said Eboshi.

"I refuse to exercise in the nude" you say.

Eboshi sighed. "alright....you don't have to exercise. I have a confession to make...I,uh....like fat men. I once dated a sumo wrestler......" All you can do is state blankly at the ninja-girl.

Eboshi looks you over, and you suddenly realize that the bush you were behind is now gone!

"What the--?!" you yell.

Eboshi just smiles. "Instead of exercising, I'm going to fatten you up some more"
15311122222121122212.title: Eboshi's confession

153111222221211222122.content:
Oh good lord... a chubby-chaser! Not that mind it very much, it's just... a little weird, even for you! Besides, it seems kindof insulting. You dont really consider yourself fat.. big maybe, not fat!

"Look uh... um..." you try to speak to Eboshi while covering your certain spot with one hand and grab some leafs with the other, "I uh... appreciate your hospitality and all, but.. the thing is, I allready have a girlfriend."

"Her name is Sally, is it not?" she asks you after reading your mind!!
"Yeah.." you say as you string some leaves together and make a little leaf skirt. It's not much, but it's all you got to cover yourself! "So... Im afraid youre gonna have to find another guy-"

"-ANOTHER GUY??!!!" the ninja girl flips out the second she hears those words, "But I have allready tracked down my prey!! I will not let it leave just because it's heart belongs to another.. because it's ass allready belongs to ME!!"

Geez, she's pretty damn subtle! Still, Eboshi tries to relax and starts doing some breathing exercises and Eastern chants to calm herself down, "...my apologies, Sean-san. I was trained to be much more formal than that."

You just stare at her strangely, "Eh... no problem. Now can I PLEASE get back home? PLEASE?!"
"Well..." the ninja thinks to herself for a while, "I COULD think of it... if you manage to accomplish a test of mine."
"What kind of test?"

She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a pebble, "If you manage to snatch this pebble from me, I will let you go. But if you cant... you will remain my personal sumo-love for all eternity!"

'SUMO LOVE'?! Oh, that's it! She is SO gonna get it!

You just smile, "Allrighty. If that's what you want..." and in a heartbeat, you leap at her!!
153111222221211222122.title: Lonely AND bored... WONDERFUL!

1531112222212112221221.content:
You are surprisingly successful, you are able to snatch up the pebble and grab her in one fell swoop. “Hah, that was easy!” you chide her. But then you notice her smile and you realize that it was too easy.

“Yes Sean-san you have earned your freedom.” Suddenly she moves and you find yourself flat on your back, staring up at the sky. “However, I didn’t say when I’d let you go.” You feel a draft and come to realize that those cloths you’d fixed for yourself are now gone. “I figure one maybe two years of your company should make up for all the trouble I went through to get you…” she leans down and pinches your cheek and then your belly. “Chubby-chan!”

You blink and try and heave her off to you, with now success. She just rides your feeble attempts out like the expert she is. “Umm you are joking right.” She grins and leans down.
1531112222212112221221.title: If something is too good to be true...

15311122222121122212212.content:
"I am not, oh husky one!" And in a flash second, she disappears off you... and leaves you with your arms tied together as well as your legs!! "A true ninja never jokes around!"
You can hear her voice even though you dont see her, but that's not your biggest concern! Your biggest concern is trying to break free of these damn ropes she mysterious tied you with! God, she IS pretty playful, aint she?

You look around for that crazed ninja, but you dont see her in sight! "Arrgghh... damn it, WHERE ARE YOU?!!" you shout.

"I am everywhere..." you hear Eboshi's voice call to you, "And yet I am nowhere... you cant see me.. yet you know I am here. I am nowhere near you... and yet I am breathing down your neck."

"STOP SPEAKING IN RIDDLES!!!" you roar! Ok, that's it! Obviously she wants to keep playing. And even though you snatched her pebble, she still seems bent on wanting to keep you inside her!! Perhaps your only hope is to get off the island...

"There IS no way off!" ninja girl reads your mind! "Nor is there a way OUT!"
Damn. Guess youre stuck for a little longer... you cut the ropes that bind you with a conviently placed pocket knife and get up off the ground..

You have two choices at this point:

Try and build a raft to get off the island.. or explore the deep jungle within it...
15311122222121122212212.title: That's what you get for being irresistable!

choices: You wake up the next morning alive and unharmed
You wake up and hear Eboshi calling your name in the distance
153111222221211222122121.content: After deciding that staying inside Eboshi is not how you want to go out, you scamper off to find raft parts. It takes you five hours to construct an axe and chop down enough trees to build your raft. By the time you finish construction of the raft itself its nighttime. You're exhausted but before you collapse you hear an inhuman scream. You turn around horrified and then it occurs to you that at night bad stuff happens. Then you hear a voice that turns your blood to ice. "Don't sleep tonight boy. If you do I guarantee you won't wake up the next day" The voice warns. "Few things on this island are friendly." You dare to turn around and see what's talking to you. The thing talking to you is a hooded figure. His face is hidden by the hood but you can his red glowing eyes. "Who are you?" You squeak. "I'm known as Nightmare." He answers. "Are you here to kill me?" You ask on the verge of tears. "Not this time." Nightmare says. You feel something cold and hard against your neck. You look down and see that you are fully clothed and you have a golden amulet with a red gem in the center. "It will guide you to things that will help you. Do not ignore it. At times the way it points you may seem strange but it will NEVER deceive you." Nightmare says. With that the world begins to spin around you. Your vision darkens and you hit the ground.
153111222221211222122121.title: Meet Nightmare?!

choices: Obey the amulet and go to Eboshi
1531112222212112221221212.content: You wake up lying flat out on the sand. Your raft is where you left it and the clothes Nightmare gave you are still on. You sit up and hear Eboshi calling you in the distance. Remembering what Nightmare told you you look at the amulet he gave you. It's made like a compass although the needle has been replaced by a red gem. To your surprise the gem points to where Eboshi's voice is coming from and not toward your raft. You stop and think. For the first time you notice you have a backpack next to you. Inside is a .45 pistol, a machete, a box of matches, and a high-grade flashlight. Finally you notice you're no longer flabby you're literally skin and bones but you feel stronger. Knowing this what do you do?
1531112222212112221221212.title: Bail out or try your luck?

choices: You follow the amulet and go east to find a village
You follow the amulet and head north deeper into the jungle
15311122222121122212212121.content: You throw the backpack on and head toward Eboshi's voice. You push through some bushes and arrive in a clearing. Eboshi is standing in the middle and looking in your direction. You step out of hiding cautiously. You hope that Eboshi isn't reading your thoughts as you approach because you're holding the pistol behind your back with one hand. "Why do you have clothes Sean-san?" Eboshi demands. You keep your mind blank so she can't use your thoughts against you. "Found 'em." You reply without thought. Eboshi narrows her eyes and pitches a smoke bomb at the ground. You're blinded and when the smoke clears you are once again naked and unarmed. Eboshi is standing in front of you holding all your stuff. "You won't be needing these." Eboshi says. In another puff of smoke she's gone. You're not done in yet because before Eboshi disappeared you stole a look at the direction the amulet was pointing. To your surprise though the strength you felt is gone and you're fat again. You then conclude that the amulet is magic in more ways than just a compass. Disregarding these thing you head in the direction the amulet was pointing.
15311122222121122212212121.title: Wise choice or horrible mistake?

choices: You and Slats decide to make Eboshi regret eating you
153111222221211222122121212.content: You sprint into the jungle ignoring the sounds encroaching upon you from all sides. After twenty minutes of running you pass under a tree. Suddenly you're being hoisted into the air. You look up and see an octopus pulling you toward it. The ground is getting further and further away and you're beginning to lose hope. Then a red and black blur whips past you and you begin falling to the ground. You fall onto something smooth and scaly and are quickly pinned down by it. You stare the creature in the eyes but you notice something on its back. From your limited view the object appears grey and square and you think you see some writing scratched on the corner of the box. It looks like 'SX+~'. Then it hits you. The thing on this creature's back is your old boom box. Then you wonder how the creature got your old boom box. Then the lizard looks at you more closely. "Sean? Is that you?" The lizard asks. "Aye. That's me." You answer. "Sean it's me! Slats!" It says. Then you finally recognize him. It's your old lizard plush Slats. You had strapped your boom box to him because you thought he looked cool wearing it. Now what?
153111222221211222122121212.title: Old friend

choices: You eplore more of the jungle
153111222221211222122122.content:
The jungle on the island is a thick one. It's filled with palm trees and rubber trees. It kinda looks like that island in that "Mysterious Island" movie you watched a week ago. There's even a waterfall...you take a sip of the water, and find it's nice and cool. You go deeper into the jungle and see that you're on a well-worn path. Maybe this island won't be too bad as a home...at least you won't die of thrist. You come to a small village inhabited by several people! All of the people, as it turns out, were former owners of Eboshi that now live within her! There's a total of 10 people in the village. The 'mayor' of the city is a young man around your age by the name of Bill Sinclair.


"We've lived here since Eboshi ate us" said Bill. "we've come used to living in a plush toy...I'm glad to see that Eboshi has found a new friend for us"

All of the people in the village are overweight by a good 200 pounds. It seems that Eboshi indeed is a chubby-chaser! You're skin and bone compared to the people of the village. The people of the village eat the fruits that grow on the island...which is high in fat. All the villagers seem to be happy.
153111222221211222122122.title: Finding the village

1531112222212112221221221.content:
Maybe it would have been a good idea to stay with the village, but you know what? Youre kinda curious to what else this lovely island has in store for you!

"Say uh... Bill?" you ask the jumbo-sized village chief, "what else is beyond this village?"
The second you say that, Bill nearly chokes on a fruit he was chewing on, but manages to spit it out in time!
"..B...beyond this village?! Oh, you dont wanna know!" he starts shaking his head, "Theyre used to be around 40 of us living in this village. A lot of our friends went beyond this village, like weeks ago! Sigh... Ive still yet to see any of them come back!"

Although you heed his warning, youre still too curious, "Uh... mind if I go check it out?"
"ARE YOU KIDDING?! IT COULD BE SUICIDE!! Some things on this island.. I dont even think Eboshi herself is aware of!"
Hmmm...maybe... just MAYBE if youre lucky, these other people might have found a way out of her! However, it's no guarantee that that could be it. On the other hand, they couldve been eaten alive by some exotic creatures that live here!

Still, you shake your head and step out of the village ready to explore! You can even hear Bill shout out to you, "YOU'LL BE SORRY..."

You trail through nearly yards and yards of trees, thick grasses, swamps, lakes... and yet you havent found a single bug or animal around! Strange... it's so... lonely...

"HELP!!! HELP! SOMEBODY!!!!!!"

Just then you heard a cry for help! It sounded like a woman.. but what other woman besides Eboshi could be living among this island?!

"Somebody??! ANYBODY?!!!!"

Not wanting to ignore someone in need, you rush to wherever that voice is coming from... this voice seems to lead you to lake of quicksand! And the voice is coming from the woman caught in the middle of it!

The head of a woman with green eyes and blonde hair wrapped in a pony-tail popping out of the quicksand trying desperately to keep the last part of her body dragged down with the rest!

"Hang on! I'll get you out of there!" you shout to the poor woman in need. You look around and find a conveniently-placed rope tied to a tree... almost as if it was allready waiting for you!
Still, you pay it no mind and tie the rope to your waist before making that jump into the quicksand!

You reach your arms under the sandy liquidy surface and feel what seems to be this woman's arms.. so with all your might, you pull them out! Good... those were her arms! You reach in farther and wraps your arms around the woman's waist underneith the sand as you continue to pull her out!
"Dont worry, ma'am!" you tell her, "Youre gonna be fine! Just relax! I'll get you out of here!"

However, for some odd reason, she doesnt seem to be scared anymore.. if anything, she's smiling... scratch that! She's GRINNING!
Nevertheless, you grab her then you grab the rope and pull her on outta there! Yep, it always feels great helping out those in need...

But wait a second... you start to witness stranger things as you pull more and more of her out of the sand...

Finally, when you pull her bottom half out of the sand, you see that it isnt human! It's actually...
1531112222212112221221221.title: If it looks like a trap... it probably is!

15311122222121122212212211.content:
You stare at what you pull out of the quicksand. It's a snake's tail! This woman is a naga; half-human and half-snake! The snake part of the woman seems to go on for 100 feet, and is thick as a tree. The snake part starts just below her belly button. You back out of the quicksand pit before the naga can do anything.
"Hi there" said the naga, slithering her way towards you. You try to run, but you keep looking at the naga's green eyes. You can't take your eyes off of her. The naga's green eyes hold you...you wanna dive right into them. When the naga comes beside you, you feel yourself snap out of your trance.
"You're awfully skinny" said the naga, looking you over. You can see the naga's huge breasts...and she doesn't seem to care that you're now looking at those flesh globes.
"You must be new here" said the naga. "My name is Carmen...what's yours?"
"Uh...Sean" you say. "how did...what....?" You can't believe that you're talking to a living, breathing naga. You've heard of nagas before, but you had never seen one before. Most nagas live in the Tropics, since they're cold-blooded. You've heard that nagas eat people and large animals.
"Is this your first time seeing my species?" asked Carmen. You nod.
"Heh heh" laughs Carmen.
"You do know that you're in a plush toy" you say.
"Oh, yes" said Carmen. "Eboshi caught me hibernating, you see...and she just swallowed me up! Imagine that! A mere toy able to swallow me whole! Well..at first, I was angry at her...but then, she promised me to get some food to me"
"You eat the people in the village?!" you ask.
