"Yes" said Carmen,grinning. "you see, us nagas like our food alive and squirming. I call for help, which leads a foolish villager that ventured out of the village to this quicksand pit...and then, I eat them. Eboshi also eats other animals for me to eat....but my favorite food is human....speaking of which...you look delicious"
It is then you noticed that Carmen has warped her coils around you! She smiles when she sees you have discovered this fact. You struggle uselessly in her coils, but she has an iron-clad grip on you.
"There's no escape for you" said Carmen. "but don't worry...I might let you live in my second stomach if you squirm all the way down"
15311122222121122212212211.title: Carmen the Naga

choices: Try to run as fast as your slobbered feet can!
153111222221211222122122111.content:
You desperately wanna run... wanna scream bloody murder! But you cant! Youre practically hypnotized as you stare at those eyes of hers...
"Hmm.. youre a lot smaller than the usual men Eboshi traps," Carmen says to you, "...Oh well! Probably just means youre low-fat!"
And in a flash, her top half descends at your feet while her jaws slowly open over them as youre slowly being gorged from the bottom-up!

Her mouth works her way up your legs before-
"ALLLGGGHHHH!!!" Carmen screams in pain with her mouth full!
This was caused by a certain someone stepping on her tail! A certain someone... named Eboshi!!

"Huh?! Abothi?!" Carmen looks at her questionable. The ninja just glares at her, "Carmen... Let him go! NOW!"

"But...But yoo sad ah cun ave any won that leves da viwwage!!"
"That one is off limits!" Eboshi points to you.
"But wy?"
"Do not question my actions! That is an order!!"

"Aww!!!" Carmen moans in disappointment as she starts disgorging your legs! Theyre completely soaked in saliva by now! Youre pretty grossed out, but youre just relieved she didnt eat you!
After Carmen spits you out, Eboshi steps off her tail allowing her to slither away disappointed...

You breathe a sigh of relief and thank your heroine, "Whew! Th..thanks a lot, Eboshi!"

She, however, does not seem very happy to see you, judging by that glare underneith that garb of hers!
"...Who gave you permission to leave the village?!"

"Um..I was just-"

"You were just being disobient, werent you, Sean-san?!" Eboshi crosses her arms, "Perhaps I was not being very formative with my rules of living within me!"

That's when you notice the ninja girl's pulling out a sword!!
"Uh... Eboshi? What are you doing?"

"Inflicting your punishment..." Eboshi then grips her blade with both her hands, raises it upside-down near her head and stares you right in the eye, "...NOW HOLD STILL!!!"
153111222221211222122122111.title: COME BACK, SNAKE-GIRL!!!!!!!!

choices: You and Eboshi go back to the village
Carmen comes back to apologize to you
1531112222212112221221221111.content:
"Eboshi, please listen!" you plead to the crazy ninja-girl ready to slice you in two with her sword. "you didn't explain the rules of living with you. How can you punish me if I don't know the rules?"


Eboshi is about to slice you in half, when she stops and drops her sword. "Oh...I guess I kinda did forget to tell you the rules, Sean-san"

You take a huge sigh of relief.

"Okay, Sean-san" said Eboshi. "Here are my rules" She hands you a piece of paper. You take the paper and look over it.



EBOSHI'S RULES


1. Nobody is permitted to leave the village without my permission
2. Call me "Lady Eboshi" in my presence
3. You must weigh at least 200 pounds overweight
4. Swimming in the ocean is strictly forbidden.
5. On every other day, you must take a bath (every day if you work outside)
6. No complaining or whinning!
7. Follow my intructions without question
8. You must eat at least 60 lbs of food every day
9 No exercising allowed
10. Flirting with Carmen is allowed (revised rule from last year)


"Uh..." you say. "I guess you really like fat guys, Lady Eboshi"

"Yes" said Eboshi who smiles. "now I expect you to follow these rules by tomorrow. I'm letting you off the hook for now...but be warned! If you disobey any of my rules, I will order Carmen to digest you in her stomach"
1531112222212112221221221111.title: The Rules

choices: Nah... you'll go back to the village...
15311122222121122212212211112.content:
In a cloud of smoke, the ninja-girl disappeared! You couldnt help just freeze in shock... she was about to kill you for breaking a rule... AND SHE NEVER EVEN TOLD YOU WHAT THE RULES WERE! And a few of these rules she's given you are a little outrageous! For example: #8. Eating 60lbs a DAY?! Good lord, youre just gonna die!! Who in their right mind can possibly eat 60lbs of food in one day?!

Just then, you felt something scaley tap your shoulder which caused you to jump in suprise!
"WAH! ...huh?!" Sure enough, it was a snake tail. And not just ANY tail! Carmen's!! She just blushes a little and raises her hand, "Uh...hi!"

After your first encounter with her, you dont want to take ANY chances, "EBOSH-"
Before you could finish, Carmen leaped at you at covered your mouth with her hand! "Sh! Sh! Sh!!!!" she shushed you, "Sigh...look, I just wanted to say Im sorry about earlier! Honestly, if I knew you were off limits, I would've NEVER tried to eat you!"

"Seriously?" you ask her. Carmen nodded, "Seriously!" ..Well, that's SORTA comforting. At least you wont worry about her anymore as long as youre living on island... quite possbily forever... never again will you ever EVER see Sally again. You could imagine the poor woman crying her eyes out over your disappearance..

"Youre missing someone, aint ya?" Carmen turned her head to you.
"Uh.. Im sorry?"
"You got a girlfriend on the outside?"
You sigh, "Yeah... yeah, I do."

That's when Carmen jerked her head to the left, then to the right, then slithered toward your ear and whispered, "You didnt hear it from me, but I heard that there is ONE way out of Eboshi.. and that's underwater!"

"What?" you whisper back, "Underwater?!"
That just caused Carmen to snicker a little, "Heh! Why else do you think Rule #4 is no swimming?! Because there's a secret passageway under the sea that leads out the ninja-doll's stomach and straight out her mouth!"
Hearing that, you give her your undivided attention! "...For real?!"
She nodded, "Yup!"

"Well, in that case..." youre just about to rush to the ocean, until Carmen coils you to stop your running, "WAIT!!"
She whispered a little more, "Pst! If it were really that easy, Id have done it myself! ...But I heard that there is something or someone guarding the passageway! I heard whatever it is ate a few of the chubby villagers that found out the secret! That's why I aint going near it!"

...Damn! Of course there'd be a catch! ..But then again, this might be your only shot at returning home! And then again... what if what Carmen said about something guarding the way out was true?!
Either way, if youre caught, Eboshi's gonna be PISSED!

...Are you feeling a little MORE adventurous?!
15311122222121122212212211112.title: Under the sea?

choices: You bump into a plush humpback whale
153111222221211222122122111121.content: What did you come across midway through the ocean
153111222221211222122122111121.title: ...To the ocean!!

choices: You eat once you get to the village
You meet another mythical beast on the island
153111222221211222122122111122.content:
"Do you hav any idea what's guarding the exit?" you whisper back.

"Well, I heard it was this HUGE whale" said Carmen. "I don't know...but I don't wanna get eaten!"

Eboshi got mad at you for not following the rules when you didn't even know the rules! If you tried to escpae, Eboshi surely would slice you apart without mercy. So you decide the only option you have; go back to the village. You tell Carmen that you don't want to get eaten either, and that you're going back to the village.

"Be sure to come visit me" said Carmen. "with permission, of course"

You wave goodbye to Carmen and make your way to the village. You keep going over the fact that Eboshi wants you to eat 60 lbs of food a day! That's impossible...the human stomach can't hold that much food!


"Sean-san, you're in my stomach" said Eboshi, appearing out of nowhere. You jump...could she stop doing that?!

"My stomach is a magical place" said Eboshi. "while you're in my stomach, you can swallow 60 lbs of food quite easily. You can even eat Carmen if you wanted"

"But, Lady Eboshi" you say. "I can't eat 60 lbs a day! I'll get fat!"

"That's the idea, Sean-san" giggled Eboshi.

"So how's come you're not fat?" you ask.

"I gotta keep my girlish figure because I'm a ninja, Sean-san" said Eboshi. "have you ever heard of a fat ninja?"

"Well....no" you say.

"See you in the village" said Eboshi and she vanishes in a puff of smoke.
153111222221211222122122111122.title: Back to the village

choices: Bring him with you to the village...
1531112222212112221221221111222.content:
Wonderful... so youre stuck. Not wanting to face.. whatever's keeping you trapped on the island, nor do you want to anger your captor, it seems there's nothing else you can do but make the most of the rest of your life..

However, just as youre walking back to the village, you have the STRANGEST feeling youre being followed... some kind of deep instinct perhaps.

Just then, you hear rattling in the bushes...
"Uh.. Carmen? That you?" ...no response. "Eboshi? ...Bill?" ...Still nothing.

Geez, what's going o-
"RAAARRRRR!!!!!"

BAM!!! Something pins you to the ground! A dragon!!! A silver colored dragon about your size!!! Aw crap.. how many more creatures lurk in the ninja-girl's insides?!
You scream out loud as the silver dragon glares into your soul with it's grey-colored eyes. Hey wait a minute... this dragon looks familiar.. That's when you notice the blue pen-writing on his cheek. It says 'Sean'! ...Oh my god, it looks just like your old childhood toy, Silver! That couldnt be... could it?

"...Uh...Silver? Is that you?" you ask it. It tilts it's head while staring... then finally speaks, "...Sean? ....SEAN!!!!" It gets off of you and helps you off the ground. "Sean... wow, I never thought Id see you again!"

"Whoa, all these years, I thought I had lost you!" you actually hug this big scaly silver-colored dragon without any regret whatsoever!
"Same here!" Silver hugs back, "I thought I would never see you again after that ninja-girl swallowed me!"

You sigh, "Eboshi got you too, huh?" Silver shrugs and nodded, "Ever since then I desperately tried getting off this island.. but.. I was always too afraid of getting in the water because of whatever's lurking in it! I heard it's some big ugly scaley sea monster..."
"Really?" you heard otherwise, "Carmen told me it's some kind of giant whale."

The dragon thinks to itself, "Well, no one exactly knows.. the ones that actually HAVE seen it never came back!"
Hearing this just makes you even more tempted to see what's in the water preventing anyone from escaping... just what is this guardian Carmen and Silver seem to talk about?

Unfortunately, it's gonna have to wait as you think about heading back to the village... but then again, what about your dragon friend?
Sure, bringing him might cause up quite a scare to the poor fat human villagers, but you just dont wanna leave him just yet! You still got some catching up to do!!!
1531112222212112221221221111222.title: Your oldest pal...

15311122222121122212212211112221.content:
You and the Silver used to be sleeping pals...Silver was just so snuggly and he was always there to comfort you. Of course, you didn't realize that Silver was alive. You decide to take Silver back to the village, not caring what the other villagers might say. You haven't seen Silver in 10 long years, and you always wondered what ever happened to him. Silver, as his name suggests, is silver all over save for his golden eyes and red tongue. Silver is about the same size as you are. Your name is faded on Silver's neck, back you can still see it.


"What happened to you?" you ask.

"I was swallowed up by this Eboshi girl" said Silver. He has a Czech accent.and sounds as if he's just learning how to speak English. "Eboshi seems to like swallowing things..."

"Yeah...I met Carmen" you say.

"Oh yeah, me and Carmen are friends" said Silver.

"Come on" you say. "let's go to the village and catch up"

So you and Silver walk back to the village. The vhubby village people give Silver a wide berth. They all can plainy see your name written on Silver's neck...like it was a brand-mark.
15311122222121122212212211112221.title: Back with Silver

153111222221211222122122111122212.content:
"AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!"

Before you and Silver could even begin catching up on old times, your dreams are shattered by the scream of a fellow overweight villager!

This guy stops right in front of you and starts trying to catch his breath! "Y...Y...YOU! S..Sean! Ya gotta help!"
"Um.. what is it?" you ask him.

"It's Bill!" he answers, "He...He was... picking coconuts by the shore.. when... he tripped and fell in... the water.. a gigantic hand.. it came out...and... YOU GOTTA HELP!!"

"Gigantic hand from the water?" Silver looks at the villager in concern, "It could be the creature that is for to guarding the only way out of Eboshi!"

Aw crap! Bill slipped in the water and this guardian creature assumed he was trying to escape and well... did it's job!
Finally the villager took one last deep breath and calmed down, "Look, we dont have much time! Bill's in trouble! We gotta get him outta there before the sea-thing makes a meal out of him!"

"Wait! Why ME?!" you asked him.

The guy just shrugged and shook his head, as if you asked a dumb question! "DUH! It's obvious Eboshi's got a thing for you! She cant afford to let YOU get eaten by the creature!"

"Perhaps the husculiar fellow is correct," Silver seems to agree, "It what he says is true, surely this THING will not try to eat you for fear of what ninja-girl will do to it!"

"So will ya help?! PLEASE??!!!" the villager shakes in anticipation hoping that you'll say yes.

"It is up to you," Silver says, "Whatever decision you make, I will more than happy to follow along with it!"
Well on the plus side, at least you'll have Silver to watch your back! But then again... you DO know the rules! You disobey them, you might end up in worse shape than Bill might be!
153111222221211222122122111122212.title: A Good Samaritan?

choices: You just got Silver back and you don't want to give him up anytime soon
1531112222212112221221221111222121.content:
You agree to go find Bill. It's great to have Silver with you again and you begin to wonder if the thing that's trying to eat Bill is all that bad. When you arrive at the beach you see Bill swimming madly. Suddenly a huge whale with human arms and legs comes out of the water. Bill screams and continues swimming. THUD! You look behind you to see that Silver has passed out (he always had a weak stomach). Bill makes it to the beach panting heavily. You go to see if he's OK. "Bill are you alright?" You ask. "I'm fine." He coughs.

The giant guardian sinks back into the water. You now understand that an escape from the island is going to be a lot harder than you thought. You and Bill drag Silver, who is still unconscious, back to the village. When you arrive Eboshi is there. You think she is mad at you. (Unfortunately you're right she is REALLY mad.) "I told you not to leave the village Sean-san!" She says patiently. "I went to save Bill." You reply. Eboshi looks at you coldly. Just then Silver wakes up. Eboshi looks at Silver and gets and idea. "I won't kill you Sean-san. IF you give me Silver." Eboshi snaps her fingers and Carmen appears looking rather hungry. Silver taps you on the shoulder. "Don't worry Sean I'll be alright." Silver says as he approaches Carmen.

What do you do?
1531112222212112221221221111222121.title: Let's go find Bill!

choices: Yes, Eboshi is unaware that you made it out.
No such luck, you may be out but Eboshi isn't finished with you yet.
15311122222121122212212211112221212.content:
You love Silver and you don't want him to die. Then you remember that Silver had said he and Carmen are friends. You wonder if the whole thing is rigged. Silver approaches Carmen. Carmen wraps up Silver and begins to constrict him. Silver cries out in pain. Eboshi is watching Carmen so you run up to her and grab her katana. Eboshi is about to stab you with her kunai but you knock her out with the handle of her own katana. You hold the sword to Camren's throat. Carmen drops Silver who is actually choking a little. You pick up Silver and carry him away (he's about your size so it's not hard to carry him. Unfortunately you do have to drop Eboshi's katana.

You arrive at the beach and put Silver down. "Thanks." He says. "Anything for an old friend." You reply. "How can we get past that guardian, it's huge!" Silver asks. "Maybe we can outswim it." You suggest. Silver nods and the two of you go into the water.

The guardian hasn't come out yet and you're chin-deep in the water. You look at Silver who says. "Ready when you are." You nod and dive deep. The water is clear and warm so swimming and seeing through it is easy. True to Carmen's theory you see a cave. It looks like the guardian hasn't noticed you so you continue towards the cave. Silver begins to talk to you in you head. "Look out!" Suddenly the guardian is swimming towards you. Something grabs you (it's Silver so don't worry). You are now jetting toward the cave faster than you could've imagined possible. Remarkably you reach the cave. It goes upward and you realize that it continues out of the water. You and Silver climb out. "That was easy........ too easy." You say. Silver understands what you mean. There is a torch mounted on the wall. Surprisingly it is lit. You grab it and move deeper into the cave.

*splash* Suddenly the rocky cave floor is replaced with soft skin that you assume is Eboshi's throat. It's slippery but you manage to climb up and out. You reach a large room. You are suddenly surrounded by light. When the light fades you and Silver are back in your room and once again you are normal size. You and Silver look at each other. You and Silver begin to laugh hysterically thinking that you just beat a ninja. But did you actually escape?
15311122222121122212212211112221212.title: Allow Silver to be eaten

choices: The power of Christ compelled that posibility!
153111222221212.content:
....Hoo boy......

....Could it be perhaps that this little girl's a goth and you got grabbed by one of her little demon plushies?
153111222221212.title: Shout at the devil!

1531112222212121.content:
It's hands were cold. And strong. And the nails were not so neatly trimmed, although they kinda seemed like they recently had a manicure. However, you had far too little time to compliment on your captor's fine grooming.

Whatever got you, turned you around to get a good look at you... perhaps it can see that look at your eye just before they swallow you whole?!

"Kee.....do?!"
It, no SHE did not look very happy to see you. Of course knowing what she is, you werent any happier to see HER!
Judging by the horns in her black hair, darkened skin-tone, bat wings, skull earrings, and yellow demonic eyes glaring deep into your soul... this appeared to be a demon. A demon plushie?! This is a little girl's bedroom! You'd think you'd be attacked by cuddle teddy bears or pink bunnies or barbie dolls, but a DEMON?! And a rather tall one towering over you as she gripped you tight.

"KEE-DO!" an angry demon shouting at you. You got a good look at her glittering white and pearly sharp fangs as she moved her mouth while she talked! Goodie. Cat-girl wasnt scary enough!
You wanted to say something, but nothing came out of your mouth. So she raised your body high enough to meet her eye level. "Keedo?! KEEDO?!" she asked you in an unfamiliar language.

"Uh...um.... uh.... Hi!" you answered.
"Kee?" she raised her eyebrow at you dumbfounded by your response.

Since you didnt want to stay in suspense for too long, you just cut to the chase and asked the demon-girl, "Are... are you gonna eat me?" If the answer's yes, you hoped what Minnie told you was right and applied to ALL the plushies!

"Kee. Kee ee," she just replied in own tongue you cant understand. At least her voice sounded a little calmer than before. In fact, she actually released that tight grip on your body and set you back down. Relieved, you breathed a sigh of relief... but the relief didnt last long!

"KEEE!!!" With one hard kick, the demon-girl knocked you to the ground and pressed her high-heeled shoe against your chest pinning you down! Her shoe was almost as cold as her hands, but that wasnt what was causing you to shiver!

Her yellow eyes were staring deep into yours, like a snake looking down at a mouse being squeezed to death against it's coils!
"Kee....do?" she asked you in what sounded like a quiet, mocking tone.
You try to calm yourself down and remind yourself that you'll live through it if she plans on eating you. But there's STILL that slight chance that Minnie could be wrong. If that's true, the last thing you'd want eating you alive would be a spawn from Hell!

What should you do about that creepy demon pinning you against the ground and giving you quite a threatening stare? Run like hell or try to talk to her and show you that you mean no harm?
1531112222212121.title: Hey, it's Beelzebub Barbie!

choices: You and Bird talk some more
15311122222121211.content:
"Kee..." you say to the demon-girl, not knowing if she could understand you or not...but you have to try to talk to her, if it was possible. "Kee do do!"
The demon-girl looks at you in silence for a moment, considering on what you just said to her.
"Gaffai?" asked the demon-girl.
"Gaffai" you repeat back to her, like a parrot.
"Kee doo do do kee isousan'l jayln" said the demon-girl.
"Can you speak English?" you ask the demon-girl.
"Lassar do'na fleaseca, Klingatiassno?" asked another voice in that same language. You look around and see a goth chick standing right beside you. The goth chick looks to be 20 years old, and about the same size as you.
"Dant Isk tanna fleaseca" said the demon-girl to the goth girl.
"She doesn't speak English" said the goth girl to you.
"What's she been talking about?" you ask.
"Mostly "Where did you come from?" " said the goth girl. "and 'are you tasty?' Klungleah has a taste for live humans"
"Klungleah?" you ask.
"That's her name" said the goth girl. "or...it's her English name..her real name is Klingatiassno..but in English, it's Klungleah"
"What's your name?" you ask the goth girl.
"Roberta" said the goth girl. "people call me 'Bird' "
"Hito" said Klungleah. "geard na na isk kee do"
"Jati la ghoia, Kling" said Roberta. "Klungleah wants to know if she can eat you"
"I can't even talk to her..." you mutter. "hey, how can you talk to her in her own language?"
"By letting her eat you" said Roberta. "she does something to you that allows you to talk in Standard Demonic...that's what her language is called...well..in her own tongue, its called 'Leeah canan'"
"What's that mean?" you ask.
"Basically, 'common speech'" said Roberta.
15311122222121211.title: Klungleah and Bird

choices: "I told you the mortal would fall for it!"
153111222221212111.content:
Hmm.. if you let the demoness eat you, she'll turn you bilingual? Sure youre up for enhancing your vocabulary, could there be any other side-effects? Roberta was eaten before and she looks fine. Unless, she didnt used to be a goth...

"Kee?" Klungleah put her hands to her hips and tilted her head as if she was impatiently waiting for your response, "Na ist kee?!"
Since you couldnt ask her yourself, you asked her translator, "Um.. could you tell her to get her foot off me?

She didnt even have to tell her. Bird simply pointed at Klungleah's foot and waved her finger upwards. The demon-girl sighed and just barely lifted her high-heeled shoe high enough to slip out from under it.
"...AH?" But just as you got back up, the very tall demon-girl grabbed you by your collar and lifted you up off the ground. This wasnt any better than being pinned under her shoe since you could feel the eerie coldness of her hand start to seep into your shirt! It was so cold, you had to shiver.

"Im sorry," Roberta apologized, "but she's not gonna let you go. She uh... doesnt really take kindly to strangers who trespass in her room uninvited." Figures.
"W...well, c-c-c-c-cant you tell her I m-m-m-mean no.. h.. h.. harm?" you ask while shivering from the intense cold. Too bad Bird shook her head, "I already tried the same thing before she ate me... she's kinda stubborn unless you let her eat you."

You turn your head just slightly and you can see Klungleah's yellow eyes glaring at you from only inches away. It's pretty clear at this point that she's not very happy to see you. Perhaps the last thing you'd ever want to do in your life is piss off one of Hell's finest... but just looking at those jaws of hers gritting your way, the second-to-last thing would be letting yourself slip in between them!

"Dont worry, it's gonna be ok!" Roberta assures you, "She wont chew you. It's just one simple quick swallow and in just a few hours, you'll be good as new!"
"P-p-p-promise?" you can feel the demoness' fingers touching the back of your neck at this point!
"You have my word," she promises, "you'll be good as new, just another friend, and a little smarter! You wont regret it!"

You trust her. You dont think she has any reason to lie to you. Sure Klingata...something is kinda scary, but you gotta face your fears sooner or later!
You look back at the demoness, staring deeply into her yellow eyes and give a slight nod, "...Ok... you can eat me."
The moment those words left your mouth, the glare disappeared from her face. As if she understood what you said, "...Gali?"
"...Gali," you nod, "go right ahead."

Klungleah actually smiled at the response, almost giddy-like! "KEE!!" she cried out in joy. If you werent scared of her, you'd admit that the look on her face was almost cute..

But before you could reflect on the demon-girl's 'cuteness', she put her freezing cold hands around your neck and opened her mouth wide and slowly descended over your head.
Her slimy tongue was even colder than her hands as REAL saliva squirted all across your face. Her breath kinda reeked of raw meat, but knowing what she tends to eat is understandable! Her teeth didnt bother you at all other than her fangs. It hurt a little as they scrapped against your scalp. It probably cut and bled. Good thing she intends on swallowing you whole!

You felt your body being pushed even closer to the back of her purplish throat. Though you were scared, you just kept telling yourself 'Im gonna be fine. Im gonna be just fine! Dont worry! Remember what Bird said!'
Speaking of which, just before you were squeezed against Klungleah's tonsils, you could overhear Roberta saying something to her... though it sounded a little faint, you could make at least one little sentence.................
153111222221212111.title: It wont be so bad! I promise!

153112.content:
Normally you'd beg for your life... however, you kinda think the cat-girl is pretty... and a woman is STILL a woman. You think of a plan! You were going to use that irresistable CHARM of yours!!

You look at her right in her eyes and say, "Please do not eat me. I do not deserve to be devoured by someone as beautiful as yourself!"

She then tilts her head and stares at you strangely, "Me..ow?"

You grin, "I feel so lucky... to be the prey of one such as you! You have not only snagged me... but you have also hunted down and tracked my HEART!"

She starts to giggle and purr! It looks like it's working!

You continue, "You have the most beautiful jade-colored eyes mine have ever seen! Your cute little cat-ears match your cute-yet-dangerous claws! And you have a tail like the sexy little lioness that you are! I would rather be in your lovely hands... than in your lovely stomach!"

(...DAMN...you ARE good!)

She grins and blushes! It looks like your charm really got to her! However, youre not out of the clear YET...

She thinks for a while....and grins wickedly at you!!! She then stands up and youre finally free! But before you can run, she takes out her claws and slashes at you!!

...but youre not hurt!...However your clothes are torn apart! She then leans down and gives a nice hard LICK up your naked body!!!!

Now you start to wonder if your charm didnt work... or WORKED TOO WELL!!!
153112.title: Whoa....BAD kitty!

1531121.content:
You think to yourself, "Ok....THIS is getting weird!" and being stripped naked by a cat-like person more than twice your size IS pretty creepy!.....not to mention, a BIG disadvantage in case she LOVES to scratch!!!

You slowly back away... then get and run as fast as you can in the other direction! Youre not sure where to go or what to do if you manage to get away... but that doesnt concern you right now!

...but then you have a strange feeling about what youre doing! Youre sure why but...

When you turn around, you notice she isnt chasing you... in fact she looks kinda sad... she puts her hand/paws in her face and starts crying! Aww... all she wanted was some company!

You stop running... and kinda feel sorry for her. Perhaps that was a little harsh of you to just run off on her like that... maybe she just needs a little companionship...

On the other hand... she could be faking it... and leading you RIGHT into her trap! You'd not only prove to be easy prey... but gullible prey as well!

However, that decision is up to YOU!
1531121.title: Tears of a crocodile?

15311211.content:
You curse yourself for being unable to abandon a crying girl, even if said girl is made of fabric and part cat. With your chivalry guiding you, slowly you walk back to the weeping catgirl. With paws covering her eyes as she cries, your return goes unnoticed by her.

“Hey catgirl, I came back. So, could you stop crying or something, it’s kinda embarrassing.” Your voice stops the fall of tears and the catgirl looks down at you. Her look of surprise is replaced with that of rapture and she plucks you up by the armpits and brings you to her face. You immediate reaction is to struggle as you near her mouth, but her tongue isn’t what you feel, instead it’s the soft fuzz of her cheek. She is nuzzling you, while purring contently with a big cat like smile on her plushy face.

Still a little reluctant to be so close to the big animated toy, you try to push her cheek away. Feeling you trying to push her away again, the catgirl pulls you away and looks at you in perplexity.

“Does human not like me?” She whispered her first word. Dazed you don’t know what to say. You had no idea that the toy could speak until this moment.

“Of coarse I speak. I’d be bad girlfriend if I couldn’t speak with boyfriend.” This stops you again; the catgirl thinks you’re her girlfriend. This revelation comes second to the information that she could read your mind.

“If boyfriend wants me to stop reading mind, then he must admit to being boyfriend?” You gulp at her, knowing that she could over power you with the strange powers, telling her that you already have a girlfriend could be bad. Maybe you should play along and say you’re her girlfriend, then your mind would be free from her invasion.
15311211.title: She speaks! With bad grammar no less

choices: Try to think of a good excuse...
153112111.content:
Of course you play along!! If you dont... she could get upset...! Perhaps...even angry! She might probably wind up eating you, but since she's part-cat, she'll probably tear you to shreads first! NOT exactly the most SATISFYING part of vore! VORE IS HELL!

"*Gulp*...Yes, my lovely preditor...I am yours!" you say regrettingly.

She smiles! "YAY!" she licks your face! "You is SOOO cute! Stay where are! Me be right back!" She puts you down and runs off.

You DARE not run... Instead, you think to yourself, "Oh... curse my irresistability to women!! If only I werent so damn lovable!" (Oh PLEEEEAASSEEE!)

"I BACK!!!" she comes running back up to you carrying something in her mouth: A dead bird? Uh oh...

You look at it shocked! "THAT'S MY NEIGHBOR, MR. REDFIELD'S PARAKEET!!!"

She just smile, "Yep... now it our lunch! Eat up!"

She takes bites out of it and offers you some!

Would you dare eat parts of a dead bird? Or would you dare piss off your kitty girlfriend?

Well guess what! THAT decision is YOURS!!!
153112111.title: Aww...is that for ME?

1531121112.content:
"I don't like birds..." you say. You pray to God that this kitty is offended!

The cat-girl cocks her head and considers.

"What food you like?" she finally asks.

Now what?

"Uh..Cooked food" you say.

The cat-girl gets a digusted look on her face. "Live food much better"

"But that isn't living" you say, pointing to the dead Parakeet in her hands.

"Oh.." she said. "uncooked, though.."

"I don't mean to offend you" you say. "but I'll pick my own foo.."
You regret saying that as she gets an angry look on her face. She shows you her fangs, which could rip you to shreds.
"I like bringing food to boyfriend" she said. "if you don't like food that me bring, You're not boyfriend!"
She jumps at you and pins you down to the floor. The parakeet lands beside your head.
"If not boyfriend, than you're food!" she yells.
1531121112.title: Boyfriend not like food

15311211122.content:
You start to feel her claws starting to pierce your back!!!!!If you dont start eating that bird, that cat will start eating YOU!!

Finally you scream, "AAUUUGGGHH!! OK! OK!! I'll eat the damn parakeet!!!" and think to yourself, 'Sorry Mr. Redfield... it was your bird or ME!'

Her grip on you loosens but she still stares at you with an angry look on her face!

You cannot believe youre actually gonna eat that thing! EWWWWW!!!! You take a bite... and of course, it's disgusting...

"ugghh...MMMM.." you say with a forced smile! Oh god you wanna puke!

But then you get an idea: Something you learned while watching "Without a Padle" your roomate rented!

You point behind the cat-girl! "OH NO!! ITS A DOG!!!"

"WWHHAA??!!" She jumps off of you and turn around...

While her back is turned, you toss that bird behind the fridge into a hole in the wall!

She turns back around, "Hey...there no dog!"

"Guess I was just imagining it!" you smile! She notices the whole parakeet's gone!

"Uh....that was some GOOOOOOD chicken!" you smile nervously!

She looks strangely at you.... youre unsure whether she believes you or not!
15311211122.title: Smart Choice!

choices: She comes back...with a cooked rabbit!
She comes back...with a cooked rat!
153112111222.content:
"You throw food away, not eat it" she said.

"No, I didn't" you say.

"DON'T LIE TO ME!" she screams.

"I didn't lie.." you start to say.

"Don't pull wool over me eyes" she saids. "I know every trick in book"
Oh damn. Looks like she isn't stupid, despite her grammar.
"Me not stupid" she saids. "me hasn't been alive for long. So, me doesn't know grammar"
"Well..I can teach you" you say.
"DON'T CHANGE SUBJECT!" she snaps. "if me food isn't good for you, then your not boyfriend!"
"Hold it" you say. "look, I'll be your boyfrined, but I don't like the kind of food you like"
"You want cooked food?" she asks, and she looks like she's about to puke!
"Yes" you say.
"Can do" she saids. "be right back!"
153112111222.title: Me like cooked food

1531121112222.content:
Well, you learn something new every day... cat-girl doesnt speak very good english... but she isnt stupid! Best not piss her off THIS time around!

"ME BACK!!" She starts running toward you..

"Oh...THIS oughta be good," you think to yourself!

"Uh huh!...TA DAH!!" she whips out.... a cooked RAT?

Sigh...you obviously werent being very specific! She could have roasted up a snail or grilled a monkey, even barbecued your roomate!! YOU WOULD HAVE ATE THAT?!!!

"Um...perhaps it's my fault," you try and tell her, "I wasnt being very specific on what KIND of cooked food I like!"

She sighs, "...Now you no like me cooked food?!" she starts to tear up..., "..me horrible.."

Aww... now youre gonna make her cry again! "W W W W WAIT A MINUTE!! Im sorry... maybe I was just..uh... underestimating your cooking!" you say to try and cheer her up!

"*SNIFF* So...you will try?" she asked.

You step up toward that cooked rat... you have a BAD feeling about this... but you take a bite!

"......Hey....this isnt bad!" you say with a huge relief! You take more bites out of it...it's actually pretty good!

"YAY! Boyfriend happy now!" she says with a smile on her face!

You breathe a sigh of relief... you get to live a little longer!

"Ok, boyfriend! Lunchtime over! TIME TO PLAY!" She pounces on top of you!!

"WWWHHHAAA!!!" you fall to the ground with a loud THUMP!! She pins you down to the floor!

"Umm...what are you doing?" you ask her worried!

She smiles a wicked grin...and unleashes her claws!! "PLAY-TIME!!!!"

"WHA??!! But...I DONT HAVE CLAWS!!!"

"TOO BAD!" she grins!

...oh and for the record: She DOES love to scratch!!
1531121112222.title: Hey, if the Survivor cast will...

choices: When you wake up, you're in a hospital
15311211122222.content:
She uses you as a scratcing post. Luckily, her claws aren't that sharp, but they do hurt! You try to fight her off you, but it's no good!


"OWW!" you yell.

"You make good toy!" she saids.

"Let me go!" you plead as blood pours from your arms and legs.

"But it's PLAY TIME!"

"If you kill me, you won't have a boyfriend anymore!" you yell.

You're getting weak because you're bleeding pretty badly. If this keeps up, you'll bleed to death!

"Last boyfriend made fine toy" she saids. "he didn't want to become my snack, so he became me toy"

"Where is he?" you ask.

"Last boyfriend is...missing" she saids and she stops scratching you at last.

"Missing?" you ask.

"Last boyfriend ran away...make me sad" she said.

You're still weak from the loss of blood! Then, everything goes black....
15311211122222.title: Scratching post

153112111222221.content:
*Beep.....beep....beep...beep...*

"Allright! He's coming to!"

"Yay! Another one saved by us!"

What the?... you slowly start to wake up... inside some strange white room... you notice bandages all over your body... where are you?

"You're in a hospital silly!" a nurse smiles at you! A cute, but odd looking nurse... she looks like a doll of a cartoon character with pink hair and blue eyes wearing a cute little short-skirt nurse outfit and a little cap with a red cross on it...

"Yikes... cat-girl did a number on you!" another nurse says to you... she looks EXACTLY like the other nurse, but with green hair!

"Good thing we found you!" ANOTHER nurse appears... looks exactly like the other nurses but with blonde hair!

"Gee..uh...thanks!" is all you can say, as you get up off your little hospital bed, "Um.. this may sound like a stupid question... but am I-"

"...in some kind of toy-hospital talking to living dolls while still in shrunken size?" the pink-haired girl interrupted, "YEP! Welcome to our little precinct! Located in little Suzy Konetts bedroom!"

"Whoa.." you get up off your little hospital bed.

"Dont get up," the green-haired nurse says, "You'll need your rest after what you've been through!"

"I'm fine," you tell her as you head to the door... but the nurses block your path. "I need to get back home. Please let me through."

"But Im afraid we cant let you leave!" the blonde-nurse says.

"Why not?" you ask.

The three smile and speak in unison, "BECAUSE WE'RE STARVING!!"

...oh GREAT!...
153112111222221.title: Your lovely little rescuers

choices: Pain or no pain, open that exit door!
...Be a good boy. Hopefully, it wont hurt...
1531121112222212.content:
Oh great, oh great, OH GREAT GREAT GREAT GREAT TIMES INFINITY! Youve just survived being a human scratching post but managed to be saved... only to end up as food for the people that saved you??!!

However, when you try to head to the door your body still aches from the pain. With so many cuts and scratches, you probably bled too much to have the strength to run away... your only hope would be to talk your way out of a horrible situation!

"W...Wa...wait a second!" you back away accidently knocking a jar of Q-Tips behind you! "Y....youre nurses! I thought your job was supposed to nurse me to good health!"

The pink-haired nurse just giggled, "Heheheh. Hey look, girls! He's shaking. Isnt that cute?"
"Now now," the green-haired nurse waved her finger in your face, "Be a good boy and relax. We promise it wont hurt!"

It wont hurt?! Being split up to feed three man-eating dolls isnt gonna hurt?!!
"But... why would you wanna eat me?" you ask them, "Youre just dolls! You...You cant-"

"Cant what?" the blonde haired twin asked, "Cant move? Cant talk? Cant treat people's injuries? Cant have a will of our own?" Ouch... good point!
"And humans taste good. PERIOD." said the nurse with green hair.

You start slowing moving towards the door... but each single move of your leg hurts! At this point, you even question whether running will hurt worse than giving up?
"Besides," the pink haired girl crossed her arms, "If it werent for us, you mightve bled to death! I believe you owe us something!"

You looked back at her with a dumbfounded and disgusted look on your face"Uh... owe you by letting you eat me??!!" Sure enough, they actually nod their heads!
Finally, after a bit of struggling with the pain, you manage to reach the door... unfortunately, it hurts just lifting your arm to reach for the handle!

Man... the exit's just beyond your reach and yet for every move you make, it feels like your getting each and every one of your limbs slowly ripped off!

"Didnt I tell you to be a good boy?" said the green-haired nurse as she reached into her pocket, "Please calm down, patient. Bad boys get tend to get shots!

With that, she pulls out a shiny hyperthermic needle! Question is, what could be in that need?! Would you even want to find out? Whatever it is, it could add to the pain you already have!

But then... is the pain worth NOT being eaten alive?!
1531121112222212.title: CODE BLUE.................balls!

choices: The chamber changes into a grassy field
you aren't alone in the stomach
15311211122222122.content:
The pain is just too much for you and you sigh. Maybe getting eaten alive won't be so bad next to this awful pain. And anyway...if you are eaten alive, you might be out of your misery. With a groan of pain, you walk back towards the bed.

"That's better" said the green-haired nurse.

"Just make it quick" you say as you close your eyes, ready to feel your flesh being torn apart by these nurses. You wait and wait...and wait. What's the holdup already? If they wanted to eat you, why have they not done anything to you yet? The pain in your body fades somewhat once you're on the bed, but it still hurts like hell. You dare not open your eyes, because you don't want to see these nurses rip into you. You wait for something to happen, but it never happens. After 3 minutes of nothing, you open your eyes only to see you're not on your bed anymore. You're not even in the same room as before! You look around and see that the room you're in now is more like a chamber. A chamber with pinkish walls and wrinkled sides. You look around wildly and see a hole right above your head.

"Where am I?" you ask.

The only answer you get is a girlish giggle coming from everywhere around you.
15311211122222122.title: It didn't hurt at all.....

153112111222221221.content:
Your entire view changes! From what was once a humongous organic chamber with barely any breathable air is now a nice wide green lively grassy field!
For some reason, just being out in this field makes you feel a lot better... not only that, but your arms and legs no longer hurt!

You move your arm... no pain! You move your leg... no pain! To question this even further, you get up and start walking. No 'Ow ow ow ow'. The pain is officially gone! Well... there was at least ONE good thing that came out of being eaten alive...

"ONE good thing?! Is that how you repay the girls that saved your life?"

Hmm?! Who said that? You look all around this field, but no one else is there... it's just you. But you couldve sworn you heard somebody talk!

"He still doesnt get it, does he sis?"

Ok, that time youre SURE you heard someone! It sounded like one of those nurses....
"HELLO?" you shout, "ANYBODY THERE?"
No response. You try again, "HELLO??!! IS SOMEBODY THERE?!" STILL nothing! ...You know you were hearing something earlier. You just know it! But why isnt there any response now?

*wwwwwwwwwwwwWWWWHHHHHHHHHHEEEEEWWWWWWWW* Judging by that strange whistle sound from above getting louder and louder, something's falling from the sky. When you look up, all you can see a huge sharp point sticking downwards ready to impale you if you dont get out of the way!

"AAAAAHHH!!" you scream as you jump out of the way just BARELY avoiding being split in half! That gigantic sharp object is actually a huge hyperthermic needle!

"Whoops! Heheh, sorry!" a humongous hand picks that needle up off the grass... the hand belonging to a giant woman in a nurses uniform... that green haired nurse!
Not only that, but the pink-haired and blonde nurse and standing right beside her!
How.. How exactly did they get so big?! And just what happened to you while you were closing your eyes?

"Hey, I found him!" shouted the blonde pointing her huge finger at you. The three nurses towering over you start to stare into your soul... Yikes, just a few seconds ago, you were all by yourself. NOW LOOK!

All three begin smiling at you.... then wave their hands and say in unison, "...HI!"
153112111222221221.title: Nothing's hurting... except your pride.

choices: Bridget takes you somewhere private to get to know you without you being scared
Sakura and Laura snatch you from Bridget
1531121112222212211.content:
You smile back uneasily and gave them all a wave. "H...Hello again ladies..." you say.

"Poor little thing, he's scared of us. He dose have the right to be though, we DID plan on eating him alive. Anyway, it's time we were introduced. I'm Bridget, the pink-haired nurse is Sakura, and our blond is Laura." the green-haired nurse introduces. With that, Bridget scooped you up and cradled you. You struggled to get free, not wanting to risk being devoured, only for her to gently tighten her grip.

"Why not just lock him in a bird cage? he'll fit at his size...though he'd make a good love-slave at this size too..." Sakura said.

"I still can't believe you talked us into keeping him as a pet rather than eating him, Bridget. I'm hungry and he looks like the perfect-sized snack." Laura said.

Hearing that the one holding you vouched to keep you off the menu, you relaxed fractionally. You noticed Bridget held you closer with each of what the other two nurses said. She cared! She was now your favorite out of the three.
1531121112222212211.title: Smile and wave back.

choices: Try to break free and escape!
153112111222222.content:
"Hey....you allright?"

"Wha....what...."

When you wake up..... you notice a lot of bandages wrapped around your chest, arms and legs... and a stranger with a huge trenchcoat and hat on is looking down on you!

He says, "Oh thank god! For a moment, I thought she went too far with the NEXT one! Man, she did a number on you!!"

You get up and finally ask him, "W...who are you?"

"Im uh....the last boyfriend she had..." he lowered his head slightly.

"Oh...youre the one who chose to be her 'toy' instead of her snack?" you ask him.

"Uh huh..." he took off his hat... and revealed a pair of mouse ears!

You get shocked! "YOURE A....MOUSE??!!"

"Actually, a toy mouse... I was in the same toy store that she was in. I couldnt believe how stupid the store clerk was putting a toy mouse-man next to a toy cat-woman! Worst blind date I have EVER been on!!!"

"Oh.... bummer," is all you could say.

He then turns around, "OH CRAP! I gotta hide! Talk to ya later!" he dashes off!

She starts walking up to you... "Is boyfriend allright? Um...sorry...me got carried away!"

"It's uh....no problem!" you say with a forced smile.

"Goody! Boyfriend should go sleep! We play more tomorrow!!" she says with a smile!

"Oh.... goody," is all you could say.

She lays down and smuggles with you... perhaps a little TOO tight! And instantly falls asleep!

....over an hour later, you STILL cant sleep because of thinking about what she did to you today, and what she'll do to you tomorrow!

She's gripping you pretty tight in her sleep... but still, you gotta escape!!

Of course, if she finds out youre trying to leave her....well.... you can use your imagination!

...Should you make your escape NOW or wait until tomorrow?
153112111222222.title: The EX....

choices: You and Al talk some more
You ask Al how can he talk via your dreams
1531121112222222.content:
Try to escpae now and you've just signed your death warrant. You decide to try to escape tomorrow. If you can escape from her! Maybe it wouldn't be so bad to be her snack...but then, she'll probably rip you to shreds! You shudder at the mere thought.
She is sleeping VERY soundly. She purrs in her sleep and you figure that she is very pretty...when not tearing your flesh out! Finally, you manage to get to sleep. When you do get to sleep, you enter a dream. In the dream, you see the mouse-man again.
"Her name is Sandra" said the mouse-man. "My name is Al"
"I'm Sean" you say. "wait...this isn't a normal dream is it?"
"Dreams are hardly normal" said Al.
"So...why is Sandra so...the way she is?" you ask.
"Sandra is that way because it's her nature" said Al. "Lions and the other big cats are all related to your basic house cat. Sandra is more like a lion than a house cat. A house cat wouldn't--well, normally wouldn't--use you as a scratching post. A lion would--"
"Tear you to shreds" you say.
"Right" said Al. "just thank God that Sandra's claws aren't that sharp"
"Shall I let her eat me?" you ask.
"No" said Al. "you wouldn't survive...she likes to CHEW.."
"How's come Sandra's grammar isn't that good?" you ask.
"Sandra is smart" said Al. "but doesn't see the reason to use grammar"
"I see" you say.
"She did went a little overboard with you" said Al.
"A little?"
"Just don't worry" said Al. "Sanrdra isn't going to kill you, now that you're her boyfriend now"
"Well, THAT'S comforting" you say.
1531121112222222.title: Her name is Sandra

choices: Come up with a good lie!
15311211122222222.content:
"Um..Ive been wondering..." you say to Al.

"What is it Shawn?"

"Um...that's Sean."

"Thats what I said! Shaun!"

"No you did-um.. nevermind! Anyway, how are you even able to communicate with me via a dream in the first place?"

He just says to you, "How is a toy even able to talk to you in the first place?"

Her sister, on your right, blinked herself awake and purred. “Mmm he looks delicious!” she says as she licks her lips.

You gulp. “Um I’m just passing through?” it’s a long shot but at this point any things worth a shot.

Both catgirls giggle at the same moment, while their fingers draw out patterns on your chest. “Oh my no, I’d say you’re going to be with us for some time to come. What do you want to do first Jezebel?”

The other catgirl puts a finger to her lips in thought. “Let’s see how long he can last…” she says, a wide grin splitting her face as she moves herself towards your crotch.

Before you can see her do anything, her sister straddles your chest, blocking your view. “No peeking!” she teases with a wink. You try and peer around her to see what Jezebel is doing but all you can make out is the sight of her tail bobbing around. That’s when you feel something warm, wet, and rough teasing your nethers.

“Now here’s the deal!” the one sitting atop you says. “If you hold out long enough, we’ll all play a fun game together.” She giggles for a moment. “But if you can’t hold out, you become breakfast, lunch and dinner for the next three days!”

You grit your teeth, trying not to let the sensation of what’s happening to your crotch get to you. “And how long is that?”

She glances over her shoulder at Jezebel. “Just an hour, easy right?”

Jezebel does something that makes your toes curl and you curse under your breath, how the heck are you supposed to resist this for an hour.

15322221212121.title: Queen Sally?!

153222212121211.content:
You have utmost trust in Sally, so you do as she wishes. However, lots of questions start filling your head as the two of you take a little walk around the house hovering in space.

"Ok, subjects. I need to talk privately with Sean," she told the little plush-toy catgirls clinging to you, "Please remove yourself from him."
They do as their queen says... except for the one clinging to your leg! She STILL continues to smile and purr against it!

"AHEM!!!" Sally glared at the third. The third finally whimpered in disappointment and let go of you.

"Allright uh... Sally," you bring up the courage to speak to her, "Care to explain to me what's going on.."
She sighs for a bit before giving her answer, "..My... my kind are dying out."
"Wait wait wait! Your kind?!!"

"Let me finish," she tells you, "...my species is running short on males to mate with. Soon enough, we will die out. It is because of a reflex that occurs whenever we finish the sexual process... you humans refer to it as the 'Black Widow Reflex'."

"Let me guess," you interrupt her, "You eat your mate after screwing them?"
She sighs, "Exactly... however... YOU on the other hand, are different. We are still unsure why, but for some mysterious reason, whenever you are eaten alive, you magically reform back to normal! You prove to be quite an opportunity AND necessity to our kind! That is why I have chosen you to-"

"HANG ON JUST A SECOND!!!" you interrupt her again. Although you have many questions you wish to ask her (such as how did her kind become plush toys), ONE specific question came to mind...

"Which question is it?" Sally asked you obviously reading your mind!

"So... me and you... we're not really boyfriend and girlfriend? You were just hanging with me just to help your kind survive a little longer?! I was only a tool? ...What about those times we had together?! WERE THEY ALL JUST LIES??!!!"

...Good question.
153222212121211.title: The Black Widow Reflex

"Sean, Sean" said Sally. "relax, would you? All of your questions will be answered later"

1541.content:
Nothing seems out of the ordanary as you slowly descend the staircase near your bedroom door, yet you cannot help shake a sense of unease around you. The sinister air grows deeper with each step and you find yourself increasing your speed. The staircase seems longer than usual and you soon break into a run to reach it's bottom in time. It seems very much as if the stairs are growing in an attempt to halt your movement, and you are happy to finally reach the bottom. It seems silly to have grown so disturbed for no real reason, much less to sprint downstairs, but at the very least you were not seen. At least you thought that you had not been seen, until a slight blue light flickers in the corner of your right eye. Spinning about you once more find that nothing is unusual, though the sinister aura has grown far stronger. At this point you decide that going to be would be a good option to calm your nerves, but first you decide to stop by the kitchen for a quick snack. You nearly let out a scream as you reach the kitchen and come face to face with a figure. Fortunatly you realize that it is none other than your girlfriend and regain your composure.

"What are you doing here so late?" You try to hide the surprise in your voice but you doubt she will overlook having scared you. However she does not seem to acknowledge you and simply stares forward. After a few moments you notice tears running from her eyes. "It hurts... please stop it, please stop it!" To your horror gashes in her clothing begin to manifest. "Please stop it!" With no sign of cause or effect Sally then vanishes. At this time no desire for food or sleep remains, and you turn to run for the door. Once again the blue light flashes in your eye and you can feel an unspeakable presence descending upon you. There is a second flash, and with that you awaken.

The sun is already shining brightly by the time you sit up in bed, the last traces of the nightmare slipping from your mind, fortunatly it is your day off from work. After the terrible dream you barely notice the small cat on your shelf, Sally's gift to you, is now sitting at the front of it's row. In a better mindset you might have recalled having placed it much further back the night before, but it was not possible at this point. With a last yawn you roll from the bed and decide to get ready for the day ahead.

You go through your day normally... as if nothing happened... Still, you wonder what got into Sally last night! Although you dont mind Sally's cat plush toy she got you... you have a STRANGE feeling about it! But luckily, night comes and nothing out of the ordinary happens... YET!

Anyway, sleeptime comes and you have a nice, peaceful rest... at least until...

"Wake up human... NOW!!"

Whatever just shouted at you, scared the living hell out of you and cause you to wake up!

When you wake up... you notice a gigantic man staring down at you... an eerie young man... with long black hair, green eyes with slanted pupils... and with strange cat ears!!!

Your first thought is, "What in the hell..." as you look around your room... it's HUGE!!! It's like your bed goes on for miles!! You're shrunk!

"You obviously got a knack for the obvious!" The cat-man smiles at you!

You quiver in fear at what he wants do with you!

"It's understandable!"

"W..w..who are you?" you ask him.

He grins at you... revealing a pair of cat-fangs! "Oh Im sorry, where are my manners? I am Chronos! Uh... pronounced like 'Crow-nose' in case you have a hard time remembering it!"

You look behind him and notice that creepy cat-doll on your shelf is gone!! Could he be..

"Yep! It's ME!"

"uh...Chronos.. what is it you want with me?" you ask him while shaking.

He continues to smile, "I'll give you a hint: Hmm... I cant seem to find a mouse anywhere! Looks like I'll have to settle with YOU!"

You jump! "WHAT??!!! YOURE GONNA EAT ME?!"

Chronos nods his head, "Uh huh! I was thinking about eating your girlfriend... but she's a bit too SQUEMISH! I perfer female prey myself... but, what the hell? Maybe Ive been missing out on something good!"

You look him straight in the eye and say, "Sally... what did you do to her, last night?!"

He laughs a bit, "Heheh... I was kinda fooling around with her! What do you expect? IM A CAT! I LOVE PLAYING WITH PREY!!!"

You start to beg, "No! Please dont! I dont wanna die!!"

"Relax! Youre not gonna die!" Chronos tells you, "You'll just be stored with the others!"

You gulp, "Uh...others?"

Just then, he snatches you off the bed with a hand/paw and looks at you with a wicked grin, "Now... since Im such a nice creature, I'll gladly give you a choice: You can just be swallowed now nice and easy... or we can play one last game before you say G'Bye!!!"

1542.content:
It was rather funny, in all honesty, that the most powerful being on the planet was being sold within a ninty nine cents bin. On the other hand it was actually rather fortunate that your current owner did not realize your true "value"; otherwise you might not have been found in time by a proper owner. In actuality you could remain fully powered for over a decade without a meal, however you were still very eagier to feel your belly filling once again. The owner of the shop was always a possibility but he was easily ninty, his life force would lack the vivid flavor that youth provided.

Your chain of thought was broken as a young man, about seventeen, stepped into the shop. The doors movements triggered a light bell which stirred the owner back into full attention as well. Outright communication would harm your cause and as such you instead simply did you best to radiate an aura that would cause you to stand apart from the bins other items. For a moment it appeared the ruse had failed, had you grown so weak already?! Seconds passed before he finally turned back to the bin and plucked you up, his large hands fully enwrapping your tiny form. Without a word he produced a wallet with his free hand and slipped a doller upon the counter. As your new owner turned to leave the shop keeper locked his gaze directly upon you, could he possibly have known what you were?! Regardless the old man made no attempts to stop your exit as you were carried to your new owners car. The light of the sun, how long it had been, subtly increased the scent of your owner's hand. To a normal creature this would have been unnoticable but it sent your palette into storms.

As your owner entered the car you were rather unceremoniously dumped onto the backseat. Pain was an alien concept to you but discomfort was certainly real, your meals final moments would be that much more painful. There was no noticible change in your felt body but as the car ride continued you began to relax, waiting for the coming games to begin.

1551121.content:
The Renamon plush toy your girlfriend gave you is.... unique. But not in a bad way. For one thing, it's pretty big for a toy. In fact it's life-sized! Also, it has movable limbs, which makes it eerily real. Of course, you have no idea how real it is.

One night, as you're watching TV you hear a crash from your room. You grab a bat, which happens to be laying around, and head upstairs. Cautiously, you open the door to your room to see that...
1551121.title: Yes, even it is cliche!

choices: Another animal enters the room before Frank can explain
15511211.content:
When you enter your room, you turn on the light and find it completely trashed! Books, bookcases, your clock radio, and nearly all of your clothes are all on the floor. It's as if someone was looking for something and they didn't care to clean up. You notice one wall of your room has been spray-painted with two words: Furry Lover. Another wall is spray-painted with the words "Welcome to the war, kid". You look around to see nothing is missing except for your Renamon doll. You look down at your bed to see a lengthy note lying there, no doubt left behind by whoever stole the Renamon toy. You pick up the note and read it.



"What war?" is no doubt the first question that you're thinking about. Well, it's a long story...much too long for this piece of paper. Let's just say for now that this war has been going on for a thousand years; a war between us Humans and the Furries. A Furry is an anthromorphic animal; an animal with human traits. If you want to learn more about Furries, I suggest you visit the following address: 30410 Alberta Benson Blvd. There, you'll find one of the Furries that we've tracked down...we're aiming to kill him any day now; he doesn't even know that we know where he lives. He goes by the name of Daniel Fredrick MacGregor and he's a horse. Good luck not getting eaten by him.
Why did we take your little Renamon toy? Let's just say we're preventing something very bad to happen. Like I said, the story behind the war is far too long to explain here. Trust me, you'll be glad that we took Renamon away. Don't come looking for us; by the time you read this, we'll be outside the county. Goodbye.

D.W. L.


Alberta Benson Blvd? That's clear across town, near the Van Meer Homes...which happens to be a bad neighborhood. You haven't heard of this MacGregor before. He's a horse? This is all very confusing!

Suddenly, two people enter your room. Or rather...two animals enter your room. One of them is a raccoon that's slightly taller than you, and the other is a very obese rat that's only four feet tall. The two animals are dressed like normal people; the raccoon is wearing a tee shirt and blue jeans while the rat is wearing a polo shirt and sweat pants that clashed horribly with the polo shirt. They take a look around the room before talking to you.

"Give me that note" said the rat, snatching it from your grip and glancing at it. "Langford again"

"No surprise there" said the raccoon.

"Excuse me" you say. "what is this all about?"

"Brief him" said the rat.

"Here?" asked the raccoon, who was now holding the note and reading it over. "he says that they know where Daniel is hiding. We should go there and get him out of there"

"Daniel has moved" said the rat. "he moved two days ago. Roger and Harrison helped him"

"Okay, okay" said the raccoon. "but we should get out of here to start looking for...Renamon"

"They're probably heading for New Philly" said the rat. "okay, brief the kid on the way"

"Hey, I'm not a..." you start to protest.

"Right...we're not doing this proper, are we?" asked the raccoon. "my name is Frank and this is...Templeton"

"Theodore" corrected the rat.

"Can I get a straight answer for once?" you ask.

Frank the raccoon sighs heavily and starts to explain.
15511211.title: Welcome to the war

155112112.content:
"Alright," Frank said, sighing. "Follow us out to the car, and I'll explain along the way." You follow them outside, lock all the doors in the house, and get in the backseat. "Now then," Frank started, "allow me to explain what's going on. But, I must preface that it does tend to drag on in certain places, so I'll try to minimize the filler."

         After a very long, very drawn-out explanation, you started to understand what was going on. Back in the 70's when the furry fandom began to form, a strange phenomenon began happening to many of the people within it; they began to turn into their fursonas with no rhyme or reason. They also had the ability to turn back into humans - as Frank and Theodore had done so as not to draw unwanted attention to the car - at will, which explained why you had never heard of this before; because very few people actually knew it was a thing. Of course, a handful of people outside of the furry fandom had a problem with people becoming animals, calling them, among other things, "abominations". This ultimately led to a, for want of a better term, war between the furries who could transform and the self-proclaimed "anti-furs"; a war that was still happening, and one you were now roped into, whether you like it or not.

         "Wow," you said. "This is an awful lot of information to take in, but I think I get the gist of it. You said this has been going on since the 70's right? Well, the person who left me that note said it's been going on for a thousand years or so."

         "Either they were just exaggerating for theatricality," Theodore said, "or they were flat-out lying. Either way, the fact of the matter is that this war has been going for as long as the furry fandom has been around. And it's constantly covered up by the media whenever there are casualties on either side; the news ain't gonna say 'the killer was an anti-fur', for instance. But there ARE some instances where the media will try to turn neutral people to the side of the anti-furs."

         "Wait," you say, "you mean like that one episode of CSI?"

         "You catch on quick," Frank answered. "That episode--"

         "It was called Fur and Loathing, which is a pun on Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, since the original CSI takes place in Las Vegas," Theodore said. "That doesn't have any relevance to the conversation, but I can't let obvious puns go unmentioned... It's a really bad habit of mine."

         "Yes, I know," Frank said, annoyance clear in his voice. "As I was saying before I was so rudely interrupted, that episode was written by an anti-fur to try and get neutral people to turn against us. And it worked; that episode was the first time many people had even heard of furries before, and many of the people who saw it still think we're nothing but sexual deviants and still conflate us with otherkin."

(Author's Note: I don't actually know if the real life writer of that episode was an anti-fur or not; I'm just trying to do some world-building.)

         "Well," you begin, "I wasn't fooled by that episode, or by CSI in general. Growing up with a police detective for a mom and a scientist for a dad, they taught me many things about their respective trades, and I knew that CSI oversimplified pretty much everything. Besides, Law and Order was WAY better."

         "I see," Frank said. "Back to the point, the media has swayed more than its fair share of people against us. The media has made attempts to sway people to our side; some more successful than others. But whichever side they're swayed to, these people become supportive of that side of this war, whether or not they realize it."

         "Ok, but, why did the anti-furs come after me," you asked? "I'm not a furry, nor am I on the side of the furries. Even if I was, how exactly could I help them? I'm just an accountant. But at the very top of this long list of questions is this: why did they steal my Renamon plushy? That was a hand made anniversary gift from my late wife; it's all I have left to remember her by."

         "Wait, a hand made gift from your wife," Theodore said, "and you said she's dead. How exactly did she die?"

         "Huh? She died from a gunshot wound while she was walking to the cafe on the corner a few months ago," you replied with a noticeable hint of confusion in your voice. "The coroner told me she was hit by stray bullet." Frank and Theodore looked at each other, their eyes visibly widening. "Huh? What's wrong?"

         "Tell me," Frank said, his voice thick with concern; "what was her name?"

         "Her... name? Uh... her name was Sayaka Ishida," you answer honestly. "Why do you ask; were you friends of hers? Because, if so, she never mentioned you before."

         "Are you dense," Frank asked? "Your wife was a prominent member of the furry fandom. Don't tell me you didn't know that."

         "Wait what? She never told me she was a furry," you said, getting even more confused. "She never did anything to imply she was a furry either."

         "Well let me ask you something," Theodore said; "didn't Sayaka make lifelike plushies and sell them on the internet, most of them being animal ones? And you never thought that was suspicious?"

         "Y-yeah," you replied. "She told me told me it was just a hobby that started when she was eight. She also told me she sold them to parents to give to their children as presents."

         "So this IS news to you," Frank sighed. "Well, let me let you in on another little secret of hers. Now, you may want to prepare yourself for this, because it might blow your mind: Sayaka not only had a Renamon fursona, but she could turn into it as well."

         "She could what," you exclaimed?! "She never told me that."

         "She was probably going to tell you when the time was right," Frank said. "Additionally, Sayaka wasn't hit by a stray bullet; she was targeted by an anti-fur. Her killer just made it LOOK like she was hit by a stray bullet."

         "Wh-what," you asked? You were starting to get angry now; you loved Sayaka with all your heart, and now you learned that she was murdered. "When I find whoever was responsible, I'll fucking gut them like a fish!"

         "Well," Theodore said, "you're in luck; Sayaka's killer is the very person who stole your Renamon plushy. And we're taking you to them right now. Speak of the Devil, there's the place."

         Frank then pulls the car up to a house and the three of you head inside. There you find...

Option 1: Your plushy had come to life, and it was in the process of swallowing Sayaka's killer whole.

Option 2: Similar to the above, but your plushy had already finished swallowing Sayaka's killer.

Option 3: Your plushy was fighting Sayaka's killer and winning.

Living in a small town is a mixed blessing. For one thing, small towns aren't crime-ridden areas like those big cities are. But small towns are poor towns, with not many shops or people in them. Chester is one of those crossroads towns that are small. Chester has a population of maybe 5,000. It's only claim to fame was Lake Chester, which is a huge camping ground and national park. If it wasn't for the national Park, the town of Chester wouldn't be where it was. The town also has one big factory in it, and a couple of shops. One of these shops was a shop that was called "Gregory's Shop". Gregory's Shop sold all sorts of weird stuff---it's a thrift shop. The store's owner--Gregory Dearns--was a very charitable man....not to mention very religious. Gregory's Shop sells second-hand goods and a fair few--and rather limited--DVDs and old VHS tapes. The shop has two dozen volunteers that work at the store. And you just happen to be one of the volunteers that work at the store as a stock boy.
One evening, you were stocking the part of the store that sold second-hand stuffed animals. Some of the stuffed animals looked pretty dirty, but perfectly suited to be sold at the store. It was near quitting time and some of the employees are leaving for the day. You put the last stuffed animal up on the shelf and you notice that it's a plush toy of Angewomon of the Digimon series. The plush toy is about three feet tall. When you leave it on the shelf, you hear a voice in your head calling your name. "Don't leave me here" the voice had said. It had been a soft feminine voice. You look around, but see nobody around.
"Take me with you" the voice said again.
You look back at the Angewomon and....grabbed it off of the shelf. You hadn't intended to remove it from the shelf, it was like your body was moving by itself. You stuff the Angewomon back in the box you got it from. You then walked to the back of the shop, threw away the box in a large bin and leave the shop with the Angewomon in hand. The next thing you knew, you're at your house and you enter it with your key. You had just moved into this house after graduating from college.
You take the Angewomon to your room and leave it there and went back downstairs to watch TV and have dinner.
When bedtime came, you went upstairs and enter your room.......and gasped in shock as you see that your room has been cleaned. The walls of your room are now covered in Christian art and a huge Cross is now on your door.
"Your room looks better now" said a feminine voice. You turn to see that the plush toy of Angewomon is on your bed, smiling up at you! When you were turning to face the plush toy, you thought you saw something else than a simple plush toy at the corner of your eye....but when you fully turned to face Angewomon, you see a simple plush toy.

You Blink. "What do you mean?"
